engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: Apparently, something happened over by the harbor earlier today. Why have things been so dangerous lately?
engSearchText:
Apparently, something happened over by the harbor
earlier today. Why have things been so
dangerous lately?
jpnChrName: 今度は港の方でも何かあったの……？ 昨晩と言い、ここのところ物騒というか……
jpnSearchText:
今度は港の方でも何かあったの……？
昨晩と言い、ここのところ物騒というか……

engChrName: And here I was thinking I could have some peace for once in my life...
engSearchText:
And here I was thinking I could have some peace for
once in my life...
jpnChrName: せっかく越してきてからこの方、友達もできて この街も安心して暮らせるなって思っていたのに……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく越してきてからこの方、友達もできて
この街も安心して暮らせるなって思っていたのに……

engChrName: I heard there was an incident last night in the Eastern Quarter. People have been talking all about that weird fog.
engSearchText:
I heard there was an incident last night in the
Eastern Quarter. People have been talking all about
that weird fog.
jpnChrName: 昨晩東方人街で事件があったって…… 向こうにいる友達も大丈夫かしら……？
jpnSearchText:
昨晩東方人街で事件があったって……
向こうにいる友達も大丈夫かしら……？

engChrName: I hope my friends over there are okay...
engSearchText: I hope my friends over there are okay...
jpnChrName: 最近は不良の喧嘩も増えたと聞くけど…… そういえば妙な霧も出ていたような……
jpnSearchText:
最近は不良の喧嘩も増えたと聞くけど……
そういえば妙な霧も出ていたような……

engChrName: Every time I watch Wolves' Requiem, I find new things to love about it. Director Lam is a master of his craft.
engSearchText:
Every time I watch Wolves' Requiem, I find new
things to love about it. Director Lam is a master of
his craft.
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱりラム監督の『狼達の鎮魂歌』は 何度見ても面白いわね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱりラム監督の『狼達の鎮魂歌』は
何度見ても面白いわね……

engChrName: I only started watching Kowloon Pictures films when I moved here, but I quickly became an avid fan.
engSearchText:
I only started watching Kowloon Pictures films when
I moved here, but I quickly became an avid fan.
jpnChrName: 《九龍映像》の映画、最初はラングポートに 越してきて、せっかくだからって見始めたけど……
jpnSearchText:
《九龍映像》の映画、最初はラングポートに
越してきて、せっかくだからって見始めたけど……

engChrName: I was drawn in by their unique settings and atmospheres.
engSearchText:
I was drawn in by their unique settings
and atmospheres.
jpnChrName: 今になってみると普通に世界観に引き込まれる というか、雰囲気が癖になるというか……
jpnSearchText:
今になってみると普通に世界観に引き込まれる
というか、雰囲気が癖になるというか……

engChrName: Thanks to those movies, I've made friends with Easterners who have a shared interest in film.
engSearchText:
Thanks to those movies, I've made friends with
Easterners who have a shared interest in film.
jpnChrName: 映画を通して東方人の友達もできたし、 映画って本当に良いものよねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
映画を通して東方人の友達もできたし、
映画って本当に良いものよねぇ……

engChrName: It's been a year since I moved to Langport, and life's been great ever since.
engSearchText:
It's been a year since I moved to Langport, and life's
been great ever since.
jpnChrName: ラングポート……もう越してきて一年になるけど、 住んでみると面白いのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポート……もう越してきて一年になるけど、
住んでみると面白いのよねぇ。

engChrName: I feel like I'm living in all those Eastern-style action flicks I love so much.
engSearchText:
I feel like I'm living in all those Eastern-style action
flicks I love so much.
jpnChrName: ほら、まさに東方系の活劇映画の世界みたいで、 暮らして感じられる空気感もあるというか……
jpnSearchText:
ほら、まさに東方系の活劇映画の世界みたいで、
暮らして感じられる空気感もあるというか……

engChrName: It's fun to compare the cultural differences of Langport and the place I grew up in.
engSearchText:
It's fun to compare the cultural differences of
Langport and the place I grew up in.
jpnChrName: 文化の違いなんかも、むしろ友達を作りながら お互いに楽しめるものだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
文化の違いなんかも、むしろ友達を作りながら
お互いに楽しめるものだしねぇ。

engChrName: We're getting the usual afternoon traffic, thankfully.
engSearchText: We're getting the usual afternoon traffic, thankfully.
jpnChrName: 朝に比べて客入りが戻ってきましたよ。
jpnSearchText: 朝に比べて客入りが戻ってきましたよ。

engChrName: Now that the cops, the Bracer Guild, and Heiyue are on the move, the people are a bit less anxious.
engSearchText:
Now that the cops, the Bracer Guild, and Heiyue are
on the move, the people are a bit less anxious.
jpnChrName: やはり警察やギルド、黒月が動き出したから 不安も払拭されたんですかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり警察やギルド、黒月が動き出したから
不安も払拭されたんですかねぇ。

engChrName: As long as people feel like they can kick back and enjoy movies again, I can be at ease, too.
engSearchText:
As long as people feel like they can kick back and
enjoy movies again, I can be at ease, too.
jpnChrName: この調子で普段通りに映画を楽しめる 雰囲気が戻ってくれれば安心できますね。
jpnSearchText:
この調子で普段通りに映画を楽しめる
雰囲気が戻ってくれれば安心できますね。

engChrName: We could see the fog that covered the Eastern Quarter from here. It was...unsettling.
engSearchText:
We could see the fog that covered the Eastern
Quarter from here. It was...unsettling.
jpnChrName: 向こう岸に出た霧……ここからも見えて、 随分と不自然でしたが結局何だったのでしょうね……
jpnSearchText:
向こう岸に出た霧……ここからも見えて、
随分と不自然でしたが結局何だったのでしょうね……

engChrName: Evidently, there were murders that happened within the fog.
engSearchText:
Evidently, there were murders that happened within
the fog.
jpnChrName: やはり不安な方も多いのか、 今朝は少し客入りが減ってしまいましたし……
jpnSearchText:
やはり不安な方も多いのか、
今朝は少し客入りが減ってしまいましたし……

engChrName: Can't blame people for being cagey this morning. I wouldn't be in the mood to go to the theaters, either...
engSearchText:
Can't blame people for being cagey this morning.
I wouldn't be in the mood to go to the
theaters, either...
jpnChrName: まあ……聞けば霧の中で殺人事件もあったというし、 東方人街の人達は映画どころじゃないのかもですね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……聞けば霧の中で殺人事件もあったというし、
東方人街の人達は映画どころじゃないのかもですね……

engChrName: I hear this year's film festival is going to be held in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I hear this year's film festival is going to be held
in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: そう言えば今年は映画祭を、 南東のサルバッド市でも開催するそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば今年は映画祭を、
南東のサルバッド市でも開催するそうですね。

engChrName: I wonder who's going to win the award for best director. Personally, I'm rooting for Director Lam.
engSearchText:
I wonder who's going to win the award for
best director. Personally, I'm rooting for
Director Lam.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の目玉といえば監督賞、自分はやはり 九龍映像のラム監督を応援したいですが……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の目玉といえば監督賞、自分はやはり
九龍映像のラム監督を応援したいですが……

engChrName: Although, I AM a big fan of Director Gotti, too, so I wouldn't mind if he won it.
engSearchText:
Although, I AM a big fan of Director Gotti, too, so I
wouldn't mind if he won it.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督の作品も捨てがたいところが多くて。 どっちを応援したものか悩ましいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督の作品も捨てがたいところが多くて。
どっちを応援したものか悩ましいですよ。

engChrName: Welcome to Cinema Nouvelle! What movie would you like to watch?
engSearchText:
Welcome to Cinema Nouvelle! What movie would
you like to watch?
jpnChrName: 《シネマ・ヌーヴェル》へようこそ、 何か映画を観ていきますか？
jpnSearchText:
《シネマ・ヌーヴェル》へようこそ、
何か映画を観ていきますか？

engChrName: We host films from our local Kowloon Pictures studio, but we also show movies from other companies as well, such as Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
We host films from our local Kowloon Pictures
studio, but we also show movies from other
companies as well, such as Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: うちではラングポートの誇る《九龍映像》の作品を 中心に上映していますが、当然他社の物もありますよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちではラングポートの誇る《九龍映像》の作品を
中心に上映していますが、当然他社の物もありますよ。

engChrName: People are always lining up to see Director Gotti's newest feature films.
engSearchText:
People are always lining up to see Director Gotti's
newest feature films.
jpnChrName: 例えば《ベガスフィルム》の ゴッチ監督作品もなかなか人気でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
例えば《ベガスフィルム》の
ゴッチ監督作品もなかなか人気でしてね。

engChrName: Fans of Kowloon's action flicks often flock to Gotti's. There's some stiff competition in that genre.
engSearchText:
Fans of Kowloon's action flicks often flock to Gotti's.
There's some stiff competition in that genre.
jpnChrName: 九龍映像もスペクタクルな作品は結構ありますしね、 九龍映像のファンにもゴッチ作品はウケやすいようで。
jpnSearchText:
九龍映像もスペクタクルな作品は結構ありますしね、
九龍映像のファンにもゴッチ作品はウケやすいようで。

engChrName: Things are back to normal around here, so I'm not as depressed as I was this morning. Glad I didn't call in sick.
engSearchText:
Things are back to normal around here, so I'm not as
depressed as I was this morning. Glad I didn't call
in sick.
jpnChrName: ま、周りの雰囲気も戻ってきたし、 今更怖がってもしかたないですしねー。
jpnSearchText:
ま、周りの雰囲気も戻ってきたし、
今更怖がってもしかたないですしねー。

engChrName: Doubt that thought even crossed the pasta guy's mind, though. He has so much passion for his job— and I'm just here for my paycheck.
engSearchText:
Doubt that thought even crossed the pasta guy's
mind, though. He has so much passion for his job—
and I'm just here for my paycheck.
jpnChrName: あのパスタ屋みたいな情熱はウザいけど、 せいぜいお給料分は働くとしますかー。
jpnSearchText:
あのパスタ屋みたいな情熱はウザいけど、
せいぜいお給料分は働くとしますかー。

engChrName: Ugh. I'm down in the dumps after what happened yesterday.
engSearchText:
Ugh. I'm down in the dumps after what
happened yesterday.
jpnChrName: いやー……昨日のは参ったですよー。 事件の事もあって大分滅入りますー……
jpnSearchText:
いやー……昨日のは参ったですよー。
事件の事もあって大分滅入りますー……

engChrName: Maybe I should take the day off. I'm sure one of the other part-timers could take over my shift.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should take the day off. I'm sure one of the
other part-timers could take over my shift.
jpnChrName: どうせただのバイトだし、こういう時くらい、 休んでも罰当たらないと思ったけど……
jpnSearchText:
どうせただのバイトだし、こういう時くらい、
休んでも罰当たらないと思ったけど……

engChrName: But the pasta guy's still going strong...
engSearchText: But the pasta guy's still going strong...
jpnChrName: あのパスタ屋が暑苦しく頑張ってるのを見ると、 自分だけ休むのも何か癪だなと思いましてー。
jpnSearchText:
あのパスタ屋が暑苦しく頑張ってるのを見ると、
自分だけ休むのも何か癪だなと思いましてー。

engChrName: *sigh* Never mind I'd feel guilty if I threw in the towel.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Never mind I'd feel guilty if I threw in
the towel.
jpnChrName: そんなわけで、不本意ながら普段通りに 甘味とジュース販売中でーす。
jpnSearchText:
そんなわけで、不本意ながら普段通りに
甘味とジュース販売中でーす。

engChrName: Whew. I'm beat. I can't even muster the energy to close up shop...
engSearchText:
Whew. I'm beat. I can't even muster the energy to
close up shop...
jpnChrName: ふう、今日はいつも以上に疲れましたー。 店仕舞いもだるいですー。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今日はいつも以上に疲れましたー。
店仕舞いもだるいですー。

engChrName: Meanwhile, that pasta guy over there is still full of vim and vigor.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, that pasta guy over there is still full of
vim and vigor.
jpnChrName: しかしあっちのパスタ屋はこんな遅くまで 相変わらず元気ですねー。
jpnSearchText:
しかしあっちのパスタ屋はこんな遅くまで
相変わらず元気ですねー。

engChrName: How in the heck is that noodlehead not drop-dead tired?!
engSearchText:
How in the heck is that noodlehead not
drop-dead tired?!
jpnChrName: まったく、あの人の熱量は一体 どっから来てるんですかねー？
jpnSearchText:
まったく、あの人の熱量は一体
どっから来てるんですかねー？

engChrName: Welcome! Would you like an Eastern snack? We have delicious mantou!
engSearchText:
Welcome! Would you like an Eastern snack?
We have delicious mantou!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませー、東方伝統の軽食、 饅頭（マントウ）はいかがですかー？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませー、東方伝統の軽食、
饅頭（マントウ）はいかがですかー？

engChrName: They're freshly cooked, piping hot, and go great with our lychee juice.
engSearchText:
They're freshly cooked, piping hot, and go great with
our lychee juice.
jpnChrName: できたてホクホク、こちらの ライチジュースともよく合いますよー？
jpnSearchText:
できたてホクホク、こちらの
ライチジュースともよく合いますよー？

engChrName: They're a Langport specialty. You'll fall head over heels for them with just one bite!
engSearchText:
They're a Langport specialty. You'll fall head over
heels for them with just one bite!
jpnChrName: これぞまさに煌都名物、 ぜひぜひお試しくださいー！
jpnSearchText:
これぞまさに煌都名物、
ぜひぜひお試しくださいー！

engChrName: My pasta is working its wonders! I've had a slew of Easterners lining up at my stand today!
engSearchText:
My pasta is working its wonders! I've had a slew of
Easterners lining up at my stand today!
jpnChrName: さて、改めて普段通りにパスタを広めんッ！ 今日は思ったよりも東方人も来てくれたッ！
jpnSearchText:
さて、改めて普段通りにパスタを広めんッ！
今日は思ったよりも東方人も来てくれたッ！

engChrName: Looks like they all want a change of pace.
engSearchText: Looks like they all want a change of pace.
jpnChrName: やはり彼らも、新しいものを食べて 気分転換したいのだなッ！
jpnSearchText:
やはり彼らも、新しいものを食べて
気分転換したいのだなッ！

engChrName: Now's the time for pasta to shine!
engSearchText: Now's the time for pasta to shine!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、これを機に東方人の皆にも パスタが愛されれば嬉しい限りッ！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、これを機に東方人の皆にも
パスタが愛されれば嬉しい限りッ！

engChrName: Everyone's fraught with worry over last night's events. I'm hoping my pasta can cheer people up a little.
engSearchText:
Everyone's fraught with worry over last night's events.
I'm hoping my pasta can cheer people up a little.
jpnChrName: 向こうで起きた事件で皆が不安がっているが…… こんな時こそパスタを食して元気を出そう！
jpnSearchText:
向こうで起きた事件で皆が不安がっているが……
こんな時こそパスタを食して元気を出そう！

engChrName: When I'm down, a bowl of noodles always perks me right up. Pasta, buckwheat, and Eastern noodles will all do the trick.
engSearchText:
When I'm down, a bowl of noodles always perks me
right up. Pasta, buckwheat, and Eastern noodles will
all do the trick.
jpnChrName: 麺には人を元気にする不思議な力があるッ！ それは、パスタも蕎麦も東方麺も同じだッ！
jpnSearchText:
麺には人を元気にする不思議な力があるッ！
それは、パスタも蕎麦も東方麺も同じだッ！

engChrName: I just want pasta to make a difference in this city— and maybe it can do so by bringing smiles back to people's faces!
engSearchText:
I just want pasta to make a difference in this city—
and maybe it can do so by bringing smiles back to
people's faces!
jpnChrName: 俺が皆のために出来るのはパスタで人々を癒す事ッ！ ならば迷う事などあろうはずもない！
jpnSearchText:
俺が皆のために出来るのはパスタで人々を癒す事ッ！
ならば迷う事などあろうはずもない！

engChrName: There's nothing in the world that rivals this evening view...except pasta, of course.
engSearchText:
There's nothing in the world that rivals this evening
view...except pasta, of course.
jpnChrName: ははは、夜景を臨みながら食する パスタは一層に絶品！
jpnSearchText:
ははは、夜景を臨みながら食する
パスタは一層に絶品！

engChrName: Did you know that pasta pairs excellently with wine? Perhaps you should consider taking a swig and a slurp as you relax and enjoy the night sky.
engSearchText:
Did you know that pasta pairs excellently with wine?
Perhaps you should consider taking a swig and a slurp
as you relax and enjoy the night sky.
jpnChrName: ワインにも合うしな、夜は夜でパスタは 東方麺に負けぬ事を示してみせるッ！
jpnSearchText:
ワインにも合うしな、夜は夜でパスタは
東方麺に負けぬ事を示してみせるッ！

engChrName: It's quite fortuitous that the shivering breeze is carrying the scent of olives. Those who are seeking warmth will no doubt be drawn here!
engSearchText:
It's quite fortuitous that the shivering breeze is
carrying the scent of olives. Those who are seeking
warmth will no doubt be drawn here!
jpnChrName: 夜風がオリーブの香りを夜の街に運び、 人々を引き込んでくれると信じてッ！
jpnSearchText:
夜風がオリーブの香りを夜の街に運び、
人々を引き込んでくれると信じてッ！

engChrName: Some may claim that the greatest noodles in the world are the Eastern noodles—but to that I say, 'Nay!'
engSearchText:
Some may claim that the greatest noodles in the
world are the Eastern noodles—but to that I
say, 'Nay!'
jpnChrName: 麺類の頂点に立つのはパスタ！ この街でそれを証明してみせるッ！
jpnSearchText:
麺類の頂点に立つのはパスタ！
この街でそれを証明してみせるッ！

engChrName: Because we have pasta—and I'm here to prove that it stands at the peak of the noodle pyramid!
engSearchText:
Because we have pasta—and I'm here to prove that it
stands at the peak of the noodle pyramid!
jpnChrName: パスタを売るなら他の街の方が良い という意見も百も承知！
jpnSearchText:
パスタを売るなら他の街の方が良い
という意見も百も承知！

engChrName: Starting up a successful pasta business in this city will no doubt be an uphill battle, but pasta WILL come out on top.
engSearchText:
Starting up a successful pasta business in this city will
no doubt be an uphill battle, but pasta WILL come
out on top.
jpnChrName: だが、そんなハンデを貰っては 勝負に勝ったとは言えん！
jpnSearchText:
だが、そんなハンデを貰っては
勝負に勝ったとは言えん！

engChrName: The fall of the Eastern noodle dynasty in Langport is nigh—and it will come at the noodly hand of pasta!
engSearchText:
The fall of the Eastern noodle dynasty in Langport is
nigh—and it will come at the noodly hand of pasta!
jpnChrName: 東方の麺類が覇権を握るこの地で勝利してこそ、 真の覇者を決められるというものッ！
jpnSearchText:
東方の麺類が覇権を握るこの地で勝利してこそ、
真の覇者を決められるというものッ！

engChrName: I can't believe I threw my pouch instead of the ball... I guess I'm a little drowsy today after all.
engSearchText:
I can't believe I threw my pouch instead of the ball...
I guess I'm a little drowsy today after all.
jpnChrName: 私とした事が、息子と遊んでいる時にまで うたた寝しちゃうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
私とした事が、息子と遊んでいる時にまで
うたた寝しちゃうなんて……

engChrName: It's a good thing I have a son who always looks out for me.
engSearchText:
It's a good thing I have a son who always looks out
for me.
jpnChrName: それにしても……投げちゃったポーチまで 拾ってくれて本当に良い子になったわねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……投げちゃったポーチまで
拾ってくれて本当に良い子になったわねぇ……

engChrName: When my son and I were heading home last night, we saw the fog in the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
When my son and I were heading home last night,
we saw the fog in the Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: 昨日は東方人街の方で騒ぎがあって…… 帰り道の辺りもいくらか混乱していたのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日は東方人街の方で騒ぎがあって……
帰り道の辺りもいくらか混乱していたのよねぇ。

engChrName: I panicked and tried to rush home, but in the middle of our run, I lost my balance and nearly fell.
engSearchText:
I panicked and tried to rush home, but in the middle
of our run, I lost my balance and nearly fell.
jpnChrName: 私もびっくりしちゃって、帰り道で慌てて 転びそうになってしまったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
私もびっくりしちゃって、帰り道で慌てて
転びそうになってしまったんだけど……

engChrName: Thankfully, my son was there to break my fall. When did he become so dependable?
engSearchText:
Thankfully, my son was there to break my fall.
When did he become so dependable?
jpnChrName: 驚いた事に、息子が咄嗟に支えてくれたのよ。 いつの間に頼もしく育ったのやら……
jpnSearchText:
驚いた事に、息子が咄嗟に支えてくれたのよ。
いつの間に頼もしく育ったのやら……

engChrName: He's growing up so fast... I should make more of an effort to play with him. We need to enjoy the time we have together.
engSearchText:
He's growing up so fast... I should make more of an
effort to play with him. We need to enjoy the time we
have together.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、遊び相手もして少しでも この子と親子の縁を深めなきゃ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、遊び相手もして少しでも
この子と親子の縁を深めなきゃ……

engChrName: I promised my son I'd spend time with him, but I fell asleep... I feel terrible.
engSearchText:
I promised my son I'd spend time with him, but I
fell asleep... I feel terrible.
jpnChrName: 随分と長い事寝てしまったみたいで…… 息子の相手できなくて申し訳なかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
随分と長い事寝てしまったみたいで……
息子の相手できなくて申し訳なかったわ。

engChrName: The park is a peaceful retreat from the noisy hustle and bustle of the city. Maybe that's why I get so sleepy every time I come here.
engSearchText:
The park is a peaceful retreat from the noisy hustle
and bustle of the city. Maybe that's why I get so
sleepy every time I come here.
jpnChrName: ラングポートは街自体が騒がしいからねぇ、 公園に来ると、その反動で寝ちゃうのよ……
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートは街自体が騒がしいからねぇ、
公園に来ると、その反動で寝ちゃうのよ……

engChrName: Mmm... Whoops...
engSearchText: Mmm... Whoops...
jpnChrName: むにゃむにゃ…… 引っかかったわね……
jpnSearchText:
むにゃむにゃ……
引っかかったわね……

engChrName: Zzz...
engSearchText: Zzz...
jpnChrName: ……すーっ……
jpnSearchText: ……すーっ……

engChrName: Hey, hey! Wake up, Mommy! The weather's super nice today!
engSearchText:
Hey, hey! Wake up, Mommy! The weather's super
nice today!
jpnChrName: ねぇねぇマーマー、起きてよー。 せっかくのお天気だよー。
jpnSearchText:
ねぇねぇマーマー、起きてよー。
せっかくのお天気だよー。

engChrName: Mmm... Right, right...
engSearchText: Mmm... Right, right...
jpnChrName: うーん……そうよ～ ……むにゃむにゃ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん……そうよ～
……むにゃむにゃ……

engChrName: Zzz...
engSearchText: Zzz...
jpnChrName: すーっ……
jpnSearchText: すーっ……

engChrName: *sigh* Mommy went to sleep again... She promised to play with me.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Mommy went to sleep again... She promised to
play with me.
jpnChrName: ママ、また寝ちゃった…… 遊んでくれるヤクソクだったのに。
jpnSearchText:
ママ、また寝ちゃった……
遊んでくれるヤクソクだったのに。

engChrName: I wonder if there's any fun games I can play by myself.
engSearchText:
I wonder if there's any fun games I can play
by myself.
jpnChrName: 何か一人で遊べるおもしろい事、 ないかなー？
jpnSearchText:
何か一人で遊べるおもしろい事、
ないかなー？

engChrName: Thank you again for yesterday, Yao. You've grown up so much.
engSearchText:
Thank you again for yesterday, Yao. You've grown up
so much.
jpnChrName: ヤオ、昨日はありがとうね。 ヤオが良い子に育ってて嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤオ、昨日はありがとうね。
ヤオが良い子に育ってて嬉しいわ。

engChrName: You're welcome, Mommy! Thanks for playing with me!
engSearchText:
You're welcome, Mommy! Thanks for playing
with me!
jpnChrName: うん、ボクこそ遊んでくれてありがとう！
jpnSearchText: うん、ボクこそ遊んでくれてありがとう！

engChrName: I'll let you get some sleep now. You need a nap.
engSearchText: I'll let you get some sleep now. You need a nap.
jpnChrName: でも……眠いならお昼寝の後でも良いよ？
jpnSearchText: でも……眠いならお昼寝の後でも良いよ？

engChrName: Huh? Oh, I think I'm okay. I'm wide awake!
engSearchText: Huh? Oh, I think I'm okay. I'm wide awake!
jpnChrName: あら、ママ別にそんな……
jpnSearchText: あら、ママ別にそんな……

engChrName: Are you sure? You threw your pouch instead of the ball.
engSearchText:
Are you sure? You threw your pouch instead of
the ball.
jpnChrName: だってママ……さっき、ボールじゃなくて ポーチ投げてたもん。
jpnSearchText:
だってママ……さっき、ボールじゃなくて
ポーチ投げてたもん。

engChrName: I think you should hit the hay.
engSearchText: I think you should hit the hay.
jpnChrName: ゼッタイ眠いでしょ？
jpnSearchText: ゼッタイ眠いでしょ？

engChrName: What? But my pouch is right here—ack!
engSearchText: What? But my pouch is right here—ack!
jpnChrName: えっ、うそ！？ そ、そう言えば……ポーチが無いわ！
jpnSearchText:
えっ、うそ！？
そ、そう言えば……ポーチが無いわ！

engChrName: Maybe I need some rest after all...
engSearchText: Maybe I need some rest after all...
jpnChrName: ……あ、今ので何だか目が覚めちゃったかも。
jpnSearchText: ……あ、今ので何だか目が覚めちゃったかも。

engChrName: Have a good nap! Oh, and here's your pouch back.
engSearchText: Have a good nap! Oh, and here's your pouch back.
jpnChrName: ……ポーチならボクがひろったから アンシンしてね、ママ。
jpnSearchText:
……ポーチならボクがひろったから
アンシンしてね、ママ。

engChrName: I don't want Mommy to push herself too hard, so I'm gonna let her sleep.
engSearchText:
I don't want Mommy to push herself too hard, so I'm
gonna let her sleep.
jpnChrName: ママ、眠いならムリしないで欲しいな。
jpnSearchText: ママ、眠いならムリしないで欲しいな。

engChrName: Otherwise, she might conk out while we're heading home...
engSearchText:
Otherwise, she might conk out while we're
heading home...
jpnChrName: 今遊んでたら、ゼッタイおうちに帰るジカンに 寝ちゃいそうだし……
jpnSearchText:
今遊んでたら、ゼッタイおうちに帰るジカンに
寝ちゃいそうだし……

engChrName: On the way home last night, Mommy tripped.
engSearchText: On the way home last night, Mommy tripped.
jpnChrName: きのう、おうちに帰るときにママが びっくりしてつまづいちゃったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
きのう、おうちに帰るときにママが
びっくりしてつまづいちゃったんだけど……

engChrName: I was scared, so I held her hand real tight and stopped her from falling.
engSearchText:
I was scared, so I held her hand real tight and stopped
her from falling.
jpnChrName: ボクも怖かったけど、手を繋いでいたし なんとか支えてあげられたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ボクも怖かったけど、手を繋いでいたし
なんとか支えてあげられたんだ。

engChrName: I've gotta look out for Mommy. I don't want her to get hurt...
engSearchText:
I've gotta look out for Mommy. I don't want her to
get hurt...
jpnChrName: ママ、いつも眠たくてあぶなっかしいし、 ボクがたすけてあげないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ママ、いつも眠たくてあぶなっかしいし、
ボクがたすけてあげないとね。

engChrName: Mommy only just woke up now. She must've been really sleepy.
engSearchText:
Mommy only just woke up now. She must've been
really sleepy.
jpnChrName: ママ、けっきょく暗くなるまで ずっと寝てたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ママ、けっきょく暗くなるまで
ずっと寝てたんだ。

engChrName: We've got the same bedtime, though...
engSearchText: We've got the same bedtime, though...
jpnChrName: これでもいつも、夜はボクと 同じくらい早く寝れちゃうの……
jpnSearchText:
これでもいつも、夜はボクと
同じくらい早く寝れちゃうの……

engChrName: I think I'll jump rope for a while.
engSearchText: I think I'll jump rope for a while.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、縄跳びでもしようかなー。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず、縄跳びでもしようかなー。

engChrName: ...Aww, crud. I left my rope at home. Phooey.
engSearchText: ...Aww, crud. I left my rope at home. Phooey.
jpnChrName: あ、でも縄をおうちに忘れてきちゃったよ、 どうしようかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、でも縄をおうちに忘れてきちゃったよ、
どうしようかなぁ。

engChrName: People my age will never forget that horrible incident all those years ago...
engSearchText:
People my age will never forget that horrible incident
all those years ago...
jpnChrName: それにしても……昨日ので忌々しい名を 思い出すのは儂だけでもないようじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……昨日ので忌々しい名を
思い出すのは儂だけでもないようじゃ……

engChrName: I was just a bright-eyed youngster back then, but due to the reconstruction, I was blessed with many opportunities for prosperity.
engSearchText:
I was just a bright-eyed youngster back then, but due
to the reconstruction, I was blessed with many
opportunities for prosperity.
jpnChrName: あの時は儂もまだ下積みじゃったが、 混乱の立て直しの中で商機には恵まれた。
jpnSearchText:
あの時は儂もまだ下積みじゃったが、
混乱の立て直しの中で商機には恵まれた。

engChrName: In fact, I may have only been able to ride the waves to the top due to the turbulent tides of that era...
engSearchText:
In fact, I may have only been able to ride the waves to
the top due to the turbulent tides of that era...
jpnChrName: そう思えば、儂もあの者によって人生を 変えられた一人なのかもしれんな……
jpnSearchText:
そう思えば、儂もあの者によって人生を
変えられた一人なのかもしれんな……

engChrName: While I was heading to my sauna last night, the street erupted into chaos.
engSearchText:
While I was heading to my sauna last night, the street
erupted into chaos.
jpnChrName: 昨夜は、儂の銭湯がある二番街も 酷く混乱しおったが……
jpnSearchText:
昨夜は、儂の銭湯がある二番街も
酷く混乱しおったが……

engChrName: My body moved on its own, and I managed to save some people.
engSearchText:
My body moved on its own, and I managed to save
some people.
jpnChrName: 身体が咄嗟に動いて、近くの人らを 助けることが出来てな。
jpnSearchText:
身体が咄嗟に動いて、近くの人らを
助けることが出来てな。

engChrName: When things hit the fan, having martial arts training can come in handy.
engSearchText:
When things hit the fan, having martial arts training
can come in handy.
jpnChrName: 拳法をやっていたお陰じゃな、 やはりいざという時に役に立つものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
拳法をやっていたお陰じゃな、
やはりいざという時に役に立つものじゃ。

engChrName: That's why it's so important to train your mind and body constantly—even in retirement.
engSearchText:
That's why it's so important to train your mind and
body constantly—even in retirement.
jpnChrName: やはり隠居後にこそ、毎日の運動と 精神鍛錬は大切なものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり隠居後にこそ、毎日の運動と
精神鍛錬は大切なものじゃ。

engChrName: Whenever I gaze at the lights of Langport, I think back on the time when I ran all those businesses.
engSearchText:
Whenever I gaze at the lights of Langport, I think
back on the time when I ran all those businesses.
jpnChrName: こうして今の煌都の光を見とると、 色々な商売をしていた時が遥か昔に思えるのう……
jpnSearchText:
こうして今の煌都の光を見とると、
色々な商売をしていた時が遥か昔に思えるのう……

engChrName: Langport went through some hard times when I was a young lad. As the city was being put back together, my companies flourished.
engSearchText:
Langport went through some hard times when I was
a young lad. As the city was being put back together,
my companies flourished.
jpnChrName: 儂が若い頃には煌都も色々あって、 立て直しの中で商いにも成功して……
jpnSearchText:
儂が若い頃には煌都も色々あって、
立て直しの中で商いにも成功して……

engChrName: Over the years, I passed all of them on to the younger generation.
engSearchText:
Over the years, I passed all of them on to the
younger generation.
jpnChrName: 今では他の商いも若い衆に譲り、 銭湯くらいしか経営しておらんが……
jpnSearchText:
今では他の商いも若い衆に譲り、
銭湯くらいしか経営しておらんが……

engChrName: Except the sauna. That's still an important business to me. In fact, I think I'll go check in on it tonight.
engSearchText:
Except the sauna. That's still an important business
to me. In fact, I think I'll go check in on it tonight.
jpnChrName: まあ、それでも大切な商いに変わりはない。 どれ、今夜も銭湯の様子を見に行くか……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それでも大切な商いに変わりはない。
どれ、今夜も銭湯の様子を見に行くか……

engChrName: Thanks for the help, kiddos.
engSearchText: Thanks for the help, kiddos.
jpnChrName: お前さん達を見ていたら、 我慢できなくなってしまってな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さん達を見ていたら、
我慢できなくなってしまってな。

engChrName: I think it's time for me to rest these weary old bones...
engSearchText: I think it's time for me to rest these weary old bones...
jpnChrName: ゆっくり身体を慣らしている所じゃよ。
jpnSearchText: ゆっくり身体を慣らしている所じゃよ。

engChrName: ...for today. Hohoho.
engSearchText: ...for today. Hohoho.
jpnChrName: ホッホッホ、心配せずとも今日は無茶はせんよ。
jpnSearchText: ホッホッホ、心配せずとも今日は無茶はせんよ。

engChrName: I'll be back to teaching starting tomorrow. Maybe I'll even sneak in a little surfing, too.
engSearchText:
I'll be back to teaching starting tomorrow. Maybe I'll
even sneak in a little surfing, too.
jpnChrName: 本格的な指導とサーフィンは 明日からの楽しみにとっておくからのう！
jpnSearchText:
本格的な指導とサーフィンは
明日からの楽しみにとっておくからのう！

engChrName: Just don't overdo it, old timer.
engSearchText: Just don't overdo it, old timer.
jpnChrName: ま、程々にしておけよ……
jpnSearchText: ま、程々にしておけよ……

engChrName: I'll be looking forward to the good news.
engSearchText: I'll be looking forward to the good news.
jpnChrName: 儂はここで報告を待たせてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText: 儂はここで報告を待たせてもらうぞ。

engChrName: Wish I didn't have to sit around waiting, though.
engSearchText: Wish I didn't have to sit around waiting, though.
jpnChrName: ふう……じっとしているというのは 暇じゃなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……じっとしているというのは
暇じゃなぁ……

engChrName: If my hips start to feel better, I think I'll go out and catch some waves on my surfboard!
engSearchText:
If my hips start to feel better, I think I'll go out and
catch some waves on my surfboard!
jpnChrName: 腰が良くなったら、 サーフィンのリベンジといこうかのう！
jpnSearchText:
腰が良くなったら、
サーフィンのリベンジといこうかのう！

engChrName: You're just a bundle of energy, ain'tcha?
engSearchText: You're just a bundle of energy, ain'tcha?
jpnChrName: その歳で張り切りすぎなんだっつの……
jpnSearchText: その歳で張り切りすぎなんだっつの……

engChrName: Phew... It feels good to get out and move my body on a bright and sunny day like this.
engSearchText:
Phew... It feels good to get out and move my body on
a bright and sunny day like this.
jpnChrName: ふう……こうも天気がいいと 身体を動かしたくなるんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……こうも天気がいいと
身体を動かしたくなるんじゃが。

engChrName: I probably shouldn't push myself too hard, however.
engSearchText: I probably shouldn't push myself too hard, however.
jpnChrName: 昨日の今日じゃし、 無理は出来んよなあ……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の今日じゃし、
無理は出来んよなあ……

engChrName: I hope they'll be able to stand in for me today...
engSearchText: I hope they'll be able to stand in for me today...
jpnChrName: 噂のあの者らが、代理を引き受けて くれるといいんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
噂のあの者らが、代理を引き受けて
くれるといいんじゃが……

engChrName: I heard something happened at the storehouse in the Harbor District. That place is on my route today...
engSearchText:
I heard something happened at the storehouse in the
Harbor District. That place is on my route today...
jpnChrName: 今度は港湾区の倉庫街で何かあったって？ そろそろ港の方に帰る予定だったけど……
jpnSearchText:
今度は港湾区の倉庫街で何かあったって？
そろそろ港の方に帰る予定だったけど……

engChrName: Gah... I'm starting to regret my career decisions.
engSearchText: Gah... I'm starting to regret my career decisions.
jpnChrName: うわぁ……自分も運送会社勤めだから、 何かに巻き込まれないか不安になるよ。
jpnSearchText:
うわぁ……自分も運送会社勤めだから、
何かに巻き込まれないか不安になるよ。

engChrName: Hopefully I won't be running face-first into danger.
engSearchText: Hopefully I won't be running face-first into danger.
jpnChrName: 今後の仕事にも影響が出ないと良いな……
jpnSearchText: 今後の仕事にも影響が出ないと良いな……

engChrName: Last night was rough... I heard there were casualties.
engSearchText: Last night was rough... I heard there were casualties.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は大変だったね…… 向こうじゃ殺人まであったって聞くしさ。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は大変だったね……
向こうじゃ殺人まであったって聞くしさ。

engChrName: When something like this happens, I'm always worried I'll be caught up in Heiyue's business. They're so scary...
engSearchText:
When something like this happens, I'm always
worried I'll be caught up in Heiyue's business.
They're so scary...
jpnChrName: 正直、ああいう騒ぎがあると、やっぱり 黒月のゴタゴタに巻き込まれないか怖いよ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、ああいう騒ぎがあると、やっぱり
黒月のゴタゴタに巻き込まれないか怖いよ。

engChrName: But I'm more terrified of the thugs that're out and about. Maybe Heiyue's a necessary evil after all...
engSearchText:
But I'm more terrified of the thugs that're out
and about. Maybe Heiyue's a necessary evil
after all...
jpnChrName: ただ、最近は他の街から来たチンピラもいるし…… 黒月の睨みもあった方が良いのかなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、最近は他の街から来たチンピラもいるし……
黒月の睨みもあった方が良いのかなぁ……

engChrName: I've got one last delivery to make, and then I can call it a night.
engSearchText:
I've got one last delivery to make, and then I can call
it a night.
jpnChrName: さて、次の配達先で 今日の仕事は終わりかな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、次の配達先で
今日の仕事は終わりかな。

engChrName: Speaking of nighttime, Langport feels like a completely different city when the sun goes down.
engSearchText:
Speaking of nighttime, Langport feels like a
completely different city when the sun goes down.
jpnChrName: しかし……ラングポートは夜に なると大分雰囲気が変わるよね……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……ラングポートは夜に
なると大分雰囲気が変わるよね……

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. The city's gorgeous at this time of day, but it's also scary, especially with Heiyue out in full force.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. The city's gorgeous at this time
of day, but it's also scary, especially with Heiyue out
in full force.
jpnChrName: 綺麗ではあるけど……夜は黒月の人たちも 一層目にするから少し怖いんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
綺麗ではあるけど……夜は黒月の人たちも
一層目にするから少し怖いんだよね。

engChrName: I've heard all sorts of rumors about them, and if even half of them are true... *shiver*
engSearchText:
I've heard all sorts of rumors about them, and if even
half of them are true... *shiver*
jpnChrName: ……彼らについては色々な噂もあるけど、 どこまでが本当なのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
……彼らについては色々な噂もあるけど、
どこまでが本当なのかな……？

engChrName: Phew. Things are busy, busy, busy. Langport's a market city, so there's always tons of deliveries to be made.
engSearchText:
Phew. Things are busy, busy, busy. Langport's a
market city, so there's always tons of deliveries to
be made.
jpnChrName: ふう、忙しい……最近の好景気、 煌都は貿易都市だし一層影響も強くてね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、忙しい……最近の好景気、
煌都は貿易都市だし一層影響も強くてね。

engChrName: There's also been a lot of trade between here and Valis over in the Central East.
engSearchText:
There's also been a lot of trade between here and
Valis over in the Central East.
jpnChrName: 最近だと、中東のヴァリス市国って国との 貿易も増えてるみたいでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
最近だと、中東のヴァリス市国って国との
貿易も増えてるみたいでねぇ。

engChrName: I won't complain about making more money, but I wish things would slow down a little. Haven't been able to catch my breath lately...
engSearchText:
I won't complain about making more money, but I
wish things would slow down a little. Haven't been
able to catch my breath lately...
jpnChrName: 何にせよ儲けが増えるのは良いけど、 流石にそろそろ休みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ儲けが増えるのは良いけど、
流石にそろそろ休みたいね。

engChrName: Hanson and I are of a similar mind. He understands the gravity of the situation perfectly.
engSearchText:
Hanson and I are of a similar mind. He understands
the gravity of the situation perfectly.
jpnChrName: ハンソン氏はこちらの事情も理解してくれたし、 前向きに社内で検討してくれるそうで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハンソン氏はこちらの事情も理解してくれたし、
前向きに社内で検討してくれるそうで何よりだ。

engChrName: We're steadily approaching an era of change in the world of trading.
engSearchText:
We're steadily approaching an era of change in the
world of trading.
jpnChrName: 今の時代、ラングポートもそろそろ 変わらねばならない時にある気もしていてね。
jpnSearchText:
今の時代、ラングポートもそろそろ
変わらねばならない時にある気もしていてね。

engChrName: And we have to be on top of it if we are to survive.
engSearchText: And we have to be on top of it if we are to survive.
jpnChrName: 私達のような貿易会社は、特にその変化に 乗って行かねばならないだろうね。
jpnSearchText:
私達のような貿易会社は、特にその変化に
乗って行かねばならないだろうね。

engChrName: Heiyue hasn't crushed Kowloon's operations, but it certainly has a stranglehold over them.
engSearchText:
Heiyue hasn't crushed Kowloon's operations, but it
certainly has a stranglehold over them.
jpnChrName: 九龍……黒月とて他の企業を排除はしないが、 それでも煌都の事業者は影響を受けてしまう。
jpnSearchText:
九龍……黒月とて他の企業を排除はしないが、
それでも煌都の事業者は影響を受けてしまう。

engChrName: That's why we can't continue to rely on them. We have to find our own path forward.
engSearchText:
That's why we can't continue to rely on them.
We have to find our own path forward.
jpnChrName: だが……やはりいつまでも、彼らへの依存に 甘んじるより、独自の道が必要だと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが……やはりいつまでも、彼らへの依存に
甘んじるより、独自の道が必要だと思うんだ。

engChrName: So, we're choosing to build roads to future success by partnering with international enterprises.
engSearchText:
So, we're choosing to build roads to future success by
partnering with international enterprises.
jpnChrName: こうして外国の企業と協力してルートを構築するのも、 きっと東方系企業の未来のためになるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
こうして外国の企業と協力してルートを構築するのも、
きっと東方系企業の未来のためになるはずだ。

engChrName: My company is thinking about working together with other foreign businesses.
engSearchText:
My company is thinking about working together with
other foreign businesses.
jpnChrName: うちの会社も最近は、外国資本との 連携を本格的に考えていてね。
jpnSearchText:
うちの会社も最近は、外国資本との
連携を本格的に考えていてね。

engChrName: I'll be meeting with a representative from a company in Liberl tomorrow.
engSearchText:
I'll be meeting with a representative from a company
in Liberl tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 明日もリベールの会社から来た方と 話し合う予定なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
明日もリベールの会社から来た方と
話し合う予定なんだ。

engChrName: It's for the best. We can't keep relying on the Kowloon Group alone.
engSearchText:
It's for the best. We can't keep relying on the
Kowloon Group alone.
jpnChrName: 九龍グループの力だけに依存するのは、 やはり何か違ってる気がするからね。
jpnSearchText:
九龍グループの力だけに依存するのは、
やはり何か違ってる気がするからね。

engChrName: Apparently the economy in Messeldam is collapsing due to the mafia.
engSearchText:
Apparently the economy in Messeldam is collapsing
due to the mafia.
jpnChrName: 北のメッセルダム市ではマフィアのせいで 経済が混乱しているところもあるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
北のメッセルダム市ではマフィアのせいで
経済が混乱しているところもあるらしい。

engChrName: Heiyue has been here to protect Langport from threats like them.
engSearchText:
Heiyue has been here to protect Langport from
threats like them.
jpnChrName: その意味で、煌都は黒月の抑止力が 一役買っている面もあるかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、煌都は黒月の抑止力が
一役買っている面もあるかもしれないが……

engChrName: I have mixed feelings about that, though. I don't think our economy and public safety should be so dependent on a criminal organization.
engSearchText:
I have mixed feelings about that, though. I don't
think our economy and public safety should be so
dependent on a criminal organization.
jpnChrName: 果たして、経済や治安をそんな 裏の抑止力に依存して良いのかね……
jpnSearchText:
果たして、経済や治安をそんな
裏の抑止力に依存して良いのかね……

engChrName: I work at a trade company, so I can feel the effects of their influence. It's a little disquieting to see how much pull they have here.
engSearchText:
I work at a trade company, so I can feel the effects of
their influence. It's a little disquieting to see how
much pull they have here.
jpnChrName: 貿易会社に勤める身としては彼らの影響力を 強く感じる分、やるせないものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
貿易会社に勤める身としては彼らの影響力を
強く感じる分、やるせないものだよ。

engChrName: So, Hanson. Do you think you can leave trade between Langport and Bose to our company?
engSearchText:
So, Hanson. Do you think you can leave trade
between Langport and Bose to our company?
jpnChrName: それではハンソンさん、ボース市の市場における 煌都経由の貿易は我が社にお任せいただけそうで？
jpnSearchText:
それではハンソンさん、ボース市の市場における
煌都経由の貿易は我が社にお任せいただけそうで？

engChrName: I believe we can. The powers that be will find it favorable, I'm sure.
engSearchText:
I believe we can. The powers that be will find it
favorable, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: ええ、恐らく弊社の重役たちも好意的に 捉えてくれるのではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、恐らく弊社の重役たちも好意的に
捉えてくれるのではないかと。

engChrName: Many dealers in Liberl prefer not to do business with the Kowloon Group's subsidiary companies.
engSearchText:
Many dealers in Liberl prefer not to do business with
the Kowloon Group's subsidiary companies.
jpnChrName: リベールでも、九龍系列の貿易会社を 多少敬遠してしまう業者もいますしね……
jpnSearchText:
リベールでも、九龍系列の貿易会社を
多少敬遠してしまう業者もいますしね……

engChrName: So I believe your proposal makes perfect sense. It has the potential to boost everyone's profits.
engSearchText:
So I believe your proposal makes perfect sense. It has
the potential to boost everyone's profits.
jpnChrName: その意味で御社からの提案は、そうした業者たちの 経済活動を活発化させ得るものかと。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で御社からの提案は、そうした業者たちの
経済活動を活発化させ得るものかと。

engChrName: Excellent. Glad we're on the same page.
engSearchText: Excellent. Glad we're on the same page.
jpnChrName: そう言って頂けるとありがたいです、 良い返事をお待ちしておりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
そう言って頂けるとありがたいです、
良い返事をお待ちしておりますよ。

engChrName: We, too, are thinking about lessening our reliance on Kowloon.
engSearchText:
We, too, are thinking about lessening our reliance
on Kowloon.
jpnChrName: 我々としても、九龍への依存度はなるべく 下げた方が良いと考えていましてね……
jpnSearchText:
我々としても、九龍への依存度はなるべく
下げた方が良いと考えていましてね……

engChrName: This will surely help us improve our standings in Liberl.
engSearchText:
This will surely help us improve our standings
in Liberl.
jpnChrName: それがリベールにおける企業活動の 委縮回避につながるなら何よりかと。
jpnSearchText:
それがリベールにおける企業活動の
委縮回避につながるなら何よりかと。

engChrName: Agreed. I have hope that the first fruits of our new partnership will yield a high return for everyone involved.
engSearchText:
Agreed. I have hope that the first fruits of our new
partnership will yield a high return for
everyone involved.
jpnChrName: ええ、長くお付き合いできるよう、 私からも上に働きかけますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、長くお付き合いできるよう、
私からも上に働きかけますよ。

engChrName: It's about time I headed home. This was a fun sightseeing trip.
engSearchText:
It's about time I headed home. This was a fun
sightseeing trip.
jpnChrName: いろいろ気になるけど、そろそろ帰らないと…… 観光もできたし、船や珍しい仕様の列車も見れたけど……
jpnSearchText:
いろいろ気になるけど、そろそろ帰らないと……
観光もできたし、船や珍しい仕様の列車も見れたけど……

engChrName: Last night really put a damper on it, though. I wish I could help out somehow.
engSearchText:
Last night really put a damper on it, though. I wish I
could help out somehow.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、目的は果たしたとはいえ、事件が あったのにこのまま帰るのも気持ち悪いかな……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、目的は果たしたとはいえ、事件が
あったのにこのまま帰るのも気持ち悪いかな……

engChrName: I think I'll try to find a place I can donate to when I get back.
engSearchText:
I think I'll try to find a place I can donate to when I
get back.
jpnChrName: 帰ったらニュース誌を読んで、寄付とか そういうのがあるなら力になろうかな……
jpnSearchText:
帰ったらニュース誌を読んで、寄付とか
そういうのがあるなら力になろうかな……

engChrName: I-Is it true that there was an incident last night in the Eastern Quarter?
engSearchText:
I-Is it true that there was an incident last night in the
Eastern Quarter?
jpnChrName: えっと、昨日の夜に東方人街の方で 事件があったって本当だったのかな……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、昨日の夜に東方人街の方で
事件があったって本当だったのかな……

engChrName: I've never seen fog that dense before, so I snapped a few photos. Was that insensitive?
engSearchText:
I've never seen fog that dense before, so I snapped a
few photos. Was that insensitive?
jpnChrName: 霧とかが珍しかったから呑気に 撮影してたけど……もしかして不謹慎だったかな……？
jpnSearchText:
霧とかが珍しかったから呑気に
撮影してたけど……もしかして不謹慎だったかな……？

engChrName: The sight of the fog mixed in with the moon made for some captivating shots, but there was something creepy about it all, too.
engSearchText:
The sight of the fog mixed in with the moon made
for some captivating shots, but there was something
creepy about it all, too.
jpnChrName: でも今思えば……霧とか月とか、幻想的だったけど 確かに不気味な感じもあったかも……
jpnSearchText:
でも今思えば……霧とか月とか、幻想的だったけど
確かに不気味な感じもあったかも……

engChrName: The view from here is gorgeous at night. I could gaze out at the stars and the lights from the Eastern Quarter all day.
engSearchText:
The view from here is gorgeous at night. I could gaze
out at the stars and the lights from the Eastern
Quarter all day.
jpnChrName: 流石は“煌都”……新市街の夜景も綺麗だけど、 やっぱり東方人街の町明かりは独特だよね！
jpnSearchText:
流石は“煌都”……新市街の夜景も綺麗だけど、
やっぱり東方人街の町明かりは独特だよね！

engChrName: I hear the view's even more beautiful during festivals and celebrations. They line the streets with paper lanterns, apparently.
engSearchText:
I hear the view's even more beautiful during festivals
and celebrations. They line the streets with paper
lanterns, apparently.
jpnChrName: 新節とかお祝いの時は東方人街も一層 提燈が増えて夜景がきれいになるって言うし……
jpnSearchText:
新節とかお祝いの時は東方人街も一層
提燈が増えて夜景がきれいになるって言うし……

engChrName: Maybe I'll visit Langport during one of them and take pictures from the top of the Great Spire.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll visit Langport during one of them and
take pictures from the top of the Great Spire.
jpnChrName: 一回はそういう時にも見に来て、 煌天楼の上から撮りたいわよね。
jpnSearchText:
一回はそういう時にも見に来て、
煌天楼の上から撮りたいわよね。

engChrName: Wow. Langport's a totally different city from when I came here as a kid.
engSearchText:
Wow. Langport's a totally different city from when I
came here as a kid.
jpnChrName: へえ、今のラングポートってこんな感じなんだ。 子供の頃来た時より、一層発展してるね……！
jpnSearchText:
へえ、今のラングポートってこんな感じなんだ。
子供の頃来た時より、一層発展してるね……！

engChrName: The Great Spire looks a lot nicer, too. I think I'll take a photo of it.
engSearchText:
The Great Spire looks a lot nicer, too. I think I'll take
a photo of it.
jpnChrName: この煌天楼も改修で随分と綺麗になったようだし…… あとで遠景で一枚撮影しようかなー。
jpnSearchText:
この煌天楼も改修で随分と綺麗になったようだし……
あとで遠景で一枚撮影しようかなー。

engChrName: Driving around the neighborhood's got me all psyched up! I think it's time to party the night away!
engSearchText:
Driving around the neighborhood's got me all
psyched up! I think it's time to party the night away!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、近辺をひとっ走りしたら昂っちまった、 こりゃあ一杯飲まねぇと締まらねぇな！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、近辺をひとっ走りしたら昂っちまった、
こりゃあ一杯飲まねぇと締まらねぇな！

engChrName: All right, Hyades. Let's leave our cars here and go out for drinks. Then we'll head home first thing tomorrow.
engSearchText:
All right, Hyades. Let's leave our cars here and go out
for drinks. Then we'll head home first
thing tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ヒアデス、車を置いて飲みに繰り出すぞ！ 帰りは明日になるが問題ねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
ヒアデス、車を置いて飲みに繰り出すぞ！
帰りは明日になるが問題ねぇ！

engChrName: And we're not grabbin' a hotel room. We're gonna do some car camping!
engSearchText:
And we're not grabbin' a hotel room. We're gonna do
some car camping!
jpnChrName: 何せ、せっかくの新車だ！ 良い気分のまま車中泊ってのもオツなモンよ！
jpnSearchText:
何せ、せっかくの新車だ！
良い気分のまま車中泊ってのもオツなモンよ！

engChrName: For street racers like me, gettin' a sweet new ride is the best feeling in the world!
engSearchText:
For street racers like me, gettin' a sweet new ride is
the best feeling in the world!
jpnChrName: 走り屋としちゃあ、最高に気に入った 車に乗るのには何も惜しくはねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
走り屋としちゃあ、最高に気に入った
車に乗るのには何も惜しくはねぇ！

engChrName: Buyer's remorse comes later. Today, I'm gonna PARTY!
engSearchText:
Buyer's remorse comes later. Today, I'm
gonna PARTY!
jpnChrName: ローンを組んだのも、後悔する 理由なんざあるはずもねぇよ。
jpnSearchText:
ローンを組んだのも、後悔する
理由なんざあるはずもねぇよ。

engChrName: But first, I'm gonna give my new car a spin before heading home.
engSearchText:
But first, I'm gonna give my new car a spin before
heading home.
jpnChrName: さて、帰る前にまずは煌都の周りを しこたま試し走りするとすっか！
jpnSearchText:
さて、帰る前にまずは煌都の周りを
しこたま試し走りするとすっか！

engChrName: Dude, you won't BELIEVE what I just did. I finally caved and bought that limited edition Red Star I've been wanting!
engSearchText:
Dude, you won't BELIEVE what I just did. I finally
caved and bought that limited edition Red Star I've
been wanting!
jpnChrName: 見てくれ、遂に……遂に買ったぜ、 レッドスターの限定モデル！
jpnSearchText:
見てくれ、遂に……遂に買ったぜ、
レッドスターの限定モデル！

engChrName: I've been DYING to get my hands on one ever since Junifer and Graham got me to try it out.
engSearchText:
I've been DYING to get my hands on one ever since
Junifer and Graham got me to try it out.
jpnChrName: ユニファとグレアムに勧められて 試乗して以来の念願が遂に叶ったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
ユニファとグレアムに勧められて
試乗して以来の念願が遂に叶ったんだ！

engChrName: Holy... Those are some damn sweet wheels. I heard you can only buy one of these from Red Star dealers directly.
engSearchText:
Holy... Those are some damn sweet wheels. I heard
you can only buy one of these from Red Star
dealers directly.
jpnChrName: はえー、これが噂のレッドスター直営の ディーラーからしか買えないってやつっスか。
jpnSearchText:
はえー、これが噂のレッドスター直営の
ディーラーからしか買えないってやつっスか。

engChrName: You must've broke the bank for it. I mean, these things cost a fortune.
engSearchText:
You must've broke the bank for it. I mean, these
things cost a fortune.
jpnChrName: でも、そんな大金どうしたんスか？ 結構な値段だったと思うっスけど。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そんな大金どうしたんスか？
結構な値段だったと思うっスけど。

engChrName: Nah, I got a loan. Gonna be payin' this thing off for the next 15 years.
engSearchText:
Nah, I got a loan. Gonna be payin' this thing off for
the next 15 years.
jpnChrName: ローンを組んだんだよ、１５年のな。
jpnSearchText: ローンを組んだんだよ、１５年のな。

engChrName: There was no way in hell I was gonna be able to buy it outright.
engSearchText:
There was no way in hell I was gonna be able to buy
it outright.
jpnChrName: 貯金が貯まるまでなんて、 とても待っちゃいられねぇぜ！
jpnSearchText:
貯金が貯まるまでなんて、
とても待っちゃいられねぇぜ！

engChrName: Whoa, for real? That's hardcore.
engSearchText: Whoa, for real? That's hardcore.
jpnChrName: うへぇ、マジっスか。 その思い切りの良さは流石っスね。
jpnSearchText:
うへぇ、マジっスか。
その思い切りの良さは流石っスね。

engChrName: I heard Graham got a loan for his car, too, but you've taken it to the next level.
engSearchText:
I heard Graham got a loan for his car, too, but you've
taken it to the next level.
jpnChrName: グレアムさんもローン組んだって聞きますが、 ダウニーさんそれ以上じゃないっスか。
jpnSearchText:
グレアムさんもローン組んだって聞きますが、
ダウニーさんそれ以上じゃないっスか。

engChrName: ...Don't tell me you called me over just to rub it in my face.
engSearchText:
...Don't tell me you called me over just to rub it in
my face.
jpnChrName: それで、もしかして急に俺を呼び出したの、 自慢の為だけじゃないっスよね……？
jpnSearchText:
それで、もしかして急に俺を呼び出したの、
自慢の為だけじゃないっスよね……？

engChrName: Nah, I wanted to give you the keys to my old car. It's yours. I know you've been wanting one for a while.
engSearchText:
Nah, I wanted to give you the keys to my old car.
It's yours. I know you've been wanting one for
a while.
jpnChrName: それはだな、俺がここまで乗ってきた その旧車をお前に譲りたいと思ったからだ。
jpnSearchText:
それはだな、俺がここまで乗ってきた
その旧車をお前に譲りたいと思ったからだ。

engChrName: Plus I wanna take this baby out on a test run pronto.
engSearchText: Plus I wanna take this baby out on a test run pronto.
jpnChrName: 俺は帰り道に早速この新車で飛ばしたいし、 ヒアデスも車欲しかったろ？
jpnSearchText:
俺は帰り道に早速この新車で飛ばしたいし、
ヒアデスも車欲しかったろ？

engChrName: Wha...? You're just gonna give me your old car? Is that why you told me to come by train?
engSearchText:
Wha...? You're just gonna give me your old car?
Is that why you told me to come by train?
jpnChrName: ええ……流石に話が急なんスけど。 だから列車で来いって言ったんスね……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……流石に話が急なんスけど。
だから列車で来いって言ったんスね……

engChrName: Well, thanks, man. You sure this isn't a little much, though?
engSearchText:
Well, thanks, man. You sure this isn't a little
much, though?
jpnChrName: ダウニーさん、上機嫌なのはわかるっスが、 流石に思い切り良過ぎっスよ……
jpnSearchText:
ダウニーさん、上機嫌なのはわかるっスが、
流石に思い切り良過ぎっスよ……

engChrName: You can't be serious. We're going drinking? Now?
engSearchText: You can't be serious. We're going drinking? Now?
jpnChrName: えー、今から飲むんスか……
jpnSearchText: えー、今から飲むんスか……

engChrName: *sigh* I guess we would be driving all night if we started heading back now...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess we would be driving all night if we
started heading back now...
jpnChrName: そりゃまあ、今帰っても着くのは明け方だし、 車中泊自体は仕方ないっスが……
jpnSearchText:
そりゃまあ、今帰っても着くのは明け方だし、
車中泊自体は仕方ないっスが……

engChrName: I don't mind car camping, but I'm, uh, not exactly champing at the bit to sleep in this thing while drunk.
engSearchText:
I don't mind car camping, but I'm, uh, not exactly
champing at the bit to sleep in this thing while drunk.
jpnChrName: 正直、お酒入った状態でこの車に 寝泊まりするのは大分気後れするッス……
jpnSearchText:
正直、お酒入った状態でこの車に
寝泊まりするのは大分気後れするッス……

engChrName: I rushed over after Downey told me to meet him here, but I had no idea he was planning to give me his old ride.
engSearchText:
I rushed over after Downey told me to meet him here,
but I had no idea he was planning to give me his
old ride.
jpnChrName: 急に呼ばれたもんだから特急で来てみれば、 まさか旧車のお下がりの話とは……
jpnSearchText:
急に呼ばれたもんだから特急で来てみれば、
まさか旧車のお下がりの話とは……

engChrName: I appreciate the thought, really, but I'd honestly rather just get myself a new one. His car's been having tons of issues lately.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the thought, really, but I'd honestly
rather just get myself a new one. His car's been
having tons of issues lately.
jpnChrName: 正直な話、気後れするんスよね…… ダウニーさんの車、前に色々あったし……
jpnSearchText:
正直な話、気後れするんスよね……
ダウニーさんの車、前に色々あったし……

engChrName: But I'm not the type to turn down a free meal. Plus he took out a fifteen-year loan, so how can I say no?
engSearchText:
But I'm not the type to turn down a free meal.
Plus he took out a fifteen-year loan, so how can I
say no?
jpnChrName: でも、１５年ローンなんて聞いたら 断るに断れないッスよ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、１５年ローンなんて聞いたら
断るに断れないッスよ……

engChrName: I heard something happened at the Harbor District.
engSearchText: I heard something happened at the Harbor District.
jpnChrName: 港湾区の事件についても聞き及んでおります、 市街への影響は今の所は見られません。
jpnSearchText:
港湾区の事件についても聞き及んでおります、
市街への影響は今の所は見られません。

engChrName: The police and the guild supposedly have their eyes on that place now.
engSearchText:
The police and the guild supposedly have their eyes
on that place now.
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、警察とギルドが港湾区方面に 釘付けになっている事も否めませんがね……
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、警察とギルドが港湾区方面に
釘付けになっている事も否めませんがね……

engChrName: So far, nothing out of the ordinary has transpired here in New Town, but that may very well change...
engSearchText:
So far, nothing out of the ordinary has transpired here
in New Town, but that may very well change...
jpnChrName: やはり、こうした場合にあってこそ…… 我々の真価は……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、こうした場合にあってこそ……
我々の真価は……

engChrName: There was an incident in the Eastern Quarter last night. People here have been at a loss.
engSearchText:
There was an incident in the Eastern Quarter
last night. People here have been at a loss.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は東方人街の方で事件と混乱があり…… 新市街でも戸惑う方が多くいらっしゃるようです。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は東方人街の方で事件と混乱があり……
新市街でも戸惑う方が多くいらっしゃるようです。

engChrName: I'll have to be sensitive to that while doing my job.
engSearchText: I'll have to be sensitive to that while doing my job.
jpnChrName: 私の方でも、旅行者の方のトラブル回避や 住民の方々と九龍方面の繋ぎに一層気を配りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
私の方でも、旅行者の方のトラブル回避や
住民の方々と九龍方面の繋ぎに一層気を配りましょう。

engChrName: Kowloon Financial Bank's HQ rests at the top of the Great Spire alongside several other offices.
engSearchText:
Kowloon Financial Bank's HQ rests at the top of the
Great Spire alongside several other offices.
jpnChrName: 煌天楼の上階フロアは九龍銀行本社を初め、 多くがオフィスですが展望台などもありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
煌天楼の上階フロアは九龍銀行本社を初め、
多くがオフィスですが展望台などもありましてね。

engChrName: Many tourists love to look down on all of Langport from the observation deck there. I'd recommend you do the same if you haven't.
engSearchText:
Many tourists love to look down on all of Langport
from the observation deck there. I'd recommend you
do the same if you haven't.
jpnChrName: ラングポートが“煌都”と称される所以の一つでもある あの夜景を眺めようと、観光の方で賑わっております。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートが“煌都”と称される所以の一つでもある
あの夜景を眺めようと、観光の方で賑わっております。

engChrName: There's a restaurant on the deck, so you can dine on some of the finest cuisine Langport has to offer while taking in the night view.
engSearchText:
There's a restaurant on the deck, so you can dine on
some of the finest cuisine Langport has to offer while
taking in the night view.
jpnChrName: 展望台にはレストランなどもございますので、 もし良ければ遊びに来て下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
展望台にはレストランなどもございますので、
もし良ければ遊びに来て下さいね。

engChrName: Welcome to the Langport Trade Center, which is also colloquially known as the Great Spire.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Langport Trade Center, which is
also colloquially known as the Great Spire.
jpnChrName: ラングポート貿易センタービル、 通称“煌天楼”にようこそ。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポート貿易センタービル、
通称“煌天楼”にようこそ。

engChrName: The building was designed to be mixed use, and it was completed eight years ago under the guidance of the Kowloon Group.
engSearchText:
The building was designed to be mixed use, and it
was completed eight years ago under the guidance of
the Kowloon Group.
jpnChrName: こちらは八年前に九龍グループの主導で 完成した駅舎も兼ねた複合ビルになりまして……
jpnSearchText:
こちらは八年前に九龍グループの主導で
完成した駅舎も兼ねた複合ビルになりまして……

engChrName: It recently underwent large-scale remodeling to account for advances in technology. That was finished just last year.
engSearchText:
It recently underwent large-scale remodeling to
account for advances in technology. That was
finished just last year.
jpnChrName: また、この数年での技術進歩も反映し、 昨年には大規模な改装工事も行われました。
jpnSearchText:
また、この数年での技術進歩も反映し、
昨年には大規模な改装工事も行われました。

engChrName: The Great Spire is even more advanced than Crossbell's Orchis Tower, and it's beloved by the citizenry.
engSearchText:
The Great Spire is even more advanced than
Crossbell's Orchis Tower, and it's beloved by
the citizenry.
jpnChrName: クロスベルの《オルキスタワー》以上に近代的な今の姿も、 多くの市民の方々に愛されております。
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルの《オルキスタワー》以上に近代的な今の姿も、
多くの市民の方々に愛されております。

engChrName: After living in Langport for many years, I've come to realize there's more conflict here than in Longlai.
engSearchText:
After living in Langport for many years, I've come to
realize there's more conflict here than in Longlai.
jpnChrName: 数年間暮らし、龍來に比べて揉め事も 多いとは身に染みて判っていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
数年間暮らし、龍來に比べて揉め事も
多いとは身に染みて判っていましたが……

engChrName: However, this is the first time there's been so many incidents in a row.
engSearchText:
However, this is the first time there's been so many
incidents in a row.
jpnChrName: ここまで大きな事件が続けて起こるのは、 流石に初めてですよ……
jpnSearchText:
ここまで大きな事件が続けて起こるのは、
流石に初めてですよ……

engChrName: I'm concerned about where we're headed, but now's not the time to fret. I'll put my faith in the bracers.
engSearchText:
I'm concerned about where we're headed, but now's
not the time to fret. I'll put my faith in the bracers.
jpnChrName: いくらか先行きは不安ですが……今こそエレイン様をはじめ、 遊撃士の皆さんを信じたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
いくらか先行きは不安ですが……今こそエレイン様をはじめ、
遊撃士の皆さんを信じたいものです。

engChrName: I heard all about the incident in the Eastern Quarter. It truly pains my heart...
engSearchText:
I heard all about the incident in the Eastern Quarter.
It truly pains my heart...
jpnChrName: 東方人街の事件は聞き及んでおります…… とても痛ましい事件だったようで……
jpnSearchText:
東方人街の事件は聞き及んでおります……
とても痛ましい事件だったようで……

engChrName: I've been trapped in a whirlwind of trouble since coming here, but it hardly compares to the tragedy that befell those kids.
engSearchText:
I've been trapped in a whirlwind of trouble since
coming here, but it hardly compares to the tragedy
that befell those kids.
jpnChrName: この街に来てから、いくらかのトラブルは 承知していますが……今回ほど悲惨な事件は初めてです。
jpnSearchText:
この街に来てから、いくらかのトラブルは
承知していますが……今回ほど悲惨な事件は初めてです。

engChrName: I don't know if I'll find myself face to face with danger, too, but I'm not going to flee. I will stay right where I am.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'll find myself face to face with
danger, too, but I'm not going to flee. I will stay right
where I am.
jpnChrName: 私どももどうなるかは分かりませんが…… この街でこのままやっていくつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私どももどうなるかは分かりませんが……
この街でこのままやっていくつもりです。

engChrName: If I shrink in fear, I'll be letting down every one of the bracers here, and that just won't fly.
engSearchText:
If I shrink in fear, I'll be letting down every one of the
bracers here, and that just won't fly.
jpnChrName: 怖気づいて委縮すれば、頼りにさせて頂いている 遊撃士の方々にも失礼ですしね……
jpnSearchText:
怖気づいて委縮すれば、頼りにさせて頂いている
遊撃士の方々にも失礼ですしね……

engChrName: I hope you enjoyed your meal earlier.
engSearchText: I hope you enjoyed your meal earlier.
jpnChrName: 先ほどはありがとうございました。 エレイン様のお連れなら遠慮はいりません。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどはありがとうございました。
エレイン様のお連れなら遠慮はいりません。

engChrName: You're a friend of Elaine's, correct? Then you're a friend of mine as well. I owe her a great deal.
engSearchText:
You're a friend of Elaine's, correct? Then you're a
friend of mine as well. I owe her a great deal.
jpnChrName: 彼女には何かとお世話になっており…… というのも、私は国境の町《龍來》の出でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
彼女には何かとお世話になっており……
というのも、私は国境の町《龍來》の出でしてね。

engChrName: I come from Longlai. My goal was to serve their dishes to more people, so I decided to open up a restaurant in a place that tourists flock to.
engSearchText:
I come from Longlai. My goal was to serve their
dishes to more people, so I decided to open up a
restaurant in a place that tourists flock to.
jpnChrName: 故郷で学んだ料理を多くの人に振る舞いたいと 思い、この街に店を持ったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
故郷で学んだ料理を多くの人に振る舞いたいと
思い、この街に店を持ったのですが……

engChrName: (Oh, so it was Longlai food. Guess Elaine was right on the money. No wonder the taste was so familiar.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, so it was Longlai food. Guess Elaine was right
on the money. No wonder the taste was so familiar.)
jpnChrName: （《龍來》か……エレインもそう言っていたな。   どうりで懐かしい感じもしたわけだ……）
jpnSearchText:
（《龍來》か……エレインもそう言っていたな。
どうりで懐かしい感じもしたわけだ……）

engChrName: If I'm rememberin' right, the lineage over there is pretty far removed from Heiyue. Must be a pain.
engSearchText:
If I'm rememberin' right, the lineage over there is
pretty far removed from Heiyue. Must be a pain.
jpnChrName: ……確かに、向こうの系統だと黒月とも 距離があるだろうし……何かと面倒もあるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに、向こうの系統だと黒月とも
距離があるだろうし……何かと面倒もあるだろうな。

engChrName: Yes, that has caused me no end of trouble. That's why I call upon the guild when I'm in a pickle.
engSearchText:
Yes, that has caused me no end of trouble. That's why
I call upon the guild when I'm in a pickle.
jpnChrName: ええ、そういった事情もあり 困った際はギルドを頼る事にしております。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そういった事情もあり
困った際はギルドを頼る事にしております。

engChrName: Elaine's been a great help on that front. If she weren't here, Heiyue would've walked all over me.
engSearchText:
Elaine's been a great help on that front. If she weren't
here, Heiyue would've walked all over me.
jpnChrName: 特にエレイン様には、黒月に関係した 問題でも助けていただいたもので……
jpnSearchText:
特にエレイン様には、黒月に関係した
問題でも助けていただいたもので……

engChrName: That's why I'm forever indebted to her. I decided to repay her with my cooking.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm forever indebted to her. I decided to
repay her with my cooking.
jpnChrName: 私にできる恩返しはやはり料理でと思い、 賓客としてもてなしている次第です。
jpnSearchText:
私にできる恩返しはやはり料理でと思い、
賓客としてもてなしている次第です。

engChrName: My experience working at the inn in Longlai has proved to be invaluable during my stay in Langport.
engSearchText:
My experience working at the inn in Longlai has
proved to be invaluable during my stay in Langport.
jpnChrName: 《龍來》の旅館に勤めていた経験を この街でも活かせる事は本当に光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
《龍來》の旅館に勤めていた経験を
この街でも活かせる事は本当に光栄です。

engChrName: However, the distance between Heiyue and me is as wide as the ocean. The conflicts are neverending.
engSearchText:
However, the distance between Heiyue and me is as
wide as the ocean. The conflicts are neverending.
jpnChrName: ただ、黒月とお互いに距離がある故 何かと苦労も絶えないもので……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、黒月とお互いに距離がある故
何かと苦労も絶えないもので……

engChrName: I don't know what I'd do without the bracers and Elaine.
engSearchText:
I don't know what I'd do without the bracers
and Elaine.
jpnChrName: それを解決してくださったエレイン様には 感謝してもしきれません。
jpnSearchText:
それを解決してくださったエレイン様には
感謝してもしきれません。

engChrName: Welcome! We serve Eastern cuisine that's quite different from what you may be used to here in Langport.
engSearchText:
Welcome! We serve Eastern cuisine that's quite
different from what you may be used to here
in Langport.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、煌都の主流とは違う様式ですが、 当店の東方料理をどうぞご賞味あれ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、煌都の主流とは違う様式ですが、
当店の東方料理をどうぞご賞味あれ。

engChrName: The menu consists of dishes from my hometown. They are light on the spices and oil so as not to overwhelm the delectable flavor.
engSearchText:
The menu consists of dishes from my hometown.
They are light on the spices and oil so as not to
overwhelm the delectable flavor.
jpnChrName: これは私の故郷の料理を参考にしていましてね、 香辛料や油を控え、あっさりめに仕上げ……
jpnSearchText:
これは私の故郷の料理を参考にしていましてね、
香辛料や油を控え、あっさりめに仕上げ……

engChrName: I opened a restaurant here believing that my dishes would be accessible and loved by everyone.
engSearchText:
I opened a restaurant here believing that my dishes
would be accessible and loved by everyone.
jpnChrName: これならより多くの人に馴染んでいただけると思い、 この街にて出店した次第でございます。
jpnSearchText:
これならより多くの人に馴染んでいただけると思い、
この街にて出店した次第でございます。

engChrName: (So this guy serves Eastern food from a different culture. Wonder if he's from that town...)
engSearchText:
(So this guy serves Eastern food from a
different culture. Wonder if he's from that town...)
jpnChrName: （煌都とは違う文化圏の東方料理か……   なるほど、“あの街”の系統か……）
jpnSearchText:
（煌都とは違う文化圏の東方料理か……
なるほど、“あの街”の系統か……）

engChrName: My restaurant is still somewhat obscure.
engSearchText: My restaurant is still somewhat obscure.
jpnChrName: うちの料理の様式は煌都の主流に比べ、 マイナーではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
うちの料理の様式は煌都の主流に比べ、
マイナーではありますが……

engChrName: Someday, however, it will be known throughout all of Langport. I want my food to be enjoyed by all, residents and tourists alike.
engSearchText:
Someday, however, it will be known throughout all
of Langport. I want my food to be enjoyed by all,
residents and tourists alike.
jpnChrName: 是非とも多くの方に親しんでいただきたいですしね。 多くの方が来るこの街で頑張らせていただいています。
jpnSearchText:
是非とも多くの方に親しんでいただきたいですしね。
多くの方が来るこの街で頑張らせていただいています。

engChrName: Evidently, there was some trouble at the harbor.
engSearchText: Evidently, there was some trouble at the harbor.
jpnChrName: 今度は港の方でも何かあったって……
jpnSearchText: 今度は港の方でも何かあったって……

engChrName: I'm worried about everything that's been going on in the city, but that doesn't mean I'm going to pack my bags and leave.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about everything that's been going on in
the city, but that doesn't mean I'm going to pack my
bags and leave.
jpnChrName: この街も色々あるのは理解していますが、 それでも私はオーナーと頑張りたいです。
jpnSearchText:
この街も色々あるのは理解していますが、
それでも私はオーナーと頑張りたいです。

engChrName: I'm going to keep working for Kuwano as usual. I want to help him see his mission through.
engSearchText:
I'm going to keep working for Kuwano as usual.
I want to help him see his mission through.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、オーナーの挑戦はこの街でこそ 持つ意味もあると思いますし……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、オーナーの挑戦はこの街でこそ
持つ意味もあると思いますし……

engChrName: We'll just have to believe that the bracers will keep us safe.
engSearchText:
We'll just have to believe that the bracers will keep
us safe.
jpnChrName: それに、エレインさんやギルドの 皆さんがいる事ですし、彼らを信じましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それに、エレインさんやギルドの
皆さんがいる事ですし、彼らを信じましょう。

engChrName: I heard people from the Eastern Quarter were murdered last night... Kuwano's heart is aching over this.
engSearchText:
I heard people from the Eastern Quarter were
murdered last night... Kuwano's heart is aching
over this.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は東方人街が大変だったそうで…… 殺人まであったと聞きますしね……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は東方人街が大変だったそうで……
殺人まであったと聞きますしね……

engChrName: He said we're going to stay open so that we can cheer everyone up with our food.
engSearchText:
He said we're going to stay open so that we can cheer
everyone up with our food.
jpnChrName: オーナーも心を痛めているようですが…… 東方人街の人達を元気づけるためにも営業するそうです。
jpnSearchText:
オーナーも心を痛めているようですが……
東方人街の人達を元気づけるためにも営業するそうです。

engChrName: I need to learn from his example and get my act together.
engSearchText:
I need to learn from his example and get my
act together.
jpnChrName: 私もクワノ・オーナーに倣い、 気持ちを切り替えて頑張らないと……
jpnSearchText:
私もクワノ・オーナーに倣い、
気持ちを切り替えて頑張らないと……

engChrName: If I want to open my own place in the future, I'll need his mental fortitude.
engSearchText:
If I want to open my own place in the future, I'll need
his mental fortitude.
jpnChrName: 将来お店を立ち上げるためにも、オーナーの 心構えもしっかり学びたいですしね。
jpnSearchText:
将来お店を立ち上げるためにも、オーナーの
心構えもしっかり学びたいですしね。

engChrName: I recently learned Elaine and I are from the same hometown.
engSearchText:
I recently learned Elaine and I are from the
same hometown.
jpnChrName: エレインさん……聞けば私と同郷だそうで、 個人的にも良くしていただいているんです。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさん……聞けば私と同郷だそうで、
個人的にも良くしていただいているんです。

engChrName: She's been very encouraging to me. She told me that—even though Eastern cuisine isn't popular back home—my dishes would win them over.
engSearchText:
She's been very encouraging to me. She told me
that—even though Eastern cuisine isn't popular back
home—my dishes would win them over.
jpnChrName: あそこは東方料理があまり流行りませんけど、 この上品な味なら受け入れられるかもって……
jpnSearchText:
あそこは東方料理があまり流行りませんけど、
この上品な味なら受け入れられるかもって……

engChrName: My dream is to open up a new branch of Houraien so that they can be exposed to—and ultimately accept— Eastern culture.
engSearchText:
My dream is to open up a new branch of Houraien so
that they can be exposed to—and ultimately accept—
Eastern culture.
jpnChrName: 故郷の皆に東方文化を知る機会になって欲しくて、 ここで暖簾分けを目指して修行しているんです。
jpnSearchText:
故郷の皆に東方文化を知る機会になって欲しくて、
ここで暖簾分けを目指して修行しているんです。

engChrName: So, you and Elaine grew up in the same place, huh?
engSearchText: So, you and Elaine grew up in the same place, huh?
jpnChrName: エレインの同郷、か……
jpnSearchText: エレインの同郷、か……

engChrName: You should know that'll be a tall order. Some of the people there've got some serious prejudice against Eastern culture.
engSearchText:
You should know that'll be a tall order. Some of the
people there've got some serious prejudice against
Eastern culture.
jpnChrName: 確かにあそこじゃ……東方文化は 流行りにくいかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
確かにあそこじゃ……東方文化は
流行りにくいかもしれないな。

engChrName: It's not just them. World's full of jackasses who turn their nose up at our culture.
engSearchText:
It's not just them. World's full of jackasses who turn
their nose up at our culture.
jpnChrName: ハッ、いるところにはいるんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、いるところにはいるんだよなぁ。

engChrName: Doesn't matter if they've never had an Eastern dish in their life. They'll shit on whatever you serve just because they aren't used to it.
engSearchText:
Doesn't matter if they've never had an Eastern dish in
their life. They'll shit on whatever you serve just
because they aren't used to it.
jpnChrName: 食べた事も無いってのに、東方文化って だけで胡散臭い目で見る奴はよ。
jpnSearchText:
食べた事も無いってのに、東方文化って
だけで胡散臭い目で見る奴はよ。

engChrName: I know. That's why—when I do open a restaurant—I want to start them with something simple.
engSearchText:
I know. That's why—when I do open a restaurant—I
want to start them with something simple.
jpnChrName: ええ、ですからまずはこういう 馴染みやすいものならどうかなと思って……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ですからまずはこういう
馴染みやすいものならどうかなと思って……

engChrName: The people back home may have some preconceived biases, but if they get hooked on our food, they'll grow to love it for sure.
engSearchText:
The people back home may have some preconceived
biases, but if they get hooked on our food, they'll
grow to love it for sure.
jpnChrName: 故郷の人たちもちょっと先入観があるだけですし、 少しずつ慣れれば好きになれると思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
故郷の人たちもちょっと先入観があるだけですし、
少しずつ慣れれば好きになれると思うんです。

engChrName: Elaine gave me that piece of advice, among others.
engSearchText: Elaine gave me that piece of advice, among others.
jpnChrName: エレインさんにも感想やアドバイスも 多く頂けている事ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんにも感想やアドバイスも
多く頂けている事ですしね。

engChrName: I mainly wait tables here, but the head chef has been teaching me all kinds of recipes in our downtime.
engSearchText:
I mainly wait tables here, but the head chef has been
teaching me all kinds of recipes in our downtime.
jpnChrName: 今はフロント業務も多いですが、 それなりに料理も教えて貰っています。
jpnSearchText:
今はフロント業務も多いですが、
それなりに料理も教えて貰っています。

engChrName: I know the people of my hometown are prejudiced, but I'm sure our dishes will win them all over.
engSearchText:
I know the people of my hometown are prejudiced,
but I'm sure our dishes will win them all over.
jpnChrName: 何かと東方文化への偏見も多い街でも、 この系統なら受け入れられそうですしね。
jpnSearchText:
何かと東方文化への偏見も多い街でも、
この系統なら受け入れられそうですしね。

engChrName: I'll open a restaurant there, and in time, the people will come to embrace Eastern culture.
engSearchText:
I'll open a restaurant there, and in time, the people
will come to embrace Eastern culture.
jpnChrName: いつか故郷にお店を持って、東方文化に 慣れ親しむきっかけを作りたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
いつか故郷にお店を持って、東方文化に
慣れ親しむきっかけを作りたいものです。

engChrName: Welcome to Houraien. If you're looking for Eastern cuisine, you've come to the right place.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Houraien. If you're looking for Eastern
cuisine, you've come to the right place.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、《蓬莱苑》へようこそ。 東方料理でしたら是非当店をご利用ください。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、《蓬莱苑》へようこそ。
東方料理でしたら是非当店をご利用ください。

engChrName: Our menu is quite different from most Langport restaurants', but I promise that our dishes will blow you away.
engSearchText:
Our menu is quite different from most Langport
restaurants', but I promise that our dishes will blow
you away.
jpnChrName: ラングポートの主流とは少々違う様式の 東方料理ですが、この街でも好評ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートの主流とは少々違う様式の
東方料理ですが、この街でも好評ですよ。

engChrName: Even those who aren't accustomed to Eastern foods will fall in love at first bite.
engSearchText:
Even those who aren't accustomed to Eastern foods
will fall in love at first bite.
jpnChrName: 当店の料理は癖も無く万人受けしやすいと言って 頂けていますし、初めての方にもお勧めですよ。
jpnSearchText:
当店の料理は癖も無く万人受けしやすいと言って
頂けていますし、初めての方にもお勧めですよ。

engChrName: The head chef's food preparation methods are a little unconventional, but he always manages to bring out the best in the ingredients.
engSearchText:
The head chef's food preparation methods are a little
unconventional, but he always manages to bring out
the best in the ingredients.
jpnChrName: 当店ではオーナーの拘りで、素材の味を活かした 東方でも少し珍しい様式の物を提供していましてね。
jpnSearchText:
当店ではオーナーの拘りで、素材の味を活かした
東方でも少し珍しい様式の物を提供していましてね。

engChrName: His dishes hooked me the first time I tried them.
engSearchText: His dishes hooked me the first time I tried them.
jpnChrName: とても奥深く上品な味わいで、私も食べて以来 すっかり惚れ込んでしまいましたよ……！
jpnSearchText:
とても奥深く上品な味わいで、私も食べて以来
すっかり惚れ込んでしまいましたよ……！

engChrName: I really want to share them with the people back home.
engSearchText:
I really want to share them with the people
back home.
jpnChrName: こういう東方料理を……是非とも私の故郷にも 教えてあげたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
こういう東方料理を……是非とも私の故郷にも
教えてあげたいものです。

engChrName: I feel like the two of us are even closer than ever. Going on this trip was the right move.
engSearchText:
I feel like the two of us are even closer than ever.
Going on this trip was the right move.
jpnChrName: 色々あったけど、彼女との仲が 深まった意味ではこの旅行は正解だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
色々あったけど、彼女との仲が
深まった意味ではこの旅行は正解だったよ。

engChrName: We'll be heading home in a bit, but I definitely want to go on another trip with her soon.
engSearchText:
We'll be heading home in a bit, but I definitely want
to go on another trip with her soon.
jpnChrName: もうすぐ帰るけど、また彼女と一緒に どこかに行って、もっと仲を深めたいね。
jpnSearchText:
もうすぐ帰るけど、また彼女と一緒に
どこかに行って、もっと仲を深めたいね。

engChrName: Something happened in the Eastern Quarter yesterday. Honestly, I was pretty terrified.
engSearchText:
Something happened in the Eastern
Quarter yesterday. Honestly, I was pretty terrified.
jpnChrName: 昨日は東方人街で何かあったみたいで…… 僕も正直恐かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日は東方人街で何かあったみたいで……
僕も正直恐かったよ。

engChrName: I could see the fog all the way from here...
engSearchText: I could see the fog all the way from here...
jpnChrName: ここからも、不自然な霧とか光が 見えたし……何だったんだろう……
jpnSearchText:
ここからも、不自然な霧とか光が
見えたし……何だったんだろう……

engChrName: Then I looked over at Katyusha and saw she was petrified. That's when I knew I needed to man up.
engSearchText:
Then I looked over at Katyusha and saw she
was petrified. That's when I knew I needed to
man up.
jpnChrName: でも、意外にもカチューシャが もっと怖がってて……
jpnSearchText:
でも、意外にもカチューシャが
もっと怖がってて……

engChrName: It's been a long time since I last comforted her like that.
engSearchText:
It's been a long time since I last comforted her
like that.
jpnChrName: 彼女をあんなに励ましてあげたのは 久しぶりだったな……
jpnSearchText:
彼女をあんなに励ましてあげたのは
久しぶりだったな……

engChrName: Phew. I'm pooped. We did a heck of a lot of walking around, so I'm just about ready to hit the sack.
engSearchText:
Phew. I'm pooped. We did a heck of a lot of walking
around, so I'm just about ready to hit the sack.
jpnChrName: ふう、今日はあちこちを回って、 それなりに疲れたし早く寝たいな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今日はあちこちを回って、
それなりに疲れたし早く寝たいな。

engChrName: Katyusha's a lively gal, but being dragged from place to place can be a little draining.
engSearchText:
Katyusha's a lively gal, but being dragged from place
to place can be a little draining.
jpnChrName: カチューシャは活発だから一緒にいて 楽しいけど、体力はもたなくてね……
jpnSearchText:
カチューシャは活発だから一緒にいて
楽しいけど、体力はもたなくてね……

engChrName: This light dinner ought to perk me up. Then I can go relax in my hotel room and sleep like a rock.
engSearchText:
This light dinner ought to perk me up. Then I can go
relax in my hotel room and sleep like a rock.
jpnChrName: まあ、夜もここでお腹に優しい物を食べれたし、 今夜はゆっくり眠れそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、夜もここでお腹に優しい物を食べれたし、
今夜はゆっくり眠れそうだ。

engChrName: We don't usually have Eastern food up north, so I wasn't sure if this stuff would be to our tastes.
engSearchText:
We don't usually have Eastern food up north, so I
wasn't sure if this stuff would be to our tastes.
jpnChrName: 最初は、僕ら北国の人間には東方料理は 合わないんじゃないかって不安だったけど……
jpnSearchText:
最初は、僕ら北国の人間には東方料理は
合わないんじゃないかって不安だったけど……

engChrName: But I guess I was worried for nothing. This dish was seasoned to perfection.
engSearchText:
But I guess I was worried for nothing. This dish was
seasoned to perfection.
jpnChrName: ここの料理は本当に優しい味付けだね。 彼女も喜んでくれてて嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここの料理は本当に優しい味付けだね。
彼女も喜んでくれてて嬉しいよ。

engChrName: Mmm... This is delicious! It's light and easy to eat, just like everyone said.
engSearchText:
Mmm... This is delicious! It's light and easy to eat,
just like everyone said.
jpnChrName: これが噂に聞くあっさりめの東方料理…… 確かに全然クセが無くて食べやすいね！
jpnSearchText:
これが噂に聞くあっさりめの東方料理……
確かに全然クセが無くて食べやすいね！

engChrName: Yeah, and it's tasty, too. This is high class stuff.
engSearchText: Yeah, and it's tasty, too. This is high class stuff.
jpnChrName: ああ、出汁や香草の使い方も すごく上品だしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、出汁や香草の使い方も
すごく上品だしな。

engChrName: I'm relieved that you're enjoying it. I was worried this kinda food wouldn't really be for us.
engSearchText:
I'm relieved that you're enjoying it. I was worried this
kinda food wouldn't really be for us.
jpnChrName: カチューシャが喜んでくれて良かった。 ちゃんと口に合うか少し不安だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
カチューシャが喜んでくれて良かった。
ちゃんと口に合うか少し不安だったんだ。

engChrName: Same, but hey. Looks can be deceiving. I'd take this Eastern dish over that cheap junk we had for breakfast any day of the week.
engSearchText:
Same, but hey. Looks can be deceiving. I'd take this
Eastern dish over that cheap junk we had for
breakfast any day of the week.
jpnChrName: うん、前に食べた安いお店のはギトギトで 苦手だけど、これならいくらでも食べられそう！
jpnSearchText:
うん、前に食べた安いお店のはギトギトで
苦手だけど、これならいくらでも食べられそう！

engChrName: All right. Once we're done here, I wanna go do some sightseeing!
engSearchText:
All right. Once we're done here, I wanna go do
some sightseeing!
jpnChrName: お腹の調子も崩さなさそうだし、 午後は目一杯観光しようね！
jpnSearchText:
お腹の調子も崩さなさそうだし、
午後は目一杯観光しようね！

engChrName: I enjoyed taking in the sights, but the highlight of the trip was the tail end of last night. Darren was there for me when I needed him most.
engSearchText:
I enjoyed taking in the sights, but the highlight of the
trip was the tail end of last night. Darren was there
for me when I needed him most.
jpnChrName: 観光も楽しかったけど、ダレンの頼もしい 一面が見れたのが何よりの収穫だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
観光も楽しかったけど、ダレンの頼もしい
一面が見れたのが何よりの収穫だったよ。

engChrName: I'm so happy I agreed to go on this trip with him. Next time, I'd like to see a place that really feels like Calvard.
engSearchText:
I'm so happy I agreed to go on this trip with him.
Next time, I'd like to see a place that really feels
like Calvard.
jpnChrName: 改めて彼との旅行は良いなって思えた。 次はもっと共和国らしいものも見たいな。
jpnSearchText:
改めて彼との旅行は良いなって思えた。
次はもっと共和国らしいものも見たいな。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival is coming up at the end of the year. Maybe we could go to that?
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival is coming up at the end of
the year. Maybe we could go to that?
jpnChrName: 年末には“革命記念祭”があるらしいし、 それを見に来るのも良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
年末には“革命記念祭”があるらしいし、
それを見に来るのも良いかも。

engChrName: I take back everything I said about Darren yesterday.
engSearchText: I take back everything I said about Darren yesterday.
jpnChrName: 見直しちゃったよ…… 昨日のダレンには。
jpnSearchText:
見直しちゃったよ……
昨日のダレンには。

engChrName: He noticed I was really scared last night, so he grabbed my hand and led me back to the hotel.
engSearchText:
He noticed I was really scared last night, so he
grabbed my hand and led me back to the hotel.
jpnChrName: 東方人街の方が何か変で……少し怖かったけど、 ホテルまでエスコートしてくれてね。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街の方が何か変で……少し怖かったけど、
ホテルまでエスコートしてくれてね。

engChrName: Then he comforted me and told me he'd protect me at all costs.
engSearchText:
Then he comforted me and told me he'd protect me
at all costs.
jpnChrName: その後も、騒ぎが治まるまで近くで慰めてくれて、 何があっても守るって言ってくれたの。
jpnSearchText:
その後も、騒ぎが治まるまで近くで慰めてくれて、
何があっても守るって言ってくれたの。

engChrName: Darren's a sweet guy and all, but he's about as energetic as a bear in hibernation.
engSearchText:
Darren's a sweet guy and all, but he's about as
energetic as a bear in hibernation.
jpnChrName: ダレン……優しいけど、もう少し 頼もしさがあって欲しいな。
jpnSearchText:
ダレン……優しいけど、もう少し
頼もしさがあって欲しいな。

engChrName: He's also a bit of a wimp. The poor guy passed out right in front of me when he saw a dried bat at a food stall.
engSearchText:
He's also a bit of a wimp. The poor guy passed out
right in front of me when he saw a dried bat at a
food stall.
jpnChrName: 何でゲテモノ屋台で蝙蝠の干物を見て、 私より先に気絶しちゃうの……
jpnSearchText:
何でゲテモノ屋台で蝙蝠の干物を見て、
私より先に気絶しちゃうの……

engChrName: I wanted to eat something from there, but he practically begged for us to come to this restaurant again. So, here we are...
engSearchText:
I wanted to eat something from there, but he
practically begged for us to come to this
restaurant again. So, here we are...
jpnChrName: 夜は向こうで食べたかったのに、 結局このお店に戻る事になっちゃってさ。
jpnSearchText:
夜は向こうで食べたかったのに、
結局このお店に戻る事になっちゃってさ。

engChrName: Darren has a knack for picking out the best places to eat. The food here was divine!
engSearchText:
Darren has a knack for picking out the best places
to eat. The food here was divine!
jpnChrName: ダレンのお店選びのセンスは流石だね、 こんな良いところに連れてきてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
ダレンのお店選びのセンスは流石だね、
こんな良いところに連れてきてくれて。

engChrName: Hopefully this will be our last stop for a while, though. I want to do less restaurant hopping and more sightseeing.
engSearchText:
Hopefully this will be our last stop for a
while, though. I want to do less restaurant hopping
and more sightseeing.
jpnChrName: でも、どうせならもっと一緒に あちこち動き回りたいよ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、どうせならもっと一緒に
あちこち動き回りたいよ……

engChrName: If you're looking for Fan, you just missed him. He left with Ashen a few moments ago.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Fan, you just missed him. He left
with Ashen a few moments ago.
jpnChrName: ファン大人でしたら、先ほどアシェン様と 共にお出かけになりました。
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人でしたら、先ほどアシェン様と
共にお出かけになりました。

engChrName: I don't know where they're headed, unfortunately. It sounded urgent.
engSearchText:
I don't know where they're headed, unfortunately.
It sounded urgent.
jpnChrName: 行き先は存じ上げませんが、 どうやら、大切なご用でして。
jpnSearchText:
行き先は存じ上げませんが、
どうやら、大切なご用でして。

engChrName: Oh, Fan did ask me to deliver a message to you. He said, 'Thank you for all your help.'
engSearchText:
Oh, Fan did ask me to deliver a message to you.
He said, 'Thank you for all your help.'
jpnChrName: その件に関係して……ファン大人より、 改めて“よろしく”と言伝を預かっております。
jpnSearchText:
その件に関係して……ファン大人より、
改めて“よろしく”と言伝を預かっております。

engChrName: The Kowloon Group has been holding emergency meetings in light of last night's events.
engSearchText:
The Kowloon Group has been holding emergency
meetings in light of last night's events.
jpnChrName: 昨晩の一件を受け、九龍グループでも いくらかの緊急会議は行われていますが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の一件を受け、九龍グループでも
いくらかの緊急会議は行われていますが……

engChrName: We don't want to inconvenience any of our guests, so we're trying to handle the situation.
engSearchText:
We don't want to inconvenience any of our guests, so
we're trying to handle the situation.
jpnChrName: 基本的に対応はつつがなく行われております、 当ホテルのお客様にもご迷惑はおかけしません。
jpnSearchText:
基本的に対応はつつがなく行われております、
当ホテルのお客様にもご迷惑はおかけしません。

engChrName: Fan is currently out. You have my apologies.
engSearchText: Fan is currently out. You have my apologies.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、申し訳ございませんが ファン大人はご不在になります。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、申し訳ございませんが
ファン大人はご不在になります。

engChrName: If you'd like me to relay a message, I'd be happy to deliver it to him.
engSearchText:
