If you'd like me to relay a message, I'd be happy to
deliver it to him.
jpnChrName: お取次ぎの必要があれば伺いますが…… ファン大人もお忙しいので、ご理解下さい。
jpnSearchText:
お取次ぎの必要があれば伺いますが……
ファン大人もお忙しいので、ご理解下さい。

engChrName: I understand that you've accepted a request from Fan.
engSearchText: I understand that you've accepted a request from Fan.
jpnChrName: 先ほどファン大人と 会談されたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどファン大人と
会談されたそうですね。

engChrName: Let me know if there's anything I can do to help you.
engSearchText: Let me know if there's anything I can do to help you.
jpnChrName: ファン大人のお客様である以上 私共も、しかと対応いたします。
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人のお客様である以上
私共も、しかと対応いたします。

engChrName: I will do my utmost to fulfill all your needs.
engSearchText: I will do my utmost to fulfill all your needs.
jpnChrName: お取次ぎ等、何かご用があれば 遠慮なくお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
お取次ぎ等、何かご用があれば
遠慮なくお申し付けください。

engChrName: There was another incident at the harbor...
engSearchText: There was another incident at the harbor...
jpnChrName: またしても港湾区で事件か……
jpnSearchText: またしても港湾区で事件か……

engChrName: Projects like mine are always so fragile while they're in their infancy. These constant delays can prove fatal.
engSearchText:
Projects like mine are always so fragile while they're
in their infancy. These constant delays can
prove fatal.
jpnChrName: こうも事件が多いと、我が社は余計に 新事業に消極的になるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
こうも事件が多いと、我が社は余計に
新事業に消極的になるんだよな。

engChrName: At this rate, the nutritional supplement project may be shelved before it ever gets off the ground...
engSearchText:
At this rate, the nutritional supplement project may
be shelved before it ever gets off the ground...
jpnChrName: 例の栄養剤の事業も、この分だと いくらか先にはなりそうだなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
例の栄養剤の事業も、この分だと
いくらか先にはなりそうだなぁ……

engChrName: During my meeting with Mr. Hongfa, I learned yesterday's financing issue was postponed, but they're at least taking our plan into consideration.
engSearchText:
During my meeting with Mr. Hongfa, I learned
yesterday's financing issue was postponed, but
they're at least taking our plan into consideration.
jpnChrName: 昨日の融資の件、見合わせになったけど、 検討はするらしいし一歩前進かね。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の融資の件、見合わせになったけど、
検討はするらしいし一歩前進かね。

engChrName: Speaking of Mr. Hongfa, when I first got in touch with him, he thought I was Eastern.
engSearchText:
Speaking of Mr. Hongfa, when I first got in touch
with him, he thought I was Eastern.
jpnChrName: しかしホンファさんも最初に連絡した時、 私を東方系と勘違いしたらしいね。
jpnSearchText:
しかしホンファさんも最初に連絡した時、
私を東方系と勘違いしたらしいね。

engChrName: People make that mistake all the time thanks to my name.
engSearchText:
People make that mistake all the time thanks to
my name.
jpnChrName: 名前のせいで東方系と 思われる事がままあってね……
jpnSearchText:
名前のせいで東方系と
思われる事がままあってね……

engChrName: But I don't have a drop of Eastern blood in me.
engSearchText: But I don't have a drop of Eastern blood in me.
jpnChrName: 実際にはハーフですらないんだが。
jpnSearchText: 実際にはハーフですらないんだが。

engChrName: I still think this plan can work.
engSearchText: I still think this plan can work.
jpnChrName: 改めていくらかの再検討をしていますが……
jpnSearchText: 改めていくらかの再検討をしていますが……

engChrName: We could turn to villages outside of Creil, such as Armorica in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
We could turn to villages outside of Creil, such as
Armorica in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村以外にもクロスベルの アルモリカなど、有望な農村はあります。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村以外にもクロスベルの
アルモリカなど、有望な農村はあります。

engChrName: If we outsource the production of the ingredients for the supplement, domestic farms can make Eastern herbal medicines uninhibited.
engSearchText:
If we outsource the production of the ingredients for
the supplement, domestic farms can make Eastern
herbal medicines uninhibited.
jpnChrName: 東方系の生薬も希少ですし、 やはり西方の健康食材を活用する意義はあるかと。
jpnSearchText:
東方系の生薬も希少ですし、
やはり西方の健康食材を活用する意義はあるかと。

engChrName: I thought the nutritional supplement idea was a winner.
engSearchText:
I thought the nutritional supplement idea was
a winner.
jpnChrName: うーむ、上質な国産野菜を使用した 栄養剤も良いと思ったが……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、上質な国産野菜を使用した
栄養剤も良いと思ったが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, Eastern herbal remedies and Remiferia's medicines are dominating the market. Getting this plan approved won't be easy.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, Eastern herbal remedies and
Remiferia's medicines are dominating the market.
Getting this plan approved won't be easy.
jpnChrName: 現状で東方生薬やレミフェリアの薬が大きな シェアを占めているし、一筋縄じゃいかないか。
jpnSearchText:
現状で東方生薬やレミフェリアの薬が大きな
シェアを占めているし、一筋縄じゃいかないか。

engChrName: We're looking to develop an all-natural supplement using Creil Village's high-grade vegetables.
engSearchText:
We're looking to develop an all-natural supplement
using Creil Village's high-grade vegetables.
jpnChrName: ……そういう訳で、クレイユ村の高品質な 野菜は、自然派の栄養剤（サプリメント）に向いていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
……そういう訳で、クレイユ村の高品質な
野菜は、自然派の栄養剤（サプリメント）に向いていましてね。

engChrName: But we will need funding from the Kowloon Financial Bank to pursue the project. So, will you consider backing it?
engSearchText:
But we will need funding from the Kowloon
Financial Bank to pursue the project. So, will you
consider backing it?
jpnChrName: うちの重役は東方生薬重視な事もあり消極的ですが…… 《九龍銀行》さんの融資があれば動かせないかと。
jpnSearchText:
うちの重役は東方生薬重視な事もあり消極的ですが……
《九龍銀行》さんの融資があれば動かせないかと。

engChrName: Hmm... I suppose there is a novelty to a nutritional supplement that's made from mineral-rich vegetables.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I suppose there is a novelty to a nutritional
supplement that's made from mineral-rich vegetables.
jpnChrName: 確かにビタミンやミネラルの豊富な野菜を 扱った栄養剤には、新規性もあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
確かにビタミンやミネラルの豊富な野菜を
扱った栄養剤には、新規性もあるでしょう。

engChrName: Using domestic ingredients would build consumer trust, and your company could do a tax write-off for the cost of materials.
engSearchText:
Using domestic ingredients would build consumer
trust, and your company could do a tax write-off for
the cost of materials.
jpnChrName: 素材を国産で賄えるのも、消費者の信頼性と 関税の面から一つの強みと言えます。
jpnSearchText:
素材を国産で賄えるのも、消費者の信頼性と
関税の面から一つの強みと言えます。

engChrName: However, there's one fatal flaw in your proposal: it doesn't take the productive capacity of Creil and other farm towns into account.
engSearchText:
However, there's one fatal flaw in your proposal: it
doesn't take the productive capacity of Creil and
other farm towns into account.
jpnChrName: ただ、この目標はかの農村の 生産力を考慮しておりません。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、この目標はかの農村の
生産力を考慮しておりません。

engChrName: Well...that's true, I suppose. They may have their hands full making herbal medicine, which is a valuable commodity.
engSearchText:
Well...that's true, I suppose. They may have their
hands full making herbal medicine, which is a
valuable commodity.
jpnChrName: 言われてみれば……今までの生薬と 同程度の生産量で計算していましたね……
jpnSearchText:
言われてみれば……今までの生薬と
同程度の生産量で計算していましたね……

engChrName: Placing the burden of mass production on them will likely cause the quality of the product to drop.
engSearchText:
Placing the burden of mass production on them will
likely cause the quality of the product to drop.
jpnChrName: ええ、農家に負担をかけたり大量生産に移行しても 作物の品質が落ちてしまう可能性も高いですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、農家に負担をかけたり大量生産に移行しても
作物の品質が落ちてしまう可能性も高いですしね。

engChrName: Your proposal has potential, certainly, but I'm a little hesitant to agree to fund it.
engSearchText:
Your proposal has potential, certainly, but I'm a little
hesitant to agree to fund it.
jpnChrName: 長期的な観点からは一旦保留して、 様子を見たほうが良いかと。
jpnSearchText:
長期的な観点からは一旦保留して、
様子を見たほうが良いかと。

engChrName: I can't believe we were hoodwinked by Almata. They had a dummy company in the Harbor District all this time.
engSearchText:
I can't believe we were hoodwinked by Almata.
They had a dummy company in the Harbor District
all this time.
jpnChrName: メッセルダム商事以外に、港湾区の方にまで アルマータのダミー会社があったとは……
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダム商事以外に、港湾区の方にまで
アルマータのダミー会社があったとは……

engChrName: Those always spell trouble for non-Kowloon Group companies. The tenant issues alone are a headache.
engSearchText:
Those always spell trouble for non-Kowloon
Group companies. The tenant issues alone are
a headache.
jpnChrName: ダミー会社の存在は九龍系以外の会社に混乱を 招きますし、テナントの扱いの問題もある。
jpnSearchText:
ダミー会社の存在は九龍系以外の会社に混乱を
招きますし、テナントの扱いの問題もある。

engChrName: People in the finance and real estate sectors are going to be even more wary of Almata from here on.
engSearchText:
People in the finance and real estate sectors are going
to be even more wary of Almata from here on.
jpnChrName: 今後は九龍銀行を始め、金融や不動産の方面でも 一層アルマータを警戒する事になりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
今後は九龍銀行を始め、金融や不動産の方面でも
一層アルマータを警戒する事になりそうです。

engChrName: If they keep pulling stunts like this, it'll start having an adverse effect on the economy here.
engSearchText:
If they keep pulling stunts like this, it'll start having
an adverse effect on the economy here.
jpnChrName: 今回の様に裏をかかれる事が重なれば、 流石に経済的な影響も発生しかねませんしね……
jpnSearchText:
今回の様に裏をかかれる事が重なれば、
流石に経済的な影響も発生しかねませんしね……

engChrName: Due to the chaos in the Eastern Quarter, the Kowloon Financial Bank has entered into multiple emergency meetings.
engSearchText:
Due to the chaos in the Eastern Quarter, the
Kowloon Financial Bank has entered into multiple
emergency meetings.
jpnChrName: 東方人街での混乱を受け、九龍銀行も 緊急会議がいくつか入りましてね。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街での混乱を受け、九龍銀行も
緊急会議がいくつか入りましてね。

engChrName: Maintaining economic stability in Langport is one of our directives.
engSearchText:
Maintaining economic stability in Langport is one of
our directives.
jpnChrName: ラングポートの経済的な安定を 保証するのも、我々の使命です。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートの経済的な安定を
保証するのも、我々の使命です。

engChrName: We need to respond promptly to prevent the economy from going into free fall.
engSearchText:
We need to respond promptly to prevent the
economy from going into free fall.
jpnChrName: 混乱が経済に波及しないよう、 しっかり対応したいところです。
jpnSearchText:
混乱が経済に波及しないよう、
しっかり対応したいところです。

engChrName: I agree that we can't ignore any opportunities for advancements in Eastern medicine.
engSearchText:
I agree that we can't ignore any opportunities for
advancements in Eastern medicine.
jpnChrName: 東方系生薬が貴重な事を 見据えての事業は私も同感です。
jpnSearchText:
東方系生薬が貴重な事を
見据えての事業は私も同感です。

engChrName: But the business landscape is constantly evolving. The Central Eastern and south sea markets have seen many changes due to the influence of Valis.
engSearchText:
But the business landscape is constantly evolving.
The Central Eastern and south sea markets have seen
many changes due to the influence of Valis.
jpnChrName: ただ、近年ではヴァリス市国の影響力により、 中東・南海の物が売り込まれつつある。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、近年ではヴァリス市国の影響力により、
中東・南海の物が売り込まれつつある。

engChrName: And the same can be said of Ored, which used to be an import partner for agricultural goods.
engSearchText:
And the same can be said of Ored, which used
to be an import partner for agricultural goods.
jpnChrName: 加えて農産物の輸入相手だったオレド自治州も 情勢が変わりつつある……
jpnSearchText:
加えて農産物の輸入相手だったオレド自治州も
情勢が変わりつつある……

engChrName: We have to be selective when choosing projects to back, so we'd need to run the numbers and look at the state of the market before deciding.
engSearchText:
We have to be selective when choosing projects to
back, so we'd need to run the numbers and look at the
state of the market before deciding.
jpnChrName: 正直な話、今後の動向が読みにくい状況なので、 数ヶ月は傾向を見極めるべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
正直な話、今後の動向が読みにくい状況なので、
数ヶ月は傾向を見極めるべきでしょう。

engChrName: The Kowloon Financial Bank is frequently approached by startups.
engSearchText:
The Kowloon Financial Bank is frequently
approached by startups.
jpnChrName: ラングポートでは事業の立ち上げや、 取引ルートの新規開拓も盛んですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートでは事業の立ち上げや、
取引ルートの新規開拓も盛んですしね。

engChrName: They need loans, and we are happy to provide them when they suit our interests.
engSearchText:
They need loans, and we are happy to provide them
when they suit our interests.
jpnChrName: 私達《九龍銀行》にも融資の相談などが 頻繁に持ちかけられるのです。
jpnSearchText:
私達《九龍銀行》にも融資の相談などが
頻繁に持ちかけられるのです。

engChrName: After what happened in the Harbor District, I'm worried that there'll be a negative effect on imports.
engSearchText:
After what happened in the Harbor District, I'm
worried that there'll be a negative effect on imports.
jpnChrName: 港湾区で事件があったとなると、 今後の輸入品に影響が無いか心配ですね……
jpnSearchText:
港湾区で事件があったとなると、
今後の輸入品に影響が無いか心配ですね……

engChrName: The harbor's where all those goods come in.
engSearchText: The harbor's where all those goods come in.
jpnChrName: こんなに色んな舶来品は、港あってこそ やって来るんですから。
jpnSearchText:
こんなに色んな舶来品は、港あってこそ
やって来るんですから。

engChrName: These constant acts of terrorism are going to throw off all the ship schedules...
engSearchText:
These constant acts of terrorism are going to throw
off all the ship schedules...
jpnChrName: 事件があったのは一倉庫だとは言うけど…… 大きいテロとかなら、船の便にも影響しますしね……
jpnSearchText:
事件があったのは一倉庫だとは言うけど……
大きいテロとかなら、船の便にも影響しますしね……

engChrName: How's this all going to affect my business?
engSearchText: How's this all going to affect my business?
jpnChrName: 昔のテロが頻発していた時を思い出してしまって、 先行き不安というか……
jpnSearchText:
昔のテロが頻発していた時を思い出してしまって、
先行き不安というか……

engChrName: Apparently people were murdered in the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
Apparently people were murdered in the
Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: 昨晩、東方人街の方は霧だけでなく、 殺人事件もあったみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩、東方人街の方は霧だけでなく、
殺人事件もあったみたいで……

engChrName: All of the customers today have come in with their heads hung low...
engSearchText:
All of the customers today have come in with their
heads hung low...
jpnChrName: 向こうから来るお客さんたちが落ち込んでいて…… 私まで悲しくなってしまいます……
jpnSearchText:
向こうから来るお客さんたちが落ち込んでいて……
私まで悲しくなってしまいます……

engChrName: I've got to work even harder so I can put smiles back on their faces!
engSearchText:
I've got to work even harder so I can put smiles back
on their faces!
jpnChrName: 何とか、東方人街の方のお客さんたちを 元気づけるためにも普段以上に頑張らないと……！
jpnSearchText:
何とか、東方人街の方のお客さんたちを
元気づけるためにも普段以上に頑張らないと……！

engChrName: Until just recently, we primarily sold imported goods from the Central East and the East.
engSearchText:
Until just recently, we primarily sold imported goods
from the Central East and the East.
jpnChrName: 前は中東地域や東方の舶来品が 中心に並んでいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
前は中東地域や東方の舶来品が
中心に並んでいましたが……

engChrName: Though now that international relations with the Empire have stabilized, we can sell imports from Ordis and overland routes.
engSearchText:
Though now that international relations with the
Empire have stabilized, we can sell imports from
Ordis and overland routes.
jpnChrName: 最近ではエレボニア帝国と国交が正常化したお陰で、 オルディスからの品や陸路の輸入品も増えました！
jpnSearchText:
最近ではエレボニア帝国と国交が正常化したお陰で、
オルディスからの品や陸路の輸入品も増えました！

engChrName: It seems like the Empire's smaller companies have been taking an interest in Central Eastern goods.
engSearchText:
It seems like the Empire's smaller companies have
been taking an interest in Central Eastern goods.
jpnChrName: しかも、帝国の小売業者も最近では中東の品に 関心を寄せているようで……
jpnSearchText:
しかも、帝国の小売業者も最近では中東の品に
関心を寄せているようで……

engChrName: Our department store has been doing what it can to help mediate the Empire's trade market.
engSearchText:
Our department store has been doing what it can to
help mediate the Empire's trade market.
jpnChrName: 当百貨店も、帝国の貿易には微力ながら 仲介などで協力しているらしいですしね。
jpnSearchText:
当百貨店も、帝国の貿易には微力ながら
仲介などで協力しているらしいですしね。

engChrName: Welcome to the Kowloon Department Store!
engSearchText: Welcome to the Kowloon Department Store!
jpnChrName: 歓迎光臨（ファンイン・グァンリン）──いらっしゃいませ！ ようこそ九龍百貨店へ。
jpnSearchText:
歓迎光臨（ファンイン・グァンリン）──いらっしゃいませ！
ようこそ九龍百貨店へ。

engChrName: Langport is a city of commerce, so our store specializes in all kinds of rare imports.
engSearchText:
Langport is a city of commerce, so our store
specializes in all kinds of rare imports.
jpnChrName: 煌都は貿易都市ですから、当店の目玉は やはり珍しい舶来品の数々です。
jpnSearchText:
煌都は貿易都市ですから、当店の目玉は
やはり珍しい舶来品の数々です。

engChrName: That's why I'm always giddy when new goods come in. We get new imports every month!
engSearchText:
That's why I'm always giddy when new goods
come in. We get new imports every month!
jpnChrName: かく言う私も、入荷リスト更新が楽しみでしてね。 毎月のように新しい舶来品が来ますし！
jpnSearchText:
かく言う私も、入荷リスト更新が楽しみでしてね。
毎月のように新しい舶来品が来ますし！

engChrName: Did you hear about what happened at the Harbor District?
engSearchText:
Did you hear about what happened at the
Harbor District?
jpnChrName: ……次は港湾区での事件か……詳しい事は 聞いてないけど、やっぱり心配だな。
jpnSearchText:
……次は港湾区での事件か……詳しい事は
聞いてないけど、やっぱり心配だな。

engChrName: I know that there was some kind of fight there, but I don't know any of the details.
engSearchText:
I know that there was some kind of fight there, but I
don't know any of the details.
jpnChrName: “小競り合い”の噂は聞いていたけど ますます酷くなってるというか。
jpnSearchText:
“小競り合い”の噂は聞いていたけど
ますます酷くなってるというか。

engChrName: Why have there been so many incidents lately...?
engSearchText: Why have there been so many incidents lately...?
jpnChrName: これ以上大きな事件が 起きないといいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
これ以上大きな事件が
起きないといいんだが……

engChrName: *sigh* Last night sounded like it was pretty awful.
engSearchText: *sigh* Last night sounded like it was pretty awful.
jpnChrName: ふう、昨夜は大変だったそうだね。 殺人事件まであったとか……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、昨夜は大変だったそうだね。
殺人事件まであったとか……

engChrName: What was with that mist, anyway? We never usually get that at this time of year.
engSearchText:
What was with that mist, anyway? We never usually
get that at this time of year.
jpnChrName: けど急に濃い霧が出てきたとも聞くし…… うーん、どうも腑に落ちないというか。
jpnSearchText:
けど急に濃い霧が出てきたとも聞くし……
うーん、どうも腑に落ちないというか。

engChrName: And then we had those murders at the same time... Can that really be a coincidence?
engSearchText:
And then we had those murders at the same time...
Can that really be a coincidence?
jpnChrName: 海霧の季節ならともかく、不自然だよな。 本当にただの偶然なんだろうか……
jpnSearchText:
海霧の季節ならともかく、不自然だよな。
本当にただの偶然なんだろうか……

engChrName: A customer from earlier told me he came all the way to Langport just to buy a Red Star automobile.
engSearchText:
A customer from earlier told me he came all the way
to Langport just to buy a Red Star automobile.
jpnChrName: レッドスターの車をわざわざ買いに来たって 人がさっきうちの店に来たよ。
jpnSearchText:
レッドスターの車をわざわざ買いに来たって
人がさっきうちの店に来たよ。

engChrName: Apparently he got a model that can only be purchased directly from the dealer. Must've been a big fan.
engSearchText:
Apparently he got a model that can only be purchased
directly from the dealer. Must've been a big fan.
jpnChrName: 直営のディーラーからしか買えないモデルを 狙うとは、なかなかお目が高いもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
直営のディーラーからしか買えないモデルを
狙うとは、なかなかお目が高いもんだな。

engChrName: Red Star's just getting more and more popular. Hopefully I'll be able to work there someday.
engSearchText:
Red Star's just getting more and more popular.
Hopefully I'll be able to work there someday.
jpnChrName: しかしこういう人気を見ていると、改めて 俺も早く入社したいと思えてくるね。
jpnSearchText:
しかしこういう人気を見ていると、改めて
俺も早く入社したいと思えてくるね。

engChrName: Welcome. If you've got machine-related questions, feel free to ask me anything.
engSearchText:
Welcome. If you've got machine-related questions,
feel free to ask me anything.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、機械関連の相談なら 遠慮無く頼ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、機械関連の相談なら
遠慮無く頼ってくれ。

engChrName: Langport's mainly known for being a commerce city, but its machine industry is pretty robust.
engSearchText:
Langport's mainly known for being a commerce city,
but its machine industry is pretty robust.
jpnChrName: 貿易都市のイメージが強いかもしれないが、 ラングポートは結構機械工業も充実しててな。
jpnSearchText:
貿易都市のイメージが強いかもしれないが、
ラングポートは結構機械工業も充実しててな。

engChrName: We even have a Z1 circuit and a Red Star factory here.
engSearchText:
We even have a Z1 circuit and a Red Star
factory here.
jpnChrName: 何たってレッドスター社の工場や Ｚ１サーキットもあるくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
何たってレッドスター社の工場や
Ｚ１サーキットもあるくらいだ。

engChrName: My dream's to work at Red Star. I'm working on getting my engineering license.
engSearchText:
My dream's to work at Red Star. I'm working on
getting my engineering license.
jpnChrName: かく言う俺も、資格を取ってレッドスターの 技師になるためにここで修行中なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
かく言う俺も、資格を取ってレッドスターの
技師になるためにここで修行中なんだ。

engChrName: I heard about the incident at the harbor. It's so awful.
engSearchText: I heard about the incident at the harbor. It's so awful.
jpnChrName: 今度は港の方でも事件があったらしくて、 まったく嫌になっちゃうわ。
jpnSearchText:
今度は港の方でも事件があったらしくて、
まったく嫌になっちゃうわ。

engChrName: Just when I thought that racial terrorism was a thing of the past...
engSearchText:
Just when I thought that racial terrorism was a thing
of the past...
jpnChrName: せっかく最近は民族テロも無くなって、 治安も安定するかと思っていたのに……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく最近は民族テロも無くなって、
治安も安定するかと思っていたのに……

engChrName: I hope this all comes to an end soon. I want customers to feel safe while they're in our department stores.
engSearchText:
I hope this all comes to an end soon. I want
customers to feel safe while they're in our
department stores.
jpnChrName: せめて百貨店にいる間は、お客さんに 安心を届けてあげたいものよね。
jpnSearchText:
せめて百貨店にいる間は、お客さんに
安心を届けてあげたいものよね。

engChrName: I caught a glimpse of the chaos unfolding in the Eastern Quarter while I was heading home from work.
engSearchText:
I caught a glimpse of the chaos unfolding in the
Eastern Quarter while I was heading home
from work.
jpnChrName: 昨日の夜は帰りの途中で、東方人街の方で 何かあったって騒ぎに出くわして……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の夜は帰りの途中で、東方人街の方で
何かあったって騒ぎに出くわして……

engChrName: I was so distracted that I ended up making a mistake with the seasoning for dinner.
engSearchText:
I was so distracted that I ended up making a mistake
with the seasoning for dinner.
jpnChrName: 焦ったあまりに、お夕飯に使う 香辛料を間違えちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
焦ったあまりに、お夕飯に使う
香辛料を間違えちゃって……

engChrName: My husband and son coughed so hard, they started tearing up. I haven't seen that in years.
engSearchText:
My husband and son coughed so hard, they started
tearing up. I haven't seen that in years.
jpnChrName: 夫と息子が涙を流して咳してるのは 何年ぶりだったかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
夫と息子が涙を流して咳してるのは
何年ぶりだったかしらねぇ。

engChrName: You have to be careful when handling ingredients from foreign nations. Otherwise, you can get really sick.
engSearchText:
You have to be careful when handling ingredients
from foreign nations. Otherwise, you can get
really sick.
jpnChrName: 馴染みのない異国の食材って、 扱いを間違えるとお腹を壊す事もあってね。
jpnSearchText:
馴染みのない異国の食材って、
扱いを間違えるとお腹を壊す事もあってね。

engChrName: In order to responsibly sell foodstuffs, I've studied up on Eastern cuisine over the years, and I had my family test out my cooking.
engSearchText:
In order to responsibly sell foodstuffs, I've studied up
on Eastern cuisine over the years, and I had my family
test out my cooking.
jpnChrName: 私も食品販売に責任を持つために、かなり 東方料理の勉強と練習をしたわ。
jpnSearchText:
私も食品販売に責任を持つために、かなり
東方料理の勉強と練習をしたわ。

engChrName: I've been getting compliments from Eastern chefs, so I think my efforts paid off.
engSearchText:
I've been getting compliments from Eastern chefs, so
I think my efforts paid off.
jpnChrName: 何年も家族を実験台にして、今では東方人の 料理人に褒められるほどになっちゃったわ。
jpnSearchText:
何年も家族を実験台にして、今では東方人の
料理人に褒められるほどになっちゃったわ。

engChrName: Welcome! Are you tourists?
engSearchText: Welcome! Are you tourists?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、観光の人かしら。
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃい、観光の人かしら。

engChrName: We sell unique Eastern foods here. You're bound to find something you've never seen before.
engSearchText:
We sell unique Eastern foods here. You're bound to
find something you've never seen before.
jpnChrName: ここは東方系の珍しい食材なんかも 扱ってるから、見るだけでも面白いわよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは東方系の珍しい食材なんかも
扱ってるから、見るだけでも面白いわよ。

engChrName: I never saw any of these foods in my life before I started working here, but I've learned a great deal about them since.
engSearchText:
I never saw any of these foods in my life before I
started working here, but I've learned a great deal
about them since.
jpnChrName: 私も最初は戸惑ったけど、今では西方人なりに 東方香辛料の事なんかもかなり勉強したつもり。
jpnSearchText:
私も最初は戸惑ったけど、今では西方人なりに
東方香辛料の事なんかもかなり勉強したつもり。

engChrName: If you have any questions, I'll be happy to answer.
engSearchText: If you have any questions, I'll be happy to answer.
jpnChrName: 何か判らないことがあれば、 それなりに答えてあげられるわ。
jpnSearchText:
何か判らないことがあれば、
それなりに答えてあげられるわ。

engChrName: Evidently, there was another incident in the Harbor District.
engSearchText:
Evidently, there was another incident in the
Harbor District.
jpnChrName: 港湾区の方でもまた事件があったってな……
jpnSearchText: 港湾区の方でもまた事件があったってな……

engChrName: Given everything that's transpired, I'm worried that there will be pressure to clamp down on weapons sales.
engSearchText:
Given everything that's transpired, I'm worried that
there will be pressure to clamp down on
weapons sales.
jpnChrName: こうもマフィア絡みの事件が多いとなると、 武具流通の締め付けが一層強まらないか不安だよ。
jpnSearchText:
こうもマフィア絡みの事件が多いとなると、
武具流通の締め付けが一層強まらないか不安だよ。

engChrName: And just when they were on the rise...
engSearchText: And just when they were on the rise...
jpnChrName: まったく、少し前までは映画の影響もあってか、 昔以上に武具が売れていたんだけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、少し前までは映画の影響もあってか、
昔以上に武具が売れていたんだけどなぁ。

engChrName: I've been receiving multiple orders for self-defense weapons after last night.
engSearchText:
I've been receiving multiple orders for self-defense
weapons after last night.
jpnChrName: 昨晩に東方人街じゃ殺人事件もあった関係か、 朝から護身用の武具の注文が結構増えていてな。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩に東方人街じゃ殺人事件もあった関係か、
朝から護身用の武具の注文が結構増えていてな。

engChrName: To be honest, though, I don't know if they will be useful against a mafia...
engSearchText:
To be honest, though, I don't know if they will be
useful against a mafia...
jpnChrName: とはいえ……昨日の事件もあったし、 凶器に使われないかは俺も心配なんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……昨日の事件もあったし、
凶器に使われないかは俺も心配なんだよな。

engChrName: Oh, and for the record, those scoundrels definitely weren't using my products.
engSearchText:
Oh, and for the record, those scoundrels definitely
weren't using my products.
jpnChrName: 一応、例のチンピラ共が使ったのは うちの品ではなさそうなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
一応、例のチンピラ共が使ったのは
うちの品ではなさそうなんだが……

engChrName: I've had a few concerns about my choice of trade as of late.
engSearchText:
I've had a few concerns about my choice of trade as
of late.
jpnChrName: 最近は武具の取引にも気を遣っていてな……
jpnSearchText: 最近は武具の取引にも気を遣っていてな……

engChrName: Since our department store is under the Kowloon umbrella, we get a slew of orders from Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Since our department store is under the Kowloon
umbrella, we get a slew of orders from Heiyue.
jpnChrName: うちの百貨店も九龍系列だからな、 黒月からも色々とお達しがあるもんで……
jpnSearchText:
うちの百貨店も九龍系列だからな、
黒月からも色々とお達しがあるもんで……

engChrName: And ever since the mafia arrived, Heiyue and the authorities have been apprehensive about the circulation of weapons.
engSearchText:
And ever since the mafia arrived, Heiyue and the
authorities have been apprehensive about the
circulation of weapons.
jpnChrName: 例のマフィアが来てから、黒月も当局も 武具の流通に神経質になってるみてぇだ。
jpnSearchText:
例のマフィアが来てから、黒月も当局も
武具の流通に神経質になってるみてぇだ。

engChrName: Hello there. Are you interested in buying Eastern weaponry?
engSearchText:
Hello there. Are you interested in buying
Eastern weaponry?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、土産に 東方の伝統武具はどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、土産に
東方の伝統武具はどうだい？

engChrName: Thanks to the surge in the popularity of films, my weapons have been flying off the shelves.
engSearchText:
Thanks to the surge in the popularity of films, my
weapons have been flying off the shelves.
jpnChrName: 伝統武具は元より工芸品として人気だが、 近頃は映画の影響で特に売れるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
伝統武具は元より工芸品として人気だが、
近頃は映画の影響で特に売れるんだ。

engChrName: They aren't just for show, however. Many of them are used by the students of the Gekka school.
engSearchText:
They aren't just for show, however. Many of them are
used by the students of the Gekka school.
jpnChrName: 無論、張りぼてって訳じゃないしな。 月華流の人が買って行く事も多いんだ。
jpnSearchText:
無論、張りぼてって訳じゃないしな。
月華流の人が買って行く事も多いんだ。

engChrName: The negotiations with Touan ended on a positive note, so I can go home with my head held high.
engSearchText:
The negotiations with Touan ended on a positive
note, so I can go home with my head held high.
jpnChrName: トウアン氏との商談も無事に前向きな方向で まとまりましたし、心置きなく帰れそうです。
jpnSearchText:
トウアン氏との商談も無事に前向きな方向で
まとまりましたし、心置きなく帰れそうです。

engChrName: I'm sure we'll have many roadblocks ahead of us, though. There are a number of them in the world of trading.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll have many roadblocks ahead of
us, though. There are a number of them in the world
of trading.
jpnChrName: しかし、やはり同じ貿易業とは言え その地域特有の難しいものはどこもあるようで……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、やはり同じ貿易業とは言え
その地域特有の難しいものはどこもあるようで……

engChrName: I've heard about the trade disruption in Messeldam and the growing mafia problem there.
engSearchText:
I've heard about the trade disruption in Messeldam
and the growing mafia problem there.
jpnChrName: 特に最近は、共和国北部のメッセルダム港における 貿易の混乱はリベールでも耳にしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
特に最近は、共和国北部のメッセルダム港における
貿易の混乱はリベールでも耳にしますよ。

engChrName: The world is a dangerous place. We'll all have to tread carefully.
engSearchText:
The world is a dangerous place. We'll all have to
tread carefully.
jpnChrName: 地元のマフィアが急成長して介入しているとか…… いやはや、物騒な話は尽きないものですね……
jpnSearchText:
地元のマフィアが急成長して介入しているとか……
いやはや、物騒な話は尽きないものですね……

engChrName: Many businesses in Liberl wish to conduct more international trade.
engSearchText:
Many businesses in Liberl wish to conduct more
international trade.
jpnChrName: リベールでも国際貿易の一層の活発化は 多くの事業者が望んでいる事です。
jpnSearchText:
リベールでも国際貿易の一層の活発化は
多くの事業者が望んでいる事です。

engChrName: That said, some of them are expressly against trading with Langport due to its ties to Heiyue.
engSearchText:
That said, some of them are expressly against trading
with Langport due to its ties to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、煌都を介しての貿易は一部の業者が 例のシンジケートを警戒して消極的になりがちでして……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、煌都を介しての貿易は一部の業者が
例のシンジケートを警戒して消極的になりがちでして……

engChrName: Though I believe we are on the right track now.
engSearchText: Though I believe we are on the right track now.
jpnChrName: その意味で、明確に黒月と別口のルートの カバーが提案された事は有意義と言えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、明確に黒月と別口のルートの
カバーが提案された事は有意義と言えましょう。

engChrName: The clerks here are very kind. Thanks to their advice, I was able to find some good souvenirs for my family.
engSearchText:
The clerks here are very kind. Thanks to their advice,
I was able to find some good souvenirs for my family.
jpnChrName: ここの店員さんは親切だ、アドバイスのお陰で 全員分のしっくりくるものを買えましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここの店員さんは親切だ、アドバイスのお陰で
全員分のしっくりくるものを買えましたよ。

engChrName: Now that that's out of the way, I'll be able to focus on the negotiations tomorrow with a clear head.
engSearchText:
Now that that's out of the way, I'll be able to focus on
the negotiations tomorrow with a clear head.
jpnChrName: これですっきりしたし、後顧の憂いを絶って 明日の商談にも臨めそうです。
jpnSearchText:
これですっきりしたし、後顧の憂いを絶って
明日の商談にも臨めそうです。

engChrName: I'll be speaking with a representative of a company that wants to put some distance between itself and the syndicate here.
engSearchText:
I'll be speaking with a representative of a company
that wants to put some distance between itself and
the syndicate here.
jpnChrName: 何でも、この地のシンジケートと距離を置くため、 積極的に外国資本と協力したい会社らしくて。
jpnSearchText:
何でも、この地のシンジケートと距離を置くため、
積極的に外国資本と協力したい会社らしくて。

engChrName: I work at a trading company in Liberl.
engSearchText: I work at a trading company in Liberl.
jpnChrName: 私は南西方面、リベール王国の 貿易会社から来ているんですがね。
jpnSearchText:
私は南西方面、リベール王国の
貿易会社から来ているんですがね。

engChrName: International trade is fairly common these days, so I get sent here on a regular basis.
engSearchText:
International trade is fairly common these days, so I
get sent here on a regular basis.
jpnChrName: 最近は国際取引も多いし、 ここへの出張も珍しくはないのですが……
jpnSearchText:
最近は国際取引も多いし、
ここへの出張も珍しくはないのですが……

engChrName: I have some free time today, so maybe I'll go buy something for my wife and kid.
engSearchText:
I have some free time today, so maybe I'll go buy
something for my wife and kid.
jpnChrName: 妻子への土産はどうしたものか。
jpnSearchText: 妻子への土産はどうしたものか。

engChrName: I'm not really sure what they'd like, though.
engSearchText: I'm not really sure what they'd like, though.
jpnChrName: 自分が慣れてしまっている分、どのラインの 珍しいものが喜ばれるのか、これがまた悩ましいもので。
jpnSearchText:
自分が慣れてしまっている分、どのラインの
珍しいものが喜ばれるのか、これがまた悩ましいもので。

engChrName: The world keeps spinning, and I'm stuck to this department store like a streetlight.
engSearchText:
The world keeps spinning, and I'm stuck to this
department store like a streetlight.
jpnChrName: こんなに街で事件があって、世間はこんなに 動き続けているというのに……
jpnSearchText:
こんなに街で事件があって、世間はこんなに
動き続けているというのに……

engChrName: Every day is same old, same old. My life is utterly mundane—it just keeps repeating the beats over and over and over...
engSearchText:
Every day is same old, same old. My life is utterly
mundane—it just keeps repeating the beats over and
over and over...
jpnChrName: 私の人生、同じことの繰り返ししか していないじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
私の人生、同じことの繰り返ししか
していないじゃない！

engChrName: Where did I go so wrong? Am I doomed to live a meaningless existence?
engSearchText:
Where did I go so wrong? Am I doomed to live a
meaningless existence?
jpnChrName: 頑張っているつもりだけど…… このまま華の無い人生が続いていくのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
頑張っているつもりだけど……
このまま華の無い人生が続いていくのかしら……？

engChrName: Everyone's talking about some weird mist or whatever, but I'm too busy having an existential crisis to care.
engSearchText:
Everyone's talking about some weird mist or
whatever, but I'm too busy having an existential crisis
to care.
jpnChrName: 向こう岸の霧が何だったのか気になるけど、 それでも私はいつも通りに出勤。
jpnSearchText:
向こう岸の霧が何だったのか気になるけど、
それでも私はいつも通りに出勤。

engChrName: It's like I'm stuck in a never-ending time loop of work and buying ready-made food.
engSearchText:
It's like I'm stuck in a never-ending time loop of work
and buying ready-made food.
jpnChrName: いつも通りに出勤をするなら、 いつも通りにここでご飯を買うだけ……
jpnSearchText:
いつも通りに出勤をするなら、
いつも通りにここでご飯を買うだけ……

engChrName: *sigh*...
engSearchText: *sigh*...
jpnChrName: ふう……
jpnSearchText: ふう……

engChrName: I don't really have the time or energy to cook dinner. I think I'll just buy enough ready-to-eat meals to last me the week.
engSearchText:
I don't really have the time or energy to cook dinner.
I think I'll just buy enough ready-to-eat meals to last
me the week.
jpnChrName: 今日も帰ってご飯作る暇も無さそうだし、 お惣菜を買って帰るしかないわね。
jpnSearchText:
今日も帰ってご飯作る暇も無さそうだし、
お惣菜を買って帰るしかないわね。

engChrName: Wait... Don't I do that every week?
engSearchText: Wait... Don't I do that every week?
jpnChrName: 明日と明後日も遅くまで頑張りたいし、 今週いっぱいはここのお惣菜ね。
jpnSearchText:
明日と明後日も遅くまで頑張りたいし、
今週いっぱいはここのお惣菜ね。

engChrName: Hmm... What should I do for lunch today?
engSearchText: Hmm... What should I do for lunch today?
jpnChrName: さて、今日の昼食は何に しようかな……
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日の昼食は何に
しようかな……

engChrName: Won't be long until my next shift. Maybe I should just grab a quick pick-me-up?
engSearchText:
Won't be long until my next shift. Maybe I should
just grab a quick pick-me-up?
jpnChrName: この後も仕事だし、なるべく 腹持ちの良いものを選ぶべきかしら。
jpnSearchText:
この後も仕事だし、なるべく
腹持ちの良いものを選ぶべきかしら。

engChrName: I'm going to ask Bàbà if he knows anything about Almata. Then I'll hit up some other connections.
engSearchText:
I'm going to ask Bàbà if he knows anything
about Almata. Then I'll hit up some
other connections.
jpnChrName: アルマータの下っ端については…… 私も爸爸（パパ）に聞いて、色々当たってみる。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの下っ端については……
私も爸爸（パパ）に聞いて、色々当たってみる。

engChrName: I wouldn't be surprised if they had multiple hideouts, but as far as I know, Heiyue hasn't been able to find any of them.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be surprised if they had multiple hideouts,
but as far as I know, Heiyue hasn't been able to find
any of them.
jpnChrName: 多分、いくつも拠点があるのだろうけど…… 黒月がこれだけ探しても判らない所なんて……
jpnSearchText:
多分、いくつも拠点があるのだろうけど……
黒月がこれだけ探しても判らない所なんて……

engChrName: Hopefully we can find them before Aaron does...
engSearchText: Hopefully we can find them before Aaron does...
jpnChrName: アーロンがもし、その場所を掴んだら…… きっと一人で無茶を……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンがもし、その場所を掴んだら……
きっと一人で無茶を……

engChrName: Now where did Maxim run off to?
engSearchText: Now where did Maxim run off to?
jpnChrName: ふう、結局マクシム・ルーガンは どこに行ったのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、結局マクシム・ルーガンは
どこに行ったのでしょう……

engChrName: I thought I saw him earlier, but I think it might've just been a lookalike. This might be tougher than I thought...
engSearchText:
I thought I saw him earlier, but I think it might've
just been a lookalike. This might be tougher than
I thought...
jpnChrName: さっき、遠目には似た人は見ましたが…… 真剣に何か探しているっぽいし、人違いかな……
jpnSearchText:
さっき、遠目には似た人は見ましたが……
真剣に何か探しているっぽいし、人違いかな……

engChrName: But I'm not giving up! If there's a story to tell about him, then darn it, I'm gonna tell it!
engSearchText:
But I'm not giving up! If there's a story to tell about
him, then darn it, I'm gonna tell it!
jpnChrName: でも、わたしは諦めませんよ！　マクシム・ルーガンの スクープにせよ文化面の取材にせよ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、わたしは諦めませんよ！　マクシム・ルーガンの
スクープにせよ文化面の取材にせよ……

engChrName: I'll do whatever it takes to bridge the gap between me and Dingo!
engSearchText:
I'll do whatever it takes to bridge the gap between me
and Dingo!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんに一歩でも近づけるなら、 何だって全力で臨むだけですっ！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんに一歩でも近づけるなら、
何だって全力で臨むだけですっ！

engChrName: Now where did Maxim run off to? I'll get the dirt on him if it's the last thing I do!
engSearchText:
Now where did Maxim run off to? I'll get the dirt on
him if it's the last thing I do!
jpnChrName: 《紅い流星》……一体どこに行ったんでしょう、 スクープがあるなら何とか一言聞かないと……！
jpnSearchText:
《紅い流星》……一体どこに行ったんでしょう、
スクープがあるなら何とか一言聞かないと……！

engChrName: ...Ugh. Now I'm starting to sound like some third-rate gossip columnist.
engSearchText:
...Ugh. Now I'm starting to sound like some
third-rate gossip columnist.
jpnChrName: でも……有名人を追いかけているの、 これじゃあやっぱりゴシップ記者っぽい気も……
jpnSearchText:
でも……有名人を追いかけているの、
これじゃあやっぱりゴシップ記者っぽい気も……

engChrName: But if he really is up to something shady, then it's my job—and duty—to expose it!
engSearchText:
But if he really is up to something shady, then it's my
job—and duty—to expose it!
jpnChrName: でも……もしマクシム・ルーガンにやましい事があるなら それを暴くのもある意味正義の……！
jpnSearchText:
でも……もしマクシム・ルーガンにやましい事があるなら
それを暴くのもある意味正義の……！

engChrName: Shoot. Yet another dead end.
engSearchText: Shoot. Yet another dead end.
jpnChrName: ふむ、今回も外れか……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、今回も外れか……

engChrName: If only I could find a single clue...
engSearchText: If only I could find a single clue...
jpnChrName: せめて手がかりくらいはと思ったけど、 出直すしかなさそうだな……
jpnSearchText:
せめて手がかりくらいはと思ったけど、
出直すしかなさそうだな……

engChrName: H-Hey! What're YOU doing here?!
engSearchText: H-Hey! What're YOU doing here?!
jpnChrName: き、君は昼間の……！
jpnSearchText: き、君は昼間の……！

engChrName: Oh, don't tell me you're one of those tabloid vultures. Stalking is a crime, you know.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't tell me you're one of those tabloid vultures.
Stalking is a crime, you know.
jpnChrName: 何だ、まさか君もボクの旅にケチをつける ゴシップ連中の同類なのか！？
jpnSearchText:
何だ、まさか君もボクの旅にケチをつける
ゴシップ連中の同類なのか！？

engChrName: I ain't no journalist, my dude. I don't give a rat's ass about what you're up to.
engSearchText:
I ain't no journalist, my dude. I don't give a rat's ass
about what you're up to.
jpnChrName: いや、何も言ってねぇし、おっさんの 旅行模様なんざ１リジュも興味ねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
いや、何も言ってねぇし、おっさんの
旅行模様なんざ１リジュも興味ねぇが。

engChrName: Though I am kinda curious about what you meant by, 'if only I could find a single clue.'
engSearchText:
Though I am kinda curious about what you meant by,
'if only I could find a single clue.'
jpnChrName: ただ、昼間とは随分違った感じで 一人歩きしてるからな、少し気になっただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、昼間とは随分違った感じで
一人歩きしてるからな、少し気になっただけだ。

engChrName: So you were eavesdropping on me, were you? Well, that's none of your business.
engSearchText:
So you were eavesdropping on me, were you?
Well, that's none of your business.
jpnChrName: 君には関係の無い事だ……強いて言うなら、 探し物があるというだけだ！
jpnSearchText:
君には関係の無い事だ……強いて言うなら、
探し物があるというだけだ！

engChrName: Now leave me be. Even a superstar like me needs some time out of the spotlight.
engSearchText:
Now leave me be. Even a superstar like me needs
some time out of the spotlight.
jpnChrName: さあ、放っておいてくれ！ これは有名人のプライベートなんだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、放っておいてくれ！
これは有名人のプライベートなんだぞ！

engChrName: Fine, fine.
engSearchText: Fine, fine.
jpnChrName: ま、深掘りはしないでおいてやるよ。
jpnSearchText: ま、深掘りはしないでおいてやるよ。

engChrName: But lemme know if you want me to find something for you. I'd be happy to take your money.
engSearchText:
But lemme know if you want me to find something
for you. I'd be happy to take your money.
jpnChrName: ただ、探し物ってのも一応、俺の仕事に なる事もあるんでな、何なら儲けさせてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、探し物ってのも一応、俺の仕事に
なる事もあるんでな、何なら儲けさせてくれや。

engChrName: I've checked every place I could think of...
engSearchText: I've checked every place I could think of...
jpnChrName: しかし、目ぼしいところは一通り見た はずだけど……本当にどこに……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、目ぼしいところは一通り見た
はずだけど……本当にどこに……

engChrName: Maybe I should try someplace more rural?
engSearchText: Maybe I should try someplace more rural?
jpnChrName: もう少し田舎の方なんかも 当たってみた方が良いのか……？
jpnSearchText:
もう少し田舎の方なんかも
当たってみた方が良いのか……？

engChrName: All right, girls. What say we drive out to the beach after this?
engSearchText:
All right, girls. What say we drive out to the beach
after this?
jpnChrName: さて、この後はラングポート郊外で 華麗な走りをご覧にいれようか！
jpnSearchText:
さて、この後はラングポート郊外で
華麗な走りをご覧にいれようか！

engChrName: I'll let you soak in the view of me bathing in the sea breeze.
engSearchText:
I'll let you soak in the view of me bathing in the
sea breeze.
jpnChrName: 海風を浴びながら走る《赤い流星》…… きっと君達も虜になるはずだ！
jpnSearchText:
海風を浴びながら走る《赤い流星》……
きっと君達も虜になるはずだ！

engChrName: Oooh. Sign me up!
engSearchText: Oooh. Sign me up!
jpnChrName: きゃー、素敵ー！
jpnSearchText: きゃー、素敵ー！

engChrName: Would you mind if we rented a boat while we're there? I'd really like to ride one with you!
engSearchText:
Would you mind if we rented a boat while
we're there? I'd really like to ride one with you!
jpnChrName: でも、海風と言えば ボートにも乗ってみたいわ！
jpnSearchText:
でも、海風と言えば
ボートにも乗ってみたいわ！

engChrName: Well, how could I say no to such a heartfelt request?
engSearchText: Well, how could I say no to such a heartfelt request?
jpnChrName: ははは、任せるが良い！ このボクならモーターボートもお手の物！
jpnSearchText:
ははは、任せるが良い！
このボクならモーターボートもお手の物！

engChrName: I say we save it for tomorrow, though. That'll be a perfect way to cap off our date.
engSearchText:
I say we save it for tomorrow, though. That'll be a
perfect way to cap off our date.
jpnChrName: 明日にでも、海上を流星の如く 疾走する体験をさせてあげよう！
jpnSearchText:
明日にでも、海上を流星の如く
疾走する体験をさせてあげよう！

engChrName: For the next two days, my time is your time. I'm going to give you lovely ladies my undivided attention.
engSearchText:
For the next two days, my time is your time.
I'm going to give you lovely ladies my
undivided attention.
jpnChrName: なに、明日も含めて時間はいくらでもある。
jpnSearchText: なに、明日も含めて時間はいくらでもある。

engChrName: Then later tomorrow, we'll ride the waves like a comet flying through the stars.
engSearchText:
Then later tomorrow, we'll ride the waves like a
comet flying through the stars.
jpnChrName: たくさんの名所を華麗なる疾風と共に 巡らせてあげようじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
たくさんの名所を華麗なる疾風と共に
巡らせてあげようじゃないか！

engChrName: *sigh* I wonder if they've seen my request yet...
engSearchText: *sigh* I wonder if they've seen my request yet...
jpnChrName: はぁ……書いた依頼は ちゃんと見てもらえているのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……書いた依頼は
ちゃんと見てもらえているのかしら？

engChrName: I'm dying to visit the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText: I'm dying to visit the Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: 早く東方人街に行きたいのに、困ったわねぇ……
jpnSearchText: 早く東方人街に行きたいのに、困ったわねぇ……

engChrName: (Wonder if her request is for us. Maybe I should go check the bulletin board.)
engSearchText:
(Wonder if her request is for us. Maybe I should go
check the bulletin board.)
jpnChrName: （依頼か……どこ宛てか分からねえが。   念のため掲示板を確認してみるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（依頼か……どこ宛てか分からねえが。
念のため掲示板を確認してみるか？）

engChrName: Every one of the gangsters who was at the harbor has passed... This isn't how I wanted things to end.
engSearchText:
Every one of the gangsters who was at the harbor
has passed... This isn't how I wanted things to end.
jpnChrName: 半グレたちは全員の死亡が確認されました。 ……我々としても気が重いですが……
jpnSearchText:
半グレたちは全員の死亡が確認されました。
……我々としても気が重いですが……

engChrName: Although, it's hard for me to imagine that that was all of the gangsters in Langport. The numbers just don't add up.
engSearchText:
Although, it's hard for me to imagine that that was all
of the gangsters in Langport. The numbers just don't
add up.
jpnChrName: それとは別に、人数が想定より 少ないという話は気になりますね……
jpnSearchText:
それとは別に、人数が想定より
少ないという話は気になりますね……

engChrName: I doubt Almata would hide any remaining grunts, given how disposable they clearly are to them.
engSearchText:
I doubt Almata would hide any remaining grunts,
given how disposable they clearly are to them.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》が彼らを使い捨てている以上、単に どこかに隠れさせているとも考えにくい。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》が彼らを使い捨てている以上、単に
どこかに隠れさせているとも考えにくい。

engChrName: But perhaps they found another way to use them...
engSearchText: But perhaps they found another way to use them...
jpnChrName: 考えたくはないですが……別の“使い方”に 切り替えたという可能性も……
jpnSearchText:
考えたくはないですが……別の“使い方”に
切り替えたという可能性も……

engChrName: Elaine is operating independently at the moment.
engSearchText: Elaine is operating independently at the moment.
jpnChrName: エレインさんは今のところ、当支部所属の 二人とは別行動で動いています。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんは今のところ、当支部所属の
二人とは別行動で動いています。

engChrName: When you're an A-rank bracer, sometimes it's more effective to go out and investigate on your own.
engSearchText:
When you're an A-rank bracer, sometimes it's more
effective to go out and investigate on your own.
jpnChrName: Ａ級ともなれば、単独で調べてもらった方が 効率がいい場合もありますからね。
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級ともなれば、単独で調べてもらった方が
効率がいい場合もありますからね。

engChrName: The other two bracers here are following her example. We'll find the location of their hideout by dividing and conquering.
engSearchText:
The other two bracers here are following her example.
We'll find the location of their hideout by dividing
and conquering.
jpnChrName: それに多角的な視点の情報を集め 繋ぎ合わせれば、必ず連中の拠点も……
jpnSearchText:
それに多角的な視点の情報を集め
繋ぎ合わせれば、必ず連中の拠点も……

engChrName: There were civilian casualties... It's hard not to feel like we failed them.
engSearchText:
There were civilian casualties... It's hard not to feel
like we failed them.
jpnChrName: ついに死者まで出てしまうとは…… 我々も力不足を感じざるを得ません。
jpnSearchText:
ついに死者まで出てしまうとは……
我々も力不足を感じざるを得ません。

engChrName: The bracers are all doing everything they can to bring this situation to an end...
engSearchText:
The bracers are all doing everything they can to bring
this situation to an end...
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の皆さんにも、この件の解決に 全力を挙げてもらっていますが──
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士の皆さんにも、この件の解決に
全力を挙げてもらっていますが──

engChrName: ...but at this point, we may need to call the main office and request some backup.
engSearchText:
...but at this point, we may need to call the main
office and request some backup.
jpnChrName: ふむ、この際ですし総支部の協力も 仰ぐべきでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、この際ですし総支部の協力も
仰ぐべきでしょうか。

engChrName: I'm going to pore through all the info we have on Almata one last time.
engSearchText:
I'm going to pore through all the info we have on
Almata one last time.
jpnChrName: アルマータ関連の資料を再度 洗い直してみるとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ関連の資料を再度
洗い直してみるとしましょう。

engChrName: That strange mist mentioned in last night's report is concerning.
engSearchText:
That strange mist mentioned in last night's
report is concerning.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は妙な霧が発生していたという 報告もあります。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は妙な霧が発生していたという
報告もあります。

engChrName: It's possible that it's somehow connected to the strange phenomena that transpired in Creil Village.
engSearchText:
It's possible that it's somehow connected to the
strange phenomena that transpired in Creil Village.
jpnChrName: 先日のクレイユ村であったという 不可思議な現象との関連性も──
jpnSearchText:
先日のクレイユ村であったという
不可思議な現象との関連性も──

engChrName: We need to band together and figure out what Almata's up to.
engSearchText:
We need to band together and figure out what
Almata's up to.
jpnChrName: エレインさんたちとも連携しつつ、 連中の動きを探るとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんたちとも連携しつつ、
連中の動きを探るとしましょう。

engChrName: Oh, hi, Van. I see you brought a friend with you.
engSearchText: Oh, hi, Van. I see you brought a friend with you.
jpnChrName: おや、ヴァンさんに……東方人街の 例の彼まで一緒ときましたか。
jpnSearchText:
おや、ヴァンさんに……東方人街の
例の彼まで一緒ときましたか。

engChrName: I heard you two butted heads over in the Harbor District, but it's all water under the bridge now, right?
engSearchText:
I heard you two butted heads over in the Harbor
District, but it's all water under the bridge now, right?
jpnChrName: 港湾区の方でお二人は衝突されたと 聞きますが、今は特に何も無いようで。
jpnSearchText:
港湾区の方でお二人は衝突されたと
聞きますが、今は特に何も無いようで。

engChrName: Maybe. Maybe not. I'm still pissed that we didn't finish our fight, and we have your Beauty's Blade to thank for that.
engSearchText:
Maybe. Maybe not. I'm still pissed that we didn't
finish our fight, and we have your Beauty's Blade to
thank for that.
jpnChrName: ハッ、お前のところの《剣の乙女》サマが 首突っ込んで来やがったからだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、お前のところの《剣の乙女》サマが
首突っ込んで来やがったからだろうが。

engChrName: Speaking of which, I hear she and him went on a nice dinner date afterwards. Bet she treated you reaaal good.
engSearchText:
Speaking of which, I hear she and him went on a nice
dinner date afterwards. Bet she treated you
reaaal good.
jpnChrName: このおっさんはあの後、あのＡ級女に飯奢られて よろしくやってたみたいだけどなぁ～？
jpnSearchText:
このおっさんはあの後、あのＡ級女に飯奢られて
よろしくやってたみたいだけどなぁ～？

engChrName: ...It wasn't a date. And we weren't alone, either.
engSearchText: ...It wasn't a date. And we weren't alone, either.
jpnChrName: ……昔の馴染みってだけだ。
jpnSearchText: ……昔の馴染みってだけだ。

engChrName: Anyway, I heard Elaine came here specifically to deal with Almata.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I heard Elaine came here specifically to deal
with Almata.
jpnChrName: それより、エレインはやっぱ アルマータ相手だから来たって事だが……
jpnSearchText:
それより、エレインはやっぱ
アルマータ相手だから来たって事だが……

engChrName: Still wondering how she was up to date on the situation when she's barely had time to investigate.
engSearchText:
Still wondering how she was up to date on the
situation when she's barely had time to investigate.
jpnChrName: 着いたばかりにしちゃ、アルマータ幹部の事やら、 随分と状況を把握していたみたいじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
着いたばかりにしちゃ、アルマータ幹部の事やら、
随分と状況を把握していたみたいじゃないか。

engChrName: That's because we brought her up to speed.
engSearchText: That's because we brought her up to speed.
jpnChrName: ええ、こちらに来ると聞き次第、彼女のザイファに 一通りの最新資料を送りましたので。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、こちらに来ると聞き次第、彼女のザイファに
一通りの最新資料を送りましたので。

engChrName: We've been tracking Almata's movements and had intel on their leaders, so we forwarded all the information we had to her Xipha.
engSearchText:
We've been tracking Almata's movements and had
intel on their leaders, so we forwarded all the
information we had to her Xipha.
jpnChrName: アルマータの動きも、ギルドなりに追っています。 エレインさんに活用してもらえればと。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの動きも、ギルドなりに追っています。
エレインさんに活用してもらえればと。

engChrName: Wow. You guys are on top of this shit. How the hell did you get the lowdown on the leaders?
engSearchText:
Wow. You guys are on top of this shit. How the hell
did you get the lowdown on the leaders?
jpnChrName: へぇ、思ったよりもやるじゃねぇか。 アルマータの幹部なんてどうやって特定したやら。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、思ったよりもやるじゃねぇか。
アルマータの幹部なんてどうやって特定したやら。

engChrName: Heheh. We have our sources.
engSearchText: Heheh. We have our sources.
jpnChrName: フフ、私達も独自の情報源くらいは活用しますよ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、私達も独自の情報源くらいは活用しますよ。

engChrName: Contrary to your belief, we're not always one step behind.
engSearchText:
Contrary to your belief, we're not always one
step behind.
jpnChrName: 一応、私達には彼らとは違う強みもありますしね、 後手に回ってばかりではないのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、私達には彼らとは違う強みもありますしね、
後手に回ってばかりではないのですよ。

engChrName: Fair enough. It's good that you can give Elaine a foundation to work off of.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. It's good that you can give Elaine a
foundation to work off of.
jpnChrName: ま、エレインが動く土台くらいは 作ってくれてるなら何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、エレインが動く土台くらいは
作ってくれてるなら何よりだ。

engChrName: You guys're pretty damn competent—and you're more hospitable now than when I first came to Langport.
engSearchText:
You guys're pretty damn competent—and you're
more hospitable now than when I first came
to Langport.
jpnChrName: 俺が煌都に下宿してた時のギルドよりは 層も厚くなってるみてえだしな……
jpnSearchText:
俺が煌都に下宿してた時のギルドよりは
層も厚くなってるみてえだしな……

engChrName: As soon as we contacted HQ about Almata's movements in Langport, Elaine immediately requested to be sent here.
engSearchText:
As soon as we contacted HQ about Almata's
movements in Langport, Elaine immediately
requested to be sent here.
jpnChrName: 煌都でのアルマータの動向を総支部に相談した際、 真っ先にエレインさんが出張を申し出たそうで……
jpnSearchText:
煌都でのアルマータの動向を総支部に相談した際、
真っ先にエレインさんが出張を申し出たそうで……

engChrName: She said she made contact with their boss once before. Maybe that's part of why she's doggedly pursuing this.
engSearchText:
She said she made contact with their boss
once before. Maybe that's part of why she's doggedly
pursuing this.
jpnChrName: 何せ、以前にアルマータの首領と遭遇したとも 言いますし、彼女の執念も当然のことでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
何せ、以前にアルマータの首領と遭遇したとも
言いますし、彼女の執念も当然のことでしょう。

engChrName: Regardless, we intend to support her as best as we can. It'll also be in the city's best interest to get these mafia goons out of here.
engSearchText:
Regardless, we intend to support her as best as
we can. It'll also be in the city's best interest to get
these mafia goons out of here.
jpnChrName: ……それだけが理由かはさておき、我々としても 彼女のバックアップは煌都のためになりますしね。
jpnSearchText:
……それだけが理由かはさておき、我々としても
彼女のバックアップは煌都のためになりますしね。

engChrName: You're the fixers from the capital, aren't you?
engSearchText: You're the fixers from the capital, aren't you?
jpnChrName: あ、もしやあなた方が 首都からいらした解決屋さんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、もしやあなた方が
首都からいらした解決屋さんですか？

engChrName: Oh, you know about us?
engSearchText: Oh, you know about us?
jpnChrName: え……ギルドの方々も ご存じだったのですか？
jpnSearchText:
え……ギルドの方々も
ご存じだったのですか？

engChrName: Yeah. Heiyue notified us that you'd be coming to Langport.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Heiyue notified us that you'd be coming
to Langport.
jpnChrName: まあ、実は黒月方面からあなた方が来るとは それとなく知らされていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、実は黒月方面からあなた方が来るとは
それとなく知らされていましてね。

engChrName: If you're surprised that Heiyue is passing info to us, well, so are we. We're supposed to be at odds with one another.
engSearchText:
If you're surprised that Heiyue is passing info to us,
well, so are we. We're supposed to be at odds with
one another.
jpnChrName: まったく、一応は対立する間柄なのに 余裕を見せつけてくるものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、一応は対立する間柄なのに
余裕を見せつけてくるものですよ。

engChrName: They're probably just flexing. Their information network's on another level.
engSearchText:
They're probably just flexing. Their information
network's on another level.
jpnChrName: ふん、その分じゃ相変わらず連中に 出し抜かれてるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、その分じゃ相変わらず連中に
出し抜かれてるみてえだな。

engChrName: Yeah... We need to step up our game.
engSearchText: Yeah... We need to step up our game.
jpnChrName: 否定はしませんが…… だからどうという話でもないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
否定はしませんが……
だからどうという話でもないでしょう。

engChrName: Can't let a crime syndicate put us in the shade, or the people might lose faith in us...
engSearchText:
Can't let a crime syndicate put us in the shade, or the
people might lose faith in us...
jpnChrName: 我々ギルドは、市民を守るという 使命を果たすのみですよ。
jpnSearchText:
我々ギルドは、市民を守るという
使命を果たすのみですよ。

engChrName: Well, that aside, we've also heard a lot about you from the Immovable.
engSearchText:
Well, that aside, we've also heard a lot about you
from the Immovable.
jpnChrName: それに今回の来訪こそ黒月より聞きましたが、 あなたの噂は《不動》より伺っていますしね。
jpnSearchText:
それに今回の来訪こそ黒月より聞きましたが、
あなたの噂は《不動》より伺っていますしね。

engChrName: Hah! The grizzly boy scout strikes again. Bet he told you to watch out for me.
engSearchText:
Hah! The grizzly boy scout strikes again. Bet he told
you to watch out for me.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あの熊野郎か…… 少しばかり買い被ってる気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あの熊野郎か……
少しばかり買い被ってる気もするが。

engChrName: Oh, not at all. He was just telling me about how hardworking you are.
engSearchText:
Oh, not at all. He was just telling me about how
hardworking you are.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、ジンさん含め総支部の方々より、 クレイユ村での活躍なども聞いておりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、ジンさん含め総支部の方々より、
クレイユ村での活躍なども聞いておりますよ。

engChrName: HQ was also singing your praises over your accomplishments in Creil, so I'm excited to see you in action.
engSearchText:
HQ was also singing your praises over your
accomplishments in Creil, so I'm excited to see you
in action.
jpnChrName: まあ、煌都での皆さんの動きも この機に興味深く見させていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、煌都での皆さんの動きも
この機に興味深く見させていただきます。

engChrName: 'Fraid there ain't much to see, so you might wanna dial your expectations back a notch.
engSearchText:
'Fraid there ain't much to see, so you might wanna
dial your expectations back a notch.
jpnChrName: あんたも意外と食えなさそうだな……
jpnSearchText: あんたも意外と食えなさそうだな……

engChrName: The two bracers in this branch should be heading out soon.
engSearchText:
The two bracers in this branch should be heading
out soon.
jpnChrName: この支部に在籍している遊撃士のお二人も もうじき出発すると思います。
jpnSearchText:
この支部に在籍している遊撃士のお二人も
もうじき出発すると思います。

engChrName: We've had some gangster activity here in town lately, so the citizens who aren't under Heiyue's protection are rightfully nervous.
engSearchText:
We've had some gangster activity here in town lately,
so the citizens who aren't under Heiyue's protection
are rightfully nervous.
jpnChrName: ここ最近は件の半グレが暴れたせいで、黒月の 庇護下に無い市民は特に不安でしょうしね。
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近は件の半グレが暴れたせいで、黒月の
庇護下に無い市民は特に不安でしょうしね。

engChrName: Now's the time for us to step in and fulfill our duty.
engSearchText: Now's the time for us to step in and fulfill our duty.
jpnChrName: こういう時にこそ遊撃士が動いていかねば。
jpnSearchText: こういう時にこそ遊撃士が動いていかねば。

engChrName: Hello, Aaron. I heard you got into a fight. Again.
engSearchText: Hello, Aaron. I heard you got into a fight. Again.
jpnChrName: アーロン、久しぶりね。 昼間はまた乱闘騒ぎを起こしたそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、久しぶりね。
昼間はまた乱闘騒ぎを起こしたそうだけど……

engChrName: I'm surprised to see you walking around with the spriggan after that. You really are at the mercy of impulse, aren't you?
engSearchText:
I'm surprised to see you walking around with the
spriggan after that. You really are at the mercy of
impulse, aren't you?
jpnChrName: まさか裏解決屋と一緒に街歩きとはね。 単なる酔狂かトチ狂ったか、一応聞いておくね。
jpnSearchText:
まさか裏解決屋と一緒に街歩きとはね。
単なる酔狂かトチ狂ったか、一応聞いておくね。

engChrName: Shut up. Quit being a horse's ass.
engSearchText: Shut up. Quit being a horse's ass.
jpnChrName: ハッ、相変わらず突っかかるじゃねえか、 月華のジャジャ馬女。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、相変わらず突っかかるじゃねえか、
月華のジャジャ馬女。

engChrName: Why is it so hard for you to mind your own damn business?
engSearchText:
Why is it so hard for you to mind your own
damn business?
jpnChrName: 俺が何をやろうが関係あんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 俺が何をやろうが関係あんのかよ？

engChrName: Did you forget that you're MY pupil?! How dare you talk to me like that!
engSearchText:
Did you forget that you're MY pupil?! How dare you
talk to me like that!
jpnChrName: ……お前、一応ウチの門下生だった事 忘れてるか？　この鳥頭！
jpnSearchText:
……お前、一応ウチの門下生だった事
忘れてるか？　この鳥頭！

engChrName: You're in strict need of some discipline. Every member of the Gekka school is supposed to hold themselves to a higher standard of—
engSearchText:
You're in strict need of some discipline.
Every member of the Gekka school is supposed to
hold themselves to a higher standard of—
jpnChrName: お前のせいでどれだけ迷惑を被っているか。 月華の拳士たるもの、義と礼節をもって──
jpnSearchText:
お前のせいでどれだけ迷惑を被っているか。
月華の拳士たるもの、義と礼節をもって──

engChrName: Blah, blah, blah. Okay, good talk—lesson learned and all that. Gotta bounce!
engSearchText:
Blah, blah, blah. Okay, good talk—lesson learned and
all that. Gotta bounce!
jpnChrName: クック、ゴクローさんなこった。 夜が明ける前に俺は行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クック、ゴクローさんなこった。
夜が明ける前に俺は行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Oh, no, you don't! You are NOT getting out of this one, Aaron!
engSearchText:
Oh, no, you don't! You are NOT getting out of this
one, Aaron!
jpnChrName: アーロン！！　まったく……！ お前は本当に不出来な弟子ね……！
jpnSearchText:
アーロン！！　まったく……！
お前は本当に不出来な弟子ね……！

engChrName: If you keep getting into these fights, then I'm just going to have to keep lecturing you.
engSearchText:
If you keep getting into these fights, then I'm just
going to have to keep lecturing you.
jpnChrName: お前が仲間とつるんで喧嘩するの、 本家筋の人間としては放っておけないね。
jpnSearchText:
お前が仲間とつるんで喧嘩するの、
本家筋の人間としては放っておけないね。

engChrName: One of these days, you're going to hurt the people around you if you continue along this path.
engSearchText:
One of these days, you're going to hurt the people
around you if you continue along this path.
jpnChrName: お前は強いからいいだろうけど そんなやり方じゃ周りを傷つけるだけ──
jpnSearchText:
お前は強いからいいだろうけど
そんなやり方じゃ周りを傷つけるだけ──

engChrName: I mean it when I say I don't want that to happen to you. So PLEASE just try and think before you act, okay?
engSearchText:
I mean it when I say I don't want that to happen
to you. So PLEASE just try and think before you
act, okay?
jpnChrName: いつか痛い目見ることになるよ。 もっと考えて行動することね！
jpnSearchText:
いつか痛い目見ることになるよ。
もっと考えて行動することね！

engChrName: Whew. That was a good workout. Getting some exercise always helps clear my mind.
engSearchText:
Whew. That was a good workout. Getting some
exercise always helps clear my mind.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……身体を動かしたら 頭も冴えて来た気がするよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……身体を動かしたら
頭も冴えて来た気がするよ。

engChrName: I'm glad we got to work together on that.
engSearchText: I'm glad we got to work together on that.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋のことも知れて いい機会になったと思うね。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋のことも知れて
いい機会になったと思うね。

engChrName: Let me know if you ever need help with one of your requests.
engSearchText:
Let me know if you ever need help with one of
your requests.
jpnChrName: これからも手伝える事があれば 場合によっては協力するよ。
jpnSearchText:
これからも手伝える事があれば
場合によっては協力するよ。

engChrName: Though in return, we may call on your help for one of ours.
engSearchText:
Though in return, we may call on your help for one
of ours.
jpnChrName: あたし達から相談する事も あるかもしれないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
あたし達から相談する事も
あるかもしれないけどね。

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, you're that spriggan guy, aren't you?
engSearchText: Hmm? Oh, you're that spriggan guy, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ん……あんたが解決屋ね？ フン、なかなかクセのある面構えね。
jpnSearchText:
ん……あんたが解決屋ね？
フン、なかなかクセのある面構えね。

engChrName: I see you've got some civilians with you...
engSearchText: I see you've got some civilians with you...
jpnChrName: 一般人っぽい子も連れているようだけど……
jpnSearchText: 一般人っぽい子も連れているようだけど……

engChrName: My name's Xiaoling. I'm from the Gekka school.
engSearchText: My name's Xiaoling. I'm from the Gekka school.
jpnChrName: まあいい、あたしは月華流のシャオリン。 せいぜい頼りにするが良いよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、あたしは月華流のシャオリン。
せいぜい頼りにするが良いよ。

engChrName: Oh, right. That's the school Aaron's a part of.
engSearchText: Oh, right. That's the school Aaron's a part of.
jpnChrName: “月華”というと確かラングポートで 特に盛んな東方の拳法ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
“月華”というと確かラングポートで
特に盛んな東方の拳法ですよね？

engChrName: And there's a lot of Gekka practitioners in Heiyue, too.
engSearchText:
And there's a lot of Gekka practitioners in
Heiyue, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、“東方三大拳法”の代表格ってヤツだ。 黒月の構成員も月華の使い手が多いが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、“東方三大拳法”の代表格ってヤツだ。
黒月の構成員も月華の使い手が多いが……

engChrName: Yeah. Much to my chagrin.
engSearchText: Yeah. Much to my chagrin.
jpnChrName: まあ、それなりの道場でも黒月系列の 連中が多いのは認めざるをえないね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それなりの道場でも黒月系列の
連中が多いのは認めざるをえないね。

engChrName: They don't understand the core tenet of the practice, which is that the essence of Gekka lies not in acts of violence.
engSearchText:
They don't understand the core tenet of the practice,
which is that the essence of Gekka lies not in acts
of violence.
jpnChrName: けど、月華の真髄は暴力に非ず。
jpnSearchText: けど、月華の真髄は暴力に非ず。

engChrName: That's why I have to set a good example. If a member of the head family doesn't follow Gekka's founding principles, who will?
engSearchText:
That's why I have to set a good example. If a member
of the head family doesn't follow Gekka's founding
principles, who will?
jpnChrName: その本家筋の人間として、そして遊撃士として あたしがそれを証明してみせるね！
jpnSearchText:
その本家筋の人間として、そして遊撃士として
あたしがそれを証明してみせるね！

engChrName: Oh, you're part of the school's head family?
engSearchText: Oh, you're part of the school's head family?
jpnChrName: へえ、月華流の本家筋だったか。
jpnSearchText: へえ、月華流の本家筋だったか。

engChrName: Must be hard to stand your ground on that when Heiyue's always throwing its weight around.
engSearchText:
Must be hard to stand your ground on that when
Heiyue's always throwing its weight around.
jpnChrName: 黒月が幅を利かせてる街で 一本筋を通すのは並大抵じゃねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
黒月が幅を利かせてる街で
一本筋を通すのは並大抵じゃねえだろうが。

engChrName: I think it's awesome that you're sticking to your guns! You're amazing!
engSearchText:
I think it's awesome that you're sticking to your guns!
You're amazing!
jpnChrName: はいっ、ちょっと驚いちゃいました！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、ちょっと驚いちゃいました！

engChrName: Y-You really think so? Well, thank you.
engSearchText: Y-You really think so? Well, thank you.
jpnChrName: そ、そう？　……まああんたたちも 踏まえていれば、無下にはしないよ。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そう？　……まああんたたちも
踏まえていれば、無下にはしないよ。

engChrName: It's important to keep your feet planted in this city, especially when things are on edge.
engSearchText:
It's important to keep your feet planted in this city,
especially when things are on edge.
jpnChrName: 特に今の時期、荒れそうな予兆もある。 身の振り方には気をつける事ね。
jpnSearchText:
特に今の時期、荒れそうな予兆もある。
身の振り方には気をつける事ね。

engChrName: I was born and raised here in Langport. No one wants to protect this place more than me.
engSearchText:
I was born and raised here in Langport. No one wants
to protect this place more than me.
jpnChrName: あたしも煌都の生まれ。 故郷守る想いなら誰にも負けるつもりはないね。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも煌都の生まれ。
故郷守る想いなら誰にも負けるつもりはないね。

engChrName: I'll admit that—when it comes to martial arts—my brother has me beat, and I definitely couldn't take on Heiyue by myself...
engSearchText:
I'll admit that—when it comes to martial arts—my
brother has me beat, and I definitely couldn't take on
Heiyue by myself...
jpnChrName: 武術の腕で言えば兄者の方が上だし、 確かに黒月は幅を利かせてるけど──
jpnSearchText:
武術の腕で言えば兄者の方が上だし、
確かに黒月は幅を利かせてるけど──

engChrName: But with my dojo mates and my bracer comrades by my side, nothing can stop me!
engSearchText:
But with my dojo mates and my bracer comrades by
my side, nothing can stop me!
jpnChrName: ふん、あたしには道場や遊撃士の仲間がいる。 月華流の本家筋として全力でやるだけよ！
jpnSearchText:
ふん、あたしには道場や遊撃士の仲間がいる。
月華流の本家筋として全力でやるだけよ！

engChrName: I was just exchanging info with Detective Dart. We were partners back when I was a cop.
engSearchText:
I was just exchanging info with Detective Dart.
We were partners back when I was a cop.
jpnChrName: ダート捜査官と情報交換をしていたところだ。 彼は警察時代の同期でな……
jpnSearchText:
ダート捜査官と情報交換をしていたところだ。
彼は警察時代の同期でな……

engChrName: Most of the top brass is terror-stricken by Heiyue, but there's still some people left on the force who've got some backbone.
engSearchText:
Most of the top brass is terror-stricken by Heiyue, but
there's still some people left on the force who've got
some backbone.
jpnChrName: 上層部は黒月相手に及び腰になっている中、 彼の様に骨のある警察官もまだまだいる。
jpnSearchText:
上層部は黒月相手に及び腰になっている中、
彼の様に骨のある警察官もまだまだいる。

engChrName: In my opinion, the cops and the bracers need to work hand in glove. That's the way forward for us.
engSearchText:
In my opinion, the cops and the bracers need to work
hand in glove. That's the way forward for us.
jpnChrName: 表の秩序が負けぬためにも、警察とギルドで一線は 引きつつ、協力できるところはしていかんとな……
jpnSearchText:
表の秩序が負けぬためにも、警察とギルドで一線は
引きつつ、協力できるところはしていかんとな……

engChrName: I've been asking around about those gangsters.
engSearchText: I've been asking around about those gangsters.
jpnChrName: 例の半グレ共の動きについて 聞き込みをしていたところだ。
jpnSearchText:
例の半グレ共の動きについて
聞き込みをしていたところだ。

engChrName: Just doing some plain old information gathering. It's a good practice for any cop or bracer.
engSearchText:
Just doing some plain old information gathering.
It's a good practice for any cop or bracer.
jpnChrName: やはり遊撃士も警察も、こうした地道な 情報収集を甘く見たものではない。
jpnSearchText:
やはり遊撃士も警察も、こうした地道な
情報収集を甘く見たものではない。

engChrName: It's how we got our info on Almata's executives.
engSearchText: It's how we got our info on Almata's executives.
jpnChrName: エレイン氏に提供したアルマータ幹部の 動向の情報も……そうして得たものだ。
jpnSearchText:
エレイン氏に提供したアルマータ幹部の
動向の情報も……そうして得たものだ。

engChrName: Well, I say 'we,' but the credit for that belongs to a friend of mine. I need to remember to thank him later.
engSearchText:
Well, I say 'we,' but the credit for that belongs to a
friend of mine. I need to remember to thank
him later.
jpnChrName: まあ、実際に掴んだのは俺ではないが…… ふっ、彼にも礼を言っておかないとな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、実際に掴んだのは俺ではないが……
ふっ、彼にも礼を言っておかないとな。

engChrName: Whether it's investigating in the field or doing our rounds, Heiyue makes things tough for us.
engSearchText:
Whether it's investigating in the field or doing our
rounds, Heiyue makes things tough for us.
jpnChrName: 市民の目線に立って調査や警邏をしようにも、 やはり東方人街はやりにくい面がある……
jpnSearchText:
市民の目線に立って調査や警邏をしようにも、
やはり東方人街はやりにくい面がある……

engChrName: The people of the Eastern Quarter trust Heiyue more than us and the cops, so they defer to them more often than not.
engSearchText:
The people of the Eastern Quarter trust Heiyue more
than us and the cops, so they defer to them more
often than not.
jpnChrName: 向こうの市民は遊撃士よりも黒月を頼り、 黒月に忖度する者も多いからな……
jpnSearchText:
向こうの市民は遊撃士よりも黒月を頼り、
黒月に忖度する者も多いからな……

engChrName: That's why Xiaoling's such a huge help. The people there know and respect her.
engSearchText:
That's why Xiaoling's such a huge help. The people
there know and respect her.
jpnChrName: その意味でシャオリンは頼りになる、 彼女はもともと東方人街に顔が利くしな。
jpnSearchText:
その意味でシャオリンは頼りになる、
彼女はもともと東方人街に顔が利くしな。

engChrName: You're the spriggan from Edith, right? I heard about you from Calvin.
engSearchText:
You're the spriggan from Edith, right? I heard about
you from Calvin.
jpnChrName: カルビンから聞いた、君が首都の解決屋か。 黒月の関係者と契約しているとも聞くが……
jpnSearchText:
カルビンから聞いた、君が首都の解決屋か。
黒月の関係者と契約しているとも聞くが……

engChrName: I also heard you have a contract with someone connected to Heiyue. That came as a shock, given that Zin has spoken so highly of you.
engSearchText:
I also heard you have a contract with someone
connected to Heiyue. That came as a shock, given
that Zin has spoken so highly of you.
jpnChrName: さらに総支部のジンさん達にも評価されていると聞く、 なかなか珍しい立ち位置のようだ。
jpnSearchText:
さらに総支部のジンさん達にも評価されていると聞く、
なかなか珍しい立ち位置のようだ。

engChrName: My office is neutral. I'm willin' to take requests from just about anyone—as long as the work's reasonable and the pay's good.
engSearchText:
My office is neutral. I'm willin' to take requests from
just about anyone—as long as the work's reasonable
and the pay's good.
jpnChrName: まあ、筋が通ってりゃ連中の依頼も受けるが…… これでも一応、依頼以外じゃ中立は貫くつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、筋が通ってりゃ連中の依頼も受けるが……
これでも一応、依頼以外じゃ中立は貫くつもりだ。

engChrName: Interesting. I suppose that puts you in a unique position—one that lets you take on work that the bracers and cops can't.
engSearchText:
Interesting. I suppose that puts you in a unique
position—one that lets you take on work that the
bracers and cops can't.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……まあ、それなら期待させてもらうか。 警察やギルドとも違う者らなりにできる事を。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……まあ、それなら期待させてもらうか。
警察やギルドとも違う者らなりにできる事を。

engChrName: I have a question—and I apologize if it comes across as rude. Have the cops and guild fallen behind Heiyue here in Langport?
engSearchText:
I have a question—and I apologize if it comes across
as rude. Have the cops and guild fallen behind
Heiyue here in Langport?
jpnChrName: えっと……やはりラングポートでは 警察やギルドも黒月に……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと……やはりラングポートでは
警察やギルドも黒月に……？

engChrName: Unfortunately, yes. They always seem to be one step ahead of us.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, yes. They always seem to be one step
ahead of us.
jpnChrName: 後手に回りがちな事は否定できないな、 ギルドに関してはそう単純ではないが。
jpnSearchText:
後手に回りがちな事は否定できないな、
ギルドに関してはそう単純ではないが。

engChrName: The higher ups in the police department are practically in Heiyue's pocket, so they're limited in what they can do sometimes.
engSearchText:
The higher ups in the police department are
practically in Heiyue's pocket, so they're limited in
what they can do sometimes.
jpnChrName: 警察は幾分か、上層部と黒月の関係もあって あまり自由に動けない側面もある。
jpnSearchText:
警察は幾分か、上層部と黒月の関係もあって
あまり自由に動けない側面もある。

engChrName: That's part of why I left the force to become a bracer. I also just wanted to help the people more directly.
engSearchText:
That's part of why I left the force to become a bracer.
I also just wanted to help the people more directly.
jpnChrName: かく言う俺も、より純粋に市民のため動けると 考えて遊撃士に転身した身だしな。
jpnSearchText:
かく言う俺も、より純粋に市民のため動けると
考えて遊撃士に転身した身だしな。

engChrName: Must make things awkward when you bump into one of your old police buds, though.
engSearchText:
Must make things awkward when you bump into one
of your old police buds, though.
jpnChrName: ……元警官だったのか……そいつはまた 苦労してそうなもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
……元警官だったのか……そいつはまた
苦労してそうなもんだな。

engChrName: Sometimes, yes, but I'm sure they understand that line of work just didn't suit me in the end. Too much red tape.
engSearchText:
Sometimes, yes, but I'm sure they understand that
line of work just didn't suit me in the end. Too much
red tape.
jpnChrName: 同情は無用だ、俺のやり方に合わなかった というだけの話だからな。
jpnSearchText:
同情は無用だ、俺のやり方に合わなかった
というだけの話だからな。

engChrName: But I don't blame anyone for staying. There are some things you can only do when you're on the other side of the fence.
engSearchText:
But I don't blame anyone for staying. There are some
things you can only do when you're on the other side
of the fence.
jpnChrName: 現に、警察でも現場レベルではできる事をし、 自分達なりのやり方を貫き通す骨のある者も多い。
jpnSearchText:
現に、警察でも現場レベルではできる事をし、
自分達なりのやり方を貫き通す骨のある者も多い。

engChrName: One day, I hope we can join hands with the police. If we ever become a united front, we could surpass Heiyue.
engSearchText:
One day, I hope we can join hands with the police.
If we ever become a united front, we could
surpass Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 俺はそういう連中とギルドで連携が出来れば、 黒月相手に劣るものではないと確信している。
jpnSearchText:
俺はそういう連中とギルドで連携が出来れば、
黒月相手に劣るものではないと確信している。

engChrName: Yeah. I bet you guys can put aside your differences and become great friends!
engSearchText:
Yeah. I bet you guys can put aside your differences
and become great friends!
jpnChrName: 警察や遊撃士にも…… やはり誇りがあるんですね……！
jpnSearchText:
警察や遊撃士にも……
やはり誇りがあるんですね……！

engChrName: Do you know the Divine Blade of Wind over in Crossbell? He was once a police officer as well.
engSearchText:
Do you know the Divine Blade of Wind over
in Crossbell? He was once a police officer as well.
jpnChrName: そう言えばクロスベルの名高き《風の剣聖》は 知っているか？　彼も元は警察官だったらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えばクロスベルの名高き《風の剣聖》は
知っているか？　彼も元は警察官だったらしいな。

engChrName: I'm nowhere near his level, but one day, I'd like to reach the same lofty heights that he did.
engSearchText:
I'm nowhere near his level, but one day, I'd like to
reach the same lofty heights that he did.
jpnChrName: 俺は彼の足元にも及ばんが、 少しでも彼の高みに近づきたいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は彼の足元にも及ばんが、
少しでも彼の高みに近づきたいものだ。

engChrName: It'd be an honor to meet him in person someday. Maybe he'd be willing to teach me a thing or two.
engSearchText:
It'd be an honor to meet him in person someday.
Maybe he'd be willing to teach me a thing or two.
jpnChrName: 機会が合えば一度お会いして、彼の極意などを お聞かせいただければ光栄なのだがな。
jpnSearchText:
機会が合えば一度お会いして、彼の極意などを
お聞かせいただければ光栄なのだがな。

engChrName: The police and the bracers agreed to work together on this case.
engSearchText:
The police and the bracers agreed to work together
on this case.
jpnChrName: アルマータに関してはギルドとの協力も 他よりは認められている……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータに関してはギルドとの協力も
他よりは認められている……

engChrName: I'm glad I get to work alongside Hornet again. It's just like old times.
engSearchText:
I'm glad I get to work alongside Hornet again.
It's just like old times.
jpnChrName: まあ、久しぶりにホーネットと肩を 並べられるのは悪い気はしないでもないがな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、久しぶりにホーネットと肩を
並べられるのは悪い気はしないでもないがな。

engChrName: (Hmm... Doesn't seem like they're making any moves.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Doesn't seem like they're making
any moves.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ、今夜も動きはなさそうだな……）
jpnSearchText: （ふむ、今夜も動きはなさそうだな……）

engChrName: I'll be leaving fairly soon. I don't think there's going to be any activity tonight.
engSearchText:
I'll be leaving fairly soon. I don't think there's going
to be any activity tonight.
jpnChrName: ……私はじきにこの場での張り込みは 切り上げる、妙な気配も今は無いしな。
jpnSearchText:
……私はじきにこの場での張り込みは
切り上げる、妙な気配も今は無いしな。

engChrName: I know the executives are up to something, though. I just don't know what.
engSearchText:
I know the executives are up to something, though.
I just don't know what.
jpnChrName: しかし……半グレ共はともかく幹部の 潜伏場所は一体どこなのか……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……半グレ共はともかく幹部の
潜伏場所は一体どこなのか……

engChrName: It's clear they've been in this area for a while, and I intend to find out why.
engSearchText:
It's clear they've been in this area for a while, and I
intend to find out why.
jpnChrName: 既に長い間この近辺に滞在している、 それだけは確かなはずだが……
jpnSearchText:
既に長い間この近辺に滞在している、
それだけは確かなはずだが……

engChrName: (I've been watching that building for the last few days, but I haven't seen anyone resembling an executive come in or out.)
engSearchText:
(I've been watching that building for the last few
days, but I haven't seen anyone resembling an
executive come in or out.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ、幹部と思しき者の出入りが   確認されてから数日……まだ気配はあるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ、幹部と思しき者の出入りが
確認されてから数日……まだ気配はあるな。）

engChrName: (My hunch tells me they're still around, though. Maybe those gangsters are holed up there as well...)
engSearchText:
(My hunch tells me they're still around, though.
Maybe those gangsters are holed up there as well...)
jpnChrName: （もっとも、鉄砲玉の半グレ共は見当たらない……   それだけに引っかかるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（もっとも、鉄砲玉の半グレ共は見当たらない……
それだけに引っかかるが……）

engChrName: What's the right move here?
engSearchText: What's the right move here?
jpnChrName: ……さて、一体どうしたものか……
jpnSearchText: ……さて、一体どうしたものか……

engChrName: (He's on the right track.)
engSearchText: (He's on the right track.)
jpnChrName: （このおっさんは十中八九……）
jpnSearchText: （このおっさんは十中八九……）

engChrName: (I thought Heiyue was running laps around these guys, but it looks like there's a few grizzled vets who know the score.)
engSearchText:
(I thought Heiyue was running laps around these
guys, but it looks like there's a few grizzled vets who
know the score.)
jpnChrName: （ふん、黒月に抜かれてるかと思ったが、   ここの連中も案外骨があるって事か。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふん、黒月に抜かれてるかと思ったが、
ここの連中も案外骨があるって事か。）

engChrName: I'd rather be elsewhere, but I think I should keep an eye on this place for a while longer.
engSearchText:
I'd rather be elsewhere, but I think I should keep an
eye on this place for a while longer.
jpnChrName: ……本命でない事は確かではあるが、 もう少し張っておいた方が良いか。
jpnSearchText:
……本命でない事は確かではあるが、
もう少し張っておいた方が良いか。

engChrName: I want to be there when they finally make their move.
engSearchText: I want to be there when they finally make their move.
jpnChrName: 次に動きがあった時が潮時、 そう捉えておくとしよう……
jpnSearchText:
次に動きがあった時が潮時、
そう捉えておくとしよう……

engChrName: Heiyue got the jump on us with the on-site inspection, but we at least managed to catch a glimpse of the weapons' traces.
engSearchText:
Heiyue got the jump on us with the on-site
inspection, but we at least managed to catch a
glimpse of the weapons' traces.
jpnChrName: 今朝の現場検証では黒月に先を越されたが…… やはりあの痕跡は気になったな。
jpnSearchText:
今朝の現場検証では黒月に先を越されたが……
やはりあの痕跡は気になったな。

engChrName: You think the Almata executives are still here?
engSearchText: You think the Almata executives are still here?
jpnChrName: となると、お前が確認した《Ａ》の 幹部もやはり……
jpnSearchText:
となると、お前が確認した《Ａ》の
幹部もやはり……

engChrName: Yeah. I can't say for certain, but we should be ready for anything.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I can't say for certain, but we should be ready
for anything.
jpnChrName: ああ、まだ確証は無いが備えた方が良いな。 それより、連中の逃走先だが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、まだ確証は無いが備えた方が良いな。
それより、連中の逃走先だが……

engChrName: I checked the roads and the railroad, but there were no signs that they left the city. My hunch tells me their hideout isn't far away.
engSearchText:
I checked the roads and the railroad, but there were
no signs that they left the city. My hunch tells me
their hideout isn't far away.
jpnChrName: 車道も鉄道も洗い出したが、煌都を出た形跡は無い。 おそらく本命のアジトも遠くはないと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
車道も鉄道も洗い出したが、煌都を出た形跡は無い。
おそらく本命のアジトも遠くはないと思うが……

engChrName: Understood. I'd need to do some more digging to find out where it is, but I'm sure Elaine will have it pinpointed before me.
engSearchText:
Understood. I'd need to do some more digging to
find out where it is, but I'm sure Elaine will have it
pinpointed before me.
jpnChrName: やはりもう少し確証が欲しいな。 だが、今はエレインも独自に動いている。
jpnSearchText:
やはりもう少し確証が欲しいな。
だが、今はエレインも独自に動いている。

engChrName: Thanks for that info, by the way. I'm sure she's putting it to good use.
engSearchText:
Thanks for that info, by the way. I'm sure she's
putting it to good use.
jpnChrName: お前が回してくれた情報も、 彼女なら有効に役立ててくれるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
お前が回してくれた情報も、
彼女なら有効に役立ててくれるだろう。

engChrName: Don't mention it. All I did was pass along what I heard—nothing more.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. All I did was pass along what I
heard—nothing more.
jpnChrName: 礼には及ばない、警察で必要な情報の内、 共有できるものを回しただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
礼には及ばない、警察で必要な情報の内、
共有できるものを回しただけだ。

engChrName: September 20th, 12:10PM
engSearchText: September 20th, 12:10PM

engChrName: Here we are.
engSearchText: Here we are.
jpnChrName: よし──着いたぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし──着いたぞ。

engChrName: It's so pretty!
engSearchText: It's so pretty!
jpnChrName: ここがラングポート……！
jpnSearchText: ここがラングポート……！

engChrName: *sigh* That drive was just as stressful as the one to Creil.
engSearchText:
*sigh* That drive was just as stressful as the one
to Creil.
jpnChrName: 今回の道中も色々ありましたね。
jpnSearchText: 今回の道中も色々ありましたね。

engChrName: But hey. We're here, and we're on time.
engSearchText: But hey. We're here, and we're on time.
jpnChrName: 途中でかなり飛ばしたから そこまでは遅れなかったけどな。
jpnSearchText:
途中でかなり飛ばしたから
そこまでは遅れなかったけどな。

engChrName: First things first—
engSearchText: First things first—
jpnChrName: まずは──
jpnSearchText: まずは──

engChrName: I wonder who it is.
engSearchText: I wonder who it is.
jpnChrName: 誰なんでしょう？
jpnSearchText: 誰なんでしょう？

engChrName: You gotta be kidding me...
engSearchText: You gotta be kidding me...
jpnChrName: まさか……
jpnSearchText: まさか……

engChrName: This is Mr. Van Arkride, I presume?
engSearchText: This is Mr. Van Arkride, I presume?
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アークライド君だね？ 私はファン・ルウという者だ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・アークライド君だね？
私はファン・ルウという者だ。

engChrName: I believe Cao mentioned it already, but I'd like to be the first to meet you.
engSearchText:
I believe Cao mentioned it already, but I'd like to be
the first to meet you.
jpnChrName: ツァオから聞いていると思うが、 まずは会って話をしようか。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオから聞いていると思うが、
まずは会って話をしようか。

engChrName: On behalf of Heiyue, welcome to Langport.
engSearchText: On behalf of Heiyue, welcome to Langport.
jpnChrName: ようこそ煌都へ── 《アークライド解決事務所》の諸君。
jpnSearchText:
ようこそ煌都へ──
《アークライド解決事務所》の諸君。

engChrName: I'm pleased to make your acquaintance. My name is Fan Lu.
engSearchText:
I'm pleased to make your acquaintance. My name is
Fan Lu.
jpnChrName: 私がファン・ルウだ。
jpnSearchText: 私がファン・ルウだ。

engChrName: You're in line to be an elder of Heiyue, and Cao's family branches off of yours, yeah?
engSearchText:
You're in line to be an elder of Heiyue, and Cao's
family branches off of yours, yeah?
jpnChrName: なるほど、貴方がツァオの主家筋で、 《黒月》次期長老の一人ってわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、貴方がツァオの主家筋で、
《黒月》次期長老の一人ってわけですか。

engChrName: That's right. I also serve as vice president of Kowloon Financial Bank.
engSearchText:
That's right. I also serve as vice president of Kowloon
Financial Bank.
jpnChrName: フフ……一応《九龍銀行》の 副頭取なども務めているがね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……一応《九龍銀行》の
副頭取なども務めているがね。

engChrName: What's that?
engSearchText: What's that?
jpnChrName: 《九龍銀行》……？
jpnSearchText: 《九龍銀行》……？
