engChrName: Calvard's second largest bank—and one of the most prestigious in all of Zemuria.
engSearchText:
Calvard's second largest bank—and one of the most
prestigious in all of Zemuria.
jpnChrName: 共和国で二番目、大陸全土でも かなり上位の資産を誇る大銀行ですね。
jpnSearchText:
共和国で二番目、大陸全土でも
かなり上位の資産を誇る大銀行ですね。

engChrName: Thanks to their foreign and immigrant connections, they are an institution with a great deal of political power.
engSearchText:
Thanks to their foreign and immigrant connections,
they are an institution with a great deal of
political power.
jpnChrName: 移民関係や外資系企業との連携も多く、 政財界で大きな影響力を持っているとか。
jpnSearchText:
移民関係や外資系企業との連携も多く、
政財界で大きな影響力を持っているとか。

engChrName: Wow.
engSearchText: Wow.
jpnChrName: へえ……
jpnSearchText: へえ……

engChrName: You're quite the learned young lady.
engSearchText: You're quite the learned young lady.
jpnChrName: はは、そちらのお嬢さんは よく勉強しているようだね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、そちらのお嬢さんは
よく勉強しているようだね。

engChrName: Thank you, sir.
engSearchText: Thank you, sir.
jpnChrName: ……恐縮です。
jpnSearchText: ……恐縮です。

engChrName: Surprised a big shot like you wants to meet small fry like us.
engSearchText:
Surprised a big shot like you wants to meet small fry
like us.
jpnChrName: そんなお偉いさんがわざわざ 俺たちにお会いになりたがるとは。
jpnSearchText:
そんなお偉いさんがわざわざ
俺たちにお会いになりたがるとは。

engChrName: Did a little birdie tell you when we arrived?
engSearchText: Did a little birdie tell you when we arrived?
jpnChrName: しかも到着した直後の呼び出し── こちらの行動は全て把握済みですか。
jpnSearchText:
しかも到着した直後の呼び出し──
こちらの行動は全て把握済みですか。

engChrName: Heheh. It's only natural that we of Heiyue would know what's happening in our own home city.
engSearchText:
Heheh. It's only natural that we of Heiyue would
know what's happening in our own home city.
jpnChrName: 一応このラングポートは 《黒月》の本拠地でもあるからね。
jpnSearchText:
一応このラングポートは
《黒月》の本拠地でもあるからね。

engChrName: Ubiquitous as we are, it would be strange for someone to catch us unawares.
engSearchText:
Ubiquitous as we are, it would be strange for someone
to catch us unawares.
jpnChrName: 予定していた客人の到着を知るくらい そう難しいことではないさ。
jpnSearchText:
予定していた客人の到着を知るくらい
そう難しいことではないさ。

engChrName: Though, our size as an organization does come with its fair share of challenges, mind you.
engSearchText:
Though, our size as an organization does come with
its fair share of challenges, mind you.
jpnChrName: ただ、組織が大きくなりすぎると逆に、 なかなか自由に動けなくなるものでね。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、組織が大きくなりすぎると逆に、
なかなか自由に動けなくなるものでね。

engChrName: Cao said somethin' similar.
engSearchText: Cao said somethin' similar.
jpnChrName: ま、その辺のことは一応、 ツァオから聞いていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、その辺のことは一応、
ツァオから聞いていますよ。

engChrName: Simply put, when this many people are part of the same organization, there are bound to be differences of opinion.
engSearchText:
Simply put, when this many people are part of the
same organization, there are bound to be
differences of opinion.
jpnChrName: 付け加えるなら、そうだな…… 黒月も一枚岩ではない、と言っておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
付け加えるなら、そうだな……
黒月も一枚岩ではない、と言っておこうか。

engChrName: Don't worry, we didn't call you here to adjudicate some petty internal squabble.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, we didn't call you here to adjudicate
some petty internal squabble.
jpnChrName: 何か大きな分裂があるわけではない、 それは誤解しないで欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
何か大きな分裂があるわけではない、
それは誤解しないで欲しい。

engChrName: No, our issue at hand is far more...delicate, to say the least.
engSearchText:
No, our issue at hand is far more...delicate, to say
the least.
jpnChrName: ただ、事が事だけに、 今回の問題はかなりデリケートなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、事が事だけに、
今回の問題はかなりデリケートなんだ。

engChrName: Likely more so than you realize.
engSearchText: Likely more so than you realize.
jpnChrName: 多分君たちが思っている以上にね。
jpnSearchText: 多分君たちが思っている以上にね。

engChrName: Which is why we're here to sniff things out before you bring down the hammer.
engSearchText:
Which is why we're here to sniff things out before
you bring down the hammer.
jpnChrName: だから自分たちが動く事態になる前に、 俺たちに依頼した、と。
jpnSearchText:
だから自分たちが動く事態になる前に、
俺たちに依頼した、と。

engChrName: Precisely.
engSearchText: Precisely.
jpnChrName: その通りだ。
jpnSearchText: その通りだ。

engChrName: Cao's endorsement of you carries great weight, but I'm glad your senses are as keen as he led me to believe.
engSearchText:
Cao's endorsement of you carries great weight, but
I'm glad your senses are as keen as he led me
to believe.
jpnChrName: 勿論ツァオのお墨付きだからこそだが、 実際に会って、優秀そうで安心したよ。
jpnSearchText:
勿論ツァオのお墨付きだからこそだが、
実際に会って、優秀そうで安心したよ。

engChrName: I'm expecting great things from you all.
engSearchText: I'm expecting great things from you all.
jpnChrName: 期待しているよ、アークライド君。
jpnSearchText: 期待しているよ、アークライド君。

engChrName: 'Preciate it.
engSearchText: 'Preciate it.
jpnChrName: そりゃどうも。
jpnSearchText: そりゃどうも。

engChrName: Anyway, I suppose that is enough pleasantries. Let's discuss the matter at hand.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I suppose that is enough pleasantries.
Let's discuss the matter at hand.
jpnChrName: さて、挨拶はこれくらいにして、 依頼内容について話そう。
jpnSearchText:
さて、挨拶はこれくらいにして、
依頼内容について話そう。

engChrName: Works for me. You spread that rumor like I asked?
engSearchText: Works for me. You spread that rumor like I asked?
jpnChrName: そうですね。 ──頼んでいた“噂”の方は？
jpnSearchText:
そうですね。
──頼んでいた“噂”の方は？

engChrName: (What's he talking about?)
engSearchText: (What's he talking about?)

engChrName: (Hmm... Maybe they're letting the townsfolk know we'll be here.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Maybe they're letting the townsfolk know
we'll be here.)
jpnChrName: （ああ……ひょっとしたら   “４ｓｐｇ”かもしれません。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ……ひょっとしたら
“４ｓｐｇ”かもしれません。）

engChrName: (Oh! So they can give us jobs!)
engSearchText: (Oh! So they can give us jobs!)

engChrName: Yes, we spread word both in New Town and the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
Yes, we spread word both in New Town and the
Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと手を回して流したさ。 東方人街と新市街の両方にね。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと手を回して流したさ。
東方人街と新市街の両方にね。

engChrName: I must admit, it's a curious tactic. Your methods are certainly unique.
engSearchText:
I must admit, it's a curious tactic. Your methods are
certainly unique.
jpnChrName: 随分と回りくどいが なかなか興味深いやり方だね。
jpnSearchText:
随分と回りくどいが
なかなか興味深いやり方だね。

engChrName: Lots of ways to earn a livin', y'know.
engSearchText: Lots of ways to earn a livin', y'know.
jpnChrName: ま、食いぶちを稼ぐ手段でもあるんで。
jpnSearchText: ま、食いぶちを稼ぐ手段でもあるんで。

engChrName: Haha. Well, contingent on your success, we're prepared to pay you a fine sum.
engSearchText:
Haha. Well, contingent on your success, we're
prepared to pay you a fine sum.
jpnChrName: はは、今回の件が上手く行った暁には 当然報酬を惜しむつもりはないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、今回の件が上手く行った暁には
当然報酬を惜しむつもりはないけどね。

engChrName: As a reminder, the earliest we'll take action is two days from now when Cao returns from Crossbell.
engSearchText:
As a reminder, the earliest we'll take action is two
days from now when Cao returns from Crossbell.
jpnChrName: こちらはツァオがクロスベルから戻ってくる 明後日まで大きな動きに出るつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
こちらはツァオがクロスベルから戻ってくる
明後日まで大きな動きに出るつもりはない。

engChrName: In the interim, go about your business as you see fit.
engSearchText: In the interim, go about your business as you see fit.
jpnChrName: それまでは君たちのやり方で 自由にやってくれて構わない。
jpnSearchText:
それまでは君たちのやり方で
自由にやってくれて構わない。

engChrName: But if you learn anything of Almata's plans, please alert us straight away.
engSearchText:
But if you learn anything of Almata's plans, please
alert us straight away.
jpnChrName: ただしアルマータの動きがあったら 優先的に連絡して欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
ただしアルマータの動きがあったら
優先的に連絡して欲しい。

engChrName: I think that about covers what I needed to tell you all.
engSearchText: I think that about covers what I needed to tell you all.
jpnChrName: 私から言えるのはこのくらいかな。
jpnSearchText: 私から言えるのはこのくらいかな。

engChrName: Got'cha. Oh, yeah, you know anything about that problem child Cao mentioned?
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Oh, yeah, you know anything about that
problem child Cao mentioned?
jpnChrName: 了解──ただツァオが言ってた“人物”について もう少し詳しい情報があると助かりますが。
jpnSearchText:
了解──ただツァオが言ってた“人物”について
もう少し詳しい情報があると助かりますが。

engChrName: I do, but I'll leave that to the foremost expert on the subject...
engSearchText:
I do, but I'll leave that to the foremost expert on
the subject...
jpnChrName: ああ、それについては 私より適任の者がいるのだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それについては
私より適任の者がいるのだが……

engChrName: Sorry I'm late, Bàbà!
engSearchText: Sorry I'm late, Bàbà!
jpnChrName: ごめん爸爸（パパ）、遅くなったわ！
jpnSearchText: ごめん爸爸（パパ）、遅くなったわ！

engChrName: Normally, I'd scold you, but your timing was impeccable.
engSearchText:
Normally, I'd scold you, but your timing
was impeccable.
jpnChrName: 客人を待たせるとは──と言いたい所だが、 ちょうどいいタイミングだ。
jpnSearchText:
客人を待たせるとは──と言いたい所だが、
ちょうどいいタイミングだ。

engChrName: Say hello to our visitors from Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Say hello to our visitors from Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: こちらが《アークライド解決事務所》の面々だ。
jpnSearchText: こちらが《アークライド解決事務所》の面々だ。

engChrName: Oh, they're here already? Sorry for keeping you waiting!
engSearchText:
Oh, they're here already? Sorry for keeping
you waiting!
jpnChrName: もう来てたんだ？ ごめんね待たせちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
もう来てたんだ？
ごめんね待たせちゃって。

engChrName: I've been looking forward to this. Cao doesn't speak highly of people too often.
engSearchText:
I've been looking forward to this. Cao doesn't speak
highly of people too often.
jpnChrName: 貴方がツァオが言ってた解決屋さんね。 へ～、結構イケメンじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
貴方がツァオが言ってた解決屋さんね。
へ～、結構イケメンじゃない。

engChrName: Hold the phone—he didn't mention there'd be two cuties and a stud. It's a pleasure to meet you!
engSearchText:
Hold the phone—he didn't mention there'd be two
cuties and a stud. It's a pleasure to meet you!
jpnChrName: わ、可愛い女の子が二人もいるんだ？ 初めまして、仲良くしようね～。
jpnSearchText:
わ、可愛い女の子が二人もいるんだ？
初めまして、仲良くしようね～。

engChrName: I-It's nice to meet you, too.
engSearchText: I-It's nice to meet you, too.
jpnChrName: は、はい、初めまして。
jpnSearchText: は、はい、初めまして。

engChrName: What she said...
engSearchText: What she said...
jpnChrName: ……どうも。
jpnSearchText: ……どうも。

engChrName: Ditto. So, you also from the Lu family?
engSearchText: Ditto. So, you also from the Lu family?
jpnChrName: 初めましてか。 ルウ家のお嬢さんだな？
jpnSearchText:
初めましてか。
ルウ家のお嬢さんだな？

engChrName: That's right! My name's Ashen.
engSearchText: That's right! My name's Ashen.
jpnChrName: そうよ、あたしはアシェン・ルウ。
jpnSearchText: そうよ、あたしはアシェン・ルウ。

engChrName: I'm guessing you want to know about everyone's favorite red-haired menace? Well, you're in luck! He and I grew up together.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing you want to know about everyone's
favorite red-haired menace? Well, you're in luck! He
and I grew up together.
jpnChrName: あの問題児について知りたいのよね？ なら幼馴染のあたしが教えてあげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
あの問題児について知りたいのよね？
なら幼馴染のあたしが教えてあげるわ。

engChrName: I'll leave you kids to your fun, I've got another meeting to get to.
engSearchText:
I'll leave you kids to your fun, I've got another
meeting to get to.
jpnChrName: そろそろ時間か──私は会合があるので 詳しい話は娘から聞いてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ時間か──私は会合があるので
詳しい話は娘から聞いてくれたまえ。

engChrName: And by the way, you're all welcome to lodge here for the duration of your stay.
engSearchText:
And by the way, you're all welcome to lodge here for
the duration of your stay.
jpnChrName: この部屋はこのまま君たちが使うといい。 愛車共々不自由なく世話をさせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
この部屋はこのまま君たちが使うといい。
愛車共々不自由なく世話をさせてもらうよ。

engChrName: Thanks, but no thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks, but no thanks.
jpnChrName: ありがたいが丁重にお断りしますよ。
jpnSearchText: ありがたいが丁重にお断りしますよ。

engChrName: Already booked ourselves a room in the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
Already booked ourselves a room in the
Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: 東方人街の飯店（ホテル）に予約を取ってるんで これからそっちへ移動します。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街の飯店（ホテル）に予約を取ってるんで
これからそっちへ移動します。

engChrName: Hmm. You're ever the curiosity, spriggan.
engSearchText: Hmm. You're ever the curiosity, spriggan.
jpnChrName: やはり面白いな君は…… それが《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》としての流儀か。
jpnSearchText:
やはり面白いな君は……
それが《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》としての流儀か。

engChrName: It's no issue, though. As I said before, you're welcome to act as you see fit.
engSearchText:
It's no issue, though. As I said before, you're welcome
to act as you see fit.
jpnChrName: 勿論構わないさ、さっきも言ったように 君たちのやり方で自由にやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
勿論構わないさ、さっきも言ったように
君たちのやり方で自由にやってくれ。

engChrName: I look forward to good news, everyone.
engSearchText: I look forward to good news, everyone.
jpnChrName: では、頼んだよ── 《アークライド解決事務所》の諸君。
jpnSearchText:
では、頼んだよ──
《アークライド解決事務所》の諸君。

engChrName: This side of town is so different than the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
This side of town is so different than the
Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: うーん、改めて戻ってくると 景色が全然違いますねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、改めて戻ってくると
景色が全然違いますねぇ……

engChrName: There's even a movie theater here.
engSearchText: There's even a movie theater here.
jpnChrName: そちらに映画館もありますし……
jpnSearchText: そちらに映画館もありますし……

engChrName: As I recall, this is all part of a new development effort.
engSearchText:
As I recall, this is all part of a new
development effort.
jpnChrName: たしか近代以降に 開発されたエリアなんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
たしか近代以降に
開発されたエリアなんですよね？

engChrName: Yeah. Back in the day, all that was here was the port down south.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Back in the day, all that was here was the port
down south.
jpnChrName: ああ、元々デカイ港が 南の方にありはしたが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、元々デカイ港が
南の方にありはしたが……

engChrName: But after Calvard went democratic and the Orbal Revolution happened, things started changin' around here.
engSearchText:
But after Calvard went democratic and the Orbal
Revolution happened, things started changin'
around here.
jpnChrName: 民主革命に導力革命以降、 大規模に開発されたみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
民主革命に導力革命以降、
大規模に開発されたみたいだな。

engChrName: Oh. I guess that's why it's the second biggest city in the country.
engSearchText:
Oh. I guess that's why it's the second biggest city in
the country.
jpnChrName: へえ～、さすが カルバード第二の大都市ですね。
jpnSearchText:
へえ～、さすが
カルバード第二の大都市ですね。

engChrName: I mean, just look at that huge building.
engSearchText: I mean, just look at that huge building.
jpnChrName: あのビルも凄くおっきいですし！
jpnSearchText: あのビルも凄くおっきいですし！

engChrName: That's the Langport Trade Center. Some people just call it the Great Spire, though.
engSearchText:
That's the Langport Trade Center. Some people just
call it the Great Spire, though.
jpnChrName: ラングポート貿易センタービル。 ──通称《煌天楼（こうてんろう）》だ。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポート貿易センタービル。
──通称《煌天楼（こうてんろう）》だ。

engChrName: Don't think we'll have much to do there for this job.
engSearchText: Don't think we'll have much to do there for this job.
jpnChrName: 今回は用は無さそうだが ビル前の広場は人通りも多い。
jpnSearchText:
今回は用は無さそうだが
ビル前の広場は人通りも多い。

engChrName: Anywho, let's check the bulletin board and get moving.
engSearchText:
Anywho, let's check the bulletin board and
get moving.
jpnChrName: あそこの掲示板を確認したら 適当に回ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
あそこの掲示板を確認したら
適当に回ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Hey! It's you guys again!
engSearchText: Hey! It's you guys again!
jpnChrName: ああっ！　あなた達は──！
jpnSearchText: ああっ！　あなた達は──！

engChrName: Oh, aren't you that reporter from the Tyrell Times?
engSearchText: Oh, aren't you that reporter from the Tyrell Times?
jpnChrName: ……！ 確か《タイレル通信》の。
jpnSearchText:
……！
確か《タイレル通信》の。

engChrName: Is this a friend of yours?
engSearchText: Is this a friend of yours?
jpnChrName: ？　お知り合いですか？
jpnSearchText: ？　お知り合いですか？

engChrName: Not exactly—we've just bumped into Little Miss Tryhard here a few times now.
engSearchText:
Not exactly—we've just bumped into Little Miss
Tryhard here a few times now.
jpnChrName: ああ、前にちょっと会った 頑張りすぎる新米記者だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、前にちょっと会った
頑張りすぎる新米記者だ。

engChrName: Enough about that! What are you doing in Langport, anyway?! Up to no good, I bet!
engSearchText:
Enough about that! What are you doing in
Langport, anyway?! Up to no good, I bet!
jpnChrName: どうしてここにいるんですか！？ ま、まさかまた良からぬ企みを……
jpnSearchText:
どうしてここにいるんですか！？
ま、まさかまた良からぬ企みを……

engChrName: Business, as usual. You gettin' into trouble again?
engSearchText: Business, as usual. You gettin' into trouble again?
jpnChrName: 依頼されての地方出張でな。 ──そっちこそなんでいるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
依頼されての地方出張でな。
──そっちこそなんでいるんだ？

engChrName: N-No... I came here to write an article for the culture column.
engSearchText:
N-No... I came here to write an article for the
culture column.
jpnChrName: そ、その……文化面の取材で来てて……
jpnSearchText: そ、その……文化面の取材で来てて……

engChrName: That's done now, but I get the feeling something big is about to happen here.
engSearchText:
That's done now, but I get the feeling something big
is about to happen here.
jpnChrName: そっちの取材は終わったんですけど 何となく事件の匂いがしたので……
jpnSearchText:
そっちの取材は終わったんですけど
何となく事件の匂いがしたので……

engChrName: So I'm using some time off to stay and find a scoop!
engSearchText: So I'm using some time off to stay and find a scoop!
jpnChrName: 有休を使って滞在を延長してるんですっ！
jpnSearchText: 有休を使って滞在を延長してるんですっ！

engChrName: That's some dedication...
engSearchText: That's some dedication...
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか……

engChrName: (I'm surprised she noticed what's going on. I guess Dingo did mention that she has good luck.)
engSearchText:
(I'm surprised she noticed what's going on. I guess
Dingo did mention that she has good luck.)
jpnChrName: （……あり得ない強運って   ディンゴさんに言われてましたけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（……あり得ない強運って
ディンゴさんに言われてましたけど。）

engChrName: (Good luck AND a good nose, apparently.)
engSearchText: (Good luck AND a good nose, apparently.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、それと一丁前に   鼻も利くみてぇだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、それと一丁前に
鼻も利くみてぇだな。）

engChrName: Well, have fun with that. Peace.
engSearchText: Well, have fun with that. Peace.
jpnChrName: ──ま、頑張ってくれ。 そんじゃあ俺たちは行くぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、頑張ってくれ。
そんじゃあ俺たちは行くぜ。

jpnChrName: （えっと……）
jpnSearchText: （えっと……）

engChrName: (She's following us...)
engSearchText: (She's following us...)
jpnChrName: （ついて来てますね……）
jpnSearchText: （ついて来てますね……）

engChrName: (Just ignore her.)
engSearchText: (Just ignore her.)
jpnChrName: （無視無視。）
jpnSearchText: （無視無視。）

engChrName: (She's STILL following us.)
engSearchText: (She's STILL following us.)
jpnChrName: （まだいます……）
jpnSearchText: （まだいます……）

engChrName: (She's not even trying to hide it, either...)
engSearchText: (She's not even trying to hide it, either...)
jpnChrName: （隠す気ゼロですね……）
jpnSearchText: （隠す気ゼロですね……）

engChrName: All right. What gives?
engSearchText: All right. What gives?
jpnChrName: ……なんで付いてくる？
jpnSearchText: ……なんで付いてくる？

engChrName: If you're huntin' for dirt on Giacomo, I'm fresh out.
engSearchText: If you're huntin' for dirt on Giacomo, I'm fresh out.
jpnChrName: 言っとくがジャコモの件について もう言えることは何もねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
言っとくがジャコモの件について
もう言えることは何もねえぞ。

engChrName: No way. That's yesterday's news.
engSearchText: No way. That's yesterday's news.
jpnChrName: あれはもういいです──いつまでも 過去の事件を追っても仕方ないですし。
jpnSearchText:
あれはもういいです──いつまでも
過去の事件を追っても仕方ないですし。

engChrName: Care to explain why you're glommin' on to us, then?
engSearchText: Care to explain why you're glommin' on to us, then?
jpnChrName: だったら尚更、俺たちに用はねえだろ？
jpnSearchText: だったら尚更、俺たちに用はねえだろ？

engChrName: Don't mind if I do!
engSearchText: Don't mind if I do!
jpnChrName: フフン、そうでもありませんっ！
jpnSearchText: フフン、そうでもありませんっ！

engChrName: Here's an analogy: if trouble is monsters, then you're sepith!
engSearchText:
Here's an analogy: if trouble is monsters, then
you're sepith!
jpnChrName: ──どうも貴方の周りでは 色んな事件が起こっているようです。
jpnSearchText:
──どうも貴方の周りでは
色んな事件が起こっているようです。

engChrName: While you don't necessarily cause trouble yourselves, you certainly seem to attract it!
engSearchText:
While you don't necessarily cause trouble yourselves,
you certainly seem to attract it!
jpnChrName: 首謀者ではないにせよ、事件を引き寄せる “何か”があるとわたしは踏んでいます……
jpnSearchText:
首謀者ではないにせよ、事件を引き寄せる
“何か”があるとわたしは踏んでいます……

engChrName: So if I follow you, I'm bound to find my next big scoop.
engSearchText:
So if I follow you, I'm bound to find my next
big scoop.
jpnChrName: なら後をつければ、自然と事件に遭遇して スクープチャンス間違いありませんっ！
jpnSearchText:
なら後をつければ、自然と事件に遭遇して
スクープチャンス間違いありませんっ！

engChrName: Just pretend I'm not here and go about your business as usual, okay?
engSearchText:
Just pretend I'm not here and go about your business
as usual, okay?
jpnChrName: どうかわたしのことは気になさらず、 いつも通りに行動してくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
どうかわたしのことは気になさらず、
いつも通りに行動してくださいっ！

engChrName: Like hell, we will!
engSearchText: Like hell, we will!
jpnChrName: できるかっ！！
jpnSearchText: できるかっ！！

engChrName: Actually, I'm feelin' generous.
engSearchText: Actually, I'm feelin' generous.
jpnChrName: ふう、さすが《タイレル通信》期待の新人、 大したモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、さすが《タイレル通信》期待の新人、
大したモンだぜ。

engChrName: Lemme throw you a bone—there's an important person in Langport right now.
engSearchText:
Lemme throw you a bone—there's an important
person in Langport right now.
jpnChrName: ──ここだけの話、俺たちは この地である人物に注目しててな。
jpnSearchText:
──ここだけの話、俺たちは
この地である人物に注目しててな。

engChrName: Take a gander.
engSearchText: Take a gander.
jpnChrName: ほら、あいつだ。
jpnSearchText: ほら、あいつだ。

engChrName: Maxim Lugan?!
engSearchText: Maxim Lugan?!
jpnChrName: っ……？　も、もしかして マクシム・ルーガン選手……！？
jpnSearchText:
っ……？　も、もしかして
マクシム・ルーガン選手……！？

engChrName: Oh, it's the guy who really likes himself.
engSearchText: Oh, it's the guy who really likes himself.
jpnChrName: あ、“ぜっとわん”の人…… 本当に有名人だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、“ぜっとわん”の人……
本当に有名人だったんですね。

engChrName: Umm... Van, what are you—?
engSearchText: Umm... Van, what are you—?
jpnChrName: えっと、ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: Wh-What is a superstar like that doing HERE?!
engSearchText: Wh-What is a superstar like that doing HERE?!
jpnChrName: ど、どうして《紅い流星（レッドシューティングスター）》がここにっ？
jpnSearchText: ど、どうして《紅い流星（レッドシューティングスター）》がここにっ？

engChrName: Can't say. I've got client confidentiality to uphold, y'know.
engSearchText:
Can't say. I've got client confidentiality to
uphold, y'know.
jpnChrName: ああ、そいつは 守秘義務があるから言えねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そいつは
守秘義務があるから言えねぇな。

engChrName: But I'm sure that it goes without saying that it ain't normal for a guy like that...
engSearchText:
But I'm sure that it goes without saying that it ain't
normal for a guy like that...
jpnChrName: だが、あんな有名人が一人で煌都に来て あんな風にブラついている……
jpnSearchText:
だが、あんな有名人が一人で煌都に来て
あんな風にブラついている……

engChrName: ...to be wanderin' around a place like this all by his lonesome.
engSearchText:
...to be wanderin' around a place like this all by
his lonesome.
jpnChrName: ちょっとおかしいと思わねぇか？
jpnSearchText: ちょっとおかしいと思わねぇか？

engChrName: Very true...
engSearchText: Very true...
jpnChrName: た、確かに……
jpnSearchText: た、確かに……

engChrName: Unfortunately, we've got too much on our plate to keep an eye on him.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, we've got too much on our plate to
keep an eye on him.
jpnChrName: 残念だが俺たちは別件が入って 奴さんまでは追えねぇんだ。
jpnSearchText:
残念だが俺たちは別件が入って
奴さんまでは追えねぇんだ。

engChrName: So if we've gotta give up on our lead, why not pass it to a friend of Dingo's?
engSearchText:
So if we've gotta give up on our lead, why not pass it
to a friend of Dingo's?
jpnChrName: 悔しいが、ディンゴの誼（よしみ）もあるし、 お前さんに譲ってもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
悔しいが、ディンゴの誼（よしみ）もあるし、
お前さんに譲ってもいいぜ？

engChrName: I want to write about politics, though... This sounds like something fit for a tabloid.
engSearchText:
I want to write about politics, though... This sounds
like something fit for a tabloid.
jpnChrName: で、でもわたしは政治記者志望で…… それにそれこそゴシップ誌みたいな……
jpnSearchText:
で、でもわたしは政治記者志望で……
それにそれこそゴシップ誌みたいな……

engChrName: You got a sports section, don'tcha? 'Sides, maybe gettin' a scoop here will get you the transfer you've been lookin' for.
engSearchText:
You got a sports section, don'tcha? 'Sides, maybe
gettin' a scoop here will get you the transfer you've
been lookin' for.
jpnChrName: タイレルだって芸能スポーツ面はあんだろ？ 何か掴んだら手柄だし、希望部署にも繋がる。
jpnSearchText:
タイレルだって芸能スポーツ面はあんだろ？
何か掴んだら手柄だし、希望部署にも繋がる。

engChrName: Plus I bet you'll understand Dingo better if you give his line of work a try.
engSearchText:
Plus I bet you'll understand Dingo better if you give
his line of work a try.
jpnChrName: それに──ディンゴの得意分野を 学べるチャンスかもしれないぜ……？
jpnSearchText:
それに──ディンゴの得意分野を
学べるチャンスかもしれないぜ……？

engChrName: You make a compelling case, spriggan! I'm no expert on reporting celebrity news...
engSearchText:
You make a compelling case, spriggan! I'm no expert
on reporting celebrity news...
jpnChrName: 分かりましたっ……！ 確かにわたしも芸能面は疎いですし……！
jpnSearchText:
分かりましたっ……！
確かにわたしも芸能面は疎いですし……！

engChrName: ...but I'll pursue this story with journalistic integrity and respect for the subject's privacy!
engSearchText:
...but I'll pursue this story with journalistic integrity
and respect for the subject's privacy!
jpnChrName: ルールを破らず、プライベートに踏み込まず、 必ずや何らかのネタを掴んでみせますっ。
jpnSearchText:
ルールを破らず、プライベートに踏み込まず、
必ずや何らかのネタを掴んでみせますっ。

engChrName: Heheh. Just you wait, Dingo! I'll catch up to you before you know it!
engSearchText:
Heheh. Just you wait, Dingo! I'll catch up to you
before you know it!
jpnChrName: ……ふふふ、そうすれば ディンゴさんもわたしの事を見直して……
jpnSearchText:
……ふふふ、そうすれば
ディンゴさんもわたしの事を見直して……

engChrName: That's the spirit...? Anywho, good luck out there.
engSearchText: That's the spirit...? Anywho, good luck out there.
jpnChrName: お、おう……その意気だ。 ──そんじゃあ健闘を祈るぜ！
jpnSearchText:
お、おう……その意気だ。
──そんじゃあ健闘を祈るぜ！

engChrName: Thanks for the lead!
engSearchText: Thanks for the lead!
jpnChrName: 情報提供、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: 情報提供、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Today a breakout article, tomorrow the Fulitzer Prize!
engSearchText:
Today a breakout article, tomorrow the
Fulitzer Prize!
jpnChrName: 待っていなさい～、今度こそ 大スクープを掴んでやるんだから～！
jpnSearchText:
待っていなさい～、今度こそ
大スクープを掴んでやるんだから～！

engChrName: What a charming person.
engSearchText: What a charming person.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、なんだか 可愛らしいヒトでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、なんだか
可愛らしいヒトでしたね。

engChrName: She can't be much older than me, right?
engSearchText: She can't be much older than me, right?
jpnChrName: わたしよりちょっと 年上くらいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
わたしよりちょっと
年上くらいでしょうか？

engChrName: Uhh. She's a reporter, so it's safe to say she's at least twenty...
engSearchText:
Uhh. She's a reporter, so it's safe to say she's at
least twenty...
jpnChrName: い、いえ……記者なら多分 二十歳以上だと思いますけど。
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ……記者なら多分
二十歳以上だと思いますけど。

engChrName: More importantly...you did it again...
engSearchText: More importantly...you did it again...
jpnChrName: ──ヴァンさん、また………
jpnSearchText: ──ヴァンさん、また………

engChrName: A little fibbin' won't hurt. Won't get her a story either, though.
engSearchText:
A little fibbin' won't hurt. Won't get her a story
either, though.
jpnChrName: 嘘は言っちゃいねえぞ？ ま、特に何もなさそうだがな。
jpnSearchText:
嘘は言っちゃいねえぞ？
ま、特に何もなさそうだがな。

engChrName: Oh, well. Time's a-wastin'. Let's go check out the job board.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Time's a-wastin'. Let's go check out the
job board.
jpnChrName: 面倒も片付いたことだし、 改めて掲示板をチェックするか。
jpnSearchText:
面倒も片付いたことだし、
改めて掲示板をチェックするか。

engChrName: Aye, aye!
engSearchText: Aye, aye!
jpnChrName: はいっ。
jpnSearchText: はいっ。

engChrName: *sigh*...
engSearchText: *sigh*...
jpnChrName: ふう、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: ふう、分かりました。

engChrName: So this is the building Messeldam Trading Company owns...
engSearchText:
So this is the building Messeldam Trading
Company owns...
jpnChrName: ここが《メッセルダム商事》……
jpnSearchText: ここが《メッセルダム商事》……

engChrName: Or more accurately, that Almata owns.
engSearchText: Or more accurately, that Almata owns.
jpnChrName: ……アルマータの ダミーカンパニー、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータの
ダミーカンパニー、ですか。

engChrName: And it's right down the street from one of Heiyue's hotels, huh.
engSearchText:
And it's right down the street from one of Heiyue's
hotels, huh.
jpnChrName: つーか《黒月》系列のホテルの 目と鼻の先じゃねぇか……！？
jpnSearchText:
つーか《黒月》系列のホテルの
目と鼻の先じゃねぇか……！？

engChrName: That's very brazen of them...
engSearchText: That's very brazen of them...
jpnChrName: うーん、大胆ですね。
jpnSearchText: うーん、大胆ですね。

engChrName: Do you think they're purposefully trying to provoke Heiyue?
engSearchText:
Do you think they're purposefully trying to
provoke Heiyue?
jpnChrName: ……その、わざと 挑発しているのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……その、わざと
挑発しているのでしょうか？

engChrName: That's definitely half of it. The other bein' a show of confidence.
engSearchText:
That's definitely half of it. The other bein' a show
of confidence.
jpnChrName: 半分は嫌がらせだろうな。 残りの半分は自信の表れか──
jpnSearchText:
半分は嫌がらせだろうな。
残りの半分は自信の表れか──

engChrName: Doesn't seem like many folks come in and out of here.
engSearchText:
Doesn't seem like many folks come in and out
of here.
jpnChrName: フン…… 出入りは頻繁じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
フン……
出入りは頻繁じゃねえな。

engChrName: If I had to wager, they keep a skeleton crew here, and their main force is holed up elsewhere.
engSearchText:
If I had to wager, they keep a skeleton crew here, and
their main force is holed up elsewhere.
jpnChrName: 恐らくここにいるのは数人で、 他にも拠点がありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
恐らくここにいるのは数人で、
他にも拠点がありそうだ。

engChrName: Ahh. So this is their FOB? I can see the tactical advantage in that.
engSearchText:
Ahh. So this is their FOB? I can see the tactical
advantage in that.
jpnChrName: いわゆる偽装拠点ですねっ。 都市部の遊撃戦では有効かと。
jpnSearchText:
いわゆる偽装拠点ですねっ。
都市部の遊撃戦では有効かと。

engChrName: (Their what now? Sometimes she can be so hard to follow...)
engSearchText:
(Their what now? Sometimes she can be so hard
to follow...)
jpnChrName: （どうしよう、   付いていけません……）
jpnSearchText:
（どうしよう、
付いていけません……）

engChrName: Somethin' about this place rubs me the wrong way, but bustin' in there ain't really an option.
engSearchText:
Somethin' about this place rubs me the wrong way,
but bustin' in there ain't really an option.
jpnChrName: ……微妙に引っかかるが 流石に乗り込むわけにもいかねえ。
jpnSearchText:
……微妙に引っかかるが
流石に乗り込むわけにもいかねえ。

engChrName: We'll focus on other parts of town for now.
engSearchText: We'll focus on other parts of town for now.
jpnChrName: いったん他を当たるぞ。
jpnSearchText: いったん他を当たるぞ。

engChrName: Oh? Maybe he's got some keen senses on him after all.
engSearchText:
Oh? Maybe he's got some keen senses on him
after all.
jpnChrName: へえ、気付かれたかねぇ？ 思った以上に鼻が利きそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、気付かれたかねぇ？
思った以上に鼻が利きそうだ。

engChrName: We were warned that he may pose a threat. Remain vigilant.
engSearchText:
We were warned that he may pose a threat.
Remain vigilant.
jpnChrName: 報告の不確定要素…… 留意しておくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
報告の不確定要素……
留意しておくとしよう。

engChrName: (That about does it. Might be time to go investigate that stall at the docks.)
engSearchText:
(That about does it. Might be time to go investigate
that stall at the docks.)
jpnChrName: （一通り回ったし、そろそろ例の   港湾区の露店を調べに行くか？）
jpnSearchText:
（一通り回ったし、そろそろ例の
港湾区の露店を調べに行くか？）

engChrName: Visiting the docks will cause the main story to advance.
engSearchText:
Visiting the docks will cause the main story
to advance.
jpnChrName: この先に向かうと メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
この先に向かうと
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen
sub-events will disappear.
jpnChrName: 一部のクエスト・サブイベントが 消滅するので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
一部のクエスト・サブイベントが
消滅するので注意して下さい。

engChrName: What a view!
engSearchText: What a view!
jpnChrName: うわぁ～、キレイです！
jpnSearchText: うわぁ～、キレイです！

engChrName: With a skyline like this, it's no wonder people call this the Dazzling City.
engSearchText:
With a skyline like this, it's no wonder people call this
the Dazzling City.
jpnChrName: “煌都”ラングポート、 その名に相応しい光景ですね……！
jpnSearchText:
“煌都”ラングポート、
その名に相応しい光景ですね……！

engChrName: Definitely one of this place's best features.
engSearchText: Definitely one of this place's best features.
jpnChrName: ま、この街の醍醐味の一つだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、この街の醍醐味の一つだな。

engChrName: No disagreement here.
engSearchText: No disagreement here.
jpnChrName: そうね……
jpnSearchText: そうね……

engChrName: Please enjoy your meal.
engSearchText: Please enjoy your meal.
jpnChrName: それではオークレール様、 ごゆっくりお楽しみください。
jpnSearchText:
それではオークレール様、
ごゆっくりお楽しみください。

engChrName: Well, ain't you the VIP? Not every day the head chef comes out to greet a guest themselves.
engSearchText:
Well, ain't you the VIP? Not every day the head chef
comes out to greet a guest themselves.
jpnChrName: 随分と賓客待遇じゃねぇか、 料理長が挨拶に来たくらいだし。
jpnSearchText:
随分と賓客待遇じゃねぇか、
料理長が挨拶に来たくらいだし。

engChrName: I suppose.
engSearchText: I suppose.
jpnChrName: まあ、ね。
jpnSearchText: まあ、ね。

engChrName: A while back, I helped this restaurant out of some trouble. They've been treating me like royalty ever since.
engSearchText:
A while back, I helped this restaurant out of
some trouble. They've been treating me like royalty
ever since.
jpnChrName: 以前この店のトラブルを解決した事があって それ以来恩義を感じてくれているみたい。
jpnSearchText:
以前この店のトラブルを解決した事があって
それ以来恩義を感じてくれているみたい。

engChrName: It's been surprisingly convenient to come here since this establishment distances itself from Heiyue.
engSearchText:
It's been surprisingly convenient to come here since
this establishment distances itself from Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 黒月とも距離を置いているらしいから 私としても助かっているわ。
jpnSearchText:
黒月とも距離を置いているらしいから
私としても助かっているわ。

engChrName: Damn. I was just jokin', but you really are Miss Popular.
engSearchText:
Damn. I was just jokin', but you really are
Miss Popular.
jpnChrName: なるほどねぇ。 さすが売れっ子は違うな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどねぇ。
さすが売れっ子は違うな。

engChrName: So not every business in Langport aligns with Heiyue, then?
engSearchText:
So not every business in Langport aligns with
Heiyue, then?
jpnChrName: 黒月に距離を…… そういうお店もあるんですね？
jpnSearchText:
黒月に距離を……
そういうお店もあるんですね？

engChrName: Correct. There are many other companies investing in this city, after all. People often use this restaurant as neutral ground to discuss business.
engSearchText:
Correct. There are many other companies investing
in this city, after all. People often use this restaurant
as neutral ground to discuss business.
jpnChrName: ええ、煌都は黒月系以外の資本も多いし、 商談に使いやすい店でもあるみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、煌都は黒月系以外の資本も多いし、
商談に使いやすい店でもあるみたい。

engChrName: Interestingly, the Eastern food served here is more akin to Longlai's cuisine than that of Langport.
engSearchText:
Interestingly, the Eastern food served here is more
akin to Longlai's cuisine than that of Langport.
jpnChrName: 料理の系統も煌都とはちょっと違って 《龍來（ロンライ）》の流れを汲むそうね。
jpnSearchText:
料理の系統も煌都とはちょっと違って
《龍來（ロンライ）》の流れを汲むそうね。

engChrName: 'Eastern' is a rather broad term, I suppose.
engSearchText: 'Eastern' is a rather broad term, I suppose.
jpnChrName: なるほど……東方系と言っても 色々あるとは聞いていましたが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……東方系と言っても
色々あるとは聞いていましたが。

engChrName: So, umm...
engSearchText: So, umm...
jpnChrName: えと……ところで。
jpnSearchText: えと……ところで。

engChrName: Let's shelve the table talk for now.
engSearchText: Let's shelve the table talk for now.
jpnChrName: とりあえず始めるか。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず始めるか。

engChrName: We wouldn't want the food getting cold.
engSearchText: We wouldn't want the food getting cold.
jpnChrName: ええ、折角だし 冷めないうちに頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、折角だし
冷めないうちに頂きましょう。

engChrName: Especially not a meal as lovely as this.
engSearchText: Especially not a meal as lovely as this.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そうですね。

engChrName: Yay! Time to dig in!
engSearchText: Yay! Time to dig in!
jpnChrName: えへへ、いただきます……！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、いただきます……！

engChrName: *munch* Mmm!
engSearchText: *munch* Mmm!
jpnChrName: モグモグ……ん～～っ……！
jpnSearchText: モグモグ……ん～～っ……！

engChrName: It really is delicious, isn't it?
engSearchText: It really is delicious, isn't it?
jpnChrName: あはは…… 確かに本当に美味しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
確かに本当に美味しいですね。

engChrName: Wouldn't shock me if the chef here trained under the best in the biz back in Longlai.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't shock me if the chef here trained under the
best in the biz back in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ああ、龍來の名店の 直弟子あたりがやってそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、龍來の名店の
直弟子あたりがやってそうだな。

engChrName: Guess we should be thankin' the famous Beauty's Blade for the hookup.
engSearchText:
Guess we should be thankin' the famous Beauty's
Blade for the hookup.
jpnChrName: こんな豪華な夕食にありつけるとは 《剣の乙女》サマ万々歳だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな豪華な夕食にありつけるとは
《剣の乙女》サマ万々歳だぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* You can stop that anytime, thank you.
engSearchText: *sigh* You can stop that anytime, thank you.
jpnChrName: ふう……それは止めてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText: ふう……それは止めてちょうだい。

engChrName: Besides, I'm sure your client would be more than happy to prepare any reservation if you only asked.
engSearchText:
Besides, I'm sure your client would be more than
happy to prepare any reservation if you only asked.
jpnChrName: それに依頼主に要求したら同じくらいの 名店に招待してくれるんじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
それに依頼主に要求したら同じくらいの
名店に招待してくれるんじゃないかしら？

engChrName: Perhaps a fine meal at the Kowloon Hotel's restaurant would do?
engSearchText:
Perhaps a fine meal at the Kowloon Hotel's
restaurant would do?
jpnChrName: 九龍ホテルに入っているレストランも 絶品という評判みたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
九龍ホテルに入っているレストランも
絶品という評判みたいだし。

engChrName: On to us already, huh?
engSearchText: On to us already, huh?
jpnChrName: ……ったく、もう知ってんのかよ。
jpnSearchText: ……ったく、もう知ってんのかよ。

engChrName: It doesn't quite sit well with me that you have connections like this...
engSearchText:
It doesn't quite sit well with me that you have
connections like this...
jpnChrName: ギルドに依頼する人達でもないし、 貴方が適任ということは理解しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドに依頼する人達でもないし、
貴方が適任ということは理解しているわ。

engChrName: ...but, given the fact they'd never come to us, you are the right man for the job.
engSearchText:
...but, given the fact they'd never come to us, you are
the right man for the job.
jpnChrName: 感心はしないけれど。
jpnSearchText: 感心はしないけれど。

engChrName: Expectations ain't that high, really.
engSearchText: Expectations ain't that high, really.
jpnChrName: ま、こっちも“つなぎ”のようなもんだろ。
jpnSearchText: ま、こっちも“つなぎ”のようなもんだろ。

engChrName: We're just holdin' down the fort until Cao gets back.
engSearchText: We're just holdin' down the fort until Cao gets back.
jpnChrName: ツァオが戻ってくるまで事態をこれ以上 悪化させないための保険ってくらいか。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオが戻ってくるまで事態をこれ以上
悪化させないための保険ってくらいか。

engChrName: I assumed as much. Though, I'm not sure the White Orchid Dragon will be quite as successful securing the help he's after.
engSearchText:
I assumed as much. Though, I'm not sure the White
Orchid Dragon will be quite as successful securing the
help he's after.
jpnChrName: でしょうね……でも白蘭竜方面も “切り札”本人の方が応じるかどうか。
jpnSearchText:
でしょうね……でも白蘭竜方面も
“切り札”本人の方が応じるかどうか。

engChrName: While that person hasn't left it behind entirely, they seem hesitant to continue the family business.
engSearchText:
While that person hasn't left it behind entirely, they
seem hesitant to continue the family business.
jpnChrName: “名前”は捨てていないみたいだけど 迷っているような雰囲気だったし。
jpnSearchText:
“名前”は捨てていないみたいだけど
迷っているような雰囲気だったし。

engChrName: Damn. You know her?
engSearchText: Damn. You know her?
jpnChrName: って、お前も知ってんのかよ……
jpnSearchText: って、お前も知ってんのかよ……

engChrName: I could ask the same of you.
engSearchText: I could ask the same of you.
jpnChrName: 貴方の方こそね。
jpnSearchText: 貴方の方こそね。

engChrName: (This person they keep mentioning must be very well connected...)
engSearchText:
(This person they keep mentioning must be very
well connected...)
jpnChrName: （……お二人とも同じくらい   各方面に通じているみたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……お二人とも同じくらい
各方面に通じているみたいですね……）

engChrName: Aren't you going to finish your food, Agnès?
engSearchText: Aren't you going to finish your food, Agnès?
jpnChrName: アニエスさん、食べないんですか？
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん、食べないんですか？

engChrName: O-Of course.
engSearchText: O-Of course.
jpnChrName: い、いえっ、 美味しく頂いてますよっ？
jpnSearchText:
い、いえっ、
美味しく頂いてますよっ？

engChrName: I just wanted to say that I'm glad you're here, Elaine.
engSearchText: I just wanted to say that I'm glad you're here, Elaine.
jpnChrName: その……先ほどの件もそうですけど エレインさんが来てくれて心強いですよね！
jpnSearchText:
その……先ほどの件もそうですけど
エレインさんが来てくれて心強いですよね！

engChrName: Not just because you saved us earlier, but for the peace of Langport in general.
engSearchText:
Not just because you saved us earlier, but for the
peace of Langport in general.
jpnChrName: 私たちがというより、 このラングポートの平穏のためにも。
jpnSearchText:
私たちがというより、
このラングポートの平穏のためにも。

engChrName: I appreciate the thought, but don't set your expectations too high.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the thought, but don't set your
expectations too high.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとう。 ──でもちょっと買いかぶりすぎかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ありがとう。
──でもちょっと買いかぶりすぎかしら。

engChrName: The government's tacitly given Heiyue complete freedom to run this city as they please.
engSearchText:
The government's tacitly given Heiyue complete
freedom to run this city as they please.
jpnChrName: この街は黒月が治める地…… 共和国政府もそれを半ば黙認している。
jpnSearchText:
この街は黒月が治める地……
共和国政府もそれを半ば黙認している。

engChrName: I can step in when the guild's code allows, but at the end of the day, the people of the Eastern Quarter are loyal to Heiyue.
engSearchText:
I can step in when the guild's code allows, but at the
end of the day, the people of the Eastern Quarter are
loyal to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 無論、民間人の安全のためなら無理も通すわ。 でも東方人街の人たちは《黒月》の味方だしね。
jpnSearchText:
無論、民間人の安全のためなら無理も通すわ。
でも東方人街の人たちは《黒月》の味方だしね。

engChrName: Our branch here in Langport serves as an implied deterrent—nothing more.
engSearchText:
Our branch here in Langport serves as an implied
deterrent—nothing more.
jpnChrName: ここでの私たちは、抑止力でしかないのよ。
jpnSearchText: ここでの私たちは、抑止力でしかないのよ。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……

engChrName: Yet Calvard's favorite bracer made her way out here regardless.
engSearchText:
Yet Calvard's favorite bracer made her way out
here regardless.
jpnChrName: にも関わらず首都総支部のエースである お前がここまで出張ってきた──
jpnSearchText:
にも関わらず首都総支部のエースである
お前がここまで出張ってきた──

engChrName: It's about Almata, yeah?
engSearchText: It's about Almata, yeah?
jpnChrName: やはり《アルマータ》相手だからか。
jpnSearchText: やはり《アルマータ》相手だからか。

engChrName: Exactly.
engSearchText: Exactly.
jpnChrName: ええ──その通りよ。
jpnSearchText: ええ──その通りよ。

engChrName: Ordinarily, the guild only intervenes when civilian well-being is directly threatened.
engSearchText:
Ordinarily, the guild only intervenes when civilian
well-being is directly threatened.
jpnChrName: 本来、民間人の安全が脅かされない限り、 ギルドは裏勢力同士の争いには干渉しない。
jpnSearchText:
本来、民間人の安全が脅かされない限り、
ギルドは裏勢力同士の争いには干渉しない。

engChrName: There are cases where we can act preemptively, but people know where our line is and how to avoid crossing it.
engSearchText:
There are cases where we can act preemptively, but
people know where our line is and how to avoid
crossing it.
jpnChrName: 例外も多いけど、各勢力もその一線を 越えないように暗闘することが多いの。
jpnSearchText:
例外も多いけど、各勢力もその一線を
越えないように暗闘することが多いの。

engChrName: I've heard the warriors of my corps talk about that before.
engSearchText:
I've heard the warriors of my corps talk about
that before.
jpnChrName: はい……戦士団も そこは気をつけているみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
はい……戦士団も
そこは気をつけているみたいです。

engChrName: Conflicted as I am about a girl your age saying that, I'll put it aside for now.
engSearchText:
Conflicted as I am about a girl your age saying that,
I'll put it aside for now.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そう……貴女のような女の子に 言われるのもちょっと複雑だけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そう……貴女のような女の子に
言われるのもちょっと複雑だけど。

engChrName: All was as usual until a few years ago, when a new organization demonstrated a total disregard for that line.
engSearchText:
All was as usual until a few years ago, when a new
organization demonstrated a total disregard for
that line.
jpnChrName: ──話を戻すけど、その一線を平気で 踏みにじる組織が数年前に現れた。
jpnSearchText:
──話を戻すけど、その一線を平気で
踏みにじる組織が数年前に現れた。

engChrName: I'm sure you can guess who by now.
engSearchText: I'm sure you can guess who by now.
jpnChrName: それが──
jpnSearchText: それが──

engChrName: Almata...
engSearchText: Almata...
jpnChrName: 《アルマータ》、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 《アルマータ》、ですか……

engChrName: Until recently, Heiyue was the undisputed leader of Calvard's criminal underbelly.
engSearchText:
Until recently, Heiyue was the undisputed leader of
Calvard's criminal underbelly.
jpnChrName: 聞いていると思うけど、これまで 共和国の裏社会は黒月が一強だった。
jpnSearchText:
聞いていると思うけど、これまで
共和国の裏社会は黒月が一強だった。

engChrName: Almata was just one of many mid-sized, non-Eastern mafias.
engSearchText:
Almata was just one of many mid-sized,
non-Eastern mafias.
jpnChrName: そんな中、アルマータも中規模程度の 白人系マフィアの一つに過ぎなかったの。
jpnSearchText:
そんな中、アルマータも中規模程度の
白人系マフィアの一つに過ぎなかったの。

engChrName: However, things began to change eight years ago when their former leader, Enrique, made a critical mistake.
engSearchText:
However, things began to change eight years ago
when their former leader, Enrique, made a
critical mistake.
jpnChrName: 分岐点となったのは８年前──ボスだった エンリケという男が裏社会で下手を打ったことよ。
jpnSearchText:
分岐点となったのは８年前──ボスだった
エンリケという男が裏社会で下手を打ったことよ。

engChrName: I imagine you've heard all this in far greater detail from some of your friends, though.
engSearchText:
I imagine you've heard all this in far greater detail
from some of your friends, though.
jpnChrName: ……そのあたりの事情は、 貴方のお友達の方が詳しそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……そのあたりの事情は、
貴方のお友達の方が詳しそうだけど。

engChrName: Bits and pieces. It's hearsay, anyway.
engSearchText: Bits and pieces. It's hearsay, anyway.
jpnChrName: らしいな。 俺も又聞きしたくらいだが。
jpnSearchText:
らしいな。
俺も又聞きしたくらいだが。

engChrName: Almata's underboss at the time took it upon himself to 'purge' Enrique and seize control of the organization.
engSearchText:
Almata's underboss at the time took it upon himself
to 'purge' Enrique and seize control of
the organization.
jpnChrName: そしてそのエンリケを粛正する形で 組織を掌握したのが、当時の若頭……
jpnSearchText:
そしてそのエンリケを粛正する形で
組織を掌握したのが、当時の若頭……

engChrName: His name is Gerard Dantès.
engSearchText: His name is Gerard Dantès.
jpnChrName: ジェラール・ダンテス──現アルマータのボスよ。
jpnSearchText: ジェラール・ダンテス──現アルマータのボスよ。

engChrName: So that's what happened.
engSearchText: So that's what happened.
jpnChrName: ……その人が………
jpnSearchText: ……その人が………

engChrName: Only ever heard his name, but the guy's gotta be pretty crazy, right?
engSearchText:
Only ever heard his name, but the guy's gotta be
pretty crazy, right?
jpnChrName: ……名前だけは聞いてるが そこまでヤバいヤツなのか？
jpnSearchText:
……名前だけは聞いてるが
そこまでヤバいヤツなのか？

engChrName: He's certainly proven himself capable. Almata's standing has skyrocketed in the years since he took control.
engSearchText:
He's certainly proven himself capable.
Almata's standing has skyrocketed in the years since
he took control.
jpnChrName: たった数年で組織の規模を 何十倍にも拡大させた手腕……
jpnSearchText:
たった数年で組織の規模を
何十倍にも拡大させた手腕……

engChrName: His charisma is enough to bring even the most hardened criminals into his fold.
engSearchText:
His charisma is enough to bring even the most
hardened criminals into his fold.
jpnChrName: 最高ランクの“裏”の使い手たちを 部下として従わせているカリスマ性。
jpnSearchText:
最高ランクの“裏”の使い手たちを
部下として従わせているカリスマ性。

engChrName: And for as exceptionally strong as his sword arm is, it's his relentless devotion to his cause that's truly terrifying.
engSearchText:
And for as exceptionally strong as his sword arm is,
it's his relentless devotion to his cause that's
truly terrifying.
jpnChrName: そして本人の圧倒的な実力と 何よりもあの異常な精神性………
jpnSearchText:
そして本人の圧倒的な実力と
何よりもあの異常な精神性………

engChrName: Hold up. Have you met this guy or somethin'?
engSearchText: Hold up. Have you met this guy or somethin'?
jpnChrName: ……？　まるで実際に 会ったことがあるような口ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText:
……？　まるで実際に
会ったことがあるような口ぶりだな。

engChrName: I have. He didn't identify himself, and I couldn't quite see him because of his active camouflage...
engSearchText:
I have. He didn't identify himself, and I couldn't
quite see him because of his active camouflage...
jpnChrName: 一度だけ──本人は名乗っていない上に 姿は光学迷彩でよく見えなかったけれど。
jpnSearchText:
一度だけ──本人は名乗っていない上に
姿は光学迷彩でよく見えなかったけれど。

engChrName: ...but I have no doubts that it was him.
engSearchText: ...but I have no doubts that it was him.
jpnChrName: ジェラール本人と思しき人物と遭遇して やり合ったことがあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ジェラール本人と思しき人物と遭遇して
やり合ったことがあるわ。

engChrName: If I'd only been able to apprehend him then, I could have prevented all that Almata's done since.
engSearchText:
If I'd only been able to apprehend him then, I could
have prevented all that Almata's done since.
jpnChrName: ……あの時、彼を捕らえられていれば どんなに良かったことか……
jpnSearchText:
……あの時、彼を捕らえられていれば
どんなに良かったことか……

engChrName: But I was utterly powerless against him.
engSearchText: But I was utterly powerless against him.
jpnChrName: でも実際には……何もできなかった。
jpnSearchText: でも実際には……何もできなかった。

engChrName: Even just thinking of that fight sends a chill down my spine.
engSearchText:
Even just thinking of that fight sends a chill down
my spine.
jpnChrName: 今思い返しても背筋が凍るほど 底の知れない男よ──あいつは。
jpnSearchText:
今思い返しても背筋が凍るほど
底の知れない男よ──あいつは。

engChrName: For real?
engSearchText: For real?
jpnChrName: お前にそこまで言わせる相手か……
jpnSearchText: お前にそこまで言わせる相手か……

engChrName: I wish I was exaggerating... The guild and the police have been looking into Almata.
engSearchText:
I wish I was exaggerating... The guild and the police
have been looking into Almata.
jpnChrName: ええ……そしてギルドや警察は ここ数年アルマータを探り続けている。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……そしてギルドや警察は
ここ数年アルマータを探り続けている。

engChrName: I suspect Heiyue, the CID, and other organizations are likely doing the same.
engSearchText:
I suspect Heiyue, the CID, and other organizations
are likely doing the same.
jpnChrName: 多分ＣＩＤも── 恐らく黒月に、他の裏の勢力なども。
jpnSearchText:
多分ＣＩＤも──
恐らく黒月に、他の裏の勢力なども。

engChrName: However, every attempt to probe Almata with undercover agents has ended in failure. Many bracers and police officers have lost their lives.
engSearchText:
However, every attempt to probe Almata with
undercover agents has ended in failure. Many bracers
and police officers have lost their lives.
jpnChrName: でも内偵は悉く失敗し……犠牲になった 遊撃士や捜査官も一人や二人じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
でも内偵は悉く失敗し……犠牲になった
遊撃士や捜査官も一人や二人じゃないわ。

engChrName: Oh, dear...
engSearchText: Oh, dear...

engChrName: That's not good.
engSearchText: That's not good.
jpnChrName: ……そこまで、ですか。
jpnSearchText: ……そこまで、ですか。

engChrName: What we do know is that Melchior, the member you met, is not Almata's only executive.
engSearchText:
What we do know is that Melchior, the member you
met, is not Almata's only executive.
jpnChrName: ──《Ａ》の幹部だけど、貴方たちが遭遇した “メルキオル”以外にも何人か確認されている。
jpnSearchText:
──《Ａ》の幹部だけど、貴方たちが遭遇した
“メルキオル”以外にも何人か確認されている。

engChrName: It's highly likely some are here in Langport as we speak.
engSearchText:
It's highly likely some are here in Langport as
we speak.
jpnChrName: おそらく一部は煌都入りしてるでしょう。
jpnSearchText: おそらく一部は煌都入りしてるでしょう。

engChrName: I know Van can handle himself, and I can very, very reluctantly accept that you probably can, too, Feri...
engSearchText:
I know Van can handle himself, and I can very, very
reluctantly accept that you probably can, too, Feri...
jpnChrName: ヴァンはともかく、フェリさんも まあ百歩譲るとして──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはともかく、フェリさんも
まあ百歩譲るとして──

engChrName: But you're where I draw the line, Agnès. 'Dangerous' hardly begins to describe the situation here.
engSearchText:
But you're where I draw the line, Agnès.
'Dangerous' hardly begins to describe the
situation here.
jpnChrName: アニエスさん。 一般人の貴女はどう考えても危険よ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさん。
一般人の貴女はどう考えても危険よ。

engChrName: Tell me: why is a student at one of the country's most prestigious schools using her precious free time working for a fixer?
engSearchText:
Tell me: why is a student at one of the country's most
prestigious schools using her precious free time
working for a fixer?
jpnChrName: アラミスは名門──どうして多忙な 学生生活の合間にこんな事をしているの？
jpnSearchText:
アラミスは名門──どうして多忙な
学生生活の合間にこんな事をしているの？

jpnChrName: わ、私は………
jpnSearchText: わ、私は………

engChrName: I'm sorry. All I can say is that I have my reasons.
engSearchText: I'm sorry. All I can say is that I have my reasons.
jpnChrName: ……詳しいことを言えなくてすみません。 ですが私には、ある事情があります……
jpnSearchText:
……詳しいことを言えなくてすみません。
ですが私には、ある事情があります……

engChrName: My whole life, I've been shackled by circumstances out of my control, and forced to give up on many things as a result.
engSearchText:
My whole life, I've been shackled by circumstances
out of my control, and forced to give up on many
things as a result.
jpnChrName: その事情は私を縛り、萎縮させ、 色々なものを諦めさせるものでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
その事情は私を縛り、萎縮させ、
色々なものを諦めさせるものでしたが……

engChrName: However, in meeting Van and Feri, and working together...
engSearchText:
However, in meeting Van and Feri, and
working together...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんに相談して、お仕事に関わらせて もらって、フェリちゃんとも出会えて──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんに相談して、お仕事に関わらせて
もらって、フェリちゃんとも出会えて──

engChrName: ...it feels like my eyes have been opened to a whole new world.
engSearchText:
...it feels like my eyes have been opened to a whole
new world.
jpnChrName: 世界が広がった気がするんです。
jpnSearchText: 世界が広がった気がするんです。

engChrName: The more I see, the more I begin to understand what it is I really want out of my life.
engSearchText:
The more I see, the more I begin to understand what
it is I really want out of my life.
jpnChrName: 本当に自分がやりたい事、 ……在りたいと思える自分──
jpnSearchText:
本当に自分がやりたい事、
……在りたいと思える自分──

engChrName: As well as the kind of person I aspire to be.
engSearchText: As well as the kind of person I aspire to be.
jpnChrName: 完全にとはとても言えませんが 少しずつ見えてきたものがあります。
jpnSearchText:
完全にとはとても言えませんが
少しずつ見えてきたものがあります。

engChrName: While that wasn't my initial reason for working with Van, it's the main reason I'm still helping him.
engSearchText:
While that wasn't my initial reason for working with
Van, it's the main reason I'm still helping him.
jpnChrName: ……他にも直接的な事情もありますけど、 それが、お手伝いしている最大の理由です。
jpnSearchText:
……他にも直接的な事情もありますけど、
それが、お手伝いしている最大の理由です。

engChrName: Aww...
engSearchText: Aww...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: ...I'm still not convinced this is in your best interests, but it's clear I won't be able to talk you out of this.
engSearchText:
...I'm still not convinced this is in your best interests,
but it's clear I won't be able to talk you out of this.
jpnChrName: ……納得はできないけど この場で貴女を説得するのは難しそうね。
jpnSearchText:
……納得はできないけど
この場で貴女を説得するのは難しそうね。

engChrName: All right. I'll leave you to your work for now.
engSearchText: All right. I'll leave you to your work for now.
jpnChrName: わかった──今回の件については これ以上の口出しは控えるわ。
jpnSearchText:
わかった──今回の件については
これ以上の口出しは控えるわ。

engChrName: Please be extremely careful. That goes for you, too, Feri.
engSearchText:
Please be extremely careful. That goes for you,
too, Feri.
jpnChrName: ただし、くれぐれも慎重に行動すること。 ──フェリさん、貴女もよ？
jpnSearchText:
ただし、くれぐれも慎重に行動すること。
──フェリさん、貴女もよ？

engChrName: O-Of course.
engSearchText: O-Of course.
jpnChrName: は、はい！
jpnSearchText: は、はい！

engChrName: You can count on me!
engSearchText: You can count on me!
jpnChrName: 了解ですっ。
jpnSearchText: 了解ですっ。

engChrName: Make sure you take the scary lady's words to heart, now.
engSearchText:
Make sure you take the scary lady's words to
heart, now.
jpnChrName: そうそう、怖～いお姉さんの助言は ちゃんと聞かないとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、怖～いお姉さんの助言は
ちゃんと聞かないとなぁ。

engChrName: Would you like to take this outside?
engSearchText: Would you like to take this outside?
jpnChrName: 当 然 、貴 方 も よ ？
jpnSearchText: <S5>当 然 、貴 方 も よ ？

engChrName: Please, spare me...
engSearchText: Please, spare me...

engChrName: My apologies for the delay. Here is your sanbuzhan.
engSearchText: My apologies for the delay. Here is your sanbuzhan.
jpnChrName: お待たせしました── デザートの三不粘（サンプーチャン）でございます。
jpnSearchText:
お待たせしました──
デザートの三不粘（サンプーチャン）でございます。

engChrName: Oh, hell yeah!
engSearchText: Oh, hell yeah!
jpnChrName: 来たかっ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>来たかっ！

engChrName: What a vibrant yellow! I don't think I've ever seen a custard with quite this shape and color before.
engSearchText:
What a vibrant yellow! I don't think I've ever seen a
custard with quite this shape and color before.
jpnChrName: わぁ、綺麗な金色ですね。 それに不思議な形……
jpnSearchText:
わぁ、綺麗な金色ですね。
それに不思議な形……

engChrName: Heehee. Look at it wobble around!
engSearchText: Heehee. Look at it wobble around!
jpnChrName: プルプルしてます……！
jpnSearchText: プルプルしてます……！

engChrName: What a strange texture!
engSearchText: What a strange texture!
jpnChrName: ……！　この食感……
jpnSearchText: ……！　この食感……

engChrName: Mmm. It's the perfect level of sweetness.
engSearchText: Mmm. It's the perfect level of sweetness.
jpnChrName: ふふ……甘さも絶妙ね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ……甘さも絶妙ね。

engChrName: A dessert so slick it'll slip and slide against the plate, your chopsticks, and even the inside of your mouth.
engSearchText:
A dessert so slick it'll slip and slide against the plate,
your chopsticks, and even the inside of your mouth.
jpnChrName: 三不粘（サンプーチャン）……皿につかない、 箸につかない、口につかない幻の甜点（デザート）……
jpnSearchText:
三不粘（サンプーチャン）……皿につかない、
箸につかない、口につかない幻の甜点（デザート）……

engChrName: The unique mouthfeel paired with its gentle and subtle flavors is sublime—revolutionary even!
engSearchText:
The unique mouthfeel paired with its gentle and
subtle flavors is sublime—revolutionary even!
jpnChrName: 濃厚で香ばしい味わいなのに少しもくどくない 優しい甘さ、そしてこの不思議な食感……！
jpnSearchText:
濃厚で香ばしい味わいなのに少しもくどくない
優しい甘さ、そしてこの不思議な食感……！

engChrName: In fact, it's a bigger game changer than the Democratic Revolution!
engSearchText:
In fact, it's a bigger game changer than the
Democratic Revolution!
jpnChrName: ──うおおおおおっ！ こいつはデザート界の民主革命やでええっ！！
jpnSearchText:
──うおおおおおっ！
こいつはデザート界の民主革命やでええっ！！

engChrName: I know, right?
engSearchText: I know, right?
jpnChrName: はいっ、おいしすぎますっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、おいしすぎますっ！

engChrName: I've been meaning to ask...has he always been like this?
engSearchText:
I've been meaning to ask...has he always been
like this?
jpnChrName: ……えっと、昔からなんですか？
jpnSearchText: ……えっと、昔からなんですか？

engChrName: He never did this when we were kids...
engSearchText: He never did this when we were kids...
jpnChrName: うーん、小さい頃は そうでもなかったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、小さい頃は
そうでもなかったんだけど……

engChrName: After finishing their meal and parting ways with Elaine, they returned to the Eastern Quarter by bus.
engSearchText:
After finishing their meal and parting ways with
Elaine, they returned to the Eastern Quarter by bus.
jpnChrName: 夕食後、店の前でエレインと別れたヴァンたちは バスに乗って新市街から東方人街へと戻り──
jpnSearchText:
夕食後、店の前でエレインと別れたヴァンたちは
バスに乗って新市街から東方人街へと戻り──

engChrName: Well, wasn't as smooth as I'd hoped, but what's done is done.
engSearchText:
Well, wasn't as smooth as I'd hoped, but what's done
is done.
jpnChrName: ふう、少し手こずったが 何とか片付いて良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、少し手こずったが
何とか片付いて良かったぜ。

engChrName: Say, you know if there're any public baths around here?
engSearchText:
Say, you know if there're any public baths
around here?
jpnChrName: ──お前、このあたりで深夜に やってる公衆浴場とか知らねえか？
jpnSearchText:
──お前、このあたりで深夜に
やってる公衆浴場とか知らねえか？

engChrName: Even better if they've got a sauna.
engSearchText: Even better if they've got a sauna.
jpnChrName: サウナとかありゃ最高なんだが。
jpnSearchText: サウナとかありゃ最高なんだが。

engChrName: Old man Wang's got one just down the way.
engSearchText: Old man Wang's got one just down the way.
jpnChrName: あー、東方人街の２番街だったら ワン爺さんの銭湯があるが……
jpnSearchText:
あー、東方人街の２番街だったら
ワン爺さんの銭湯があるが……

engChrName: Don't tell me you're aching after one little scuffle?
engSearchText: Don't tell me you're aching after one little scuffle?
jpnChrName: クク、あの程度の切った張ったで まさか疲れちまったとか言わねーよな？
jpnSearchText:
クク、あの程度の切った張ったで
まさか疲れちまったとか言わねーよな？

engChrName: You gotta work on your stamina, man. I can stay up for three nights straight with energy to spare!
engSearchText:
You gotta work on your stamina, man. I can stay up
for three nights straight with energy to spare!
jpnChrName: 夜はまだまだこれから── むしろ３日連続オールくらい普通だろ。
jpnSearchText:
夜はまだまだこれから──
むしろ３日連続オールくらい普通だろ。

engChrName: Spoken like a true teenager.
engSearchText: Spoken like a true teenager.
jpnChrName: あのな……まだ１０代の ガキと一緒にすんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
あのな……まだ１０代の
ガキと一緒にすんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Heh. Stay jealous.
engSearchText: Heh. Stay jealous.
jpnChrName: おっと、そいつは失礼。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そいつは失礼。

engChrName: I know—you should go for a massage instead.
engSearchText: I know—you should go for a massage instead.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ療法院の按摩あたりを 代わりに勧めとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあ療法院の按摩あたりを
代わりに勧めとくぜ。

engChrName: Oh, wait, that'd put an old fart like you outta commission for a few days at least.
engSearchText:
Oh, wait, that'd put an old fart like you outta
commission for a few days at least.
jpnChrName: ああ、アンタくらいの年齢は 筋肉痛は数日後に来るんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アンタくらいの年齢は
筋肉痛は数日後に来るんだったか？

engChrName: Dude. I ain't old!
engSearchText: Dude. I ain't old!
jpnChrName: そこまで歳食ってねえよ！！
jpnSearchText: そこまで歳食ってねえよ！！

engChrName: Sheesh. Don't know if I could put up with you if you weren't handy in a fight.
engSearchText:
Sheesh. Don't know if I could put up with you if you
weren't handy in a fight.
jpnChrName: ったくクソ生意気なガキだな。 ……ま、さっきの手際は中々だったが。
jpnSearchText:
ったくクソ生意気なガキだな。
……ま、さっきの手際は中々だったが。

engChrName: So, you're doing theater, and what? Is the plan to just join up with Heiyue at some point?
engSearchText:
So, you're doing theater, and what? Is the plan to just
join up with Heiyue at some point?
jpnChrName: 定職には就いてねえみたいだが やっぱいずれは黒月入りすんのか？
jpnSearchText:
定職には就いてねえみたいだが
やっぱいずれは黒月入りすんのか？

engChrName: What? I hit a nerve?
engSearchText: What? I hit a nerve?
jpnChrName: ……？　どうした。
jpnSearchText: ……？　どうした。

engChrName: Why do you care what I'm doing with my life?
engSearchText: Why do you care what I'm doing with my life?
jpnChrName: ハン…… 別にアンタには関係ねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
別にアンタには関係ねえだろ。

engChrName: No reason in particular.
engSearchText: No reason in particular.
jpnChrName: そりゃそうだが…… ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃそうだが……
……そうだな。

engChrName: All I am is an outsider who floats into town from time to time.
engSearchText:
All I am is an outsider who floats into town from
time to time.
jpnChrName: 俺は煌都はたまに寄るくらいの余所者だ。
jpnSearchText: 俺は煌都はたまに寄るくらいの余所者だ。

engChrName: There are some things you can only really tell a person like me that ain't got a stake in your life.
engSearchText:
There are some things you can only really tell a
person like me that ain't got a stake in your life.
jpnChrName: そういう相手だからこそ言える、 どうってことのねぇ戯れ言や世迷い言……
jpnSearchText:
そういう相手だからこそ言える、
どうってことのねぇ戯れ言や世迷い言……

engChrName: Not gonna force you or anything, mind.
engSearchText: Not gonna force you or anything, mind.
jpnChrName: ──そんなモンも あるんじゃねえかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
──そんなモンも
あるんじゃねえかと思ってな。

engChrName: ...Heh.
engSearchText: ...Heh.

engChrName: This place is special to me. I get to mess around with my friends and go up on the big stage.
engSearchText:
This place is special to me. I get to mess around with
my friends and go up on the big stage.
jpnChrName: ──別に不満なんて何もねぇ。 煌都での暮らしも、皆と馬鹿騒ぎすんのも。
jpnSearchText:
──別に不満なんて何もねぇ。
煌都での暮らしも、皆と馬鹿騒ぎすんのも。

engChrName: I've also got a bunch of memories of being with Mom here.
engSearchText:
I've also got a bunch of memories of being with
Mom here.
jpnChrName: 舞台はたまに出る分にはアガるし、 亡くなったオフクロとの思い出もあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
舞台はたまに出る分にはアガるし、
亡くなったオフクロとの思い出もあるしな。

engChrName: Sure, Heiyue does stuff that ticks me off, but I still go way back with Ashen and her family.
engSearchText:
Sure, Heiyue does stuff that ticks me off, but I still go
way back with Ashen and her family.
jpnChrName: 黒月もムカつく連中はいるが アシェンの家も含めて馴染みも多い。
jpnSearchText:
黒月もムカつく連中はいるが
アシェンの家も含めて馴染みも多い。

engChrName: Though, me and Lǎo Yéye aren't really close these days.
engSearchText:
Though, me and Lǎo Yéye aren't really close
these days.
jpnChrName: ……ま、さっきも言ったように 最近ちょいと疎遠な爺さんもいるが。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、さっきも言ったように
最近ちょいと疎遠な爺さんもいるが。

engChrName: Cao's a shady son of a bitch, but it's obvious that he's sharp as a tack.
engSearchText:
Cao's a shady son of a bitch, but it's obvious that he's
sharp as a tack.
jpnChrName: ツァオは胡散臭ぇがキレるのは間違いねぇし、 頭角を現してんのは組織として健全な証拠だ。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオは胡散臭ぇがキレるのは間違いねぇし、
頭角を現してんのは組織として健全な証拠だ。

engChrName: If smart people like him can move up in Heiyue, it's not a bad idea for me to join up and see how I do.
engSearchText:
If smart people like him can move up in Heiyue, it's
not a bad idea for me to join up and see how I do.
jpnChrName: てめえがどこまでやれんのか、 入って腕試しをすんのもアリだろう。
jpnSearchText:
てめえがどこまでやれんのか、
入って腕試しをすんのもアリだろう。

engChrName: I just...
engSearchText: I just...

engChrName: ...have doubts sometimes.
engSearchText: ...have doubts sometimes.
jpnChrName: たまにふと、思う時がある。
jpnSearchText: たまにふと、思う時がある。

engChrName: You suddenly find yourself wonderin' if you really belong here. If you have the right to have a life this nice.
engSearchText:
You suddenly find yourself wonderin' if you really
belong here. If you have the right to have a life
this nice.
jpnChrName: ここに居ていいのか、 ……自分の居場所はここなのか。
jpnSearchText:
ここに居ていいのか、
……自分の居場所はここなのか。

engChrName: A little self-doubt growin' up's totally normal— happens to everyone.
engSearchText:
A little self-doubt growin' up's totally normal—
happens to everyone.
jpnChrName: ま、モラトリアムってヤツだ。 多かれ少なかれ、誰だって通る。
jpnSearchText:
ま、モラトリアムってヤツだ。
多かれ少なかれ、誰だって通る。

engChrName: But I get the feeling you're kinda like me.
engSearchText: But I get the feeling you're kinda like me.
jpnChrName: ただまあ──お前の場合は ちょっと俺に似てるのかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ──お前の場合は
ちょっと俺に似てるのかもしれねえな。

engChrName: You love someone or something so much, you have to let them go. Yet you don't have the heart to tell 'em that.
engSearchText:
You love someone or something so much, you have to
let them go. Yet you don't have the heart to tell
'em that.
jpnChrName: 大好きだからこそ離れるしかねえ…… ……愛してるからこそ伝えられない言葉が。
jpnSearchText:
大好きだからこそ離れるしかねえ……
……愛してるからこそ伝えられない言葉が。

engChrName: Damn...
engSearchText: Damn...
jpnChrName: アンタ………
jpnSearchText: アンタ………

engChrName: Lay off the romance movies, old man! All that sentimental crap sounds ridiculous coming out of your ugly mug.
engSearchText:
Lay off the romance movies, old man! All that
sentimental crap sounds ridiculous coming out of your
ugly mug.
jpnChrName: クク、映画かなんかの台詞か？ 顔に似合わずロマンチストじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、映画かなんかの台詞か？
顔に似合わずロマンチストじゃねえか。

engChrName: Leave my face out of this!
engSearchText: Leave my face out of this!
jpnChrName: 顔に似合わずは余計だっつの！
jpnSearchText: 顔に似合わずは余計だっつの！

engChrName: Anyway, take it from me: you can make a home for yourself anywhere you want.
engSearchText:
Anyway, take it from me: you can make a home for
yourself anywhere you want.
jpnChrName: ──ただま、自分の居場所なんて どこにだって作れるってことだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ただま、自分の居場所なんて
どこにだって作れるってことだ。

engChrName: Could be some far off land, or maybe you go on a long journey to end up right back where you started.
engSearchText:
Could be some far off land, or maybe you go on a
long journey to end up right back where you started.
jpnChrName: 此処ではない何処でだろうが、 巡り巡って還ってきた場所だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
此処ではない何処でだろうが、
巡り巡って還ってきた場所だろうが。

engChrName: Point is, you have to decide that yourself.
engSearchText: Point is, you have to decide that yourself.
jpnChrName: 選ぶのはそいつ自身だ──違うか？
jpnSearchText: 選ぶのはそいつ自身だ──違うか？

engChrName: How 'bout that?
engSearchText: How 'bout that?
jpnChrName: …………違わねぇ。
jpnSearchText: …………違わねぇ。

engChrName: You and me couldn't be more different, but I get what you're saying.
engSearchText:
You and me couldn't be more different, but I get
what you're saying.
jpnChrName: てめえとは一リジュたりとも 被ってるわけじゃねえが……
jpnSearchText:
てめえとは一リジュたりとも
被ってるわけじゃねえが……

engChrName: Sometimes it feels like the world's fading away around me.
engSearchText:
Sometimes it feels like the world's fading away
around me.
jpnChrName: たまにふと、昏い穴がぽっかりと すぐ足元に開いてる気分になる事がある。
jpnSearchText:
たまにふと、昏い穴がぽっかりと
すぐ足元に開いてる気分になる事がある。

engChrName: Probably just imagining things, or maybe I really don't get enough sleep...
engSearchText:
Probably just imagining things, or maybe I really
don't get enough sleep...
jpnChrName: 根拠があるわけでもねえ…… ただの気の迷いか疲れなんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
根拠があるわけでもねえ……
ただの気の迷いか疲れなんだろうが。

engChrName: I'll see my bros or Ashen—hell, even the city lights— and my vision just kinda...hazes over.
engSearchText:
I'll see my bros or Ashen—hell, even the city lights—
and my vision just kinda...hazes over.
jpnChrName: そんな時、ダチどもやアシェンたちの顔、 街の賑やかな明かりも霞んで見えて……
jpnSearchText:
そんな時、ダチどもやアシェンたちの顔、
街の賑やかな明かりも霞んで見えて……

engChrName: It makes me sick.
engSearchText: It makes me sick.
jpnChrName: …………反吐が、 出るような気分になっちまう。
jpnSearchText:
…………反吐が、
出るような気分になっちまう。

engChrName: Ah.
engSearchText: Ah.
jpnChrName: ……そうか。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか。

engChrName: You really love this place, don'tcha?
engSearchText: You really love this place, don'tcha?
jpnChrName: お前、本当に煌都が── 生まれ育った街のことが大好きなんだな。
jpnSearchText:
お前、本当に煌都が──
生まれ育った街のことが大好きなんだな。

engChrName: So much that doubting your love for even a second makes you hate yourself.
engSearchText:
So much that doubting your love for even a second
makes you hate yourself.
jpnChrName: そんな風に一瞬でも思っちまう 自分自身が許せなくなるくらい。
jpnSearchText:
そんな風に一瞬でも思っちまう
自分自身が許せなくなるくらい。

engChrName: Is that so wrong?!
engSearchText: Is that so wrong?!
jpnChrName: ああ、悪いかよ……！
jpnSearchText: ああ、悪いかよ……！

engChrName: You telling me I shouldn't hate Almata for coming in and trying to mess shit up?!
engSearchText:
You telling me I shouldn't hate Almata for coming in
and trying to mess shit up?!
jpnChrName: だからこそ許せねえ！ 半グレどもも、アルマータってのも！
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ許せねえ！
半グレどもも、アルマータってのも！

engChrName: Or be pissed at Heiyue for letting it all happen?!
engSearchText: Or be pissed at Heiyue for letting it all happen?!
jpnChrName: 悠長に静観してやがる黒月の連中も！
jpnSearchText: 悠長に静観してやがる黒月の連中も！

engChrName: Screw all of that! I've got to protect this place!
engSearchText: Screw all of that! I've got to protect this place!
jpnChrName: 俺は俺自身に証明する── ダチと共にこの街を守ることによって！
jpnSearchText:
俺は俺自身に証明する──
ダチと共にこの街を守ることによって！

engChrName: I've got to prove to myself that I belong here! That all my doubts are bullshit.
engSearchText:
I've got to prove to myself that I belong here! That all
my doubts are bullshit.
jpnChrName: 俺がこの街に居てもいいんだって！ ──みんなと一緒でもいいんだって！！
jpnSearchText:
俺がこの街に居てもいいんだって！
──みんなと一緒でもいいんだって！！

engChrName: But if I gotta be the one to do it, you and the guild are in my way.
engSearchText:
But if I gotta be the one to do it, you and the guild
are in my way.
jpnChrName: ……その意味じゃ ギルドと同じくてめぇらも邪魔だ。
jpnSearchText:
……その意味じゃ
ギルドと同じくてめぇらも邪魔だ。

engChrName: I already know you're damn tough, and I like the way you handle your work...
engSearchText:
I already know you're damn tough, and I like the way
you handle your work...
jpnChrName: 改めて実力は見させてもらったし、 正直、なかなか面白そうな仕事だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
改めて実力は見させてもらったし、
正直、なかなか面白そうな仕事だぜ。

engChrName: ...but I've already made up my mind. So you gonna get the hell out of here or what?
engSearchText:
...but I've already made up my mind. So you gonna
get the hell out of here or what?
jpnChrName: だが、それとこれとは話が別だ…… ──やっぱり退いてもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
だが、それとこれとは話が別だ……
──やっぱり退いてもらおうか？

engChrName: Heh. I respect the hustle, kid.
engSearchText: Heh. I respect the hustle, kid.
jpnChrName: ったく…… そういうのは嫌いじゃねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
そういうのは嫌いじゃねえが。

engChrName: But aren'tcha jumpin' the gun a little?
engSearchText: But aren'tcha jumpin' the gun a little?
jpnChrName: お前、一つ忘れてねぇか？
jpnSearchText: お前、一つ忘れてねぇか？

engChrName: What are you talking about?
engSearchText: What are you talking about?
jpnSearchText: は……？

engChrName: I get it—you're a bit leery of us 'cause we're working for Cao.
engSearchText:
I get it—you're a bit leery of us 'cause we're working
for Cao.
jpnChrName: 俺が《裏解決屋》だって事だ。 確かにツァオの依頼で来ちゃいるが……
jpnSearchText:
俺が《裏解決屋》だって事だ。
確かにツァオの依頼で来ちゃいるが……

engChrName: Thing is, I'll work for just about anyone if the job's right and the mira's there.
engSearchText:
Thing is, I'll work for just about anyone if the job's
right and the mira's there.
jpnChrName: あくまで４ｓｐｇの出張対応に来ただけで お前を止めろなんて言われちゃいない。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで４ｓｐｇの出張対応に来ただけで
お前を止めろなんて言われちゃいない。

engChrName: But as you've seen, when I work, I do things my way.
engSearchText: But as you've seen, when I work, I do things my way.
jpnChrName: そして俺は誰からの、どんな依頼でも請ける。 そこに幾許かの“筋”がある限りはな。
jpnSearchText:
そして俺は誰からの、どんな依頼でも請ける。
そこに幾許かの“筋”がある限りはな。

engChrName: So don't go lumpin' me in with those sticks-in-the-mud over at the guild.
engSearchText:
So don't go lumpin' me in with those
sticks-in-the-mud over at the guild.
jpnChrName: ──“使命”を背負わざるを得ねぇ お堅いギルドと一緒にしないでもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
──“使命”を背負わざるを得ねぇ
お堅いギルドと一緒にしないでもらおうか？

engChrName: Are you saying—?
engSearchText: Are you saying—?
jpnChrName: ……そいつは………
jpnSearchText: ……そいつは………

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: We've been looking all over for you!
engSearchText: We've been looking all over for you!
jpnChrName: 見つけましたっ！
jpnSearchText: 見つけましたっ！

engChrName: The hell are you all doin' here?
engSearchText: The hell are you all doin' here?
jpnChrName: お前ら……！？
jpnSearchText: お前ら……！？

engChrName: Hahaha!
engSearchText: Hahaha!
jpnSearchText: っ……ハッ………

engChrName: Pops got caught goin' for a night on the town, eh? Sucks being old, don't it?
engSearchText:
Pops got caught goin' for a night on the town, eh?
Sucks being old, don't it?
jpnChrName: 見つかっちまったなぁオッサン。 夜遊びがバレた亭主の気分かよ？
jpnSearchText:
見つかっちまったなぁオッサン。
夜遊びがバレた亭主の気分かよ？

engChrName: Can it, already!
engSearchText: Can it, already!
jpnChrName: だからオッサンじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: だからオッサンじゃねえ！

engChrName: Halle and Jack told us everything. We've been worried sick!
engSearchText:
Halle and Jack told us everything. We've been
worried sick!
jpnChrName: ハルさんたちから話を聞いて…… ……もう、心配したんですから！
jpnSearchText:
ハルさんたちから話を聞いて……
……もう、心配したんですから！

engChrName: She's right! Wait, you're with...Aaron?
engSearchText: She's right! Wait, you're with...Aaron?
jpnChrName: そうですっ……！ ──って、あなたは……
jpnSearchText:
そうですっ……！
──って、あなたは……

engChrName: Chill. I can explain.
engSearchText: Chill. I can explain.
jpnChrName: いや、これはだな……
jpnSearchText: いや、これはだな……

engChrName: But first, Elaine, what are you doing here?
engSearchText: But first, Elaine, what are you doing here?
jpnChrName: ──つーかエレイン、 なんでお前まで居やがるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──つーかエレイン、
なんでお前まで居やがるんだ？

engChrName: I happened to run into them on my nighttime patrol.
engSearchText: I happened to run into them on my nighttime patrol.
jpnChrName: 夜の巡回に出ようとした所で たまたま会っただけなのだけど。
jpnSearchText:
夜の巡回に出ようとした所で
たまたま会っただけなのだけど。

engChrName: Though I must say, you two suddenly seem close. Was one wild night on the town all it took to smooth things over?
engSearchText:
Though I must say, you two suddenly seem close.
Was one wild night on the town all it took to smooth
things over?
jpnChrName: それにしても仲良くなったわね？ ……夜遊びで意気投合したのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても仲良くなったわね？
……夜遊びで意気投合したのかしら。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Oh, is this an adult thing?
engSearchText: Oh, is this an adult thing?
jpnChrName: よあそび……
jpnSearchText: よあそび……

engChrName: Course not.
engSearchText: Course not.
jpnChrName: なわけねえだろ……
jpnSearchText: なわけねえだろ……

engChrName: Nah, tell them. It was a hot night in Langport! We were just getting busy with a real babe.
engSearchText:
Nah, tell them. It was a hot night in Langport!
We were just getting busy with a real babe.
jpnChrName: クク──いや～、さっきまで二人して かなりの上玉と熱い時間を過ごしてなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
クク──いや～、さっきまで二人して
かなりの上玉と熱い時間を過ごしてなぁ。

engChrName: My man here really knows how to pick 'em. ❤
engSearchText: My man here really knows how to pick 'em. ❤
jpnChrName: なかなかタンノーさせてもらったぜ❤
jpnSearchText: なかなかタンノーさせてもらったぜ❤

engChrName: Come on!
engSearchText: Come on!
jpnChrName: ってオイっ！？
jpnSearchText: ってオイっ！？

engChrName: Why don't you tell us more about this 'babe'?
engSearchText: Why don't you tell us more about this 'babe'?
jpnChrName: じょ、上玉……
jpnSearchText: じょ、上玉……

engChrName: And what does he mean by 'busy'?
engSearchText: And what does he mean by 'busy'?
jpnChrName: ……熱い時間……
jpnSearchText: ……熱い時間……

engChrName: ...Well, Van?
engSearchText: ...Well, Van?

engChrName: That's my cue to exit stage left.
engSearchText: That's my cue to exit stage left.
jpnChrName: クク、良いオチが付いたところで 一足先に帰らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、良いオチが付いたところで
一足先に帰らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Don't forget what I told you earlier, 'kay?
engSearchText: Don't forget what I told you earlier, 'kay?
jpnChrName: アンタらと対立するつもりはねぇが 俺たちの邪魔だけは許さねえ……
jpnSearchText:
アンタらと対立するつもりはねぇが
俺たちの邪魔だけは許さねえ……

engChrName: Keep out of my way and—
engSearchText: Keep out of my way and—
jpnChrName: それさえ弁えるんだったら──
jpnSearchText: それさえ弁えるんだったら──

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Why is your bag glowing...?
engSearchText: Why is your bag glowing...?

engChrName: (The hell?)
engSearchText: (The hell?)

engChrName: Shit...
engSearchText: Shit...
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: Look!
engSearchText: Look!

engChrName: What in the world?
engSearchText: What in the world?
jpnChrName: 霧……いえ靄（もや）でしょうか……
jpnSearchText: 霧……いえ靄（もや）でしょうか……

engChrName: A fog's rolled in...
engSearchText: A fog's rolled in...
jpnChrName: ええ…… でもどうしていきなり。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
でもどうしていきなり。

engChrName: (I've got a bad feelin' about this...)
engSearchText: (I've got a bad feelin' about this...)
jpnChrName: （こいつは……！）
jpnSearchText: （こいつは……！）

engChrName: I don't get what's going on, but I'm not gonna wait around to find out!
engSearchText:
I don't get what's going on, but I'm not gonna wait
around to find out!
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 何だか知らねえが──！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
何だか知らねえが──！

engChrName: Aaron?
engSearchText: Aaron?
jpnChrName: あっ……！
jpnSearchText: あっ……！

engChrName: Wait! It's too dangerous!
engSearchText: Wait! It's too dangerous!
jpnChrName: 待ちなさい、危険よ！
jpnSearchText: 待ちなさい、危険よ！

engChrName: Bah! We're going after him!
engSearchText: Bah! We're going after him!
jpnChrName: チッ、追いかけるぞ！
jpnSearchText: チッ、追いかけるぞ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）！

engChrName: If all were as it seemed, this would be Almata's home base.
engSearchText:
If all were as it seemed, this would be Almata's
home base.
jpnChrName: 《メッセルダム商事》…… アルマータの拠点、でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
《メッセルダム商事》……
アルマータの拠点、でしたか。

engChrName: Yeah, but I don't think anyone's here anymore.
engSearchText: Yeah, but I don't think anyone's here anymore.
jpnChrName: ……気配、ありませんね。
jpnSearchText: ……気配、ありませんね。

engChrName: Probably jumped ship early to avoid fightin' Heiyue.
engSearchText: Probably jumped ship early to avoid fightin' Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ああ、黒月の報復を避けて 放棄したのかもしれんが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、黒月の報復を避けて
放棄したのかもしれんが……

engChrName: Still, our troublemaker might be in there right now.
engSearchText: Still, our troublemaker might be in there right now.
jpnChrName: あの跳ねっ返りが立ち寄っている 可能性はありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
あの跳ねっ返りが立ち寄っている
可能性はありそうだな。

engChrName: Are we going to infiltrate the facility, then?
engSearchText: Are we going to infiltrate the facility, then?
jpnChrName: 踏み込みますか。
jpnSearchText: 踏み込みますか。

engChrName: That's what I'm thinkin'. Keep an eye out for traps, got it?
engSearchText:
That's what I'm thinkin'. Keep an eye out for traps,
got it?
jpnChrName: ああ、ただし トラップには気をつけろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ただし
トラップには気をつけろ。

engChrName: Of course.
engSearchText: Of course.
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）。
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）。

engChrName: (This is DEFINITELY trespassing, but I suppose now's not really the time to be arguing...)
engSearchText:
(This is DEFINITELY trespassing, but I suppose
now's not really the time to be arguing...)
jpnChrName: （……普通に不法侵入ですけど   言ってられませんよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……普通に不法侵入ですけど
言ってられませんよね……）

engChrName: I've already saved you the trouble.
engSearchText: I've already saved you the trouble.
jpnChrName: ──その必要はないわ。
jpnSearchText: ──その必要はないわ。

engChrName: Oh, it's Elaine.
engSearchText: Oh, it's Elaine.
jpnChrName: わわっ……
jpnSearchText: わわっ……

engChrName: What are you doing here?
engSearchText: What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: エレインさん！？
jpnSearchText: エレインさん！？

engChrName: *sigh* When'd you become the breaking and entering type?
engSearchText:
*sigh* When'd you become the breaking and
entering type?
jpnChrName: ふう、気配消して 乗り込んでんじゃねえよ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、気配消して
乗り込んでんじゃねえよ……

engChrName: Never. The police supplied us with a warrant.
engSearchText: Never. The police supplied us with a warrant.
jpnChrName: 警察からの委任状も取っているわ。
jpnSearchText: 警察からの委任状も取っているわ。

engChrName: In light of last night's tragedy, the guild can no longer stand by idly.
engSearchText:
In light of last night's tragedy, the guild can no longer
stand by idly.
jpnChrName: ……民間人のあれだけの被害、 ギルドとしても黙ってはいられない。
jpnSearchText:
……民間人のあれだけの被害、
ギルドとしても黙ってはいられない。

engChrName: I was hoping to find a lead here, but alas...
engSearchText: I was hoping to find a lead here, but alas...
jpnChrName: せめて次の動きを探る手がかりが 残っていないか調べてみたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
せめて次の動きを探る手がかりが
残っていないか調べてみたのだけど……

engChrName: ...it's completely empty inside.
engSearchText: ...it's completely empty inside.
jpnChrName: 完全にもぬけの殻だったわ。
jpnSearchText: 完全にもぬけの殻だったわ。

engChrName: Is that so?
engSearchText: Is that so?
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: Do you think they moved to a new base, then?
engSearchText: Do you think they moved to a new base, then?
jpnChrName: 拠点を移した…… という事でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
拠点を移した……
という事でしょうか？

engChrName: I don't think this place was ever their primary base to begin with.
engSearchText:
I don't think this place was ever their primary base to
begin with.
jpnChrName: というより、事務所という 体裁すら取っていなかったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
というより、事務所という
体裁すら取っていなかったみたいね。

engChrName: Nothing inside suggests that it was ever used as an office.
engSearchText:
Nothing inside suggests that it was ever used as
an office.
jpnChrName: 無人だったのはともかく、 物が置かれていた形跡すら残っていない。
jpnSearchText:
無人だったのはともかく、
物が置かれていた形跡すら残っていない。

engChrName: Though, there were plenty of thugs that used to hang around here.
engSearchText:
Though, there were plenty of thugs that used to hang
around here.
jpnChrName: 例の半グレたちがたむろしていた 痕跡ならあったけど。
jpnSearchText:
例の半グレたちがたむろしていた
痕跡ならあったけど。

engChrName: A literal dummy company, huh?
engSearchText: A literal dummy company, huh?
jpnChrName: 文字通りのダミーカンパニーってわけか。
jpnSearchText: 文字通りのダミーカンパニーってわけか。

engChrName: Indeed. However, the fact that even the thugs have left must mean something.
engSearchText:
Indeed. However, the fact that even the thugs have
left must mean something.
jpnChrName: ただ、その半グレたちすら 姿を消しているということは……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、その半グレたちすら
姿を消しているということは……

engChrName: They were likely involved with what happened last night.
engSearchText:
They were likely involved with what happened
last night.
jpnChrName: 昨夜の事件が彼らと関係しているのは ほぼ間違いないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜の事件が彼らと関係しているのは
ほぼ間違いないでしょう。

engChrName: For sure. Even if all the pieces ain't clickin' quite yet.
engSearchText: For sure. Even if all the pieces ain't clickin' quite yet.
jpnChrName: だろうな。 ……納得できない点もあるが。
jpnSearchText:
だろうな。
……納得できない点もあるが。

engChrName: I'm of the same mind.
engSearchText: I'm of the same mind.
