jpnChrName: そうね………
jpnSearchText: そうね………

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 納得できない、とは？
jpnSearchText: 納得できない、とは？

engChrName: What happened to those boys was no fight... It was a slaughter.
engSearchText:
What happened to those boys was no fight... It was
a slaughter.
jpnChrName: ………過剰、すぎるのよ。
jpnSearchText: ………過剰、すぎるのよ。

engChrName: One look at their bodies told the whole story.
engSearchText: One look at their bodies told the whole story.
jpnChrName: 残された遺体の状態、与えられたと 思われる徹底的な暴力が……
jpnSearchText:
残された遺体の状態、与えられたと
思われる徹底的な暴力が……

engChrName: These aren't average thugs that we're dealing with. They seem more like the murderin' type.
engSearchText:
These aren't average thugs that we're dealing with.
They seem more like the murderin' type.
jpnChrName: 半グレどももタチは悪いが 所詮セミプロ──殺しは慣れていない。
jpnSearchText:
半グレどももタチは悪いが
所詮セミプロ──殺しは慣れていない。

engChrName: Whoever tore up those bodies didn't show a lick of restraint.
engSearchText:
Whoever tore up those bodies didn't show a lick
of restraint.
jpnChrName: にも関わらず、昨夜行われた“虐殺”では 一切の手加減もなく暴力が振るわれた。
jpnSearchText:
にも関わらず、昨夜行われた“虐殺”では
一切の手加減もなく暴力が振るわれた。

engChrName: Honestly, I don't know if real Almata goons would be capable of that.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I don't know if real Almata goons would be
capable of that.
jpnChrName: 正式な構成員でもないのに そこまでやれるかっつーことだな？
jpnSearchText:
正式な構成員でもないのに
そこまでやれるかっつーことだな？

engChrName: I concur. Those wounds bother me even more than the mysterious fog that suddenly rolled in.
engSearchText:
I concur. Those wounds bother me even more than
the mysterious fog that suddenly rolled in.
jpnChrName: ええ……不自然な霧も気になるけど そこが何より引っかかる。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……不自然な霧も気になるけど
そこが何より引っかかる。

engChrName: That said, I fear we may see worse bloodshed yet.
engSearchText: That said, I fear we may see worse bloodshed yet.
jpnChrName: この事件── 最悪を更に越えてくるかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
この事件──
最悪を更に越えてくるかもしれないわ。

engChrName: I'm going to investigate another potential lead.
engSearchText: I'm going to investigate another potential lead.
jpnChrName: 私は別の方面も当たってみる。
jpnSearchText: 私は別の方面も当たってみる。

engChrName: If you intend on continuing on this case, please be careful.
engSearchText:
If you intend on continuing on this case, please
be careful.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちも深入りするつもりなら くれぐれも注意してちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちも深入りするつもりなら
くれぐれも注意してちょうだい。

engChrName: The Messeldam Trading Company might not be our only enemies here.
engSearchText:
The Messeldam Trading Company might not be our
only enemies here.
jpnChrName: 敵が《メッセルダム商事》だけとは 限らないわよ。
jpnSearchText:
敵が《メッセルダム商事》だけとは
限らないわよ。

engChrName: Bah. She's got enough to worry about herself.
engSearchText: Bah. She's got enough to worry about herself.
jpnChrName: ったく、気をつけるのは お前も同じだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、気をつけるのは
お前も同じだろうが……

engChrName: I know she's strong, but will she be okay investigating like this?
engSearchText:
I know she's strong, but will she be okay investigating
like this?
jpnChrName: はい…… いくら腕が立つと言っても。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
いくら腕が立つと言っても。

engChrName: Couldn't we work alongside her?
engSearchText: Couldn't we work alongside her?
jpnChrName: その、改めて協力し合った方が いいんじゃないでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
その、改めて協力し合った方が
いいんじゃないでしょうか……？

engChrName: Well, we'll cross that bridge if we come to it.
engSearchText: Well, we'll cross that bridge if we come to it.
jpnChrName: ……ま、必要があればな。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、必要があればな。

engChrName: So, should we go look inside for ourselves?
engSearchText: So, should we go look inside for ourselves?
jpnChrName: えと、わたしたちも 一応中を調べてみますか？
jpnSearchText:
えと、わたしたちも
一応中を調べてみますか？

engChrName: Nah. If she didn't find anything, we won't either.
engSearchText: Nah. If she didn't find anything, we won't either.
jpnChrName: いや、あいつが調べて何もなけりゃあ 時間の無駄ってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、あいつが調べて何もなけりゃあ
時間の無駄ってモンだ。

engChrName: And she would've mentioned it if she found anything about Aaron.
engSearchText:
And she would've mentioned it if she found anything
about Aaron.
jpnChrName: それにどうやらアーロンのヤツも 立ち寄ってなさそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
それにどうやらアーロンのヤツも
立ち寄ってなさそうだしな。

engChrName: I just don't understand where he could have run off to.
engSearchText:
I just don't understand where he could have run
off to.
jpnChrName: はい……一体 どちらに行かれたんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい……一体
どちらに行かれたんでしょう。

engChrName: How is it that even Heiyue doesn't know where he is?
engSearchText: How is it that even Heiyue doesn't know where he is?
jpnChrName: 黒月の皆さんにも 分からないみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
黒月の皆さんにも
分からないみたいですし。

engChrName: Both him and those thugs disappearing at the same time can't be a coincidence.
engSearchText:
Both him and those thugs disappearing at the same
time can't be a coincidence.
jpnChrName: そういえば半グレの人たちも 結局、どこに行ったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば半グレの人たちも
結局、どこに行ったんでしょう？

engChrName: There's no evidence of them leaving the city, right?
engSearchText: There's no evidence of them leaving the city, right?
jpnChrName: ラングポートから出た形跡は 確かまだ無いんでしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートから出た形跡は
確かまだ無いんでしたよね？

engChrName: Nope, but that's an important fact.
engSearchText: Nope, but that's an important fact.
jpnChrName: ああ、そこがポイントだな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そこがポイントだな。

engChrName: Heiyue's got eyes all over this city, but there are still blind spots.
engSearchText:
Heiyue's got eyes all over this city, but there are still
blind spots.
jpnChrName: この街は黒月の目が行き渡ってるが それでもデカイ分、完全じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
この街は黒月の目が行き渡ってるが
それでもデカイ分、完全じゃねえ。

engChrName: I mean, we're talkin' about a city with a population of 550,000, after all—not to mention the naval base.
engSearchText:
I mean, we're talkin' about a city with a population of
550,000, after all—not to mention the naval base.
jpnChrName: なにせ人口５５万の大都市── 巨大な港湾区に海軍の基地もある。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ人口５５万の大都市──
巨大な港湾区に海軍の基地もある。

engChrName: There's no way we can search everywhere top to bottom by ourselves...
engSearchText:
There's no way we can search everywhere top to
bottom by ourselves...
jpnChrName: それらを虱潰しにするわけにも 行かなさそうですね……
jpnSearchText:
それらを虱潰しにするわけにも
行かなさそうですね……

engChrName: I'm sure that's what Heiyue is doin' right now.
engSearchText: I'm sure that's what Heiyue is doin' right now.
jpnChrName: いや、実際黒月の連中は やってる最中だとは思うがな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、実際黒月の連中は
やってる最中だとは思うがな。

engChrName: But we ain't Heiyue, so we gotta think outside the box.
engSearchText:
But we ain't Heiyue, so we gotta think outside
the box.
jpnChrName: ──だが俺たちは《裏解決屋》だ。 せいぜい鼻を働かせないとな。
jpnSearchText:
──だが俺たちは《裏解決屋》だ。
せいぜい鼻を働かせないとな。

engChrName: ...All right. This should work.
engSearchText: ...All right. This should work.
jpnChrName: ……よし、ここが良さそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……よし、ここが良さそうだな。

engChrName: Are you accessing the orbal network?
engSearchText: Are you accessing the orbal network?
jpnChrName: 導力ネット、ですか？
jpnSearchText: 導力ネット、ですか？

engChrName: What are you looking at?
engSearchText: What are you looking at?
jpnChrName: 一体何を……
jpnSearchText: 一体何を……

engChrName: A real estate site.
engSearchText: A real estate site.
jpnChrName: 不動産関連の取り扱いサイトだ。
jpnSearchText: 不動産関連の取り扱いサイトだ。

engChrName: I'm checkin' to see if anything else went down when Almata bought this place.
engSearchText:
I'm checkin' to see if anything else went down when
Almata bought this place.
jpnChrName: 《メッセルダム商事》が入ったのと 同じタイミングでの動きを調べてみる。
jpnSearchText:
《メッセルダム商事》が入ったのと
同じタイミングでの動きを調べてみる。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: ...Real estate? (Is there fake estate, too?)
engSearchText:
...Real estate?
(Is there fake estate, too?)
jpnChrName: ……？　フドウサン？
jpnSearchText: ……？　フドウサン？

engChrName: ...Bingo.
engSearchText: ...Bingo.
jpnChrName: ──あった、コイツだな。
jpnSearchText: ──あった、コイツだな。

engChrName: A huge warehouse at the docks got rented out at almost the exact same time as this office.
engSearchText:
A huge warehouse at the docks got rented out at
almost the exact same time as this office.
jpnChrName: 港湾区にある大規模倉庫の一つが ほぼ同じタイミングで借りられている。
jpnSearchText:
港湾区にある大規模倉庫の一つが
ほぼ同じタイミングで借りられている。

engChrName: Can't see exactly where or who the client is, but I ain't complainin'. We've got ourselves a lead.
engSearchText:
Can't see exactly where or who the client is, but I
ain't complainin'. We've got ourselves a lead.
jpnChrName: 倉庫の場所と借主までは見られねえが、 クク……分かりやすい尻尾を残しやがって。
jpnSearchText:
倉庫の場所と借主までは見られねえが、
クク……分かりやすい尻尾を残しやがって。

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: So essentially, this 'Messeldam Trading Company' is a ruse meant to divert attention from the warehouse...
engSearchText:
So essentially, this 'Messeldam Trading Company' is
a ruse meant to divert attention from the warehouse...
jpnChrName: ──《メッセルダム商事》は 目眩ましの意味でもダミーカンパニー。
jpnSearchText:
──《メッセルダム商事》は
目眩ましの意味でもダミーカンパニー。

engChrName: ...because that is where Almata's anti-Heiyue forces are stationed.
engSearchText:
...because that is where Almata's anti-Heiyue forces
are stationed.
jpnChrName: そちらの倉庫に、半グレの人たちも含めた 対黒月の戦力を整えているわけですね？
jpnSearchText:
そちらの倉庫に、半グレの人たちも含めた
対黒月の戦力を整えているわけですね？

engChrName: Oh! I see!
engSearchText: Oh! I see!
jpnChrName: ……！　なるほど！
jpnSearchText: ……！　なるほど！

engChrName: Spot on. Time to hustle, gang.
engSearchText: Spot on. Time to hustle, gang.
jpnChrName: 正解だ、そんじゃあ行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 正解だ、そんじゃあ行くぞ。

engChrName: Huh? But we don't know where we're going or who rented the facility.
engSearchText:
Huh? But we don't know where we're going or who
rented the facility.
jpnChrName: え……場所や借主は 分からなかったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
え……場所や借主は
分からなかったんですよね？

engChrName: Oh, are we going to ask the realtor who brokered the deal?
engSearchText:
Oh, are we going to ask the realtor who brokered
the deal?
jpnChrName: では不動産業者の方を訪ねるとか？
jpnSearchText: では不動産業者の方を訪ねるとか？

engChrName: Bad idea. If Almata really did rent the place, there's no way the realtor'll blab.
engSearchText:
Bad idea. If Almata really did rent the place, there's
no way the realtor'll blab.
jpnChrName: いや、仮にアルマータが借りてるなら 業者が話すとも思えねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、仮にアルマータが借りてるなら
業者が話すとも思えねぇ。

engChrName: They'd just end up dead. Hell, for all we know, they've already been silenced.
engSearchText:
They'd just end up dead. Hell, for all we know,
they've already been silenced.
jpnChrName: 話したが最後、消されるだろうし、 ……もう消されてるかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
話したが最後、消されるだろうし、
……もう消されてるかもしれねえな。

engChrName: Almata is cruel enough to do something like that.
engSearchText: Almata is cruel enough to do something like that.
jpnChrName: ……いかにもありそうです。
jpnSearchText: ……いかにもありそうです。

engChrName: I got a better plan, anyway. We're headed to the one guy who's got a better nose for this city than me.
engSearchText:
I got a better plan, anyway. We're headed to the one
guy who's got a better nose for this city than me.
jpnChrName: ここから先はこの街で俺以上に 鼻が利くヤツを当たってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ここから先はこの街で俺以上に
鼻が利くヤツを当たってみるぞ。

engChrName: A certain lousy drunk of a gambler with low blood pressure and a partner who might as well have him by a leash.
engSearchText:
A certain lousy drunk of a gambler with low blood
pressure and a partner who might as well have him by
a leash.
jpnChrName: いい歳して年下の相棒に頭が上がらない、 低血圧の自称本業ギャンブラーにな。
jpnSearchText:
いい歳して年下の相棒に頭が上がらない、
低血圧の自称本業ギャンブラーにな。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: ああ……！
jpnSearchText: ああ……！

engChrName: I don't think he'd appreciate that description of himself...
engSearchText:
I don't think he'd appreciate that description
of himself...
jpnChrName: ジャックさん、怒りますよ……
jpnSearchText: ジャックさん、怒りますよ……

engChrName: Who's textin' me?
engSearchText: Who's textin' me?
jpnChrName: 着信か。
jpnSearchText: 着信か。

engChrName: I forgot to tell you where the dummy company's at. I just sent along the info.
engSearchText:
I forgot to tell you where the dummy company's at.
I just sent along the info.
jpnChrName: さっき伝え忘れていたが、 例のダミー会社の場所はここだ。
jpnSearchText:
さっき伝え忘れていたが、
例のダミー会社の場所はここだ。

engChrName: Feel free to scout it out. I wouldn't recommend charging in guns blazing, though.
engSearchText:
Feel free to scout it out. I wouldn't recommend
charging in guns blazing, though.
jpnChrName: 偵察はいいが、無闇に 踏み込んだりはすんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
偵察はいいが、無闇に
踏み込んだりはすんなよ？

engChrName: (So that's where it is.)
engSearchText: (So that's where it is.)
jpnChrName: （ここって……）
jpnSearchText: （ここって……）

engChrName: Is something the matter?
engSearchText: Is something the matter?
jpnChrName: 何かありましたか？
jpnSearchText: 何かありましたか？

engChrName: Nah. Jack just gave me the location of the Messeldam Trading Company.
engSearchText:
Nah. Jack just gave me the location of the Messeldam
Trading Company.
jpnChrName: いや、ジャックの奴からだ。 《メッセルダム商事》の位置情報を伝えにな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ジャックの奴からだ。
《メッセルダム商事》の位置情報を伝えにな。

engChrName: What? We're heading there now?
engSearchText: What? We're heading there now?
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》のダミー会社という……
jpnSearchText: 《Ａ》のダミー会社という……

engChrName: Are we going to blow the door down? I'll prepare the explosives, then!
engSearchText:
Are we going to blow the door down? I'll prepare the
explosives, then!
jpnChrName: 今から乗り込みますか？
jpnSearchText: 今から乗り込みますか？

engChrName: Don't do that. I'd rather not get arrested for arson.
engSearchText: Don't do that. I'd rather not get arrested for arson.
jpnChrName: しねえよ、そんないきなり……
jpnSearchText: しねえよ、そんないきなり……

engChrName: I just wanna take a look at the building.
engSearchText: I just wanna take a look at the building.
jpnChrName: だが気になるのは確かだ。 周りの偵察だけでもしておくべきだな。
jpnSearchText:
だが気になるのは確かだ。
周りの偵察だけでもしておくべきだな。

engChrName: We ain't in any rush, though. The location's on our map apps, so we can check it out after finishing some requests.
engSearchText:
We ain't in any rush, though. The location's on our
map apps, so we can check it out after finishing
some requests.
jpnChrName: まあ急ぐわけでもねえ、地図アプリに場所が追加 されたから、４ｓｐｇ対応の後で行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ急ぐわけでもねえ、地図アプリに場所が追加
されたから、４ｓｐｇ対応の後で行ってみるか。

engChrName: I didn't realize you were here, Ashen.
engSearchText: I didn't realize you were here, Ashen.
jpnChrName: アシェンさん、こんな所にいたんですか。
jpnSearchText: アシェンさん、こんな所にいたんですか。

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys...
engSearchText: Oh, it's you guys...
jpnChrName: 貴方たち……
jpnSearchText: 貴方たち……

engChrName: I'm sorry about earlier. Feels like I sort of pushed everything onto you.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry about earlier. Feels like I sort of pushed
everything onto you.
jpnChrName: さっきはごめんね、 全部押し付けたようになって。
jpnSearchText:
さっきはごめんね、
全部押し付けたようになって。

engChrName: Don't worry about it. If I felt like you were bein' unreasonable, I wouldn't've taken the job.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. If I felt like you were bein'
unreasonable, I wouldn't've taken the job.
jpnChrName: 依頼を受けた身だ、それはいい。 事情があるのも一応分かっているしな。
jpnSearchText:
依頼を受けた身だ、それはいい。
事情があるのも一応分かっているしな。

engChrName: Anyway, I know you guys're probably investigating this whole thing on the down low.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I know you guys're probably investigating
this whole thing on the down low.
jpnChrName: それより、黒月は何か掴んでいないのか？
jpnSearchText: それより、黒月は何か掴んでいないのか？

engChrName: Has Heiyue sniffed out any clues?
engSearchText: Has Heiyue sniffed out any clues?
jpnChrName: 表で動いていなくても、 どうせ水面下で色々と探ってるんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
表で動いていなくても、
どうせ水面下で色々と探ってるんだろ？

engChrName: A few, but nothing that would tell us about Aaron's whereabouts.
engSearchText:
A few, but nothing that would tell us about
Aaron's whereabouts.
jpnChrName: ええ、もちろん。 でもアーロンの居場所は未だに……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、もちろん。
でもアーロンの居場所は未だに……

engChrName: Damn. What about Almata, then?
engSearchText: Damn. What about Almata, then?
jpnChrName: そうか…… アルマータの方は？
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
アルマータの方は？

engChrName: All we know about them is that they haven't made any moves since last night.
engSearchText:
All we know about them is that they haven't made
any moves since last night.
jpnChrName: そっちもどこに潜んでいるか 分からないわね……
jpnSearchText:
そっちもどこに潜んでいるか
分からないわね……

engChrName: We have no idea where they're hiding, unfortunately.
engSearchText: We have no idea where they're hiding, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: 昨夜以降、動きがないのは 確かみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜以降、動きがないのは
確かみたいだけど。

engChrName: Ugh... Where could they be?
engSearchText: Ugh... Where could they be?
jpnChrName: やっぱりそう簡単には行きませんね……
jpnSearchText: やっぱりそう簡単には行きませんね……

engChrName: Dunno. It's possible they aren't even in Langport anymore.
engSearchText:
Dunno. It's possible they aren't even in
Langport anymore.
jpnChrName: どこにいるのかは当然重要だが、 それ以前に、まだいるかどうかだな。
jpnSearchText:
どこにいるのかは当然重要だが、
それ以前に、まだいるかどうかだな。

engChrName: What? You think?
engSearchText: What? You think?
jpnChrName: 確かに……それによっては 方針が変わりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……それによっては
方針が変わりそうですね。

engChrName: Might've bailed so they could get outta Heiyue's reach.
engSearchText:
Might've bailed so they could get outta
Heiyue's reach.
jpnChrName: あれだけのことをやらかした以上、黒月の報復を 避けるために一時煌都を離れる可能性もある。
jpnSearchText:
あれだけのことをやらかした以上、黒月の報復を
避けるために一時煌都を離れる可能性もある。

engChrName: And now that they've stained their hands with civilian blood, the guild's gonna be out to get 'em, too.
engSearchText:
And now that they've stained their hands with civilian
blood, the guild's gonna be out to get 'em, too.
jpnChrName: 民間人に犠牲が出た以上、 ギルドも黙っていないだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
民間人に犠牲が出た以上、
ギルドも黙っていないだろうしな。

engChrName: Do you really think Almata would just back down like that?
engSearchText:
Do you really think Almata would just back down
like that?
jpnChrName: あのアルマータが、このまま 引き下がるなんて事があるんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
あのアルマータが、このまま
引き下がるなんて事があるんでしょうか……

engChrName: Doubtful, but it's not impossible, either.
engSearchText: Doubtful, but it's not impossible, either.
jpnChrName: ま、ないだろうな。 だが可能性としては一応洗った方がいい。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ないだろうな。
だが可能性としては一応洗った方がいい。

engChrName: Actually, I do think it's impossible.
engSearchText: Actually, I do think it's impossible.
jpnChrName: それに関しては掴んでいるわ。
jpnSearchText: それに関しては掴んでいるわ。

engChrName: And I can tell you why, if you'd like.
engSearchText: And I can tell you why, if you'd like.
jpnChrName: いや、そう言うのは語弊があるわね。 掴んではいないけど、答えは知っている。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そう言うのは語弊があるわね。
掴んではいないけど、答えは知っている。

engChrName: By all means!
engSearchText: By all means!
jpnChrName: どういう意味ですか？
jpnSearchText: どういう意味ですか？

engChrName: There have been no sightings of gangsters since last night.
engSearchText:
There have been no sightings of gangsters since
last night.
jpnChrName: あれ以来、半グレたちの目撃情報がない事── それ自体が答えになっているわ。
jpnSearchText:
あれ以来、半グレたちの目撃情報がない事──
それ自体が答えになっているわ。

engChrName: We have eyes on every road leading out of Langport.
engSearchText: We have eyes on every road leading out of Langport.
jpnChrName: ここしばらくは、煌都から外に通じる道路に 全て見張りを付けているのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここしばらくは、煌都から外に通じる道路に
全て見張りを付けているのよ。

engChrName: So if they had escaped, we would know.
engSearchText: So if they had escaped, we would know.
jpnChrName: その彼らも含めて“目撃情報がない” ということは──
jpnSearchText:
その彼らも含めて“目撃情報がない”
ということは──

engChrName: I can guarantee they're still in Langport.
engSearchText: I can guarantee they're still in Langport.
jpnChrName: 半グレたちはラングポートから出ていない。 ほぼ確実にね。
jpnSearchText:
半グレたちはラングポートから出ていない。
ほぼ確実にね。

engChrName: Hard to picture a bunch of lowlife gangsters evading Heiyue's surveillance network.
engSearchText:
Hard to picture a bunch of lowlife gangsters evading
Heiyue's surveillance network.
jpnChrName: ま、黒月の監視網を半グレごときが 潜り抜けられるワケねぇだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、黒月の監視網を半グレごときが
潜り抜けられるワケねぇだろうしな。

engChrName: Well, I guess that settles that.
engSearchText: Well, I guess that settles that.
jpnChrName: そう考えると確かにそうなるわけですか……
jpnSearchText: そう考えると確かにそうなるわけですか……

engChrName: Sorry I can't answer your other questions.
engSearchText: Sorry I can't answer your other questions.
jpnChrName: 大して役に立つ情報じゃないけどね。
jpnSearchText: 大して役に立つ情報じゃないけどね。

engChrName: All good. Having confirmation on that alone is huge for us, so we should be thanking you.
engSearchText:
All good. Having confirmation on that alone is huge
for us, so we should be thanking you.
jpnChrName: いや、これで方針は大分固まりそうだ。
jpnSearchText: いや、これで方針は大分固まりそうだ。

engChrName: Keep us in the loop if anything changes.
engSearchText: Keep us in the loop if anything changes.
jpnChrName: それと、もしアルマータの関係者らしきヤツが 出入りしたら知らせてくれると助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、もしアルマータの関係者らしきヤツが
出入りしたら知らせてくれると助かるぜ。

engChrName: Of course. I'm going to be talking with some other people about this, so hopefully I'll have more to share later.
engSearchText:
Of course. I'm going to be talking with some other
people about this, so hopefully I'll have more to
share later.
jpnChrName: ええ、その辺りは任せてちょうだい。 他の方面からも洗ってみるから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その辺りは任せてちょうだい。
他の方面からも洗ってみるから。

engChrName: I think this is the park that Neil was talking about.
engSearchText: I think this is the park that Neil was talking about.
jpnChrName: ここがニールさんが指定されたという 公園区画ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ここがニールさんが指定されたという
公園区画ですね。

engChrName: Yeah. He was told to put the goods on one of the benches facing the ocean.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He was told to put the goods on one of the
benches facing the ocean.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここの海に面してるベンチに 荷物を置くように言われたんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ここの海に面してるベンチに
荷物を置くように言われたんだったな。

engChrName: All right. It's my time to shine!
engSearchText: All right. It's my time to shine!
jpnChrName: はい……それじゃあそろそろ時間ですし、 行ってきますねっ！
jpnSearchText:
はい……それじゃあそろそろ時間ですし、
行ってきますねっ！

engChrName: We'll be right here if anything happens.
engSearchText: We'll be right here if anything happens.
jpnChrName: 側で見守っていますけど、 どうか気を付けて下さい……！
jpnSearchText:
側で見守っていますけど、
どうか気を付けて下さい……！

engChrName: Be ready for anything, all right?
engSearchText: Be ready for anything, all right?
jpnChrName: トラブルが起きた場合は 臨機応変に対応してくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
トラブルが起きた場合は
臨機応変に対応してくれよ。

engChrName: Understood! Beginning operation!
engSearchText: Understood! Beginning operation!
jpnChrName: はいっ！ それでは作戦開始しますっ──！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！
それでは作戦開始しますっ──！

engChrName: We've got eyes on target.
engSearchText: We've got eyes on target.
jpnChrName: あの人が荷物の引き取り役みたいですね……
jpnSearchText: あの人が荷物の引き取り役みたいですね……

engChrName: What should we do?
engSearchText: What should we do?
jpnChrName: どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: We'll follow at a distance.
engSearchText: We'll follow at a distance.
jpnChrName: もう少し距離を開けてから後をつけるぞ。
jpnSearchText: もう少し距離を開けてから後をつけるぞ。

engChrName: You're Caroline, right? We saw your request.
engSearchText: You're Caroline, right? We saw your request.
jpnChrName: よう、アンタが依頼を出した カロライン夫人か？
jpnSearchText:
よう、アンタが依頼を出した
カロライン夫人か？

engChrName: We're from Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: We're from Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 依頼を受けて来た 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
依頼を受けて来た
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。

engChrName: Oh, perfect! I've been waiting for you all! Shall we depart?
engSearchText:
Oh, perfect! I've been waiting for you all! Shall
we depart?
jpnChrName: まぁ！　待っていたわよ裏解決屋さん！ それじゃあ早速観光案内をお願いして……！
jpnSearchText:
まぁ！　待っていたわよ裏解決屋さん！
それじゃあ早速観光案内をお願いして……！

engChrName: One sec. There's something I'd like to ask you first.
engSearchText: One sec. There's something I'd like to ask you first.
jpnChrName: ちょっと待った。 その前に聞かせて欲しいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと待った。
その前に聞かせて欲しいんだが。

engChrName: Why us?
engSearchText: Why us?
jpnChrName: よりによって、どうして俺達に 観光案内を依頼しようと思ったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
よりによって、どうして俺達に
観光案内を依頼しようと思ったんだ？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: えっ？
jpnSearchText: えっ？

engChrName: I was wondering that, too.
engSearchText: I was wondering that, too.
jpnChrName: そうですね……私達が案内した方が 面白い観光になりそうとの事でしたけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……私達が案内した方が
面白い観光になりそうとの事でしたけど。

engChrName: We're not locals, so I'm not sure if we would be best suited to be your tour guides.
engSearchText:
We're not locals, so I'm not sure if we would be best
suited to be your tour guides.
jpnChrName: 私達は現地の者ではありませんし、 他にもっと適任がいるように思えます……
jpnSearchText:
私達は現地の者ではありませんし、
他にもっと適任がいるように思えます……

engChrName: Yeah. This is my first time in Langport, actually.
engSearchText: Yeah. This is my first time in Langport, actually.
jpnChrName: そうですね、こう言ってはなんですけど わたしもラングポートは初めてですし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、こう言ってはなんですけど
わたしもラングポートは初めてですし。

engChrName: Oh, I know full well that giving tours isn't your primary area of expertise.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know full well that giving tours isn't your
primary area of expertise.
jpnChrName: ええ、観光案内が貴方達の専門分野では ない事は分かってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、観光案内が貴方達の専門分野では
ない事は分かってるわ。

engChrName: But when a local guide told me a skilled spriggan was in town, I just HAD to meet you.
engSearchText:
But when a local guide told me a skilled spriggan was
in town, I just HAD to meet you.
jpnChrName: だけど、現地のガイドさんから聞いちゃったのよ。 凄腕の《裏解決屋》が来てるってね。
jpnSearchText:
だけど、現地のガイドさんから聞いちゃったのよ。
凄腕の《裏解決屋》が来てるってね。

engChrName: It's like you popped right out of a novel!
engSearchText: It's like you popped right out of a novel!
jpnChrName: そんな小説に出て来るような人達がいるなら 是非会ってみたいと思うじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
そんな小説に出て来るような人達がいるなら
是非会ってみたいと思うじゃない！

engChrName: I thought it'd be much more fun to explore the Eastern Quarter with you all than a regular tour guide.
engSearchText:
I thought it'd be much more fun to explore the
Eastern Quarter with you all than a regular
tour guide.
jpnChrName: そのついでに、一緒に東方人街を観光できたら もっと楽しくなるんじゃないかと思ってね！
jpnSearchText:
そのついでに、一緒に東方人街を観光できたら
もっと楽しくなるんじゃないかと思ってね！

engChrName: Not sure how I feel about you coming to us just 'cause we sound more 'fun' than the alternatives.
engSearchText:
Not sure how I feel about you coming to us just 'cause
we sound more 'fun' than the alternatives.
jpnChrName: オイオイ……そんな興味本位で 依頼されちゃ困るんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ……そんな興味本位で
依頼されちゃ困るんだがな。

engChrName: Well, what do you want to do, Van?
engSearchText: Well, what do you want to do, Van?
jpnChrName: あはは……気持ちは分かりますけど。 どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……気持ちは分かりますけど。
どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Not sure. This ain't the kinda work we usually do.
engSearchText: Not sure. This ain't the kinda work we usually do.
jpnChrName: そうだな……正直、俺達の仕事じゃねえが。
jpnSearchText: そうだな……正直、俺達の仕事じゃねえが。

engChrName: (Might be a good way to get familiar with the area, though.)
engSearchText:
(Might be a good way to get familiar with the
area, though.)
jpnChrName: （だが、こいつらに煌都を把握してもらうには   丁度いいかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（だが、こいつらに煌都を把握してもらうには
丁度いいかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (The gig sounds simple enough, too, and the girls may like havin' some downtime.)
engSearchText:
(The gig sounds simple enough, too, and the girls
may like havin' some downtime.)
jpnChrName: （それに、たまの息抜きと思えば   こういうのを受けてやっても悪くねえか……）
jpnSearchText:
（それに、たまの息抜きと思えば
こういうのを受けてやっても悪くねえか……）

engChrName: I'd love to tour the Eastern Quarter with you all.
engSearchText: I'd love to tour the Eastern Quarter with you all.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》の皆さんと一緒に 東方人街を観光したいの。
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋》の皆さんと一緒に
東方人街を観光したいの。

engChrName: Would you mind showing me around?
engSearchText: Would you mind showing me around?
jpnChrName: どうか私に付き合ってくれないかしら？
jpnSearchText: どうか私に付き合ってくれないかしら？

engChrName: (This ain't the kinda work we usually do.)
engSearchText: (This ain't the kinda work we usually do.)
jpnChrName: （正直、俺達の仕事じゃねえが……）
jpnSearchText: （正直、俺達の仕事じゃねえが……）

engChrName: (Might be a good way to get familiar with the area, though.)
engSearchText:
(Might be a good way to get familiar with the
area, though.)
jpnChrName: （こいつらに煌都を把握してもらうには   丁度いいかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつらに煌都を把握してもらうには
丁度いいかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (The gig sounds simple enough, too, and the girls may like havin' some downtime.)
engSearchText:
(The gig sounds simple enough, too, and the girls
may like havin' some downtime.)
jpnChrName: （それに、たまの息抜きと思えば   こういうのを受けてやっても悪くねえか……）
jpnSearchText:
（それに、たまの息抜きと思えば
こういうのを受けてやっても悪くねえか……）

engChrName: Ah, crap. I just remembered I needed to do something.
engSearchText:
Ah, crap. I just remembered I needed to
do something.
jpnChrName: おっと、忘れてたが今は間が悪くてな……
jpnSearchText: おっと、忘れてたが今は間が悪くてな……

engChrName: Could you wait a little longer?
engSearchText: Could you wait a little longer?
jpnChrName: また声をかけるから 少し待っててもらえるか。
jpnSearchText:
また声をかけるから
少し待っててもらえるか。

engChrName: Of course. I'll be here when you're ready.
engSearchText: Of course. I'll be here when you're ready.
jpnChrName: あらそうなの？ 分かったわ、絶対にまた来てちょうだいね！
jpnSearchText:
あらそうなの？
分かったわ、絶対にまた来てちょうだいね！

engChrName: All right. This is different from the requests we normally take, but we'll make an exception for you.
engSearchText:
All right. This is different from the requests we
normally take, but we'll make an exception for you.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえな……普段の依頼とは毛色は違うが 請け負う事にするか。
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえな……普段の依頼とは毛色は違うが
請け負う事にするか。

engChrName: Wonderful! Thank you so much! Today is going to be a lovely day!
engSearchText:
Wonderful! Thank you so much! Today is going to be
a lovely day!
jpnChrName: うふふっ、ありがとう！ これで楽しい一日になりそうだわ！
jpnSearchText:
うふふっ、ありがとう！
これで楽しい一日になりそうだわ！

engChrName: Yes! Now I'll get to tour Langport, too!
engSearchText: Yes! Now I'll get to tour Langport, too!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、わたしもラングポートを 観光できちゃいますねっ！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、わたしもラングポートを
観光できちゃいますねっ！

engChrName: (I'm surprised. I thought he would turn this request down for sure.)
engSearchText:
(I'm surprised. I thought he would turn this request
down for sure.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、てっきり断わってしまうのかと   思ってましたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、てっきり断わってしまうのかと
思ってましたけど……）

engChrName: Shall we head to the Eastern Quarter, then?
engSearchText: Shall we head to the Eastern Quarter, then?
jpnChrName: それなら早速、東方人街に向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それなら早速、東方人街に向かいましょうか。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's bounce.
engSearchText: Yeah. Let's bounce.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここから少し歩いた先に 東方人街のメインストリートがある。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ここから少し歩いた先に
東方人街のメインストリートがある。

engChrName: We'll decide on where to go once we get there.
engSearchText: We'll decide on where to go once we get there.
jpnChrName: どこを見て回るかは 向こうについてから決めさせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
どこを見て回るかは
向こうについてから決めさせてくれ。

engChrName: Very well, then. I'll leave the tour plan to you.
engSearchText: Very well, then. I'll leave the tour plan to you.
jpnChrName: ええ、観光プランはお任せするわ。 それじゃあよろしくお願いするわね！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、観光プランはお任せするわ。
それじゃあよろしくお願いするわね！

engChrName: Quest In a Foreign Land started!
engSearchText: Quest In a Foreign Land started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【東方人街の観光案内】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>東方人街の観光案内<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Caroline is now accompanying the party.
engSearchText: Caroline is now accompanying the party.
jpnChrName: カロライン夫人が同行者になった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カロライン夫人が同行者になった。

engChrName: Are you our client? You're Mr. Wang, right?
engSearchText: Are you our client? You're Mr. Wang, right?
jpnChrName: 依頼者のワン爺さんですね？
jpnSearchText: 依頼者のワン爺さんですね？

engChrName: Oh, hello there! So you're the spriggan from the capital, eh?
engSearchText:
Oh, hello there! So you're the spriggan from the
capital, eh?
jpnChrName: おお来たか、裏解決屋とやら。
jpnSearchText: おお来たか、裏解決屋とやら。

engChrName: I'm in dire need of a trained martial artist, and I heard you would fit the bill.
engSearchText:
I'm in dire need of a trained martial artist, and I heard
you would fit the bill.
jpnChrName: うむ……武術の心得があると聞いたが、 意外と華奢な体つきのようじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ……武術の心得があると聞いたが、
意外と華奢な体つきのようじゃな。

engChrName: Although, you're not quite what I had pictured in my head.
engSearchText:
Although, you're not quite what I had pictured in
my head.
jpnChrName: それとも最近のおなごは何か 特別な修行法でもあるのかい？
jpnSearchText:
それとも最近のおなごは何か
特別な修行法でもあるのかい？

engChrName: Umm... I'm not a spriggan, actually.
engSearchText: Umm... I'm not a spriggan, actually.
jpnChrName: い、いえ、私ではなく……
jpnSearchText: い、いえ、私ではなく……

engChrName: That'd be me. I was a student of the Kunlun school.
engSearchText: That'd be me. I was a student of the Kunlun school.
jpnChrName: こっちだ、爺さん。 一応《崑崙流》を修めてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちだ、爺さん。
一応《崑崙流》を修めてるぜ。

engChrName: Ah, yes. That makes more sense.
engSearchText: Ah, yes. That makes more sense.
jpnChrName: うむうむ、確かによく 鍛えられてるみたいじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
うむうむ、確かによく
鍛えられてるみたいじゃな。

engChrName: I feel like I've heard of Kunlun before...
engSearchText: I feel like I've heard of Kunlun before...
jpnChrName: 《崑崙（コンロン）流》…… どこかで聞いたことがあるような。
jpnSearchText:
《崑崙（コンロン）流》……
どこかで聞いたことがあるような。

engChrName: Well, that explains why Van moves so much like a martial artist.
engSearchText:
Well, that explains why Van moves so much like a
martial artist.
jpnChrName: しかし道理で、ヴァンさんの動きから 武術の型っぽさを感じるわけですね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし道理で、ヴァンさんの動きから
武術の型っぽさを感じるわけですね。

engChrName: I knew he must've had some kind of combat training, but I didn't know what kind.
engSearchText:
I knew he must've had some kind of combat training,
but I didn't know what kind.
jpnChrName: 確かに、何かしら心得が あるんだろうなとは思っていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
確かに、何かしら心得が
あるんだろうなとは思っていましたが……

engChrName: And that's not the only kinda training I've gotten.
engSearchText: And that's not the only kinda training I've gotten.
jpnChrName: ま、俺の場合はそれだけじゃねえがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、俺の場合はそれだけじゃねえがな。

engChrName: In any case, I can tell you've had plenty of real world experience. Even at this very moment, you aren't leaving any openings.
engSearchText:
In any case, I can tell you've had plenty of real
world experience. Even at this very moment, you
aren't leaving any openings.
jpnChrName: 自然体でも隙を伺わせない立ち姿── 実戦もかなり経験しているようじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
自然体でも隙を伺わせない立ち姿──
実戦もかなり経験しているようじゃな。

engChrName: You must have seen a great many battles.
engSearchText: You must have seen a great many battles.
jpnChrName: さぞかし多くの修羅場を潜って来たのじゃろう。
jpnSearchText: さぞかし多くの修羅場を潜って来たのじゃろう。

engChrName: Whoa. You can tell all that just from a glance?
engSearchText: Whoa. You can tell all that just from a glance?
jpnChrName: すごい、一目見ただけでそこまで……！
jpnSearchText: すごい、一目見ただけでそこまで……！

engChrName: Heavens no. I made that all up. Hohoho!
engSearchText: Heavens no. I made that all up. Hohoho!
jpnChrName: なんて、適当に言っただけなんじゃがな！ ホッホッホッ！
jpnSearchText:
なんて、適当に言っただけなんじゃがな！
ホッホッホッ！

engChrName: Very funny. So you wanna give me the job details or what?
engSearchText:
Very funny. So you wanna give me the job details
or what?
jpnChrName: とにかく依頼の内容を聞かせてくれ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく依頼の内容を聞かせてくれ。

engChrName: Of course, of course. I'd like you to do some martial arts instruction in my stead.
engSearchText:
Of course, of course. I'd like you to do some martial
arts instruction in my stead.
jpnChrName: そうじゃったな、実は儂の代わりに 少し武芸の指導をやってほしいのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
そうじゃったな、実は儂の代わりに
少し武芸の指導をやってほしいのじゃ。

engChrName: The moves will be simple enough, I promise. Could you help me out?
engSearchText:
The moves will be simple enough, I promise.
Could you help me out?
jpnChrName: そう難しいことはしなくていい、 受けてくれるかのう？
jpnSearchText:
そう難しいことはしなくていい、
受けてくれるかのう？

engChrName: I'd like you to do some martial arts instruction in my stead.
engSearchText:
I'd like you to do some martial arts instruction in
my stead.
jpnChrName: 儂の代わりに 少し武芸の指導をやってほしいのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
儂の代わりに
少し武芸の指導をやってほしいのじゃ。

engChrName: The moves will be simple enough, I promise. Could you help me out?
engSearchText:
The moves will be simple enough, I promise.
Could you help me out?
jpnChrName: そう難しいことはしなくていい、 受けてくれるかのう？
jpnSearchText:
そう難しいことはしなくていい、
受けてくれるかのう？

engChrName: Won't that mean we gotta do some prep beforehand?
engSearchText: Won't that mean we gotta do some prep beforehand?
jpnChrName: つっても人に指導するからには 相応な準備が必要だろう。
jpnSearchText:
つっても人に指導するからには
相応な準備が必要だろう。

engChrName: Sorry, but we're up to our ears in work right now. Mind if I come back when our load's a bit lighter?
engSearchText:
Sorry, but we're up to our ears in work right now.
Mind if I come back when our load's a bit lighter?
jpnChrName: 悪いが予定も立て込んでるし、 少し考えさせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いが予定も立て込んでるし、
少し考えさせてくれ。

engChrName: That's fine by me.
engSearchText: That's fine by me.
jpnChrName: 仕方ないか、突然じゃったしな。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ないか、突然じゃったしな。

engChrName: Let me know if you have some time later.
engSearchText: Let me know if you have some time later.
jpnChrName: もしやる気になったら、 また儂の所に来てくれ。
jpnSearchText:
もしやる気になったら、
また儂の所に来てくれ。

engChrName: Sure, I'm down.
engSearchText: Sure, I'm down.
jpnChrName: ああ、いいぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、いいぜ。

engChrName: So what kind of instruction do you do?
engSearchText: So what kind of instruction do you do?
jpnChrName: さっきの言い方だと、いつもは 爺さんが指導しているんだな？
jpnSearchText:
さっきの言い方だと、いつもは
爺さんが指導しているんだな？

engChrName: I teach a hybrid style called Tai Shin—which I created. It combines twenty-four techniques from the three major schools of Eastern martial arts.
engSearchText:
I teach a hybrid style called Tai Shin—which
I created. It combines twenty-four techniques from
the three major schools of Eastern martial arts.
jpnChrName: その通り、儂が東方武術の三大流派から ２４の型を選びまとめた《二十四式太心拳》をな。
jpnSearchText:
その通り、儂が東方武術の三大流派から
２４の型を選びまとめた《二十四式太心拳》をな。

engChrName: What? You created a whole martial arts style?
engSearchText: What? You created a whole martial arts style?
jpnChrName: 三大流派から選りすぐりの技を 集めた拳法なんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
三大流派から選りすぐりの技を
集めた拳法なんですか！？

engChrName: That's SO cool!
engSearchText: That's SO cool!
jpnChrName: なんだかすごそうです！
jpnSearchText: なんだかすごそうです！

engChrName: Oh, it's not that impressive. I just picked out a handful of simple techniques that are easy to learn.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's not that impressive. I just picked out a
handful of simple techniques that are easy to learn.
jpnChrName: ホッホッホ、そんな大層なもんじゃないさ。 むしろ学びやすさを基準に選んでいるからのう。
jpnSearchText:
ホッホッホ、そんな大層なもんじゃないさ。
むしろ学びやすさを基準に選んでいるからのう。

engChrName: I only made it to teach self-defense to others—and for exercise.
engSearchText:
I only made it to teach self-defense to others—and
for exercise.
jpnChrName: 武術を極めるための拳法ではなく、どちらかというと 護身術と健康体操を合わせたようなもんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
武術を極めるための拳法ではなく、どちらかというと
護身術と健康体操を合わせたようなもんじゃ。

engChrName: I think that's very admirable of you.
engSearchText: I think that's very admirable of you.
jpnChrName: 護身と健康のため、ですか…… すごくいいと思います！
jpnSearchText:
護身と健康のため、ですか……
すごくいいと思います！

engChrName: Hold on. Tai Shin's been around forever. I know for a fact that you didn't make it yourself.
engSearchText:
Hold on. Tai Shin's been around forever. I know for a
fact that you didn't make it yourself.
jpnChrName: ──待て待て、内容は間違ってねえが 《二十四式太心拳》自体、昔からあるモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
──待て待て、内容は間違ってねえが
《二十四式太心拳》自体、昔からあるモンだ。

engChrName: Stealin' credit ain't cool.
engSearchText: Stealin' credit ain't cool.
jpnChrName: 勝手に自分の手柄にするんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: 勝手に自分の手柄にするんじゃねえ。

engChrName: Hohoho. I suppose I can't pull the wool over a Kunlun student's eyes!
engSearchText:
Hohoho. I suppose I can't pull the wool over a
Kunlun student's eyes!
jpnChrName: ホッホッホッ！ 《崑崙流》の門下となればバレてしまうか。
jpnSearchText:
ホッホッホッ！
《崑崙流》の門下となればバレてしまうか。

engChrName: Those unaccustomed to our ways are so easily deceived.
engSearchText:
Those unaccustomed to our ways are so
easily deceived.
jpnChrName: 初心者にこう話すと効果絶大でな。 若い子がチヤホヤしてくれるんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
初心者にこう話すと効果絶大でな。
若い子がチヤホヤしてくれるんじゃよ。

engChrName: H-He sure likes his tall tales, doesn't he?
engSearchText: H-He sure likes his tall tales, doesn't he?
jpnChrName: そ、そういう事だったんですね……
jpnSearchText: そ、そういう事だったんですね……

engChrName: Grr... Fool me once, shame on you—fool me twice, shame on me...
engSearchText:
Grr... Fool me once, shame on you—fool me twice,
shame on me...
jpnChrName: むう、すっかり騙されちゃいました……
jpnSearchText: むう、すっかり騙されちゃいました……

engChrName: Okay, back to business. Why do you need someone to fill in for you?
engSearchText:
Okay, back to business. Why do you need someone to
fill in for you?
jpnChrName: んで、話を戻すが…… なんで代理が必要になったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
んで、話を戻すが……
なんで代理が必要になったんだ？

engChrName: Well, you see, I sort of threw out my back yesterday.
engSearchText: Well, you see, I sort of threw out my back yesterday.
jpnChrName: それがのう、実は昨日 うっかり腰を痛めたのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
それがのう、実は昨日
うっかり腰を痛めたのじゃ。

engChrName: I can walk around just fine, but doing any kind of sudden movement is a backbreaking endeavor.
engSearchText:
I can walk around just fine, but doing any kind of
sudden movement is a backbreaking endeavor.
jpnChrName: こうして普通に歩くくらいは問題ないんじゃが、 激しく動くと、こうズギーンと痛むのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
こうして普通に歩くくらいは問題ないんじゃが、
激しく動くと、こうズギーンと痛むのじゃ。

engChrName: Get it?! Backbreaking! Ahahaha!
engSearchText: Get it?! Backbreaking! Ahahaha!
jpnChrName: 分かるかのう？　ズギーンっと。
jpnSearchText: 分かるかのう？　ズギーンっと。

engChrName: Careful not to split your sides over your own 'jokes.'
engSearchText: Careful not to split your sides over your own 'jokes.'
jpnChrName: いや分からんが……
jpnSearchText: いや分からんが……

engChrName: I never thought a real martial artist could throw out their back. Don't you guys train your bodies daily?
engSearchText:
I never thought a real martial artist could throw out
their back. Don't you guys train your bodies daily?
jpnChrName: お爺さん元気そうに見えて、拳法もやっているのに、 それでも腰を痛めたのですか？
jpnSearchText:
お爺さん元気そうに見えて、拳法もやっているのに、
それでも腰を痛めたのですか？

engChrName: Alas, old age comes for us all, young lady. I hurt my back while on the waves.
engSearchText:
Alas, old age comes for us all, young lady. I hurt my
back while on the waves.
jpnChrName: 歳には敵わんからのう。 昨日サーフィンをやっていた時のことじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
歳には敵わんからのう。
昨日サーフィンをやっていた時のことじゃ。

engChrName: Huh? What were you doing on the waves?
engSearchText: Huh? What were you doing on the waves?
jpnChrName: さーふぃん？
jpnSearchText: さーふぃん？

engChrName: Are you kiddin' me? You were surfing?
engSearchText: Are you kiddin' me? You were surfing?
jpnChrName: マジかよ爺さん……
jpnSearchText: マジかよ爺さん……

engChrName: Of course. I hear all the youngins are doing it these days, and I'm always hip and with it.
engSearchText:
Of course. I hear all the youngins are doing it these
days, and I'm always hip and with it.
jpnChrName: ボードに立って波に乗ることじゃ。 最近の若者の中では流行っていると思うのじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
ボードに立って波に乗ることじゃ。
最近の若者の中では流行っていると思うのじゃが……

engChrName: I was faced with the biggest wave of the year. My very life was in peril—but my surfer pride was on the line.
engSearchText:
I was faced with the biggest wave of the year. My very
life was in peril—but my surfer pride was on the line.
jpnChrName: 昨日のあれは今年一番の大波かもしれん。 危険じゃが男として挑まなきゃならんのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日のあれは今年一番の大波かもしれん。
危険じゃが男として挑まなきゃならんのじゃ。

engChrName: Thus I confronted it head on. I was locked in a fierce war of attrition—a battle of wills and wits between man and wave!
engSearchText:
Thus I confronted it head on. I was locked in a fierce
war of attrition—a battle of wills and wits between
man and wave!
jpnChrName: あれは言わば波と儂、自然と人間の戦いじゃった。 いや、存在意義を賭けた戦争といってもいい！
jpnSearchText:
あれは言わば波と儂、自然と人間の戦いじゃった。
いや、存在意義を賭けた戦争といってもいい！

engChrName: Uh-huh...
engSearchText: Uh-huh...
jpnChrName: 波の存在意義ってなんでしょう……
jpnSearchText: 波の存在意義ってなんでしょう……

engChrName: And I emerged triumphant—so to celebrate my hard-earned victory, I did a 360-degree spin in the air!
engSearchText:
And I emerged triumphant—so to celebrate my
hard-earned victory, I did a 360-degree spin in
the air!
jpnChrName: 最後の最後で、儂はついにあの大波を乗りこなし、 そして見事に３６０度回転（スリーシックスティー）を決めた！
jpnSearchText:
最後の最後で、儂はついにあの大波を乗りこなし、
そして見事に３６０度回転（スリーシックスティー）を決めた！

engChrName: You did WHAT?!
engSearchText: You did WHAT?!
jpnChrName: うおお～！
jpnSearchText: うおお～！

engChrName: In that moment, I saw the light. It felt like everything came into focus.
engSearchText:
In that moment, I saw the light. It felt like everything
came into focus.
jpnChrName: あの一瞬で、光が見えた。 儂の全てが昇華されたように感じたのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
あの一瞬で、光が見えた。
儂の全てが昇華されたように感じたのじゃ。

engChrName: Visions of my long life—the peaks, the valleys, and everything in between—flooded my senses like a gushing waterfall.
engSearchText:
Visions of my long life—the peaks, the valleys, and
everything in between—flooded my senses like a
gushing waterfall.
jpnChrName: この長い人生の、良き事も、 悲しきことも、すべてな。
jpnSearchText:
この長い人生の、良き事も、
悲しきことも、すべてな。

engChrName: And after that...
engSearchText: And after that...
jpnChrName: そして──
jpnSearchText: そして──

engChrName: Yes...?
engSearchText: Yes...?
jpnChrName: そして……？
jpnSearchText: そして……？

engChrName: I fell into the water and hurt my back.
engSearchText: I fell into the water and hurt my back.
jpnChrName: 落水して腰を痛めたのじゃ。
jpnSearchText: 落水して腰を痛めたのじゃ。

engChrName: It sounds like your life flashed before your eyes.
engSearchText: It sounds like your life flashed before your eyes.
jpnChrName: 見えたのは走馬灯というものなのでは……
jpnSearchText: 見えたのは走馬灯というものなのでは……

engChrName: You're lucky you got back to the coast in one piece.
engSearchText: You're lucky you got back to the coast in one piece.
jpnChrName: つーかよくその状態で 無事に岸に戻れたもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
つーかよくその状態で
無事に岸に戻れたもんだな。

engChrName: Indeed. A boat just so happened to be passing by.
engSearchText: Indeed. A boat just so happened to be passing by.
jpnChrName: ちょうど通りすがった導力ボートに 助けてもらったからのう。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど通りすがった導力ボートに
助けてもらったからのう。

engChrName: And that's why I can't do any instruction today.
engSearchText: And that's why I can't do any instruction today.
jpnChrName: とにかくそういうわけで、 今日の儂には武芸の指導は無理じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくそういうわけで、
今日の儂には武芸の指導は無理じゃ。

engChrName: I'm so sorry that all happened.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry that all happened.
jpnChrName: なんと言いますか……
jpnSearchText: なんと言いますか……

engChrName: Hope you get better soon, man.
engSearchText: Hope you get better soon, man.
jpnChrName: ま、お大事に。
jpnSearchText: ま、お大事に。

engChrName: So, will you take my place?
engSearchText: So, will you take my place?
jpnChrName: 改めて、裏解決屋とやら、 儂の代理を頼んでいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
改めて、裏解決屋とやら、
儂の代理を頼んでいいんだな？

engChrName: Like I said earlier, I'm down.
engSearchText: Like I said earlier, I'm down.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せてくれ。

engChrName: I'm not a full-fledged master or anything, but I can handle some self-defense instructing.
engSearchText:
I'm not a full-fledged master or anything, but I can
handle some self-defense instructing.
jpnChrName: 免許皆伝をもらったわけじゃねえが、 護身術程度なら構わねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
免許皆伝をもらったわけじゃねえが、
護身術程度なら構わねぇだろ。

engChrName: Fantastic.
engSearchText: Fantastic.
jpnChrName: ホッホッホ、それは良かった。
jpnSearchText: ホッホッホ、それは良かった。

engChrName: My lesson plan for today was five forms in total: two Kunlun forms, two Gekka forms, and one Taito form.
engSearchText:
My lesson plan for today was five forms in total: two
Kunlun forms, two Gekka forms, and one
Taito form.
jpnChrName: 今日伝授する予定の型は全部で５つ。 ２つが崑崙、２つが月華、１つが泰斗流じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
今日伝授する予定の型は全部で５つ。
２つが崑崙、２つが月華、１つが泰斗流じゃ。

engChrName: Oh. Well, I don't know jack about Gekka or Taito, so I'm not sure I can help you there.
engSearchText:
Oh. Well, I don't know jack about Gekka or Taito, so
I'm not sure I can help you there.
jpnChrName: そういう構成か……しかし崑崙はともかく、 月華流と泰斗流の型はさすがに教えられねえぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そういう構成か……しかし崑崙はともかく、
月華流と泰斗流の型はさすがに教えられねえぜ？

engChrName: Then why don't you enlist the aid of the Bracer Guild? One of its members here is intimately familiar with the Gekka style.
engSearchText:
Then why don't you enlist the aid of the
Bracer Guild? One of its members here is intimately
familiar with the Gekka style.
jpnChrName: そう言えばラングポートのギルドには 月華本流の教えを受けた遊撃士がいるようじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えばラングポートのギルドには
月華本流の教えを受けた遊撃士がいるようじゃ。

engChrName: I'm sure she would be happy to help out.
engSearchText: I'm sure she would be happy to help out.
jpnChrName: そやつを連れて来ればなんとかなるじゃろう。
jpnSearchText: そやつを連れて来ればなんとかなるじゃろう。

engChrName: Then why'd you even bother asking for my help...? Well, the contract's signed, so no backing out...
engSearchText:
Then why'd you even bother asking for my help...?
Well, the contract's signed, so no backing out...
jpnChrName: それなら最初からギルドに依頼しろよ…… 引き受けた以上はやってやるが。
jpnSearchText:
それなら最初からギルドに依頼しろよ……
引き受けた以上はやってやるが。

engChrName: Thank you very much.
engSearchText: Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: ホッホ、では頼んだぞ。
jpnSearchText: ホッホ、では頼んだぞ。

engChrName: Quest Substitute Sensei started!
engSearchText: Quest Substitute Sensei started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【健やかなる武芸指導】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>健やかなる武芸指導<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, you're that spriggan guy, aren't you?
engSearchText: Hmm? Oh, you're that spriggan guy, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ん……あんたが解決屋ね？ フン、なかなかクセのある面構えね。
jpnSearchText:
ん……あんたが解決屋ね？
フン、なかなかクセのある面構えね。

engChrName: I see you've got some civilians with you...
engSearchText: I see you've got some civilians with you...
jpnChrName: 一般人っぽい子も連れているようだけど……
jpnSearchText: 一般人っぽい子も連れているようだけど……

engChrName: My name's Xiaoling. I'm from the Gekka school.
engSearchText: My name's Xiaoling. I'm from the Gekka school.
jpnChrName: まあいい、あたしは月華流のシャオリン。 せいぜい頼りにするが良いよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、あたしは月華流のシャオリン。
せいぜい頼りにするが良いよ。

engChrName: Oh, right. That's the school Aaron's a part of.
engSearchText: Oh, right. That's the school Aaron's a part of.
jpnChrName: “月華”というと確かラングポートで 特に盛んな東方の拳法ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
“月華”というと確かラングポートで
特に盛んな東方の拳法ですよね？

engChrName: Yup. Like Ashen said earlier, it's one of the big three martial arts schools in the East.
engSearchText:
Yup. Like Ashen said earlier, it's one of the big three
martial arts schools in the East.
jpnChrName: ああ、さっきの爺さんと話した時は流したが “東方三大拳法”の代表格ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、さっきの爺さんと話した時は流したが
“東方三大拳法”の代表格ってヤツだ。

engChrName: And there's a lot of Gekka practitioners in Heiyue, too.
engSearchText:
And there's a lot of Gekka practitioners in
Heiyue, too.
jpnChrName: 黒月の構成員も月華の使い手が多いが……
jpnSearchText: 黒月の構成員も月華の使い手が多いが……

engChrName: Yeah. Much to my chagrin.
engSearchText: Yeah. Much to my chagrin.
jpnChrName: まあ、それなりの道場でも黒月系列の 連中が多いのは認めざるをえないね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それなりの道場でも黒月系列の
連中が多いのは認めざるをえないね。

engChrName: Members of our school are supposed to reject violence, not embrace it. It's one of the core principles of Gekka.
engSearchText:
Members of our school are supposed to reject
violence, not embrace it. It's one of the core principles
of Gekka.
jpnChrName: けど、月華の真髄は暴力に非ず。
jpnSearchText: けど、月華の真髄は暴力に非ず。

engChrName: That's why I have to set a good example. If a member of the head family indulges in violence, then others will follow suit.
engSearchText:
That's why I have to set a good example. If a member
of the head family indulges in violence, then others
will follow suit.
jpnChrName: その本家筋の人間として、そして遊撃士として あたしがそれを証明してみせるね！
jpnSearchText:
その本家筋の人間として、そして遊撃士として
あたしがそれを証明してみせるね！

engChrName: Oh, you're part of the school's head family?
engSearchText: Oh, you're part of the school's head family?
jpnChrName: へえ、教えを受けたどころか 月華流の本家筋そのものだったのか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、教えを受けたどころか
月華流の本家筋そのものだったのか。

engChrName: Must be hard to stand your ground on that when Heiyue's always throwing its weight around.
engSearchText:
Must be hard to stand your ground on that when
Heiyue's always throwing its weight around.
jpnChrName: 黒月が幅を利かせてる街で 一本筋を通すのは並大抵じゃねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
黒月が幅を利かせてる街で
一本筋を通すのは並大抵じゃねえだろうが。

engChrName: I think it's awesome that you're sticking to your guns! You're amazing!
engSearchText:
I think it's awesome that you're sticking to your guns!
You're amazing!
jpnChrName: はいっ、ちょっと驚いちゃいました！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、ちょっと驚いちゃいました！

engChrName: Y-You really think so? Well, thank you.
engSearchText: Y-You really think so? Well, thank you.
jpnChrName: そ、そう？　……まああんたたちも 踏まえていれば、無下にはしないよ。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そう？　……まああんたたちも
踏まえていれば、無下にはしないよ。

engChrName: It's important to keep your feet planted in this city, especially when things are on edge.
engSearchText:
It's important to keep your feet planted in this city,
especially when things are on edge.
jpnChrName: 特に今の時期、荒れそうな予兆もある。 身の振り方には気をつける事ね。
jpnSearchText:
特に今の時期、荒れそうな予兆もある。
身の振り方には気をつける事ね。

engChrName: By the way, you got a sec?
engSearchText: By the way, you got a sec?
jpnChrName: ところで──少しいいか？
jpnSearchText: ところで──少しいいか？

engChrName: Hey, got a sec?
engSearchText: Hey, got a sec?
jpnChrName: ──少しいいか？
jpnSearchText: ──少しいいか？

engChrName: Sure, what's up?
engSearchText: Sure, what's up?
jpnChrName: 一体どうしたね？
jpnSearchText: 一体どうしたね？

engChrName: We're in the middle of a job right now, and we could use a hand.
engSearchText:
We're in the middle of a job right now, and we could
use a hand.
jpnChrName: 実は今、ある依頼を受けていてな。 武芸の指導をすることになったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
実は今、ある依頼を受けていてな。
武芸の指導をすることになったんだが……

engChrName: Gonna teach people some martial arts. Wanna join?
engSearchText: Gonna teach people some martial arts. Wanna join?
jpnChrName: アンタも協力してくれないか？
jpnSearchText: アンタも協力してくれないか？

engChrName: What? Why would I help you with one of your requests?
engSearchText:
What? Why would I help you with one of
your requests?
jpnChrName: どうしてあたしが… 貴方たちが受けた依頼だよね？
jpnSearchText:
どうしてあたしが…
貴方たちが受けた依頼だよね？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: そうなりますよね……
jpnSearchText: そうなりますよね……

engChrName: I mean, you don't have to if you don't want to.
engSearchText: I mean, you don't have to if you don't want to.
jpnChrName: まあ、どうしてもってわけじゃねえさ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、どうしてもってわけじゃねえさ。

engChrName: We need someone from the Gekka school, but if you're not feelin' it, I'll just hit up some other contacts.
engSearchText:
We need someone from the Gekka school, but if
you're not feelin' it, I'll just hit up some
other contacts.
jpnChrName: 必要なのは月華流の使い手── アンタが嫌なら他のツテを当たるまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
必要なのは月華流の使い手──
アンタが嫌なら他のツテを当たるまでだ。

engChrName: Peace.
engSearchText: Peace.
jpnChrName: じゃあな。
jpnSearchText: じゃあな。

engChrName: Hey, wait!
engSearchText: Hey, wait!
jpnChrName: ちょっと待つね……！
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待つね……！

engChrName: What do you mean by 'other contacts'?
engSearchText: What do you mean by 'other contacts'?
jpnChrName: ……他のツテって？
jpnSearchText: ……他のツテって？

engChrName: Heiyue. Duh.
engSearchText: Heiyue. Duh.
jpnChrName: そりゃあ決まってるだろ、 ──黒月だ。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ決まってるだろ、
──黒月だ。

engChrName: Most of them know Gekka skills like the back of their hands.
engSearchText:
Most of them know Gekka skills like the back of
their hands.
jpnChrName: 黒月の構成員はほとんど 月華流を修めてる。
jpnSearchText:
黒月の構成員はほとんど
月華流を修めてる。

engChrName: The Gekka name is practically synonymous with Heiyue these days.
engSearchText:
The Gekka name is practically synonymous with
Heiyue these days.
jpnChrName: 今じゃ月華流と言えば 黒月の代名詞みたいなもんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
今じゃ月華流と言えば
黒月の代名詞みたいなもんだろ。

engChrName: Bet people'll be thrilled to learn from the real pros.
engSearchText: Bet people'll be thrilled to learn from the real pros.
jpnChrName: だからそいつらが指導した方が 受ける側も喜ぶんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
だからそいつらが指導した方が
受ける側も喜ぶんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: And you don't have to waste any of your precious time, so everyone's happy.
engSearchText:
And you don't have to waste any of your precious
time, so everyone's happy.
jpnChrName: ギルドの手を煩わせることもねえし、 万々歳だ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの手を煩わせることもねえし、
万々歳だ。

engChrName: All righty. Catch you on the flip side—
engSearchText: All righty. Catch you on the flip side—
jpnChrName: つうわけで俺たちは──
jpnSearchText: つうわけで俺たちは──

engChrName: I'll do it.
engSearchText: I'll do it.
jpnChrName: やるよ。
jpnSearchText: やるよ。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: え？
jpnSearchText: え？

engChrName: I said I'll do it. I'm going to help whether you like it or not.
engSearchText:
I said I'll do it. I'm going to help whether you like it
or not.
jpnChrName: だからあたしが指導に 協力してあげるって言ってるね。
jpnSearchText:
だからあたしが指導に
協力してあげるって言ってるね。

engChrName: Are you sure?
engSearchText: Are you sure?
jpnChrName: いいんですか？
jpnSearchText: いいんですか？

engChrName: Yes. I know that people associate Gekka with Heiyue nowadays...
engSearchText:
Yes. I know that people associate Gekka with
Heiyue nowadays...
jpnChrName: 確かに今は黒月が月華流の 代表みたいになってるけど……
jpnSearchText:
確かに今は黒月が月華流の
代表みたいになってるけど……

engChrName: ...but they don't follow the main school's teachings.
engSearchText: ...but they don't follow the main school's teachings.
jpnChrName: 別にあいつらが本流ってわけじゃないね。
jpnSearchText: 別にあいつらが本流ってわけじゃないね。

engChrName: I'm a student of the original school, so it's my duty to spread the true Gekka style across the world.
engSearchText:
I'm a student of the original school, so it's my duty to
spread the true Gekka style across the world.
jpnChrName: 本来の月華をもっと世に広めるためにも、 本流に属するあたしがなんとか頑張らないと。
jpnSearchText:
本来の月華をもっと世に広めるためにも、
本流に属するあたしがなんとか頑張らないと。

engChrName: Is that right?
engSearchText: Is that right?
jpnChrName: ハッ、そうかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そうかよ。

engChrName: Well, glad to have you on board.
engSearchText: Well, glad to have you on board.
jpnChrName: 理由はどうあれ、 俺たちとしても助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
理由はどうあれ、
俺たちとしても助かるぜ。

engChrName: Urgh. If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were leading me by the nose. You really know how to twist the knife, don't you?
engSearchText:
Urgh. If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were
leading me by the nose. You really know how to twist
the knife, don't you?
jpnChrName: 貴方、人を唆すのが上手いんだね。 それが裏解決屋のやり方か？
jpnSearchText:
貴方、人を唆すのが上手いんだね。
それが裏解決屋のやり方か？

engChrName: No idea what you're talkin' about.
engSearchText: No idea what you're talkin' about.
jpnChrName: さて何のことやら。
jpnSearchText: さて何のことやら。

engChrName: Huh? But Van doesn't use knives.
engSearchText: Huh? But Van doesn't use knives.
jpnChrName: なるほど、これが裏解決屋のやり方……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、これが裏解決屋のやり方……

engChrName: That's just a figure of speech.
engSearchText: That's just a figure of speech.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん…… あんまり真似しちゃダメですからね？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん……
あんまり真似しちゃダメですからね？

engChrName: Okay, let's meet up at the park.
engSearchText: Okay, let's meet up at the park.
jpnChrName: それじゃ公園で集合な。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ公園で集合な。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Got it.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Got it.
jpnChrName: はいはい分かったよ。
jpnSearchText: はいはい分かったよ。

engChrName: Yo. We brought the Gekka bracer girl like you asked.
engSearchText: Yo. We brought the Gekka bracer girl like you asked.
jpnChrName: 爺さん、要望通りに 月華流の遊撃士を連れてきたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
爺さん、要望通りに
月華流の遊撃士を連れてきたぜ。

engChrName: So what do you need me to do?
engSearchText: So what do you need me to do?
jpnChrName: 具体的に何をすればいいんだ？
jpnSearchText: 具体的に何をすればいいんだ？

engChrName: First, you will practice five forms in front of each other. You will show Van the Gekka forms, and he will show you the Kunlun forms.
engSearchText:
First, you will practice five forms in front of
each other. You will show Van the Gekka forms, and
he will show you the Kunlun forms.
jpnChrName: まずはおぬしたちが今日教える予定の 型を互いに見せ合っての練習じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
まずはおぬしたちが今日教える予定の
型を互いに見せ合っての練習じゃ。

engChrName: After that, you will both demonstrate them to my students.
engSearchText:
After that, you will both demonstrate them to
my students.
jpnChrName: それが終わったら二人で一緒に 本番で指導の演舞をやってもらおうかのう。
jpnSearchText:
それが終わったら二人で一緒に
本番で指導の演舞をやってもらおうかのう。

engChrName: Got it. I can manage that no problem.
engSearchText: Got it. I can manage that no problem.
jpnChrName: なるほどそういう流れか…… 分かった、それで問題ないよ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどそういう流れか……
分かった、それで問題ないよ。

engChrName: Same here.
engSearchText: Same here.
jpnChrName: こっちもだぜ。
jpnSearchText: こっちもだぜ。

engChrName: Okay, then. These are the names of the forms:
engSearchText: Okay, then. These are the names of the forms:
jpnChrName: 今日の予定はこの５つの型じゃ。
jpnSearchText: 今日の予定はこの５つの型じゃ。

engChrName: Gekka's Twin Crescent Strike and Swallow Stance...
engSearchText: Gekka's Twin Crescent Strike and Swallow Stance...
jpnChrName: 月華流の《双月》と《下弦の構え》。
jpnSearchText: 月華流の《双月》と《下弦の構え》。

engChrName: ...Kunlun's Crushing Fist and Rapid Chop...
engSearchText: ...Kunlun's Crushing Fist and Rapid Chop...
jpnChrName: 崑崙流の《砕拳》と《我連手》。
jpnSearchText: 崑崙流の《砕拳》と《我連手》。

engChrName: ...and Taito's Elbow Thrust.
engSearchText: ...and Taito's Elbow Thrust.
jpnChrName: それと泰斗流の《巨門肘》じゃ。
jpnSearchText: それと泰斗流の《巨門肘》じゃ。

engChrName: Wait, hang on. Neither of us know Taito, so who's gonna show off that one?
engSearchText:
Wait, hang on. Neither of us know Taito, so who's
gonna show off that one?
jpnChrName: 月華流はそいつで崑崙流は俺がやるとして、 泰斗流の型はどうするんだ？
jpnSearchText:
月華流はそいつで崑崙流は俺がやるとして、
泰斗流の型はどうするんだ？

engChrName: I think I can cover that.
engSearchText: I think I can cover that.
jpnChrName: 《巨門肘》か……ジンさんが使ったのを 何回か見たことがあるから──
jpnSearchText:
《巨門肘》か……ジンさんが使ったのを
何回か見たことがあるから──

engChrName: I've seen Zin use that technique multiple times.
engSearchText: I've seen Zin use that technique multiple times.
jpnChrName: 見よう見まねくらいなら、 一応あたしにもできるはずね。
jpnSearchText:
見よう見まねくらいなら、
一応あたしにもできるはずね。

engChrName: For real? You're a lifesaver.
engSearchText: For real? You're a lifesaver.
jpnChrName: そうか、なら頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: そうか、なら頼んだぜ。

engChrName: We'll be cheering you on.
engSearchText: We'll be cheering you on.
jpnChrName: 私たちはここで見学しています。
jpnSearchText: 私たちはここで見学しています。

engChrName: Good luck, you two!
engSearchText: Good luck, you two!
jpnChrName: 二人とも頑張ってください！
jpnSearchText: 二人とも頑張ってください！

engChrName: All right, then. Shall we begin practice?
engSearchText: All right, then. Shall we begin practice?
jpnChrName: それじゃ、練習と行くかのう。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、練習と行くかのう。

engChrName: Yes, let's!
engSearchText: Yes, let's!
jpnChrName: いつでも！
jpnSearchText: いつでも！

engChrName: I'm ready as I'll ever be.
engSearchText: I'm ready as I'll ever be.
jpnChrName: ああ。
jpnSearchText: ああ。

engChrName: Very well, then.
engSearchText: Very well, then.

engChrName: Twin Crescent Strike!
engSearchText: Twin Crescent Strike!
jpnChrName: 月華流・双月！！
jpnSearchText: 月華流・双月！！

engChrName: Swallow Stance!
engSearchText: Swallow Stance!
jpnChrName: 月華流・下弦の構え！！
jpnSearchText: 月華流・下弦の構え！！

engChrName: Crushing Fist!
engSearchText: Crushing Fist!
jpnChrName: 崑崙流・砕拳！！
jpnSearchText: 崑崙流・砕拳！！

engChrName: Rapid Chop!
engSearchText: Rapid Chop!
jpnChrName: 崑崙流・我連手！！
jpnSearchText: 崑崙流・我連手！！

engChrName: Elbow Thrust!
engSearchText: Elbow Thrust!
jpnChrName: 泰斗流・巨門肘！！
jpnSearchText: 泰斗流・巨門肘！！

engChrName: And that's it. Have you committed them to memory?
engSearchText: And that's it. Have you committed them to memory?
jpnChrName: これで全部じゃ。 ちゃんと覚えたかのう？
jpnSearchText:
これで全部じゃ。
ちゃんと覚えたかのう？

engChrName: Sorry, but can we go over them all again?
engSearchText: Sorry, but can we go over them all again?
jpnChrName: 悪いがもう一回頼む。
jpnSearchText: 悪いがもう一回頼む。

engChrName: Certainly. Practice makes perfect.
engSearchText: Certainly. Practice makes perfect.
jpnChrName: 何回練習してもいいぞ、 まだ時間はあるのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
何回練習してもいいぞ、
まだ時間はあるのじゃ。

engChrName: Yeah, I've got them all down.
engSearchText: Yeah, I've got them all down.
jpnChrName: ああ、覚えたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、覚えたぜ。

engChrName: Likewise.
engSearchText: Likewise.
jpnChrName: こっちも問題ないよ。
jpnSearchText: こっちも問題ないよ。

engChrName: Excellent. Then let's put our practice into practice. Hohoho.
engSearchText:
Excellent. Then let's put our practice into practice.
Hohoho.
jpnChrName: うむ、それじゃ本番の準備に 取り掛かろうかのう。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、それじゃ本番の準備に
取り掛かろうかのう。

engChrName: Before long, the park was filled with scores of students, and the instructional class began in earnest.
engSearchText:
Before long, the park was filled with scores of
students, and the instructional class began in earnest.
jpnChrName: しばらくして、公園に人が集まり、 ついに本番の演舞が始まった。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくして、公園に人が集まり、
ついに本番の演舞が始まった。

engChrName: For today's lesson, we'll be learning five forms. I brought in two experts who will demonstrate them.
engSearchText:
For today's lesson, we'll be learning five forms.
I brought in two experts who will demonstrate them.
jpnChrName: これから今日教える ５つの型を実演してもらうのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
これから今日教える
５つの型を実演してもらうのじゃ。

engChrName: I'll be watching everyone very carefully!
engSearchText: I'll be watching everyone very carefully!
jpnChrName: ちゃんと見とるんじゃぞ！
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと見とるんじゃぞ！

engChrName: Now, then... Begin!
engSearchText: Now, then... Begin!
jpnChrName: では、始め────
jpnSearchText: では、始め────

engChrName: Third form: Twin Crescent Strike!
engSearchText: Third form: Twin Crescent Strike!
jpnChrName: ３番──月華流・双月！！
jpnSearchText: ３番──月華流・双月！！

engChrName: (Aww, crap. This is Twin Crescent Strike, so I gotta use both hands.)
engSearchText:
(Aww, crap. This is Twin Crescent Strike, so I gotta
use both hands.)
jpnChrName: （いや、双月だから両手で打つべきだな……）
jpnSearchText: （いや、双月だから両手で打つべきだな……）

engChrName: Eighth form: Crushing Fist!
engSearchText: Eighth form: Crushing Fist!
jpnChrName: ８番──崑崙流・砕拳！！
jpnSearchText: ８番──崑崙流・砕拳！！

engChrName: (Wait, I gotta swing it upward.)
engSearchText: (Wait, I gotta swing it upward.)
jpnChrName: （それは別の技だろ。）
jpnSearchText: （それは別の技だろ。）

engChrName: Tenth form: Elbow Thrust!
engSearchText: Tenth form: Elbow Thrust!
jpnChrName: １０番──泰斗流・巨門肘！！
jpnSearchText: １０番──泰斗流・巨門肘！！

engChrName: (No, I gotta use my elbow for this one. It's in the name!)
engSearchText:
(No, I gotta use my elbow for this one. It's in
the name!)
jpnChrName: （いや、肘を使う技のはずだ……）
jpnSearchText: （いや、肘を使う技のはずだ……）

engChrName: Fifteenth form: Swallow Stance!
engSearchText: Fifteenth form: Swallow Stance!
jpnChrName: １５番──月華流・下弦の構え！！
jpnSearchText: １５番──月華流・下弦の構え！！

engChrName: (Wait, I need to use my left leg.)
engSearchText: (Wait, I need to use my left leg.)
jpnChrName: （いや、ここは左のほうだな……）
jpnSearchText: （いや、ここは左のほうだな……）

engChrName: Twenty-first form: Rapid Chop!
engSearchText: Twenty-first form: Rapid Chop!
jpnChrName: ２１番──崑崙流・我連手！！
jpnSearchText: ２１番──崑崙流・我連手！！

engChrName: (Other way around.)
engSearchText: (Other way around.)
jpnChrName: （逆だな逆。）
jpnSearchText: （逆だな逆。）

engChrName: Well done!
engSearchText: Well done!
jpnChrName: うむ、見事な演舞じゃ！
jpnSearchText: うむ、見事な演舞じゃ！

engChrName: Hmm... An adequate performance.
engSearchText: Hmm... An adequate performance.
jpnChrName: ふむ、こんなもんじゃろう。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、こんなもんじゃろう。

engChrName: Thanks to you, today's class went off without a hitch. Young people these days sure are something else!
engSearchText:
Thanks to you, today's class went off without a hitch.
Young people these days sure are something else!
jpnChrName: おかげで今日の指導は無事に終わったのう。 最近の若者も大したもんじゃ、ホッホッホッ！
jpnSearchText:
おかげで今日の指導は無事に終わったのう。
最近の若者も大したもんじゃ、ホッホッホッ！

engChrName: So what are you going to do about tomorrow?
engSearchText: So what are you going to do about tomorrow?
jpnChrName: 明日からはどうするつもりですか？
jpnSearchText: 明日からはどうするつもりですか？

engChrName: I expect my back should be fine by then, so I plan to teach the lesson tomorrow.
engSearchText:
I expect my back should be fine by then, so I plan to
teach the lesson tomorrow.
jpnChrName: その頃にはもう腰の調子も戻っておるじゃろう、 また儂が直々指導するつもりじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
その頃にはもう腰の調子も戻っておるじゃろう、
また儂が直々指導するつもりじゃ。

engChrName: Are you sure you'll be okay?
engSearchText: Are you sure you'll be okay?
jpnChrName: 大丈夫でしょうか……
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫でしょうか……

engChrName: I can help out again if need be.
engSearchText: I can help out again if need be.
jpnChrName: ダメそうだったら、その時はまた あたしがフォローするよ。
jpnSearchText:
ダメそうだったら、その時はまた
あたしがフォローするよ。

engChrName: But I'm not sure if you need it. Considering your age, you're in shockingly great shape.
engSearchText:
But I'm not sure if you need it. Considering your age,
you're in shockingly great shape.
jpnChrName: それにしても、 お爺さんの佇まいと鍛え方はなかなかね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
お爺さんの佇まいと鍛え方はなかなかね。

engChrName: Your form is good, too—maybe even too good. I somehow doubt you're doing martial arts just to stay in good health.
engSearchText:
Your form is good, too—maybe even too good.
I somehow doubt you're doing martial arts just to stay
in good health.
jpnChrName: とても健康の為だけに 拳法をしてるとは思えないよ。
jpnSearchText:
とても健康の為だけに
拳法をしてるとは思えないよ。

engChrName: Well, well. I didn't expect to be found out after all these years.
engSearchText:
Well, well. I didn't expect to be found out after all
these years.
jpnChrName: ……困ったのう、よもや気付いたとは。
jpnSearchText: ……困ったのう、よもや気付いたとは。

engChrName: Allow me to let you in on a little-known secret: in my youth, I stole techniques from many schools and made them my own.
engSearchText:
Allow me to let you in on a little-known secret: in my
youth, I stole techniques from many schools and
made them my own.
jpnChrName: そう、儂こそ若い頃各流派の拳法を盗み取り、 道場破りを幾度も繰り返し──
jpnSearchText:
そう、儂こそ若い頃各流派の拳法を盗み取り、
道場破りを幾度も繰り返し──

engChrName: I'm a warrior of darkness who's imbued his hands in the blood of the greatest masters in all of Zemuria.
engSearchText:
I'm a warrior of darkness who's imbued his hands in
the blood of the greatest masters in all of Zemuria.
jpnChrName: 数多の達人を再起不能にした 血濡れの闇拳闘士……
jpnSearchText:
数多の達人を再起不能にした
血濡れの闇拳闘士……

engChrName: My true identity is...Bloodstained Fist Wang!
engSearchText: My true identity is...Bloodstained Fist Wang!
jpnChrName: 人呼んで──血霧絶拳のワン！！
jpnSearchText: 人呼んで──血霧絶拳のワン！！

engChrName: *gasp*
engSearchText: *gasp*
jpnChrName: 血霧絶拳のワン！！？
jpnSearchText: 血霧絶拳のワン！！？

engChrName: I-I've never heard that name before!
engSearchText: I-I've never heard that name before!
jpnChrName: は、初めて聞く名前ね……！
jpnSearchText: は、初めて聞く名前ね……！

engChrName: Well, of course you haven't.
engSearchText: Well, of course you haven't.
jpnChrName: ホッホッホ！ まあ知る訳がないじゃろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ホッホッホ！
まあ知る訳がないじゃろうな。

engChrName: I made it up.
engSearchText: I made it up.
jpnChrName: たった今、儂が考えたものじゃからのう。
jpnSearchText: たった今、儂が考えたものじゃからのう。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?

engChrName: I'm quite good at coming up with cool nicknames on the spot, if I do say so myself.
engSearchText:
I'm quite good at coming up with cool nicknames on
the spot, if I do say so myself.
jpnChrName: 昔から、カッコイイ渾名に 憧れておってのう～。
jpnSearchText:
昔から、カッコイイ渾名に
憧れておってのう～。

engChrName: Bloodstained Fist Wang... Yes, it has a nice ring to it. I insist on being addressed as such from now on.
engSearchText:
Bloodstained Fist Wang... Yes, it has a nice ring to it.
I insist on being addressed as such from now on.
jpnChrName: 手始めにお前さん達に 呼んで欲しいんじゃが、どうじゃ！？
jpnSearchText:
手始めにお前さん達に
呼んで欲しいんじゃが、どうじゃ！？

engChrName: No.
engSearchText: No.
jpnChrName: 誰が呼ぶと思うね。
jpnSearchText: 誰が呼ぶと思うね。

engChrName: I can't believe I was fooled by this old coot.
engSearchText: I can't believe I was fooled by this old coot.
jpnChrName: 一瞬でも信じてしまった 自分が恥ずかしいよ。
jpnSearchText:
一瞬でも信じてしまった
自分が恥ずかしいよ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: He got me again. I can't believe it...
engSearchText: He got me again. I can't believe it...
jpnChrName: また騙される所でした……
jpnSearchText: また騙される所でした……

engChrName: This guy's a character.
engSearchText: This guy's a character.
jpnChrName: 本当に元気な爺さんだ。
jpnSearchText: 本当に元気な爺さんだ。

engChrName: You sure you don't want a cut? The 50-50 offer's still on the table.
engSearchText:
You sure you don't want a cut? The 50-50 offer's still
on the table.
jpnChrName: アンタの分の報酬、本当になくていいのか？ 俺は半分ずつ分けるつもりだが。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの分の報酬、本当になくていいのか？
俺は半分ずつ分けるつもりだが。

engChrName: I know, but I want you guys to have it all.
engSearchText: I know, but I want you guys to have it all.
jpnChrName: ううん、貴方たちが全部もらうべきね。
jpnSearchText: ううん、貴方たちが全部もらうべきね。

engChrName: I feel like I've already got my share, anyway.
engSearchText: I feel like I've already got my share, anyway.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと遊撃士として 依頼を受けたわけじゃないしね。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと遊撃士として
依頼を受けたわけじゃないしね。

engChrName: This helped me discover a new way to spread the true Gekka throughout the world.
engSearchText:
This helped me discover a new way to spread the true
Gekka throughout the world.
jpnChrName: それに、あんな風に武術を広めることも できるんだって分かったし収穫は十分よ。
jpnSearchText:
それに、あんな風に武術を広めることも
できるんだって分かったし収穫は十分よ。

engChrName: And as a bonus, I got to learn about all of you guys.
engSearchText: And as a bonus, I got to learn about all of you guys.
jpnChrName: それと、貴方たちのこともね。
jpnSearchText: それと、貴方たちのこともね。

engChrName: Huh? What'd you learn about Feri and me?
engSearchText: Huh? What'd you learn about Feri and me?
jpnChrName: 貴方たち…… ヴァンさんだけではなくですか？
jpnSearchText:
貴方たち……
ヴァンさんだけではなくですか？

engChrName: A few things.
engSearchText: A few things.
jpnChrName: うん、実は裏解決屋を手伝うのは ちょっとどうかと思ってたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うん、実は裏解決屋を手伝うのは
ちょっとどうかと思ってたんだけど。

engChrName: The biggest one being that you're exactly as you look: a couple of good kids.
engSearchText:
The biggest one being that you're exactly as you look:
a couple of good kids.
jpnChrName: 見た目通り、いい子たちだったよ。
jpnSearchText: 見た目通り、いい子たちだったよ。

engChrName: Aww...
engSearchText: Aww...
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうですか？
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうですか？

engChrName: As for you, spriggan, I wrote you off as a shady person at first glance, which is part of why I was hesitant to work with you initially.
engSearchText:
As for you, spriggan, I wrote you off as a shady
person at first glance, which is part of why I was
hesitant to work with you initially.
jpnChrName: そして裏解決屋、貴方のことも 最初は胡散臭く思ってたけど──
jpnSearchText:
そして裏解決屋、貴方のことも
最初は胡散臭く思ってたけど──

engChrName: But I shouldn't judge a book by its cover. I can tell you're diligent and disciplined, given how polished your Kunlun forms were.
engSearchText:
But I shouldn't judge a book by its cover. I can tell
you're diligent and disciplined, given how polished
your Kunlun forms were.
jpnChrName: あの見事な崑崙の技、長年真摯な鍛錬を積まないと とても至れるとは思えないものね。
jpnSearchText:
あの見事な崑崙の技、長年真摯な鍛錬を積まないと
とても至れるとは思えないものね。

engChrName: I now understand why Zin trusts you so much.
engSearchText: I now understand why Zin trusts you so much.
jpnChrName: ジンさんが信頼したのも頷けるよ。
jpnSearchText: ジンさんが信頼したのも頷けるよ。

engChrName: Think you got the wrong idea about me. I just had a good master who drilled those forms into me.
engSearchText:
Think you got the wrong idea about me. I just had a
good master who drilled those forms into me.
jpnChrName: ……そんな大層なもんじゃねえよ、 単に良い師に恵まれただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
……そんな大層なもんじゃねえよ、
単に良い師に恵まれただけだ。

engChrName: Won't complain about you havin' a better impression of us, though.
engSearchText:
Won't complain about you havin' a better impression
of us, though.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタが少しは信頼してくれたなら、 俺たちとしても色々とやりやすいがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタが少しは信頼してくれたなら、
俺たちとしても色々とやりやすいがな。

engChrName: Heehee. Let's just leave it at that, then.
engSearchText: Heehee. Let's just leave it at that, then.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そういうことにしておくよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そういうことにしておくよ。

engChrName: Quest Substitute Sensei completed!
engSearchText: Quest Substitute Sensei completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【健やかなる武芸指導】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>健やかなる武芸指導<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: So, where we headed?
engSearchText: So, where we headed?
jpnChrName: で、どこで聞き込みするんだ？
jpnSearchText: で、どこで聞き込みするんだ？

engChrName: To the Kowloon Hotel. I wanna ask the receptionist there some questions.
engSearchText:
To the Kowloon Hotel. I wanna ask the receptionist
there some questions.
jpnChrName: まずはストレートに 九龍ホテルの受付だな。
jpnSearchText:
まずはストレートに
九龍ホテルの受付だな。

engChrName: I should be able to get plenty of info out of 'em since Heiyue's my client.
engSearchText:
I should be able to get plenty of info out of 'em since
Heiyue's my client.
jpnChrName: 仮にも黒月の依頼で来ている身だ。 何かしら情報を引き出せんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
仮にも黒月の依頼で来ている身だ。
何かしら情報を引き出せんだろ。

engChrName: I'm sure they want this Almata mess cleaned up nice and quickly.
engSearchText:
I'm sure they want this Almata mess cleaned up nice
and quickly.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》の息がかかった奴らが、黒月の 管轄（シマ）で堂々としているのも驚きだがな。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》の息がかかった奴らが、黒月の
管轄（シマ）で堂々としているのも驚きだがな。

engChrName: They're probably kicking themselves for letting the mafia in the door. It's their fault for underestimating outsiders.
engSearchText:
They're probably kicking themselves for letting the
mafia in the door. It's their fault for
underestimating outsiders.
jpnChrName: ま、余所者だし シンプルに舐めてんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、余所者だし
シンプルに舐めてんだろうな。

engChrName: So we've got them to deal with as well as these cheaters.
engSearchText:
So we've got them to deal with as well as
these cheaters.
jpnChrName: もう一ヶ所はそうだな……
jpnSearchText: もう一ヶ所はそうだな……

engChrName: If they really are doin' illegal gambling, then we may need some backup.
engSearchText:
If they really are doin' illegal gambling, then we may
need some backup.
jpnChrName: イカサマ師が違法なギャンブルに 手を染めてるんだとしたら──
jpnSearchText:
イカサマ師が違法なギャンブルに
手を染めてるんだとしたら──

engChrName: I might call up a couple of experts I know.
engSearchText: I might call up a couple of experts I know.
jpnChrName: “本職”にも聞いておきたい所だな。
jpnSearchText: “本職”にも聞いておきたい所だな。

engChrName: What kinda experts we talking about?
engSearchText: What kinda experts we talking about?

engChrName: You'll find out soon enough.
engSearchText: You'll find out soon enough.
jpnChrName: ま、とにかく付いて来い。
jpnSearchText: ま、とにかく付いて来い。

engChrName: Welcome, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Welcome, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ファン大人のお客様であり、 裏解決屋のヴァン様……
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人のお客様であり、
裏解決屋のヴァン様……

engChrName: Oh, and I see Aaron is accompanying you as well.
engSearchText: Oh, and I see Aaron is accompanying you as well.
jpnChrName: まさかアーロン様までご一緒とは。
jpnSearchText: まさかアーロン様までご一緒とは。

engChrName: How may I help you two gentlemen this evening?
engSearchText: How may I help you two gentlemen this evening?
jpnChrName: フフ、ではその質問には黒月の 人間としてお答えさせて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ではその質問には黒月の
人間としてお答えさせて頂きますね。

engChrName: We got a few questions for Heiyue.
engSearchText: We got a few questions for Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 話が早くて助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: 話が早くて助かるぜ。

engChrName: We're trying to find those damn cheaters. You know anything about them?
engSearchText:
We're trying to find those damn cheaters. You know
anything about them?
jpnChrName: さっそくだが、アンタたちは どこまで掴んでるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
さっそくだが、アンタたちは
どこまで掴んでるんだ？

engChrName: Oh, we're actually in the middle of investigating that matter as we speak.
engSearchText:
Oh, we're actually in the middle of investigating that
matter as we speak.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 我々もまだ調査中ではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
我々もまだ調査中ではありますが。

engChrName: We've uncovered a few things, including the fact that the cheaters are linked to A.
engSearchText:
We've uncovered a few things, including the fact that
the cheaters are linked to A.
jpnChrName: イカサマ師コンビが《Ａ》と 繋がっているのは紛れもなく事実です。
jpnSearchText:
イカサマ師コンビが《Ａ》と
繋がっているのは紛れもなく事実です。

engChrName: I also know about the incident involving your friend. It's a good thing he avoided the worst-case scenario.
engSearchText:
I also know about the incident involving your friend.
It's a good thing he avoided the worst-case scenario.
jpnChrName: アーロン様のお連れ様は 何とか回避されたようですが……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン様のお連れ様は
何とか回避されたようですが……

engChrName: Had he not been able to pay up, he would've been handed over to A.
engSearchText:
Had he not been able to pay up, he would've been
handed over to A.
jpnChrName: 負け分のミラを払えなかった相手を 《Ａ》に引き渡す──
jpnSearchText:
負け分のミラを払えなかった相手を
《Ａ》に引き渡す──

engChrName: That's about all we know at present.
engSearchText: That's about all we know at present.
jpnChrName: その事例は確かに確認しています。
jpnSearchText: その事例は確かに確認しています。

engChrName: Sounds like their info lines up with Syd's.
engSearchText: Sounds like their info lines up with Syd's.
jpnChrName: ……裏が取れたか。
jpnSearchText: ……裏が取れたか。

engChrName: I'm gonna make those cheating bastards pay.
engSearchText: I'm gonna make those cheating bastards pay.
jpnChrName: ケジメは付けさせる、必ずな。
jpnSearchText: ケジメは付けさせる、必ずな。

engChrName: Though I wouldn't have to if Heiyue would step in, but they seem content with letting them roam freely.
engSearchText:
Though I wouldn't have to if Heiyue would step in,
but they seem content with letting them roam freely.
jpnChrName: だが黒月も、そこまで 分かってて静観してるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
だが黒月も、そこまで
分かってて静観してるとはな。

engChrName: If you're fine leakin' us info...
engSearchText: If you're fine leakin' us info...
jpnChrName: だが俺たちに 情報を漏らすってことはつまり──
jpnSearchText:
だが俺たちに
情報を漏らすってことはつまり──

engChrName: ...then I'm gonna assume Heiyue's cool with us tackling this issue however we want.
engSearchText:
...then I'm gonna assume Heiyue's cool with us
tackling this issue however we want.
jpnChrName: この件はこちらの好きにして構わない。 そういうことでいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
この件はこちらの好きにして構わない。
そういうことでいいんだな？

engChrName: Yes. You may deal with them as you see fit.
engSearchText: Yes. You may deal with them as you see fit.
jpnChrName: イカサマ師コンビの件に関しては そういう判断のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
イカサマ師コンビの件に関しては
そういう判断のようですね。

engChrName: Those two aren't official agents of A, so they're of little concern to us.
engSearchText:
Those two aren't official agents of A, so they're of
little concern to us.
jpnChrName: 彼らもあくまで、 正規の構成員ではないようですし。
jpnSearchText:
彼らもあくまで、
正規の構成員ではないようですし。

engChrName: Really, now.
engSearchText: Really, now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: At present, they're relaxing in their room.
engSearchText: At present, they're relaxing in their room.
jpnChrName: ちなみに彼らは今、 部屋で寛いでいるようです。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに彼らは今、
部屋で寛いでいるようです。

engChrName: Would you like me to relay a message to them?
engSearchText: Would you like me to relay a message to them?
jpnChrName: さっそくお取次ぎ致しましょうか？
jpnSearchText: さっそくお取次ぎ致しましょうか？

engChrName: Not right now.
engSearchText: Not right now.
jpnChrName: いや、今はまだいい。
jpnSearchText: いや、今はまだいい。

engChrName: ...Pardon? I don't know what you're talking about.
engSearchText: ...Pardon? I don't know what you're talking about.
jpnChrName: ……一体何の話だ？
jpnSearchText: ……一体何の話だ？

engChrName: There's no need to be coy.
engSearchText: There's no need to be coy.
jpnChrName: とぼけなくてもいいぜ。
jpnSearchText: とぼけなくてもいいぜ。

engChrName: We already know that you're keepin' an eye on the Messeldam Trading Company.
engSearchText:
We already know that you're keepin' an eye on the
Messeldam Trading Company.
jpnChrName: アンタが《メッセルダム商事》に 目を付けてるのは分かってる。
jpnSearchText:
アンタが《メッセルダム商事》に
目を付けてるのは分かってる。

engChrName: I can tell you're from around here, so I've got a pretty good guess as to what your real job is. I could reveal it myself...
engSearchText:
I can tell you're from around here, so I've got a pretty
good guess as to what your real job is. I could reveal
it myself...
jpnChrName: どうやら煌都にも慣れていそうだ。 つまりアンタの正体は──
jpnSearchText:
どうやら煌都にも慣れていそうだ。
つまりアンタの正体は──

engChrName: ...but I'll let my buddy here do the honors.
engSearchText: ...but I'll let my buddy here do the honors.
jpnChrName: 分かるよな？
jpnSearchText: 分かるよな？

engChrName: Are you seriously testing me? Screw off.
engSearchText: Are you seriously testing me? Screw off.
jpnChrName: ちっ、試すような真似を……
jpnSearchText: ちっ、試すような真似を……
