engChrName: (Fine, I'll play along.)
engSearchText: (Fine, I'll play along.)
jpnChrName: （さっき言ってた“本職”か。）
jpnSearchText: （さっき言ってた“本職”か。）

engChrName: (I've seen this guy around town a few times, now that I think about it.)
engSearchText:
(I've seen this guy around town a few times, now that
I think about it.)
jpnChrName: （そういや、このオヤジは   街で何度か見かけたこともある。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや、このオヤジは
街で何度か見かけたこともある。）

engChrName: (He's most likely a...)
engSearchText: (He's most likely a...)
jpnChrName: （可能性が高そうなのは……）
jpnSearchText: （可能性が高そうなのは……）

engChrName: (A bracer who's gone incognito to investigate Almata?)
engSearchText:
(A bracer who's gone incognito to
investigate Almata?)
jpnChrName: （遊撃士が私服、つまり身分を隠して   アルマータを調査……）
jpnSearchText:
（遊撃士が私服、つまり身分を隠して
アルマータを調査……）

engChrName: (Nah, that's outsider behavior. A local bracer wouldn't do that.)
engSearchText:
(Nah, that's outsider behavior. A local bracer
wouldn't do that.)
jpnChrName: （外からの応援ならともかく、   地元の遊撃士の仕事じゃねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（外からの応援ならともかく、
地元の遊撃士の仕事じゃねえな。）

engChrName: (Doubt they'd need to plant a spy here to get info on Almata. They can just lean on their info network.)
engSearchText:
(Doubt they'd need to plant a spy here to get info
on Almata. They can just lean on their info network.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、黒月がアルマータのために   面倒くせえことをするわけがねえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、黒月がアルマータのために
面倒くせえことをするわけがねえ。）

engChrName: (It's more likely that he's a...)
engSearchText: (It's more likely that he's a...)
jpnChrName: （となると可能性が高いのは……）
jpnSearchText: （となると可能性が高いのは……）

engChrName: Given that you're doing a stakeout of this place...
engSearchText: Given that you're doing a stakeout of this place...
jpnChrName: 張り込み、お疲れさん。
jpnSearchText: 張り込み、お疲れさん。

engChrName: ...I'd guess that you're either a cop or a detective.
engSearchText: ...I'd guess that you're either a cop or a detective.
jpnChrName: 消去法だが恐らくアンタは警察…… それも捜査官だな。
jpnSearchText:
消去法だが恐らくアンタは警察……
それも捜査官だな。

engChrName: And here I thought the Langport police were all useless, but you're out here trying to beat the stereotype. Hats off to you.
engSearchText:
And here I thought the Langport police were all
useless, but you're out here trying to beat
the stereotype. Hats off to you.
jpnChrName: 煌都の警察は黒月に出し抜かれてばっかの イメージだが、なかなか熱心じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の警察は黒月に出し抜かれてばっかの
イメージだが、なかなか熱心じゃないか。

engChrName: Shh... Keep your voices down.
engSearchText: Shh... Keep your voices down.
jpnChrName: くっ…… あまり大きな声を出すんじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
くっ……
あまり大きな声を出すんじゃない。

engChrName: If you wish to talk, follow me.
engSearchText: If you wish to talk, follow me.
jpnChrName: 話があるならこちらに来い。
jpnSearchText: 話があるならこちらに来い。

engChrName: Not bad, kid.
engSearchText: Not bad, kid.
jpnChrName: へえ、やるじゃねえか小僧。
jpnSearchText: へえ、やるじゃねえか小僧。

engChrName: Don't patronize me, asshole.
engSearchText: Don't patronize me, asshole.
jpnChrName: フン、露骨に誘導しといてよく言うぜ。
jpnSearchText: フン、露骨に誘導しといてよく言うぜ。

engChrName: So, what can I do for the famous Langport prodigy and the spriggan?
engSearchText:
So, what can I do for the famous Langport prodigy
and the spriggan?
jpnChrName: 麒麟児に裏解決屋……
jpnSearchText: 麒麟児に裏解決屋……

engChrName: Did you say you wanted information on the cheating duo?
engSearchText:
Did you say you wanted information on the
cheating duo?
jpnChrName: 例のイカサマ師コンビについて 聞きたいんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
例のイカサマ師コンビについて
聞きたいんだったな。

engChrName: Yeah. All we know is that they're connected to A— but apparently they aren't official members.
engSearchText:
Yeah. All we know is that they're connected to A—
but apparently they aren't official members.
jpnChrName: ああ、《Ａ》と繋がっているものの 正規の構成員じゃないみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《Ａ》と繋がっているものの
正規の構成員じゃないみたいだが……

engChrName: Yeah. All we know is that they're connected to A.
engSearchText: Yeah. All we know is that they're connected to A.
jpnChrName: ああ、《Ａ》と繋がってることまでは 分かっているんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《Ａ》と繋がってることまでは
分かっているんだがな。

engChrName: Got anything else for us?
engSearchText: Got anything else for us?
jpnChrName: そっちは何か掴んでんのかよ。
jpnSearchText: そっちは何か掴んでんのかよ。

engChrName: I do. Our primary target is A, so I don't mind divulging this information.
engSearchText:
I do. Our primary target is A, so I don't mind
divulging this information.
jpnChrName: こちらもあくまで本命は《Ａ》だからな。 特別に教えてやる。
jpnSearchText:
こちらもあくまで本命は《Ａ》だからな。
特別に教えてやる。

engChrName: Like you said, they aren't official members of A.
engSearchText: Like you said, they aren't official members of A.
jpnChrName: 確かに奴らは正規の構成員ではない。
jpnSearchText: 確かに奴らは正規の構成員ではない。

engChrName: The two of them and the part-time gangsters have only just been hired.
engSearchText:
The two of them and the part-time gangsters have
only just been hired.
jpnChrName: バイトの半グレたちと同じく、 ただの雇われだ。
jpnSearchText:
バイトの半グレたちと同じく、
ただの雇われだ。

engChrName: They aren't official members of A.
engSearchText: They aren't official members of A.
jpnChrName: 奴らは正規の構成員ではない。
jpnSearchText: 奴らは正規の構成員ではない。

engChrName: The two of them and the part-time gangsters have only just been hired.
engSearchText:
The two of them and the part-time gangsters have
only just been hired.
jpnChrName: バイトの半グレたちと同じく、 ただの雇われだ。
jpnSearchText:
バイトの半グレたちと同じく、
ただの雇われだ。

engChrName: Samson and Richie have made a splash in the gambling scene.
engSearchText:
Samson and Richie have made a splash in the
gambling scene.
jpnChrName: サンソンとリッチー……
jpnSearchText: サンソンとリッチー……

engChrName: They caused quite a stir back in Messeldam.
engSearchText: They caused quite a stir back in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: 元々メッセルダムでは、そこそこ 名の知られていた賭博師のようだが。
jpnSearchText:
元々メッセルダムでは、そこそこ
名の知られていた賭博師のようだが。

engChrName: Unfortunately for them, they pressed their luck. They set their sights on swindling A out of their money, and they paid the price for it.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately for them, they pressed their luck.
They set their sights on swindling A out of their
money, and they paid the price for it.
jpnChrName: 最近、《Ａ》相手に揉め事を起こして 軍門に下ったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
最近、《Ａ》相手に揉め事を起こして
軍門に下ったみたいだな。

engChrName: They were collared and put on tight leashes. The two were given jaeger dropout bodyguards, but otherwise, they're being treated like dogs.
engSearchText:
They were collared and put on tight leashes. The two
were given jaeger dropout bodyguards, but otherwise,
they're being treated like dogs.
jpnChrName: 猟兵崩れを護衛に雇ってはいるが、 だからと言って厚遇されてる様子もない。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵崩れを護衛に雇ってはいるが、
だからと言って厚遇されてる様子もない。

engChrName: To A, they are on the same level as the part-time gangsters.
engSearchText:
To A, they are on the same level as the
part-time gangsters.
jpnChrName: はっきり言って、立場的には バイトの半グレとさほど変わらないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
はっきり言って、立場的には
バイトの半グレとさほど変わらないだろう。

engChrName: Well, ain't that convenient.
engSearchText: Well, ain't that convenient.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そいつは都合がいいな。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、そいつは都合がいいな。

engChrName: So in other words, they're expendable—which means we can bring them down without fear of retaliation.
engSearchText:
So in other words, they're expendable—which means
we can bring them down without fear of retaliation.
jpnChrName: 要は使い捨てのコマ、 締めちまっても大ごとにならなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
要は使い捨てのコマ、
締めちまっても大ごとにならなさそうだ。

engChrName: Huh? What are you two plotting?
engSearchText: Huh? What are you two plotting?
jpnChrName: って、お前たち、一体何をするつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: って、お前たち、一体何をするつもりだ。

engChrName: Nothin'. He's just messin' with you.
engSearchText: Nothin'. He's just messin' with you.
jpnChrName: ああ、こいつの言ったことは 気にしないでくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、こいつの言ったことは
気にしないでくれ。

engChrName: We're gonna resolve this nice and peacefully.
engSearchText: We're gonna resolve this nice and peacefully.
jpnChrName: あくまで穏便に済ませるつもりだからよ。
jpnSearchText: あくまで穏便に済ませるつもりだからよ。

engChrName: Yeah, what he said.
engSearchText: Yeah, what he said.
jpnChrName: ま、そーゆーことで。
jpnSearchText: ま、そーゆーことで。

engChrName: Thanks for the info! ♪
engSearchText: Thanks for the info! ♪
jpnChrName: 情報提供、あんがとな♪
jpnSearchText: 情報提供、あんがとな♪

engChrName: ...Right. Anyway, just stay out of our way from here on.
engSearchText:
...Right. Anyway, just stay out of our way from
here on.
jpnChrName: ……まあいい、 とにかく警察沙汰にはするなよ。
jpnSearchText:
……まあいい、
とにかく警察沙汰にはするなよ。

engChrName: So, what's the plan?
engSearchText: So, what's the plan?
jpnChrName: さて、これからどうすんだオッサン。
jpnSearchText: さて、これからどうすんだオッサン。

engChrName: We gonna bust into their hotel room and rip them a new asshole?
engSearchText:
We gonna bust into their hotel room and rip them a
new asshole?
jpnChrName: ホテルに乗り込んで 締め上げるっつうなら力は貸すが。
jpnSearchText:
ホテルに乗り込んで
締め上げるっつうなら力は貸すが。

engChrName: You wish.
engSearchText: You wish.
jpnChrName: ……今それだけ派手に騒いでみろ。
jpnSearchText: ……今それだけ派手に騒いでみろ。

engChrName: That'd just leave a big ol' mess for Heiyue to clean up, and I'd rather not be indebted to Heiyue.
engSearchText:
That'd just leave a big ol' mess for Heiyue to clean up,
and I'd rather not be indebted to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 場を収めるために、黒月にデカイ借りを 作ることになるのは明白だ。
jpnSearchText:
場を収めるために、黒月にデカイ借りを
作ることになるのは明白だ。

engChrName: It'd also make it harder for me to move around freely.
engSearchText: It'd also make it harder for me to move around freely.
jpnChrName: そうなると、 俺は身動きが取りづらくなるんでな。
jpnSearchText:
そうなると、
俺は身動きが取りづらくなるんでな。

engChrName: I got a better idea. Instead of fightin' with fists, I say we fight with cards.
engSearchText:
I got a better idea. Instead of fightin' with fists, I say
we fight with cards.
jpnChrName: ──ここはあえて 相手の土俵に乗る、ってのはどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ここはあえて
相手の土俵に乗る、ってのはどうだ。

engChrName: You wanna gamble with them?
engSearchText: You wanna gamble with them?
jpnChrName: 相手の土俵、つまりギャンブルか？
jpnSearchText: 相手の土俵、つまりギャンブルか？

engChrName: That's right.
engSearchText: That's right.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうだ。

engChrName: Heh. You never struck me as the high-rolling type.
engSearchText: Heh. You never struck me as the high-rolling type.
jpnChrName: ククク── やっぱオッサン、アンタ面白えわ。
jpnSearchText:
ククク──
やっぱオッサン、アンタ面白えわ。

engChrName: I considered that option, too, but I tossed the idea when I realized Syd and I wouldn't stand a chance.
engSearchText:
I considered that option, too, but I tossed the idea
when I realized Syd and I wouldn't stand a chance.
jpnChrName: オレも考えはしたが、シドと組んでも 分が悪そうだったからな。
jpnSearchText:
オレも考えはしたが、シドと組んでも
分が悪そうだったからな。

engChrName: You confident in your card-playing skills?
engSearchText: You confident in your card-playing skills?
jpnChrName: そういうからには、 博打の腕前に自信はあるんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
そういうからには、
博打の腕前に自信はあるんだろうな？

engChrName: More or less.
engSearchText: More or less.
jpnChrName: ま、それなりにな。
jpnSearchText: ま、それなりにな。

engChrName: Although, I'm probably not as self-assured as you.
engSearchText: Although, I'm probably not as self-assured as you.
jpnChrName: ちなみにジャックから聞いたが──
jpnSearchText: ちなみにジャックから聞いたが──

engChrName: Jack told me you normally win one in every three games against him. That's no small feat.
engSearchText:
Jack told me you normally win one in every three
games against him. That's no small feat.
jpnChrName: お前、ジャックたちに ３回に１回は勝つんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
お前、ジャックたちに
３回に１回は勝つんだってな。

engChrName: But what if I told you I win two in every five games against him?
engSearchText:
But what if I told you I win two in every five games
against him?
jpnChrName: 俺なら５回に２回は勝つ、って言ったらどうだ。
jpnSearchText: 俺なら５回に２回は勝つ、って言ったらどうだ。

engChrName: Ohh. You think you're better than me, huh?
engSearchText: Ohh. You think you're better than me, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ、さらっと マウント取ってんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、さらっと
マウント取ってんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Who's calling who self-assured?
engSearchText: Who's calling who self-assured?
jpnChrName: だがまあ、ブラフってわけでもなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: だがまあ、ブラフってわけでもなさそうだな。

engChrName: I'm just speakin' objectively here. I can hold my own in a round of cards.
engSearchText:
I'm just speakin' objectively here. I can hold my own
in a round of cards.
jpnChrName: ま、あくまで客観的に言ったまでで 過信はしてねえつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あくまで客観的に言ったまでで
過信はしてねえつもりだ。

engChrName: That said, our opponents are at least as good as Halle.
engSearchText: That said, our opponents are at least as good as Halle.
jpnChrName: だが少なくとも、相手は二人ともに ハルに匹敵する腕前を持つギャンブラー。
jpnSearchText:
だが少なくとも、相手は二人ともに
ハルに匹敵する腕前を持つギャンブラー。

engChrName: If we challenge them by ourselves, the deck'll be stacked against us.
engSearchText:
If we challenge them by ourselves, the deck'll be
stacked against us.
jpnChrName: つまり俺とお前が組んでもまだ分が悪い……
jpnSearchText: つまり俺とお前が組んでもまだ分が悪い……

engChrName: So I say we up the odds by stackin' our own deck with a couple of aces—or more specifically, a Jack and a Halle.
engSearchText:
So I say we up the odds by stackin' our own deck with
a couple of aces—or more specifically, a Jack and
a Halle.
jpnChrName: となると、ジャックとハルの力を 借りるべきだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
となると、ジャックとハルの力を
借りるべきだろうな。

engChrName: You're the man with the plan. I'm surprised at how calm you are about all this.
engSearchText:
You're the man with the plan. I'm surprised at how
calm you are about all this.
jpnChrName: クク、なかなか冷静じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: クク、なかなか冷静じゃねえか。

engChrName: Right back at'cha. I had you pegged as a dumb, reckless brat who ran headlong into danger.
engSearchText:
Right back at'cha. I had you pegged as a dumb,
reckless brat who ran headlong into danger.
jpnChrName: お前の方こそ、もう少し勢い任せな ガキだと思ってたんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
お前の方こそ、もう少し勢い任せな
ガキだと思ってたんだがな。

engChrName: But tonight's taught me you can think things through.
engSearchText:
But tonight's taught me you can think
things through.
jpnChrName: 《羅州の小覇王》の名も 伊達じゃねえってことか。
jpnSearchText:
《羅州の小覇王》の名も
伊達じゃねえってことか。

engChrName: I've got brains and brawn. I'm the whole package.
engSearchText: I've got brains and brawn. I'm the whole package.
jpnChrName: そいつはどーも。
jpnSearchText: そいつはどーも。

engChrName: Don't blame you for thinking of me that way, though. I know I get into a lot of fights—but I really don't enjoy pointless conflict.
engSearchText:
Don't blame you for thinking of me that way, though.
I know I get into a lot of fights—but I really don't
enjoy pointless conflict.
jpnChrName: 俺だってなるべく 無駄な抗争は避けてえ気持ちはある。
jpnSearchText:
俺だってなるべく
無駄な抗争は避けてえ気持ちはある。

engChrName: The people in the Eastern Quarter are the closest thing I have to a family.
engSearchText:
The people in the Eastern Quarter are the closest
thing I have to a family.
jpnChrName: 東方人街の奴らは、天涯孤独の俺にとっちゃ 家族みてえなモンだからな。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街の奴らは、天涯孤独の俺にとっちゃ
家族みてえなモンだからな。

engChrName: You...don't have any relatives?
engSearchText: You...don't have any relatives?
jpnChrName: お前……身寄りがいねえのか。
jpnSearchText: お前……身寄りがいねえのか。

engChrName: Nah. My mom died when I was a kid.
engSearchText: Nah. My mom died when I was a kid.
jpnChrName: ガキの頃にオフクロを亡くしてからな。
jpnSearchText: ガキの頃にオフクロを亡くしてからな。

engChrName: So the people in town took me in and treated me like one of their own.
engSearchText:
So the people in town took me in and treated me like
one of their own.
jpnChrName: だがそんなオレを、 街の連中は変わらず迎えてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
だがそんなオレを、
街の連中は変わらず迎えてくれた。

engChrName: Even Heiyue's had my back over the years.
engSearchText: Even Heiyue's had my back over the years.
jpnChrName: 何だかんだで黒月にも世話にはなってる。
jpnSearchText: 何だかんだで黒月にも世話にはなってる。

engChrName: That used to be true of Lǎo Yéye, too, but he's been... distancing himself from me lately.
engSearchText:
That used to be true of Lǎo Yéye, too, but he's been...
distancing himself from me lately.
jpnChrName: オフクロ込みで良くしてくれてた爺さんが いつしか俺を煙たがるようにはなったが……
jpnSearchText:
オフクロ込みで良くしてくれてた爺さんが
いつしか俺を煙たがるようにはなったが……

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: Anyway, I'm just trying to do what I can for the people here.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm just trying to do what I can for the
people here.
jpnChrName: ──とにかく、街の連中のために 俺は俺のやれることをやるだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
──とにかく、街の連中のために
俺は俺のやれることをやるだけだ。

engChrName: I won't let anyone tie me down, though. I've always done whatever the hell I wanted—and that's not gonna change.
engSearchText:
I won't let anyone tie me down, though. I've always
done whatever the hell I wanted—and that's not
gonna change.
jpnChrName: ただし誰も俺を束縛はできねえ。 やりたいようにやらせてもらうがな。
jpnSearchText:
ただし誰も俺を束縛はできねえ。
やりたいようにやらせてもらうがな。

engChrName: Is that right?
engSearchText: Is that right?
jpnChrName: ヘッ、そうかよ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、そうかよ。

engChrName: ...Wait, why the hell am I spilling my guts to you?
engSearchText: ...Wait, why the hell am I spilling my guts to you?
jpnChrName: つうか何をベラベラと……
jpnSearchText: つうか何をベラベラと……

engChrName: Can we go back to talking about the plan now?
engSearchText: Can we go back to talking about the plan now?
jpnChrName: いいから早く本題の話をしろや。
jpnSearchText: いいから早く本題の話をしろや。

engChrName: Sure thing.
engSearchText: Sure thing.
jpnChrName: ああ、ジャックとハルの力を借りる話だな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ジャックとハルの力を借りる話だな。

engChrName: As far as I can tell, Samson and Richie are genuine gamblers.
engSearchText:
As far as I can tell, Samson and Richie are
genuine gamblers.
jpnChrName: サンソンとリッチー…… 調べた限り、奴らは生粋のギャンブラーだ。
jpnSearchText:
サンソンとリッチー……
調べた限り、奴らは生粋のギャンブラーだ。

engChrName: They might be cheaters, but their skills are legit. I'd bet they're on another level from us.
engSearchText:
They might be cheaters, but their skills are legit.
I'd bet they're on another level from us.
jpnChrName: はっきり言って、 その実力は俺やお前よりも上……
jpnSearchText:
はっきり言って、
その実力は俺やお前よりも上……

engChrName: Probably fancy themselves as bein' on the same plane as Jack and Halle.
engSearchText:
Probably fancy themselves as bein' on the same plane
as Jack and Halle.
jpnChrName: 名を上げるために、 ジャックとハルにこだわってもいるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
名を上げるために、
ジャックとハルにこだわってもいるようだ。

engChrName: And they want everyone else to think so, too, which is why they challenged Halle.
engSearchText:
And they want everyone else to think so, too, which is
why they challenged Halle.
jpnChrName: すると、ジャックたちとの勝負は 向こうも望んでいそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
すると、ジャックたちとの勝負は
向こうも望んでいそうだな。

engChrName: But they've steered clear of Jack so far.
engSearchText: But they've steered clear of Jack so far.
jpnChrName: だが奴らは、未だに ジャックには手を出せずにいる。
jpnSearchText:
だが奴らは、未だに
ジャックには手を出せずにいる。

engChrName: Which is fair. Jack's basically a living legend among gamblers.
engSearchText:
Which is fair. Jack's basically a living legend
among gamblers.
jpnChrName: ──ま、無理もねえか。
jpnSearchText: ──ま、無理もねえか。

engChrName: You've gotta be on your A-game and have all the luck in the world to take him down.
engSearchText:
You've gotta be on your A-game and have all the luck
in the world to take him down.
jpnChrName: ジャックは伝説のギャンブラーだ。 まともにやって確実に勝てる相手じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックは伝説のギャンブラーだ。
まともにやって確実に勝てる相手じゃねえ。

engChrName: Exactly. Even if you're a cheating bastard, winning won't come easy against him.
engSearchText:
Exactly. Even if you're a cheating bastard, winning
won't come easy against him.
jpnChrName: 冴えてやがんな小僧、その通りだ。
jpnSearchText: 冴えてやがんな小僧、その通りだ。

engChrName: So we're gonna make the idea of challenging him less intimidating. Any guesses as to what I have in mind?
engSearchText:
So we're gonna make the idea of challenging him
less intimidating. Any guesses as to what I have
in mind?
jpnChrName: だったらその先も分かるな？
jpnSearchText: だったらその先も分かるな？

engChrName: Hmm... We gonna bait them with something?
engSearchText: Hmm... We gonna bait them with something?
jpnChrName: 奴らを引っ張り出すには餌が必要……
jpnSearchText: 奴らを引っ張り出すには餌が必要……

engChrName: Ooh. I get it. We're the bait.
engSearchText: Ooh. I get it. We're the bait.
jpnChrName: クク、なるほどな。 その餌がアンタとオレってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、なるほどな。
その餌がアンタとオレってわけか。

engChrName: Bingo.
engSearchText: Bingo.
jpnChrName: ご名答だ。
jpnSearchText: ご名答だ。

engChrName: Now, let's go get Jack and Halle on board.
engSearchText: Now, let's go get Jack and Halle on board.
jpnChrName: そうと決まりゃあ、 まずはジャックたちに相談すんぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そうと決まりゃあ、
まずはジャックたちに相談すんぞ。

engChrName: Well, well. It's the man, the myth, the legend in the flesh.
engSearchText:
Well, well. It's the man, the myth, the legend in
the flesh.
jpnChrName: これはこれは…… ようこそ、《勝利》のジャック。
jpnSearchText:
これはこれは……
ようこそ、《勝利》のジャック。

engChrName: We meet at long last, Jack. So good of you to come out here to play.
engSearchText:
We meet at long last, Jack. So good of you to come
out here to play.
jpnChrName: ククク、ようやく会えたな。
jpnSearchText: ククク、ようやく会えたな。

engChrName: And he brought King's adorable little daughter with him. It's been, what, a week since we last saw each other?
engSearchText:
And he brought King's adorable little daughter
with him. It's been, what, a week since we last saw
each other?
jpnChrName: キングの娘…… ハルとは、約一週間ぶりか。
jpnSearchText:
キングの娘……
ハルとは、約一週間ぶりか。

engChrName: Ready to get your butt whooped again?
engSearchText: Ready to get your butt whooped again?
jpnChrName: また俺たちに負けに来たのか？
jpnSearchText: また俺たちに負けに来たのか？

engChrName: Grr... I'll be doing the butt whooping this time!
engSearchText: Grr... I'll be doing the butt whooping this time!
jpnChrName: くっ、言わせておけば……
jpnSearchText: くっ、言わせておけば……

engChrName: Don't let them rile you up, Halle. A gambler's always gotta keep their poker face up.
engSearchText:
Don't let them rile you up, Halle. A gambler's always
gotta keep their poker face up.
jpnChrName: 挑発に乗るな、ハル。 ポーカーフェイスを崩すんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
挑発に乗るな、ハル。
ポーカーフェイスを崩すんじゃねえ。

engChrName: I-I know.
engSearchText: I-I know.
jpnChrName: わ、分かってるわよ。
jpnSearchText: わ、分かってるわよ。

engChrName: I take it Jack told you about us over the phone?
engSearchText: I take it Jack told you about us over the phone?
jpnChrName: 俺たちのことは、 ジャックから聞いてるな？
jpnSearchText:
俺たちのことは、
ジャックから聞いてるな？

engChrName: Mind going easy on us? We're just a couple of newbies.
engSearchText:
Mind going easy on us? We're just a couple
of newbies.
jpnChrName: ま、今日はお手柔らかに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、今日はお手柔らかに頼むぜ。

engChrName: Ah, so you're the prodigy and the spriggan. We never heard of you back in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
Ah, so you're the prodigy and the spriggan. We never
heard of you back in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋に煌都の麒麟児だったか……
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋に煌都の麒麟児だったか……

engChrName: If you're only rookies, then you made a big mistake coming here.
engSearchText:
If you're only rookies, then you made a big mistake
coming here.
jpnChrName: フン、どちらも俺たちの本拠の メッセルダムでは聞かない名だ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、どちらも俺たちの本拠の
メッセルダムでは聞かない名だ。

engChrName: You just dropped into the lion's den, and we're gonna tear you limb from limb.
engSearchText:
You just dropped into the lion's den, and we're gonna
tear you limb from limb.
jpnChrName: 少しくらい腕が立つからと、 この場に来たことを後悔するがいい。
jpnSearchText:
少しくらい腕が立つからと、
この場に来たことを後悔するがいい。

engChrName: Oooh. I'm shakin' in my boots here.
engSearchText: Oooh. I'm shakin' in my boots here.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、なかなか口の減らない野郎だな。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、なかなか口の減らない野郎だな。

engChrName: Bet you guys are all bark and no bite.
engSearchText: Bet you guys are all bark and no bite.
jpnChrName: クク、後悔すんのはどっちだろうな。
jpnSearchText: クク、後悔すんのはどっちだろうな。

engChrName: All right, that's enough trash talk. We don't have all day.
engSearchText:
All right, that's enough trash talk. We don't have
all day.
jpnChrName: ま、無駄話はほどほどにして さっそく勝負と行こうや。
jpnSearchText:
ま、無駄話はほどほどにして
さっそく勝負と行こうや。

engChrName: Let's get this game on the road.
engSearchText: Let's get this game on the road.
jpnChrName: 俺たちも暇じゃないんでな。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちも暇じゃないんでな。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's play.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's play.
jpnChrName: フフ、望むところだ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、望むところだ。

engChrName: Can't wait to finally dethrone the king of gambling.
engSearchText: Can't wait to finally dethrone the king of gambling.
jpnChrName: 俺たちはこの時を待ちに待っていた。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちはこの時を待ちに待っていた。

engChrName: Your lucky streak is about to come to an end, Jack.
engSearchText: Your lucky streak is about to come to an end, Jack.
jpnChrName: さっそく本命（ジャック）とやらせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText: さっそく本命（ジャック）とやらせてもらおう。

engChrName: We'll be playing poker in pairs of two, as we agreed.
engSearchText: We'll be playing poker in pairs of two, as we agreed.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ約束通り、２対２のポーカー勝負。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ約束通り、２対２のポーカー勝負。

engChrName: No peeking at your partner's hands, though.
engSearchText: No peeking at your partner's hands, though.
jpnChrName: だがこれはあくまでも個人戦── 仲間同士でもカードを見せ合うことは禁止だ。
jpnSearchText:
だがこれはあくまでも個人戦──
仲間同士でもカードを見せ合うことは禁止だ。

engChrName: At the end of the game, we'll tally up the chips, and the team with the most will be declared the winner.
engSearchText:
At the end of the game, we'll tally up the chips, and
the team with the most will be declared the winner.
jpnChrName: そして最終的に残った チップの合計額が多かったチームの勝ち。
jpnSearchText:
そして最終的に残った
チップの合計額が多かったチームの勝ち。

engChrName: Sound good?
engSearchText: Sound good?
jpnChrName: このルールで構わないな？
jpnSearchText: このルールで構わないな？

engChrName: Works for me.
engSearchText: Works for me.
jpnChrName: ああ、もちろんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、もちろんだ。

engChrName: So who's dealin'? Your bodyguards?
engSearchText: So who's dealin'? Your bodyguards?
jpnChrName: ちなみに立会人（ディーラー）は そっちの護衛が務めるんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに立会人（ディーラー）は
そっちの護衛が務めるんだな。

engChrName: I'll be watching them like a hawk.
engSearchText: I'll be watching them like a hawk.
jpnChrName: 言っておくけど……
jpnSearchText: 言っておくけど……

engChrName: If I spot them cheating in any way, it'll be your loss.
engSearchText: If I spot them cheating in any way, it'll be your loss.
jpnChrName: 立会人のイカサマが発覚したら 問答無用で貴方たちの負けだからね。
jpnSearchText:
立会人のイカサマが発覚したら
問答無用で貴方たちの負けだからね。

engChrName: Fine by me. These guys know next to nothing about gambling, anyway.
engSearchText:
Fine by me. These guys know next to nothing about
gambling, anyway.
jpnChrName: 安心しな、こいつはあくまで 《メッセルダム商事》を通して雇った護衛だ。
jpnSearchText:
安心しな、こいつはあくまで
《メッセルダム商事》を通して雇った護衛だ。

engChrName: They're just a couple of bodyguards we hired through the Messeldam Trading Company.
engSearchText:
They're just a couple of bodyguards we hired through
the Messeldam Trading Company.
jpnChrName: ギャンブルに関しては素人だからよ。
jpnSearchText: ギャンブルに関しては素人だからよ。

engChrName: This is a battle between warriors who've honed their craft to an art. We're not gonna cheat—the victory won't feel earned if we do.
engSearchText:
This is a battle between warriors who've honed their
craft to an art. We're not gonna cheat—the victory
won't feel earned if we do.
jpnChrName: 互いに“技”を磨いた者同士の勝負…… ケチな不正で汚すつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
互いに“技”を磨いた者同士の勝負……
ケチな不正で汚すつもりはない。

engChrName: Hah. And here I thought you had no pride—but now I see it's just fickle.
engSearchText:
Hah. And here I thought you had no pride—but now
I see it's just fickle.
jpnChrName: ハッ、勝負師としてのプライドは 一応あるみてえだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、勝負師としてのプライドは
一応あるみてえだな？

engChrName: We'll see if they stick to their word.
engSearchText: We'll see if they stick to their word.
jpnChrName: クク、いずれにしても見物だな。
jpnSearchText: クク、いずれにしても見物だな。

engChrName: Ugh. Samson and Richie aren't full of hot air after all.
engSearchText: Ugh. Samson and Richie aren't full of hot air after all.
jpnChrName: サンソンとリッチーか…… 流石に口先だけじゃないわね。
jpnSearchText:
サンソンとリッチーか……
流石に口先だけじゃないわね。

engChrName: They're no pushovers, that's for sure. It's been a close game so far.
engSearchText:
They're no pushovers, that's for sure. It's been a close
game so far.
jpnChrName: ジャックは当然として、 確かに勝負師としての実力は本物だな。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックは当然として、
確かに勝負師としての実力は本物だな。

engChrName: I think our boys will pull through, though. The old fart's putting up a good fight.
engSearchText:
I think our boys will pull through, though. The old
fart's putting up a good fight.
jpnChrName: クク、だがオッサンも なかなか喰らいついてんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、だがオッサンも
なかなか喰らいついてんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Yeah, he's doing great.
engSearchText: Yeah, he's doing great.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうね。

engChrName: (Had to pull a few tricks out of my hat to get this full house.)
engSearchText:
(Had to pull a few tricks out of my hat to get this
full house.)
jpnChrName: （裏技を使って揃えたフルハウス……）
jpnSearchText: （裏技を使って揃えたフルハウス……）

engChrName: (This is a slam dunk.)
engSearchText: (This is a slam dunk.)
jpnChrName: （こいつなら勝てんだろ。）
jpnSearchText: （こいつなら勝てんだろ。）

engChrName: *cough* *cough* Sorry 'bout that.
engSearchText: *cough* *cough* Sorry 'bout that.
jpnChrName: あー、タンが絡んでしょうがねえ。
jpnSearchText: あー、タンが絡んでしょうがねえ。

engChrName: Is it just me, or is the air dry in here?
engSearchText: Is it just me, or is the air dry in here?
jpnChrName: この部屋、ちょいと乾燥してねえか？
jpnSearchText: この部屋、ちょいと乾燥してねえか？

engChrName: Yeah, a little.
engSearchText: Yeah, a little.
jpnChrName: ああ、言われてみれば確かに。
jpnSearchText: ああ、言われてみれば確かに。

engChrName: (Jack's givin' me one of his signals.)
engSearchText: (Jack's givin' me one of his signals.)
jpnChrName: （咳払い……間違いない、   今のはジャックのサインだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（咳払い……間違いない、
今のはジャックのサインだ。）

engChrName: (What should I do?)
engSearchText: (What should I do?)
jpnChrName: （さて、どうするか……）
jpnSearchText: （さて、どうするか……）

engChrName: (Coughing is the sign for folding...)
engSearchText: (Coughing is the sign for folding...)
jpnChrName: （咳払いは勝負を降りろのサイン、だが……）
jpnSearchText: （咳払いは勝負を降りろのサイン、だが……）

engChrName: (...but I really don't think I can lose with this hand.)
engSearchText: (...but I really don't think I can lose with this hand.)
jpnChrName: （ジャックには悪いが──   流れ的にもここで負けるとは思えねえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ジャックには悪いが──
流れ的にもここで負けるとは思えねえ。）

engChrName: (Sorry, Jack, but I'm gonna make the play!)
engSearchText: (Sorry, Jack, but I'm gonna make the play!)
jpnChrName: （今回は押し切らせてもらうぜ……！）
jpnSearchText: （今回は押し切らせてもらうぜ……！）

engChrName: Call. Full house.
engSearchText: Call. Full house.
jpnChrName: コール──フルハウスだ。
jpnSearchText: コール──フルハウスだ。

engChrName: Heheh. Sucks for you.
engSearchText: Heheh. Sucks for you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、残念だったな。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、残念だったな。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: ……なんだと？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだと？

engChrName: I've got a full house, too.
engSearchText: I've got a full house, too.
jpnChrName: こちらもフルハウス──
jpnSearchText: こちらもフルハウス──

engChrName: Except mine has a ten, so we win!
engSearchText: Except mine has a ten, so we win!
jpnChrName: ただし大きい方の数字は１０。 つまりこちらの勝ちだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただし大きい方の数字は１０。
つまりこちらの勝ちだ。

engChrName: Heheheh. Score one for us!
engSearchText: Heheheh. Score one for us!
jpnChrName: ククク、ざまあみやがれ。
jpnSearchText: ククク、ざまあみやがれ。

engChrName: Damn. They got you good.
engSearchText: Damn. They got you good.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、くらっちまったか。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、くらっちまったか。

engChrName: C'mon, man. Get your act together.
engSearchText: C'mon, man. Get your act together.
jpnChrName: おいおい……頼むぜ、オッサン。
jpnSearchText: おいおい……頼むぜ、オッサン。

engChrName: Looks like they were one step ahead of you.
engSearchText: Looks like they were one step ahead of you.
jpnChrName: ……どうやら相手の方が 一枚上手だったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやら相手の方が
一枚上手だったみたいね。

engChrName: (Coughing is the sign for folding.)
engSearchText: (Coughing is the sign for folding.)
jpnChrName: （咳払いは勝負を降りろのサイン。）
jpnSearchText: （咳払いは勝負を降りろのサイン。）

engChrName: (Can't imagine I'd lose with this hand...)
engSearchText: (Can't imagine I'd lose with this hand...)
jpnChrName: （この手で負けるだなんて   正直思えねえが……）
jpnSearchText:
（この手で負けるだなんて
正直思えねえが……）

engChrName: (...but I need to put my trust into Jack.)
engSearchText: (...but I need to put my trust into Jack.)
jpnChrName: （ジャックを信用するしかねえか。）
jpnSearchText: （ジャックを信用するしかねえか。）

engChrName: Fold. I'm out this round.
engSearchText: Fold. I'm out this round.
jpnChrName: フォールドだ── 今回は勝負を降りさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
フォールドだ──
今回は勝負を降りさせてもらう。

engChrName: Damn. Wasn't expecting you to fold.
engSearchText: Damn. Wasn't expecting you to fold.
jpnChrName: ……馬鹿な。 まさかここで降りるとは……
jpnSearchText:
……馬鹿な。
まさかここで降りるとは……

engChrName: You're just full of surprises, aren't you, spriggan?
engSearchText: You're just full of surprises, aren't you, spriggan?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……食えねえ野郎だな。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋……食えねえ野郎だな。

engChrName: Oof. Dodged a bullet there.
engSearchText: Oof. Dodged a bullet there.
jpnChrName: おお～、怖い怖い。
jpnSearchText: おお～、怖い怖い。

engChrName: Good call, Van.
engSearchText: Good call, Van.
jpnChrName: 降りて正解だったな、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 降りて正解だったな、ヴァン。

engChrName: Just had a gut feeling.
engSearchText: Just had a gut feeling.
jpnChrName: ま、虫の知らせってヤツだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、虫の知らせってヤツだな。

engChrName: (Thanks for the save, Jack.)
engSearchText: (Thanks for the save, Jack.)
jpnChrName: （感謝するぜ、ジャック。）
jpnSearchText: （感謝するぜ、ジャック。）

engChrName: Nice going.
engSearchText: Nice going.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、やるじゃねえかオッサン。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、やるじゃねえかオッサン。

engChrName: It's always good to know when to pull back.
engSearchText: It's always good to know when to pull back.
jpnChrName: ええ、よく踏みとどまったわね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、よく踏みとどまったわね。

engChrName: The heated battle raged on, both sides unrelenting as the tide shifted back and forth.
engSearchText:
The heated battle raged on, both sides unrelenting as
the tide shifted back and forth.
jpnChrName: この後も両チームの熱戦は続き、 一進一退の攻防を見せつつも……
jpnSearchText:
この後も両チームの熱戦は続き、
一進一退の攻防を見せつつも……

engChrName: Eventually, it all came to a head, where folding would spell certain defeat—and the victor would lay claim to every chip on the table.
engSearchText:
Eventually, it all came to a head, where folding would
spell certain defeat—and the victor would lay claim to
every chip on the table.
jpnChrName: いよいよフォールド禁止、かつ 多額のチップを賭けた大勝負を迎えるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよフォールド禁止、かつ
多額のチップを賭けた大勝負を迎えるのだった。

engChrName: (Okay. I've got the cards for a straight.)
engSearchText: (Okay. I've got the cards for a straight.)
jpnChrName: （ふう、何とか   ストレートまでは揃えたが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう、何とか
ストレートまでは揃えたが……）

engChrName: Well, frick. I got bad cards. Tonight just ain't my night.
engSearchText:
Well, frick. I got bad cards. Tonight just ain't
my night.
jpnChrName: ちっ、こんな大勝負の時に くそカードかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちっ、こんな大勝負の時に
くそカードかよ。

engChrName: Pull yourself together, man. I need you to have your head in the game.
engSearchText:
Pull yourself together, man. I need you to have your
head in the game.
jpnChrName: おいおい、頼むぜジャック。
jpnSearchText: おいおい、頼むぜジャック。

engChrName: You aren't fooling anyone, you know.
engSearchText: You aren't fooling anyone, you know.
jpnChrName: フン…… この期に及んで白々しいヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン……
この期に及んで白々しいヤツだ。

engChrName: We know you're up to something.
engSearchText: We know you're up to something.
jpnChrName: ああ、流石に この男が無策なわけがないからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、流石に
この男が無策なわけがないからな。

engChrName: (He's putting his right hand on his face. That's another one of Jack's signs.)
engSearchText:
(He's putting his right hand on his face.
That's another one of Jack's signs.)
jpnChrName: （右手を顔に……   今のもジャックのサインだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（右手を顔に……
今のもジャックのサインだ。）

engChrName: (I gotta discard one of my cards, but which one?)
engSearchText: (I gotta discard one of my cards, but which one?)
jpnChrName: （となると、どれを切るべきか……）
jpnSearchText: （となると、どれを切るべきか……）

engChrName: (Jack wants me to discard the king.)
engSearchText: (Jack wants me to discard the king.)
jpnChrName: （右手を顔に……は、   『Ｋを切る』で間違いない。）
jpnSearchText:
（右手を顔に……は、
『Ｋを切る』で間違いない。）

engChrName: (He must be aiming for a four of a kind with kings.)
engSearchText: (He must be aiming for a four of a kind with kings.)
jpnChrName: （つまり、ジャックの狙いは   Ｋのフォーカードか。）
jpnSearchText:
（つまり、ジャックの狙いは
Ｋのフォーカードか。）

engChrName: (Although, he did tell me to aim for a straight flush if it's within reach.)
engSearchText:
(Although, he did tell me to aim for a straight flush if
it's within reach.)
jpnChrName: （だが……ストレートフラッシュが   狙えそうな時は狙えとも言ってたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（だが……ストレートフラッシュが
狙えそうな時は狙えとも言ってたな。）

engChrName: (Guess I'll discard the jack, then.)
engSearchText: (Guess I'll discard the jack, then.)
jpnChrName: （なら──切るのはＪだ。）
jpnSearchText: （なら──切るのはＪだ。）

engChrName: All right. Swapping a card.
engSearchText: All right. Swapping a card.
jpnChrName: さあ、一枚交換するぜ。
jpnSearchText: さあ、一枚交換するぜ。

engChrName: (That's Jack for you. Always well prepared.)
engSearchText: (That's Jack for you. Always well prepared.)
jpnChrName: （さすがジャック……   すでに仕込んでくれてたのかよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（さすがジャック……
すでに仕込んでくれてたのかよ。）

engChrName: A straight flush of hearts. Well, how about that?
engSearchText: A straight flush of hearts. Well, how about that?
jpnChrName: ハートのストレートフラッシュ…… こいつでどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハートのストレートフラッシュ……
こいつでどうだ。

engChrName: WH-WHAT?! I lost with four aces?!
engSearchText: WH-WHAT?! I lost with four aces?!
jpnChrName: ば、馬鹿な……まさか Ａのフォーカードで破れるだと！？
jpnSearchText:
ば、馬鹿な……まさか
Ａのフォーカードで破れるだと！？

engChrName: Shit. We underestimated you.
engSearchText: Shit. We underestimated you.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋…… 正直、侮りすぎていたかもな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……
正直、侮りすぎていたかもな。

engChrName: And that cost you the game.
engSearchText: And that cost you the game.
jpnChrName: クク、ご愁傷様だな。
jpnSearchText: クク、ご愁傷様だな。

engChrName: He didn't do half bad.
engSearchText: He didn't do half bad.
jpnChrName: ハッ、いくら何でも出来過ぎだろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、いくら何でも出来過ぎだろ。

engChrName: Heehee. Van and Jack make a great team.
engSearchText: Heehee. Van and Jack make a great team.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァンとジャックってば なかなかのコンビね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ヴァンとジャックってば
なかなかのコンビね。

engChrName: I'm almost jealous.
engSearchText: I'm almost jealous.
jpnChrName: 少し妬けちゃうかも。
jpnSearchText: 少し妬けちゃうかも。

engChrName: (Jack wants me to discard the king.)
engSearchText: (Jack wants me to discard the king.)
jpnChrName: （右手を顔に、は……   『Ｋを切る』で間違いない。）
jpnSearchText:
（右手を顔に、は……
『Ｋを切る』で間違いない。）

engChrName: (He must be aiming for a four of a kind with kings.)
engSearchText: (He must be aiming for a four of a kind with kings.)
jpnChrName: （つまり……ジャックの狙いは   Ｋのフォーカードか。）
jpnSearchText:
（つまり……ジャックの狙いは
Ｋのフォーカードか。）

engChrName: (I'd like to be the one to lead us to victory...)
engSearchText: (I'd like to be the one to lead us to victory...)
jpnChrName: （できれば俺自身の手で   決めたかったが……）
jpnSearchText:
（できれば俺自身の手で
決めたかったが……）

engChrName: (...but when the chips are down, you can always bet on Jack.)
engSearchText:
(...but when the chips are down, you can always bet
on Jack.)
jpnChrName: （流石はジャック、この土壇場で   きっちり役を引き寄せやがる。）
jpnSearchText:
（流石はジャック、この土壇場で
きっちり役を引き寄せやがる。）

engChrName: All right. Swapping a card.
engSearchText: All right. Swapping a card.
jpnChrName: さあ、一枚交換するぜ。
jpnSearchText: さあ、一枚交換するぜ。

engChrName: Welp. No pairs for me.
engSearchText: Welp. No pairs for me.
jpnChrName: 俺はノーペア…… ちょいと狙いすぎたみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺はノーペア……
ちょいと狙いすぎたみたいだ。

engChrName: Hope you're luckier than I was.
engSearchText: Hope you're luckier than I was.
jpnChrName: ジャックの方はどうだ。
jpnSearchText: ジャックの方はどうだ。

engChrName: Well, see for yourself.
engSearchText: Well, see for yourself.
jpnChrName: ああ……俺の手はこいつだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……俺の手はこいつだ。

engChrName: Four kings. Well done.
engSearchText: Four kings. Well done.
jpnChrName: キングのフォーカード……見事な手だ。
jpnSearchText: キングのフォーカード……見事な手だ。

engChrName: However...
engSearchText: However...
jpnChrName: クカカ、ところがどっこい──
jpnSearchText: クカカ、ところがどっこい──

engChrName: ...it won't be enough to beat THIS!
engSearchText: ...it won't be enough to beat THIS!
jpnChrName: こっちはＡのフォーカードだっ……！
jpnSearchText: こっちはＡのフォーカードだっ……！

engChrName: ...Did you hit your head or something? That's three of a kind.
engSearchText:
...Did you hit your head or something? That's three
of a kind.
jpnChrName: 何の冗談だ？ どう見たってスリーカードだが？
jpnSearchText:
何の冗談だ？
どう見たってスリーカードだが？

engChrName: Wait, what?!
engSearchText: Wait, what?!

engChrName: That's not possible! I KNOW I had four aces!
engSearchText: That's not possible! I KNOW I had four aces!
jpnChrName: ば、馬鹿な…… 俺は確かにＡのフォーカードを……
jpnSearchText:
ば、馬鹿な……
俺は確かにＡのフォーカードを……

engChrName: Wh-What the hell happened?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the hell happened?!
jpnChrName: い、一体何が起きた……！？
jpnSearchText: い、一体何が起きた……！？

engChrName: That was like a magic trick.
engSearchText: That was like a magic trick.
jpnChrName: クク、もはや魔法じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: クク、もはや魔法じゃねえか。

engChrName: That was one of King's special techniques. It let him control his opponents cards. Jack's the only other person who can use it.
engSearchText:
That was one of King's special techniques. It
let him control his opponents cards. Jack's the
only other person who can use it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、キングとジャックだけが使える 相手のカードをコントロールする“技”……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、キングとジャックだけが使える
相手のカードをコントロールする“技”……

engChrName: I haven't seen that move in a long time.
engSearchText: I haven't seen that move in a long time.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりにいいものが見られたわ。
jpnSearchText: 久しぶりにいいものが見られたわ。

engChrName: You guys are down 500,000 mira.
engSearchText: You guys are down 500,000 mira.
jpnChrName: さてと、これでお前さんたちは 計５０万ミラの負けがついたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これでお前さんたちは
計５０万ミラの負けがついたわけだ。

engChrName: Wanna keep going?
engSearchText: Wanna keep going?
jpnChrName: どうする──まだやるか？
jpnSearchText: どうする──まだやるか？

engChrName: O-Of course we will! We're not gonna back down after a loss like that!
engSearchText:
O-Of course we will! We're not gonna back down
after a loss like that!
jpnChrName: も、もちろんだ── 負けたままで終われるかっ！
jpnSearchText:
も、もちろんだ──
負けたままで終われるかっ！

engChrName: We're done with you, though, Jack.
engSearchText: We're done with you, though, Jack.
jpnChrName: だがジャック……お前とはもういい。
jpnSearchText: だがジャック……お前とはもういい。

engChrName: I wanna play Halle and the redheaded guy. We're gonna squeeze 'em dry.
engSearchText:
I wanna play Halle and the redheaded guy.
We're gonna squeeze 'em dry.
jpnChrName: ハルと赤毛の若造…… たっぷり絞ってやるから覚悟するがいい。
jpnSearchText:
ハルと赤毛の若造……
たっぷり絞ってやるから覚悟するがいい。

engChrName: Yes! Eat that!
engSearchText: Yes! Eat that!
jpnChrName: よし──リベンジ成功よ！
jpnSearchText: よし──リベンジ成功よ！

engChrName: So what was that about squeezing us dry?
engSearchText: So what was that about squeezing us dry?
jpnChrName: クク、なかなか楽しかったぜ。
jpnSearchText: クク、なかなか楽しかったぜ。

engChrName: This is humiliating...
engSearchText: This is humiliating...
jpnChrName: あ、あり得ねえ……
jpnSearchText: あ、あり得ねえ……

engChrName: It's one thing to lose to Jack, but getting our shit kicked in by these nobodies is just plain embarrassing.
engSearchText:
It's one thing to lose to Jack, but getting our shit
kicked in by these nobodies is just plain embarrassing.
jpnChrName: ジャックたちにならまだしも、 こいつらにもやられるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ジャックたちにならまだしも、
こいつらにもやられるなんて……

engChrName: You expended all of your luck in your match with Jack and Van.
engSearchText:
You expended all of your luck in your match with
Jack and Van.
jpnChrName: ま、ジャックたちに負けた時点で 貴方たちの運も底をついてたってことね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ジャックたちに負けた時点で
貴方たちの運も底をついてたってことね。

engChrName: And now you're down 1,000,000 mira.
engSearchText: And now you're down 1,000,000 mira.
jpnChrName: とにかくこれで計１００万ミラの負けだな。
jpnSearchText: とにかくこれで計１００万ミラの負けだな。

engChrName: Time to pay up.
engSearchText: Time to pay up.
jpnChrName: 払うモンはきっちり払ってもらうぜ？
jpnSearchText: 払うモンはきっちり払ってもらうぜ？

engChrName: Guess we have no other recourse...
engSearchText: Guess we have no other recourse...
jpnChrName: わ、分かった……
jpnSearchText: わ、分かった……

engChrName: ...except to run away!
engSearchText: ...except to run away!
jpnChrName: ──なんて言うと思うか！
jpnSearchText: ──なんて言うと思うか！

engChrName: Let's scram!
engSearchText: Let's scram!
jpnChrName: 逃げるぞ、お前たち──！
jpnSearchText: 逃げるぞ、お前たち──！

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnChrName: きゃあっ！？
jpnSearchText: きゃあっ！？

engChrName: Halle! Get down!
engSearchText: Halle! Get down!
jpnChrName: 伏せろ──ハル！
jpnSearchText: 伏せろ──ハル！

engChrName: Gah! Damn flash grenade!
engSearchText: Gah! Damn flash grenade!
jpnChrName: ちいっ、フラッシュグレネードか！
jpnSearchText: ちいっ、フラッシュグレネードか！

engChrName: Cowards!
engSearchText: Cowards!
jpnChrName: あんにゃろう共……！
jpnSearchText: あんにゃろう共……！

engChrName: We can't let them get away!
engSearchText: We can't let them get away!
jpnChrName: 急いで追いかけんぞ、オッサン！
jpnSearchText: 急いで追いかけんぞ、オッサン！

engChrName: Then let's go after 'em!
engSearchText: Then let's go after 'em!
jpnChrName: ──おうよ！
jpnSearchText: ──おうよ！

engChrName: You two handle things here!
engSearchText: You two handle things here!
jpnChrName: ジャックとハルはこの場の収拾を頼む！
jpnSearchText: ジャックとハルはこの場の収拾を頼む！

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せとけ。

engChrName: Good luck!
engSearchText: Good luck!
jpnChrName: ごめん、後はお願いね。
jpnSearchText: ごめん、後はお願いね。

engChrName: I don't have any business here.
engSearchText: I don't have any business here.
jpnChrName: この建物に用事はなかったな。
jpnSearchText: この建物に用事はなかったな。
